name: 1 MOBILE STORE
description:
1 Mobile Store (also known as One Specialist Mobile) established since year 2007 with more than 15 years experience in the digital industry.
We are retail business which providing one stop mobile shopping experience in Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall. Products such as smart phones, smart home electronics, gadgets and accessories, as well as telco and mobile repair & service are all available in store.
Brands that we are carrying are such as Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, ROG, Black Shark and etc. As long as you name it, we have it! In addition, our professional repair service is available for iOS and Android devices.
We are also having strong believes in our core values, which are be genuine, be at the leading edge of trend, listen to customers, have integrity and be fair. We ensure you will have a great shopping experience with us.
ratings:

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

name: 108 Matcha Saro
description: 108 Matcha Saro celebrates the rich tradition of Japanese matcha with an exquisite menu that brings the authentic flavors of Uji, Kyoto. Specializing in matcha desserts like soft serve & parfaits, warabi mochi, and our signature Obanyaki, we invite you to indulge in the pure, intense, and vibrant world of matcha.
ratings:
(3â­) Nee matcha specialty shop at Sunway Pyramid Blue Atrium.

Seating is very spacious and comfortable. Deco is clean and simple with a hint of Japanese design tone.

Prices are around RM17 for an iced matcha latte and RM16 for soft served ice cream. Not cheap but won't break your bank.

Good place for a quick stop without having to queue up or fight for seats. - 3 months ago | (4â­) Signature 108 Matcha Love Parfait are perfect, rich with matcha taste with chocolate drip. Where is the dining policy during peak hour then or u der standing, if ur restaurant or cafe is full out a sign out saying it full not making us the paying customer to rush the chairs to seat our elders and whatâ€™s even more disgusting was having to face these young kids and parents who are guilty of deaf and table hogging. description: Retailing of ladies sports fashion, lingerie and other related accessories only.
ratings:
(2â­) The quality of the innerwear from this brand is actually quite good, and for my size (F100) they are one of the few that holds large size and have more than 3 back clip which i love, aside from that, the customer service is average.

My sister and I just recently purchased innerwear from here (22/4/2023) and the employees there are quite alright, I manage to find my size but my sister took some time in finding it, which she later noticed its not the right size for her on that day when we got back home.

I understand its her incompetence when it comes to choosing something you wear everyday and still able to choose wrong. So we went back to the store for an exchange (24/4/2023) and it's a different staff this time. Though I find this employee to be somewhat irritated due to her tone when she's serving. But the biggest problem was that she secretly CUT OFF the price tag after my sister had finally done choosing the right size WITHOUT informing us and for me, that just leaves a sour taste in my mouth.

I believe staff have to at least inform the customers that they will cut off the price tag due to whatever reasons presents. Either its because customers can only exchange product once or any other reason at all, for the staff to cut off the price tag like that is just another stamp approval of me not visiting this store anymore.

I'm not sure about the name of the employee but I believe the Person in charge can find out who that is. (24/4/2023. 12.46pm) - a year ago | (5â­) Their zero bra is so comfortable and soft yet offers good support and securely fits.   Customer service lady  is quite knowledgeable and helpful. Sometimes need to visit their other branches  for the popular colors and  designs that quickly ran out of size or stock. - a year ago | (5â­) On behalf of my girlfren, found tat tis brand inner wear is awesome. Customer Service is exceed expectation because they will give suggestion n advise. Keep it up, kudos! - a year ago | (1â­) Service very BAd - a month ago | (1â­) Service is so rude - 2 years ago

name: 4Fingers
description:
Originally from Singapore, 4Fingers is now available at Sunway Pyramid! 4Fingers started out as single store in ION Orchard Singapore in 2009 and people were intrigued by their flavours. This lead to a wild spread rebellion spread across the nation. The founders of this food establishment found the best Asian fried chicken, believe or not, in New Yorkâ€™s city on the subway scene. This is where it all began. Their original chicken recipe is more well-known have a fiery sensation which is as intense as their hot and spicy sauce. From there on, they spread their wings to other regions such as Malaysia, Indonesia and Australia to share what they believed.
How do they make their chicken taste so good? Their chicken is specially cooked to using their own house recipe which resulted in an awesome fried chicken that's packed with loads of flavour. They also use only fresh, locally sourced free-range chicken in kitchens which definitely speaks of quality of their own food. What makes their chicken recipe unique, spicy and crispy, it is cooked with natural herbs and spices, with zero artificial flavourings. In addition to that there is no MSG and instead they use naturally fermented soy sauces that packs a punch, offering their food in the most natural way possible.
Their signature Soy Garlic and Hot & Spicy sauces are made the good old fashioned way, fermented naturally using a traditional Asian method (soy beans, water, 5 months of Malaysian sun) and natural herbs and spices. Not only their chicken is great but they also offer a variety of things such as their delicious burgers and sandwiches, seafood and salad to appeal to many. Now that is available in our mall, this is a great addition for everyone to enjoy a chicken recipe originated from Singapore. Come and try it out!
ratings:
(2â­) I recently visited 4fingers and decided to try their deep-fried calamari, priced at RM20+ after tax. Unfortunately, the dish was underwhelming. The squid was not cooked properlyâ€”it was still rubbery and slightly wet, which made it unpleasant to eat.

I informed the staff about the issue, but to my disappointment, they didnâ€™t take any meaningful action. Instead, they just took a photo of the dish. I didnâ€™t want to cause a fuss, as I understand they were busy, but I still left feeling let down by both the food and the lack of response.

For the price, I expected better quality and service. I hope the restaurant takes this feedback seriously and makes improvements, both in the kitchen and in their customer service. Until then, I wouldnâ€™t recommend this dish. - a month ago | (5â­) First time having meal at this outlet.. Not crowded so I enjoyed myself.. name: 6IXTY8IGHT
description:
With its signature pastel pink exterior and interior you definitely wonâ€™t miss 6IXTY8IGHT as youâ€™re walking along LG1. If youâ€™re on a shopping spree, you wonâ€™t want to skip this super cute store that has so much to offer that itâ€™s established itself as â€˜a girlâ€™s favourite shopping destinationâ€™. Hailing from its headquarters in Hong Kong, the brand started out as a youthful and energetic lingerie brand founded by Erik Ryd, a Swedish entrepreneur with a well-known lingerie manufacturing business in Asia. A few years later, the brand expanded its range of apparel from its adorable to sexy lingerie line, to include nightwear, active wear, denim, tops, dresses, pants, loungewear and accessories.
As this shopping haven expands to become one of the fastest-growing fashion brands in Asia, it now has more than 200 outlets and counting all over. Lion is proud to say that the brandâ€™s first outlet on Malaysian shores opened right here at Sunway Pyramid in 2019! When they first opened their doors to all fashion-adoring shoppers, Lion was curious to find out what the intriguing name of their store meant. Turns out, the meaning behind 6IXTY8IGHTâ€™s unique name has its roots in Chinese numerology. Since Cantonese is the main dialect spoken in Hong Kong, their pronunciation for the numbers 6 and 8 have phonetic similarities to a phrase resembling â€œForever luck!â€.
Thereâ€™s definitely something for everyone here. With their wide range of lingerie thatâ€™s either cute and quirky, or sexy and alluring, itâ€™s amazing how comfortable and affordable it is too - who ever said you canâ€™t have the best of both worlds? Even their outerwear is nothing short of stylish chic, great to mix and match for every occasion â€“ whether itâ€™s that perfect date outfit, or for a day out with friends, or even to your office. With 4,500 square feet of retail outlet space, you can shop to your heartâ€™s content for the latest fashion trends so get ready to shop till you drop!

name: 7 Eleven
description:
As many knows that 7 Eleven Sunway Pyramid is a popular convenience store that people loved. They are the pioneer and the largest 24-hours convenience store operator in Malaysia. With more than 1,000 opened stores across Malaysia, 7-Eleven Malaysia opened its door to local entrepreneurs through its unique franchising program in 2009. They are the first franchisor in the local market to offer existing profit-making stores to franchisees.
Every 7-Eleven store carries over 2,200 products and services which includes their very own proprietary brands such as Slurpee frozen beverages and Big Gulp fountain soft drinks. They also provide an array variety of services available at 7-Eleven which includes bill payment service, sale of mobile phone reload cards, IDD/STD, Touch N Go reload, internet games' starter packs, reloads via MOL Point top-up, ink cartridge refill, photocopying, fax, automated teller machine (ATM), and bulletin board for neighbourhood community notices.
In the year of 2009, 7-Eleven introduced freshly brewed coffee and other hot beverages together with packaged fresh food and bakery for the convenience of customers looking for ready-to-eat hot food. This is due to the fact many customers want something fast and on the go hence this initiative. All food items sold in 7-Eleven are certified HALAL and undergo stringent quality control to ensure tastefulness and freshness.
Being the premier neighbourhood convenience store, community building is in the heart of 7-Elevenâ€™s corporate social responsibility framework. 7-Eleven Community Care is a non-profit entity set up to implement 7-Eleven Malaysiaâ€™s corporate social responsibility and philanthropic initiatives. They believe in giving back to the society we operate in, with a commitment to support the underprivileged groups and to sustain environmental conservation effort at the local community level across all regions. With such passion they have, an outlet was opened in Sunway Pyramid to serve the conveniences to many.
ratings: (4â­) The 7-Eleven on Jalan PJS 7/18 in Bandar Sunway is a reliable 24-hour convenience store. name: A Cut Above Salon
description: A Cut Above is all about a drive to excel and to be the best. From a 428 square feet salon in Wisma MPI in 1979, both husband and wife team â€“Winnie Loo and Richard Teo had built A Cut Above into one of the best hair salons in Kuala Lumpur. Winnie Loo was trained by hair maestro Vidal Sassoon, developing her skills and professionalism, she had gained all manner of prestigious awards locally and internationally. As the forefront of the hair industry, her works had been showcased in many international magazines. The company had also grown into Malaysiaâ€™s more premier group of salons with an established hairdressing academy â€“A Cut Above Academy. At A Cut Above salon, you can enjoy a range of top quality hair products and exclusive treatments. Furthermore, you will be administered with the finesse trained stylist to provide you a relaxing and rejuvenating session. Carefully crafted over 30 years, the team will give their best to offer in professionalism, skills, products and equipment that set to high standards and even higher ideals! Visit A Cut Above Salon at Ground floor(blue zone) to relax and walk out with assured confidence in your new look!
ratings:

The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: AAPE *BY A BATHING AAPE
description: "AAPE is the bold sister brand to A Bathing Ape, the Tokyo-born streetwear label. The 90s fashion house is attracting a new generation of followers with its unexpected inspiration and spirited takes on original designs. AAPE represents an evolution from the very first creative influences and celebrates the iconic Japanese ape-head motif, which has given casualwear impact since 1993. In this collection, expect loose-fitting shapes, plenty of standout camouflage, and artistically branded tees."

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. name: ABC One Cafeteria
description:
Hidden in a little niche of the Sunway Pyramid parking, lies the elusive ABC One Cafeteria. While most people may not have heard or seen it, those who has gone there at least once will drop by again when they can. Unlike most other eateries in Sunway Pyramid, ABC One Cafeteria prides itself in providing a down-to-earth, affordable meal that is devoid of the usual drapperies of fancy eatings. Customers can look forward to a hearty meal of staple local delicacies such as fried beehoon, fried rice, mee goreng, nasi kandar, fried chicken and fish, cooked Malay dishes, and occasionally a variety of 'kuih-muihs' to wrap up your meal.
Each item are resonable priced and well seasoned to entice the appetite and still be wallet-friendly, with a slight variation in menu on a daily basis to encourage repeat customers to pop by during their lunch or tea breaks. ABC One Cafeteria is also capable of catering to events that has been pre-arranged with their cooks. Customers can provide a list of their requests and have a discussion with the team to know if their desired menu can be prepared for a very reasonable price.
Do drop by the ABC One Cafe one day for a simple meal, that is both satisfying and filling!
ratings:
(4â­) It's a good establishment if you're looking for cheap food in sunway pyramid. It's a lil bit hidden but it's right next to a lift. Do note that this place is self-serve so it's not your usual mamak where the waiter will come to serve you. Since the staff's number are a lil bit limited, it might take a while if you're ordering food that need some cooking (mi goreng mamak etc.) If you're looking for something filling (and you want it fast), I would recommend you to order their nasi campur. The payment method here are by card, duitnow qr (you have to scan their duitnow qr) and also cash. The location has some echo to it, so you might have to speak louder when ordering your food/chatting with you companions.  Overall, I had a good experience dining here, though I wish the staff had called me promptly when my tapau-ed food was ready. Despite this, the quality, price, and convenience make it worthy of a four-star rating. - 6 months ago | (1â­) Price is totally out so expensive some more staff making fool us we eat 3 person rice nasi goreng ayam kam thn nasi campur ikan kari â€¦ but thm put extra one nasi goreng biasa after we said u put extra charges pls change bill thn agine same price said tex need to pay for tex also cut rm 3 alrdy. name: AGift with Care
description:
AGift With Care, a fragrance brand that originated in Penang and has expanded to Sunway Pyramid, is dedicated to creating captivating scents while also making a positive impact on society. Since its establishment in 2010, the brand has embraced a mission rooted in the philosophy of selfless generosity. Our commitment goes beyond crafting fragrances; it embodies a heartfelt desire to give back and spread kindness.
Our products of AGift With Care are meticulously designed with a focus on personal indulgence and well-being. Each creation is thoughtfully crafted to uplift spirits and infuse lives with positivity, promoting self-care. Whether used for personal enjoyment or given as thoughtful gifts, their scented offerings carry the essence of compassion and mindfulness, creating a meaningful experience for both the user and the recipient.
AGift With Care aims to forge meaningful connections and inspire individuals on their personal journeys. We understand that life unfolds in various stages, and as such, the brand continually adapts its products to meet the evolving needs and aspirations of its customers. By remaining attuned to the ever-changing lifestyles of their audience, we ensure that our offerings align with their desires and preferences.
While personal growth is significant, AGift With Care believes in the transformative power of emotional connections. Through our scents, we aspire to touch lives, spark joy, and foster a sense of unity within the community. As the brand flourishes, we actively contribute to society by dedicating ourselves to acts of giving, motivated solely by our desire to make a positive difference.
A Gift With Care extends an invitation to individuals to embark on a fragrant voyage where purpose meets passion. Together, we aspire to inspire, uplift, and create a ripple effect of kindness that resonates far and wide. By joining forces, we aim to spread their message of selfless generosity, leaving a lasting impact on individuals and communities alike.

name: ALOHA KARAOKE & CAFÃ‰
description:
Let loose and sing with all your heart! Aloha Karaoke features a Hawaiian theme with a more green environment which makes it stand out from other karaoke places. Indulge in the entertainment while enjoying good food and drinks. Host your birthday parties, friend gatherings, reunions or company outings in this 'chill' karaoke outlet. Aloha also offers a buffet spread for corporate events such as Maybank's Western Fusion Event featuring a variety of western food and even caters to Halloween parties. With the friendly and cheerful crew members dressed in Hawaiian outfits eveready to go out of their way to make you feel welcome and even party with you, your karaoke expereince at Aloha is ensured to never be a dull one.
What other better place to go for karaoke than Aloha which is situated at Sunway Pyramid. Go to the mall to shop or have a nice meal before walking over to Aloha for your karaoke session. You could even have your daytime fun at Sunway Lagoon and plan your nightlife party at Aloha!
Awesome deals featuring student discounts with a complementary free drink await you. Feel like leveling up your entertainment experience? Aloha also offers a selection of quality cocktails from beers to whiskey and shisha, which are rare commodities to find in other karaoke places. Choose your poison from the liquor, beer and shisha packages so everyone in your group can enjoy. Aloha even has a Cocounut Bar where you can order drinks and relax outside of the karaoke rooms if you ever get overwhelmed by all the excitement and noise where the spacious and holiday-feel seating area would undoubtedly put your mind at ease. Coming with your family, fret not for Aloha also provides a selection of non-alcoholic cocktails for the children to enjoy in a uniquely crafted porcelain vessel. Awesome promotional rates are also commonly offered during festive seasons such as Chinese New Year, Chirstmas and even Valentines Day to give you an amazing experience at an affordable price.

name: ANTA Sports
description: To Keep the World Moving through our passion for sports and community
ratings: (1â­) I went yesterday 24/10/2024. The sales person initially encouraged to go for 2 items for 30% discount. After that, ask us why not we go for more, as if we go for more than 2 items, we will get additional 10% discount on top of the 30% discount. So, because of this, we get the kids to try on their shoes and the kids are in love with the sport shoes. However, to our much disappointment, when we are about to pay, we feel weird, that the calculation didnt match what we were told, and the sales person just told us that, sorry, the promotion had ended a day earlier, but how can? as a big company did such a mistake. We still ended up buying because we didnt want the kids to be upset after choosing and trying and confirming their shoes, we ended paying RM87x instead of RM79x. This is really so unprofessional way, how can the staff be so unprofessional, or the company no notification of the promotion ended? I appreciate Anta to reply us for this matter. We were regular customer of ANTA, but truly disappointed with this misinformation and service yesterday at Sunway Pyramid branch. - 4 months ago | (5â­) Great location and good service. name: APT
description:
Weâ€™re Malaysiaâ€™s No.1 Choice! APT Salon is the largest salon brand in the salon industry, serving more than 2 million customers. We are everywhere across the regions with more than 40 stores nationwide.
Over the years, we created many happy customers by offering them a complete range of hair care services including haircutting, coloring, styling and treatment at affordable prices. All of these are possible because of our passionate, dedicated, and professional hairstylist team.
ratings:
(4â­) I was service by a short hair female hair stylish. Her cutting skill was good. However it will be better if she could put on a friendly smile. She looks very stern.
Anyway I'm happy with my hairdo for RM40. Is worth it. - 2 months ago | (5â­) a very much thank you to stylist Anne which attended to my hairstyling. Not only Anne give a good haircut, she attentive and provides a good chat. Anne also recommend treatment for my hair, which after a few days my hair really did felt better and much stronger. Iâ€™ve also bought a product recommended by her, it does help. Overall a great experience. - 5 months ago | (1â­) I went to APT for a hair wash and normal dry. I went here because I've been to APT Salon several times when I lived in Penang and the service and quality there was good. And even prices were very reasonable.
Over here, in Sunway Pyramid, they charged me 60+ RM for my thin hair. I was still okay to pay because I wanted good service.
The person who washed my hair couldn't understand a word of English. He took me directly to the hair wash basin for the wash, unlike how it used to be done at the Penang branch. Before starting I asked him to shampoo only once as my hair tends to get too dry with double shampooing. But he went ahead and shampooed twice anyway.
Then when he was applying conditioner I requested that he leave it on for a couple of minutes so it can actually condition my hair and he said ok, but washed it off in less than 15 seconds. ğŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸
Then, while blowdrying he used the high heat blast from the very beginning and kept bringing it very close to my scalp. And he kept focussing on the back of my scalp while the front was just airdrying and setting to become kind-of messy-frizzy..
After he was done I had to ask him to apply hair serum, and That's something that he should have done without me asking considering how sadly he had blow-dried my hair.
After the wash my scalp has been completely damaged. It's been almost 3 weeks now since this hair wash and my scalp has not recovered yet. The back portion of my scalp is still soar and extremely itchy and i usually never have an itchy scalp. I've never faced this issue ever before. I'm not sure if it's bad products used or bad technique or both together, but it's ruined my scalp. All I wanted was a relaxing hair wash. But instead left disappointed with a damaged scalp.
One thing salon Staff should understand is that everyone coming there has different hair types and should be handled according to that. ONE METHOD/FORMULA DOESN'T FIT ALL when it comes to hair. Especially in Malaysia where you find a mix of people from so many ethnicities it's expected all the more.
Anyway all in all, bad service and disappointing experience.
I will definitely not return to this salon again - in the last week | (5â­) Did my hair (colour and cut) with Bryan. Was lucking when i came walkin heâ€™s attended me. Love the consultation and also the result! Will definitely come again ğŸ‘ğŸ¼ - in the last week | (1â­) Serena i really don't understand what she is thinking, doesn't she feel guilty for giving someone else a haircut like this? Spending RM399 on a haircut like this, shame on you. aunty ğŸ‘ - 3 months ago

name: AVEDA
description:
The founder of Aveda, Horst Rechelbacher, had set the brandâ€™s mission to care for the world we live in, from the products made to the ways in which the company strive to give back to the society. Aveda is also striving to set an example for environmental leadership and responsibility towards the world of beauty and the world in whole. Whatâ€™s unique about Aveda? First, Aveda use 100% post-consumer recycled materials in their packaging. Apart from that, more than 83% of Avedaâ€™s waste is re-used or recycled in the primary manufacturing facility. In manufacturing process, renewable energy such as wind power is fully used to manufactured all Aveda products. The company had invested much efforts in responsible packaging and manufacturing as it is their vision to set new beauty standards of leadership through their commitment to supply chain integrity with traceable, fair and sustainable ingredients. Second, Avedaâ€™s products are also cruelty-free as animals are not used in any test. Being a cruelty-free brand is an important part of Avedaâ€™s mission to care for the world. Third, Aveda uses ingredients derived from the nature such as plants, non-petroleum minerals, water and more. Avedaâ€™s products are also formulated without parabens, phthalates and sodium lauryl sulfate which are harmful to us and the environment. What can you find at Aveda? They offer a range of hair care products for both women and men. For example, shampoo, conditioner, hair treatment, dry shampoo, hair aroma, brush and scalp oils to treat all hair problems. Visit Aveda at Ground floor (Orange zone) for more info and advice by the team!
#BeautyTreats
ratings:

name: Adonis
description: Beauty is a state of mind. If you look different that doesn't mean you are different from others finally what matters is your character. A stranger can't judge you by your appearance. No matter your age or gender, your bodyâ€™s largest organ is your skin. If you want your skin especially on the face to look its best and stay healthy, you need to take care of it. Healthy, good looking skin begins with skin care. Facials are an essential ingredient of your overall skin care program and you will love the benefits of facials. A facial is a spa therapy and massage that leaves your skin cleaner, softer, younger, and truly transformed. Facials can help clear clogged pores, quench parched skin and remove dead cells. Facials involve some massage which aids in blood circulation and lymphatic drainage. The facial massage also helps to relax facial muscles which can slow the onset of wrinkles on the face. Puffiness reduction, sagging in the face and skin cell renewal are additional benefits from these massage techniques. Facials help reduce the impact of sun exposure, smoking and other environmental factors as well as incorrect product use. During your facial, your licensed aesthetic, will recommend appropriate skin care for home use to help you continue the benefits of our facial and correct ongoing skin care issues. Adonis, with natural skin care, you donâ€™t have to worry about the added chemicals you arenâ€™t sure are safe. Natural ingredients can help protect against the sun and soothe irritated skin, so they are better for the skin overall as long as you choose the right products for your skin needs. Call Adonis, at Sunway Pyramid to schedule an appointment.

name: Aeroline
description: Aeroline@Sunway connects you with an executive coach for a city-to-city travel to Singapore and Penang in convenience, comfort & reliability!
ratings:
(5â­) VLT 8817, Scania 6X2 Double Deck equipped with the SKSBUS D3DD body.

14/10/2024
Seats 61A, 61B
8:30AM
Aeroline Penangâ€”Corus Hotel KL

Trip started PROMPTLY at 8:30 AM, no delays. Driver and crew, Faiz was very nice. They helped with check in, seat directory and baggage. The driver was very skilful when navigating through the narrow roads. In one instance, it was a 2 lane road and there was one car illegally parked.  The driver still managed to drive by without even needing to reverse.

At around 8:35, Faiz came down the row with comfy blue blankets and headphones.  The headphones worked great with the on-board entertainment (OBE). The OBE was equipped with many movies and songs, of different genres.

At about 9, Faiz served food to us. It had spicy rice, potato wedges and egg. The food was 9/10, tasty! He also served hot drinks which also tasted great!

The rest of the trip, he went around a few times to collect trash.

There was one stop at a fuel station for 15 MINUTES break.

At about 1PM-1:30PM, we arrived at Corus Hotel. Driver was nice enough to let me take videos of the bus.

2 mineral water bottles with Aeroline branding is provided.

Overall, awesome ride. It deserves more than 5 stars!

Bus Quality:

Can clearly tell that the bus was very well kept. The seats were clean and comfortable, recliner and leg rest was working. Screen was working, WC was also very clean. Tray Table also works perfectly fine. - 4 months ago | (4â­) Suggest the food to be improved because the portion is too little. Other than that overall is good. Thanks. - in the last week | (3â­) For those who want to travel with Aeroline, tips: DO NOT choose lower cabinet, it's near the toilet) as it smells bad everytime other passagers open the toilet door. Especially during evening journey. - a year ago | (5â­) Superb bus service. They have a lounge in the ground floor of the bus where you can literally have a work desk.  You can get lot of work done on your commute from KL to Singapore or vice versa. Staff are nice. There is a small toilet and pantry next to the lounge which also has a tv. - 5 years ago | (4â­) One of the most comfortable method to get into Singapore. Very comfortable buses with huge seats and included meals also. Toilet available in bus as well. name: Ah Cheng Laksa
description:
Despite all the fancy and high-class dining experiences that people can find in Sunway Pyramid today, people have always harbored a surprising fondness for the local tastes that they ate growing up. Traditional favorites have long ingrained itself into the taste bud of every person, regardless of which social class you are in, be it the rich man and his craving for the decadent roadside Ramly burger or a simple office worker looking forward to a hearty lunch of char koey teow.
Ah Cheng Laksa is one of those establishments that brings out the best in a local delicacy and transport the eater on a journey away from the stress of the day. Offering a varied menu of local mains and side dishes, the main item to stand out is the infamous laksa (it IS in the name after all, in case anyone is wondering)! With their secret inhouse blend of spices for the laksa soup base, they have elevated the aromatic taste of the dish to new levels of tastiness. For an added twist, customers are encouraged to add the pungent â€˜otak udangâ€™ sauce, which is a black paste made from prawn innards to give a special zest to the flavor. Adventurous customers can add some squeezed lime juice and fried onions to the soup, creating a memorable sensation that is hard to forget.
To bolster the delicious laksa, the menu also carries fried chicken meat rolls, more commonly known as the â€˜lobakâ€™, which compliments the laksaâ€™s taste. The presence of a meaty dish gives the meal a hearty and filling feel, which may be lacking from just the laksa alone, as the sour-ish soup stimulates the appetite further as you enjoy your meal.
End your meal with a fine dessert, be it a â€˜rojakâ€™ or the infamous ABC, every day is a good day at Ah Cheng Laksa!
ratings: (1â­) Was having dinner at Ah Cheng Laksa Sunway Pyramid on 23/2. Ordered a buttermilk chicken chop rice and it came as picture shown below. The chicken was completely over fried and became black on the top. Voiced out to the staff in the kitchen and the manager responded with â€œitâ€™s cooked in this way, usually. Doesnâ€™t seem to be something wrong.â€ The staff clearly did not admit this is wrong and they did not try to compensate or offer anything to replace. I would say this is the worst thing that could possibly happen to a F&B company. Quality control - bad. Staff quality - not up to standard and not educated as they did not know whatâ€™s the right thing to do they face issues. Perhaps this is the last time that I would step into the same restaurant unless the company is willing to change and make it better. - a week ago | (4â­) It's a bit crampy. name: Al-Ikhsan Sport
description:
Growing from just a single outlet established in 1993, Al-Ikhsan Sports has quickly expanded to earn its status as Malaysiaâ€™s No.1 Sports retailer, carrying an impressive range of sports apparel, equipment and footwear. Starting off as a single store in Johor owned by a husband and wife team, the brand has now multiplied its store count to having more than 130 outlets around the country. The brandâ€™s main purpose is â€˜to keep Malaysia fit and active by making sports affordable for allâ€™.
Staying true to their goal of providing affordable sportswear and equipment for their shoppers, Al-Ikhsan offers products from well-known brands at competitive prices. Attaining quality products directly from international brands such as Adidas, New Balance, Puma and many more, they have successfully differentiated themselves from competitors.
Carrying sports apparel for different target audiences such as football fanatics, children, or casual athletes, Al-Ikhsan is able to appeal to everyoneâ€™s personal preference! As the exclusive licensee for brand for Liverpool FC, Umbro and Lotto products, fans can make their way to their outlet on LG1 to shop for these. With their own in-house brand AL Sports, the company even launched a Muslimah sportswear range, whereby they introduced a sports hijab for Mulism women who were concerned about modest dressing while maintaining an active lifestyle.
Just recently in November 2019, they received the â€œBrand of the Yearâ€ Award for Malaysia, from World Branding Forum, UK.
Lion is proud to support home-grown brands and loves to watch them successfully become a top player in the industry!

name: Aldo
description:
ALDO is the worldwide destination for on-trend fashion footwear and accessories at accessible prices. Positive, authentic, and bursting with personality, ALDO is the lifestyle brand for people stepping up in the world.
ALDO specializes in the creation of high-quality fashion footwear, leather goods and accessories. The brand pays close attention to detail and to fine craftsmanship. ALDO is dedicated to bringing you both quality and cutting-edge trends at affordable prices, season after season. Whatâ€™s more, ALDOâ€™s dedicated team of buyers and stylists constantly travel the globe to keep you on the pulse of fashion. Whether the latest footwear trends are breaking in London, Milan, Paris, New York or Tokyo, ALDO will have them on your feet first!
ALDO aims to bring a total customer experience through its people, products and environments. Shopping should be memorable. They represent the companyâ€™s belief system and are the greatest articulators of what the ALDO GROUP is all about.

name: Anime Trend
description: The destination for anime lovers and collectors! Anime Trend at Sunway Pyramid puts on its shelves the latest collectible toys, key chains, gifts and figurines of various sizes. You would not miss this shop when walking through Marrakesh at LG2 as the attractive display of action figures facing the walkway would instantly catch your line of sight and make you pause to check it out. Anime Trend mostly specialises in Marvel, Transformers and popular Japanese Anime figures such as One Piece, Bleach and Dragonball. Some smaller sized figurines come in neat boxes which would make suitable gifts for your nephews or little brother or even your man whoâ€™s an enthusiast for these merchandises. Cute tsum tsum soft toys and pink girly toys also welcome little girls to check out the shop. Whether you are the one looking for another figurine to add to your collection or looking for quality toys for your loved ones, Anime Trend probably have what you need and more.

name: Anime Trend
description: The destination for anime lovers and collectors! Anime Trend at Sunway Pyramid puts on its shelves the latest collectible toys, key chains, gifts and figurines of various sizes. You would not miss this shop when walking through Marrakesh at LG2 as the attractive display of action figures facing the walkway would instantly catch your line of sight and make you pause to check it out. Anime Trend mostly specialises in Marvel, Transformers and popular Japanese Anime figures such as One Piece, Bleach and Dragonball. Some smaller sized figurines come in neat boxes which would make suitable gifts for your nephews or little brother or even your man whoâ€™s an enthusiast for these merchandises. Cute tsum tsum soft toys and pink girly toys also welcome little girls to check out the shop. Whether you are the one looking for another figurine to add to your collection or looking for quality toys for your loved ones, Anime Trend probably have what you need and more.

name: Arabian Oud
description: "In the bustling market of the old Alzal souk of Riyadh, a small fragrance boutique, stocking only the finest ingredients, opened its doors in 1982. This was the birthplace of Arabian Oud. Sheikh Abdul-Aziz Al Jasser founded the store with one mission â€“ to source and expertly blend the best oils and scents in the world. This uncompromising dedication to quality still guides the brand today. Arabian Oud has grown from its origins in the Alzal souk to become the largest Arabian fragrance house in the world. We have taken our oriental perfumes and oils, sourced and blended from the finest ingredients, to international markets, gaining many loyal fans as we have expanded. Today we boast over 900 stores worldwide, and our unique, luxurious perfumes are worn by customers from more than 36 countries worldwide. The most highly-prized ingredient of a perfumerâ€™s palette, oud is said to be the first pure incense found on earth. Derived from dark resin found in the trunk of centuries old Aquilaria trees, this unique perfume has a cultural and religious significance dating back to ancient civilisations. Oud has a deep woody scent that persists and evolves over the whole day. Our team of oud hunters practice unwritten rites handed down from generation to generation. Native to southeast Asia, the rare, resinous heartwood forms in the trunks and roots of trees infected with a parasitic mould. Our oud hunters work tirelessly to source and harvest the finest Agarwood, while respecting the delicate balance of nature to conserve this scarce prize for future generations. Our dedicated team of world renowned perfumers and bottle designers promise perfection in every blend. Using their wealth of experience, they sensitively combine exquisite ingredients in beautiful bottles to showcase the very finest in oriental perfumery. As well as our extensive range of retail perfumes, Arabian Oud has created unique blends for international celebrities and royalty."

ratings:

I was told by the receptionist lady that there was no masseuse available, so I thought a masseur would do because I had requested a 1 hour head, shoulder, and back massage. I told the lady to tell him to avoid from the sensitive areas like the chest and underarms.
We agreed & proceed with the payment.

However, there are a few things that have severely disappointed me:

1. The masseur asked me to lie face down and begin with leg massage. I was confused and asked him, but his response was brief: "wait" till he focused on so much of my hip, at which point I asked if he could start with head and shoulder massage?

2. When we continue with the head and shoulder massage, he tends to â€œmassageâ€ my chest, which makes me feel so uncomfortable that I have to stop him right away.

3. He assumed the massage was 30mins instead of 60 mins until I ask him to double check with the receptionist again.

4. I think they need proper training / professional training, comparable what he has done on the right side, but it was different on the left. Either too much emphasis on the right or only for a short time on the left.

5. Overall experience was really bad due to poor communication. Even if you ask a basic question, either no response or unable to communicate. name: Asics
description: Be comfortable while you walk! ASICS is the acronym for the Latin phrase â€œAnimaSana In Corpore Sanoâ€, which means â€œSound Mind In A Sound Bodyâ€ â€“it is their echo of consistency, innovation, commitment to quality and authenticity. ASICS has been central to their key objective: Producing innovative sports products solutions and technologies to help athletes and active consumers achieve their goals. With more than 50 years of experience in developing sports footwear and apparel, ASICS's research and development center in Japan work closely with athletes to create innovative sports product solutions for their customers. The core GEL cushioning system and Flytefoam were both renown in enabling the most comfortable and performance-enhancing footwear and apparel for all people. Besides comfort, ASICS is also committed to innovation and sustainability products by using technologies and materials that could help preserve resources and reduce the environmental impact. You will also be amazed by the different features of ASICS footwear with distinctive technologies for maximum comfort. For example, the GLIDERIDEâ„¢ design was inspired by the effortless coasting of a bicycle and it will change the way you run! Designed by Hiroaki Nishimura, he got his inspiration by â€œKORON-KORONâ€, a Japanese expression for the sound something makes when it tips over and continues toroll on its own, similarly like a bicycle to give an effortless coasting. Moreover,the uniquely curved sole features GUIDESOLEâ„¢ TECHNOLOGY served as a shock-absorbing landing zone, which means less fatigue and more miles. Running had beenn made easy with ASICS â€“your partner for the long run! You can find ASICS store at First Foor.

customer service. Highly recommend for skincare needs! - a year ago | (1â­) I did the acne targeted facial here â€œacne recovery therapyâ€ and Iâ€™m not happy at all at the results after two facials. The skin on my face is more sensitive and prone to spots than ever. I have started to get breakouts on my chin which I have never done before! My pores are more open I feel which is where the breakouts come from. the forehead also have stubborn breakouts that wonâ€™t go even with 2 months on highly rated dermalogica products such as the â€œage bright serumâ€ which was super expensive yet has done little for my breakouts. Before this acne treatment, my â€œacneâ€ was hardly noticeable and persistent but after this treatment it is due to my skin being more sensitive. I am extremely disappointed and frustrated. As I am from abroad and was only staying at Malaysia for short-term, I am not able to make a complaint in person or fight to get compensation - so I leave this review to warn other customers. If your skin breakouts arenâ€™t severe and inflammatory, just go for natural treatments. This one was intensive and only made my skin worse. - a year ago | (5â­) I have been a member of Aster Spring from the time it opened till present and Tracy (Sunway Pyramid branch) has always been very helpful, polite and I just love her facials plus product recommendations. My daughter too loves her facials and is always very happy with her service. Am going to sign up for facials for my son as well. Kathy too has always been polite and helpful. Love the service we get at this branch! Theyâ€™re both assets to the company. Keep up the great work! - 2 years ago

name: Asus Concept Store
ratings:
(5â­) Yesterday, I had the pleasure of purchasing the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED, and the experience was nothing short of excellent. The seller was communicative and professional from start to finish, making the entire process smooth and enjoyable.

Before finalizing the purchase, I had a discussion with him regarding the laptop, its specifications, and additional items. He was knowledgeable, patient, and happy to address my questions. As part of the deal, I also received a laptop bag and a complimentary pen drive, which added great value to the purchase.

What stood out most was his approachâ€”he wasnâ€™t pushy or overly eager to close the deal. Instead, he gave me ample space and time to make an informed decision, which I truly appreciated. His cool and professional demeanor made it easy to trust his recommendations and services.

The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED itself is a fantastic deviceâ€”sleek, powerful, and visually stunning with its OLED display. Coupled with the seller's outstanding service, it was a purchase Iâ€™m very satisfied with.

For anyone looking for a stress-free buying experience, I highly recommend this seller. It's rare to find someone who combines professionalism with a personal touch so effortlessly! - 2 months ago | (5â­) Needed a basic laptop for my daughter's work. Bought a Asus E1404F, 8GB Ram, 512gb SSD from this store, the salesperson is very helpful and experienced. Good model for students. - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) I just brought asus vivobook go E1504F ( R3-7320U, 8 gb ram, 512gb ssd 15.6 fhd amd radeon graphic, sliver w11h, H&S)
,no bad for student on study - 5 months ago | (5â­) I recently Purchased an Asus Vivobook 16 as a replacement for my old Asus x570 which is 6 years old. The new Vivobook is thin, light, has larger 16 inch clear screen and came with 16GB RAM which makes browsing very fast. The AMD R5 7530U also uses very low power consumption. It came with free bag and also had Raya discount which is an added plus point. - 10 months ago | (5â­) Like Vivobook series for they are light weighted laptop with attractive features and specifications. I selected Vivobook 16 for bigger display screen and latest processor yet affordable. - a month ago

name: Atmos
description:
Founded by Hidefumi Hommyo in 2000, atmos is known as a prominent Japanese streetwear and sneaker boutique based in Tokyo, Japan. atmos always catch the eyes of sneaker lovers with its ability to follow up with the latest sneakers trends and collaboration with popular brands including Nike, adidas, Puma, Asics, and many more brands. Since atmos' first Kuala Lumpur store opening in 2020, the team has continuously strived to deliver their utmost best to Malaysiaâ€™s streetwear community and culture, and here is the opening for flagship store of atmos.
The team aims to build a bridge between Malaysian with Japanese culture, which the store focuses on minimalist aesthetics featuring neutral and monochromatic colors, clean dimensions, and spaces efficiently utilized for unique functionalities of the store. To incorporate the Japanese minimalist aesthetics, the materials used were strictly focused on timber and concrete to provide a memorable in-store experience. The bonsai display and moss wall are the unique elements and representation of the store which brings a meaning of life or living within the store. Besides that, the feature wall highlighting all the latest, in-trend and highly demanded footwear.
Complementing the store, atmos features a Cafe named â€œNo Nonsenseâ€. The â€œNo Nonsenseâ€ cafe aesthetics feature a monochromatic, woody color scheme with hints of elements of subgenre Japanese pop culture which creates a cozy yet conducive area for visitors to dwell in their interests while having cultured conversations. To further complement the aesthetics, the cafe offers a curated menu of Japanese servings which emphasizes Japanese strengths in the culinary department.
From the outside, atmos is viewed as a Japanese streetwear shop & a cafe both at the same time portraying two different identities where sneaker culture is at its core, sneakerheads conversing about sneakers over a good cup of tea.
ratings:
(5â­) I just got back from travelling Japan and Europe and coming to this cafe really reminded me of how relaxing and peaceful. The concept of this coffeehouse is pure minimalist cozy. I seriously recommend coming here. - 5 months ago | (5â­) I recently had a fantastic experience shopping for sneakers at Atmos Sunway. I want to give a special shout-out to Zul, who attended to me throughout the buying process. His professionalism and friendly attitude made the entire experience smooth and enjoyable. Zul assisted me over the phone as I couldnâ€™t be there physically. He got me the pair i wanted and prepared it well so that the runner could take it and pass it to me. Finally, the delivery was successful done and I got the pair i want perfectly! Thank you zul for your excellent service, I'll definitely go to Atmos Sunway for my future sneaker needs. Highly recommended! - 6 months ago | (5â­) great service from Balqis! been trying to get a pair of shoes because i stand a lot so i need a really good one. bought a pair here based off of her recommendations and it's so comfy. will be back for sure ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ» - a month ago | (4â­) The comics & magazine are for displays only, a very pretentious choice of decor in my opinion.
Iâ€™ve been to cafe of similar caliber in Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan, comic that are placed so close to the customers, with cabinet lights, without glass are suppose to be readable.

name: Attic
description: Retailing of body piercing services and other related products.
ratings:
(1â­) A few weeks ago, I went to this earring store in Sunway Pyramid to get my ears pierced. The piercing was done by a female staff member with glasses. I specifically told her I wanted both ears pierced and repeatedly emphasized that the piercings needed to be at the same height on both sides. She seemed very impatient and assured me that they would be even. She then pierced my ears very quickly, took the payment, and said I could leave immediately.

Now that Iâ€™m home, I realize they are indeed uneven, and even people around me can notice the difference.

This was my first time getting my ears pierced, and I didnâ€™t expect it to leave such a disappointing experience. I am very dissatisfied with the results and the customer service attitude of the staff at this branch. I hope the shop owner takes this issue seriously, improves staff training, and ensures more patience in verifying alignment carefully before piercing. - 3 months ago | (5â­) Great and fast service! It is definitely more pain imo for helix needle piercing in that first injection for awhile. But bearable. I'd done it at Lovisa and it didn't hurt as bad = different type

Price is also quite expensive. So be prepared if you have $$$
RM90 for needle piercing ONE side
Additional RM49 AND ABOVE for titanium earrings selection that are flat back which is great. This one was about RM179 additional for helix

Overall great experience and will come back if I decide to do - a month ago | (5â­) just wanted to update: 0 bleeding, 0 redness! i totally forgot i pierced them when i got back home.

finally mustered up the courage to get an ear piercing for the first time. if you're looking for somewhere sanitary, sensitive skin, first timers, safe, Attic @ Sunway is a good choice.

i paid a total of rm300+ for needle piercing (much better than a gun) for both sides, upgraded to titanium earrings (rm45 each), cleaning spray & the cream. 100% worth it.

the lady with the headscarf & lots of piercings (i did not get her name sadly), was very kind, explained things, friendly, gave suggestions & was sanitary and quick.

i was in & out within 10 minutes, ears pierced & with everything i needed. - 3 months ago | (5â­) My go-to piercing place. This is my third time here and yesterday I went to get a double lobe on my right ear. I was pierced by Aisyah and she was so gentle and nice. The whole thing was done in five minutes. I did change to a titanium earrings and that bumps up the price a little bit. Two lobe piercings with titanium earrings cost me RM268. I also did ask Aisyah if I have the anatomy for a rook piercing and thankfully I did. Next time when I got the courageğŸ¤ğŸ¼ - 5 months ago | (1â­) Previously I did my belly piercing at this shop around 2018 which was done by a Chinese lady and itâ€™s still perfectly intact and I didnâ€™t have any reactions nor pain, so I went to the same shop around last year June to do my snake eye piercing, it was a Malay lady who did for me, and she literally pierced my tongue twice!! Cuz she messed up on the first piercing and it was too obvious that it wasnâ€™t parallel, the second time was still wasnâ€™t parallel but not too obvious like the first oneğŸ˜‘, I took out the piercing around last year November cuz I was so much in pain and itchiness for the whole time, cuz obviously it wasnâ€™t done properly ğŸ˜‘ it was quite expensive almost around RM200 something but I honestly donâ€™t mind to pay RM200 for a good piercing but it turned out to be otherwise !! Iâ€™m never going back to this shop ever again ğŸ˜‘ğŸ˜‘ if youâ€™re not well trained then donâ€™t bother doing the job ğŸ˜‘ I feel so mad cuz it was a waste of money and Iâ€™m literally traumatised cuz she pierced my tongue twiceeeeeğŸ˜‘ and the she has the audacity to tell me that â€œsengettt sangatttâ€ when she messed it up as tho I did a mistakeğŸ˜‘ - 3 weeks ago

name: Auntie Anne's Pretzel
description:
Award winning US-based company, specialising in soft pretzels with 1314 stores in 45 states and 26 countries, Auntie Anneâ€™s had become the global front runner in pretzel industry. When it landed its shores in Malaysia in 1996, Chrisna Jenio Sdn Bhd has embarked as one of the pioneer of modern snack operator in Malaysia. Being the master franchise holder that operates Auntie Anne's concept in Malaysia, Chrisna Jenio is the first to introduce and offer, fresh, hand rolled soft pretzels outside of United States of America.
Aunti Anneâ€™s Sunway Pyramid uses an open kitchen concept and products being made in a full view of customers and had since serve millions of pretzels to Malaysian pretzel lovers. With 49 locations across Peninsular Malaysia in their belts and with around 250 employees, they are serving 9 million freshly baked pretzels yearly. With their proven track record in serving quality food in a sustainable environment, they are passionately involved in every aspect of the operations. All of their stores are company-owned, thus ensuring the commitment on delivering quality in every Auntie Anneâ€™s store in Malaysia.
The companyâ€™s mission is to provide fresh, hot and golden brown soft pretzels, friendly and courteous service in a sparkling clean store. With this in mind, it will satisfy customers to keep them coming back as their aim is to turn Malaysia into a better tasting place tasty pretzels. Having pretzel perfect experience of 23 years, and blessed with the opportunity to be one of the pioneers in the modern food retail industry in Malaysia, they are prepared to expand and grow while the same time serving Malaysian pretzel lovers with more great and wholesome choices of product. Opening one at Sunway Pyramid is truly an honour to serve the best pretzels they can offer to customers from different backgrounds.
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Auri
description:

Founded in 2020, AURI is a community-centric fashion brand with a mission to provide you with the most comfortable & versatile clothing that suits your everyday. Our ideology was clear from the inception: we wanted to build a community to inspire and uplift for a better self, to feel good from the inside.
So here we are, after 2 pandemic years, building our very first flagship store at Sunway Pyramid! At AURI, we believe that everyone deserves to experience comfort in its truest form. When did fashion and confidence become synonymous with discomfort and accepted as the norm? Weâ€™re here to help women like you find the comfort you deserve.
Pop in for a visit at G1.79 & 1.80 for matching mummy & mini outfits too. We welcome you to our community, a place to inspire, to share & to shop. Created with YOU in mind because "Actually, you are the inspiration".

name: Ayam Penyet Express
description:
Penyet Express is your passport to authentic Indonesian and Malaysian flavors. We specialize in the art of "penyet," smashing fresh ingredients to release their full potential. Our dishes are a bold, flavorful journey to Southeast Asia.
From the fiery sambal to our signature ayam penyet, every bite transports you to the heart of these culinary traditions. We source the finest local ingredients and prepare them with care to ensure quality in every dish.
Whether you're grabbing a quick lunch, sharing a meal with family, or indulging with friends, Penyet Express promises an unforgettable taste adventure. Our food isn't just a meal; it's an experience.
Join us and savor the vibrant, aromatic, and authentic tastes of Southeast Asia. Penyet Express is where flavor meets tradition, and every bite is a taste of our passion for great food.
ratings:
(1â­) I've been patronising this restaurant whenever I'm here in Sunway Pyramid, I bring my friends here too. But I've noticed the drop in food quality.

The chicken doesn't smell and taste fresh. The colour of the fried chicken is dark and dull in colour (as compared to the past, and also compared to other penyet shops).

The dark colour of the chicken doesn't feels alright to me. But since I've ordered, I just finish it, and see what will happen @@.

The sambal also look different too, now very dull in colour, watery and doesn't have the good sambar chilli smell.

I'll try out another shop that is newly open in the mall instead next time. - 2 months ago | (1â­) Disappointing and Unfair Treatment

I had a very disappointing experience at this restaurant. A group of eight people before me was allowed to dine in, but when I, alone, asked for a table, I was refused without any clear explanation. The waitress seemed willing to accept my request, but the cashier refused. This inconsistency in service made me feel unwelcome and unfairly treated. If there are specific policies about solo diners, they should be communicated clearly and applied consistently. Unfortunately, based on this experience, I wouldnâ€™t recommend this place to others. - 4 weeks ago | (3â­) Delicious and spicy sambal and dish. Need improvement on the fried chicken and fish.
Cozy environment,  good service. Price is good. - 3 weeks ago | (3â­) Nasi ayam penyet - Dry chicken meat and black bones, taste very plain and dry. Please improve the food quality. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Recommended to try their food, really flavorful and filling. Waitress is really nice and the place is comfortable to eat.

I usually go for the lele but my friend swears by the chicken. Itâ€™s crispy and nice and the sambal is really the cherry on top!

Delicious! - a year ago

name: BEBEK GORENG PAK NDUT
ratings:
(4â­) 2 days ago while shopping in Sunway Pyramid with my family, we were rather hungry at 6 pm. It was already dinner time for us all. We didnâ€™t want any Chinese nor Western food . So we walked around the restaurants here to pick n choose what best to eat. So my niece who is rather adventurous , wanted to try some Indonesian food. We also happened to pass by this restaurant called Bebek Goreng Pak Ndut that serves duck n chicken cuisine Indonesian style. So we took a table n ordered our dinner. We ordered 2 pax of grilled duck n original duck plus another 2 pax of crispy fried chicken n grilled chicken. The food, to our surprise, was good . The prices were also reasonable. There were some Malay as well as some Chinese customers too. After our dinner when we left , we saw their special promotions during weekdays from 2.30pm - 5.30 pm. - 3 weeks ago | (4â­) The duck is crispy outside and soft and fluffy inside thus making it very delectable. The grilled duck is the best IMO.

There is an assortment of condiments that are available and it's unlimited. A delight especially for spice lovers. - a week ago | (3â­) Plenty of seats to choose. Ordered the fried duck. Nothing to shout about. It's too dry for my liking. At least the sambal provides a good cover. The cracker also not all is crunchy.

So, overall it's just mid. - a month ago | (5â­) It was my first time visiting Bebek Goreng Pak Ndut, as I rarely see it in Jakarta. The fried duck here is incredibly juicy and comes in a generous portion. The rice is also fragrant. Plus, you can top up your sambal for free! My recommendation is the Bebek Goreng and Sangan (fried & roasted) - 2 weeks ago | (4â­) The duck was really good, especially with their red sambal. The gado gado was interesting as it had tomatoes and potatoes. The peanut sauce was also too watery. - a week ago

name: BESTORE
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago
