name: BIBI'S POPIAH
description: Well known popiah from Ipoh with rich history since year 2000 made with fresh ingredients daily.
ratings: (4â­) Bibiâ€™s Popiah at Sunway Pyramid is a good spot if youâ€™re in the mood for fresh, tasty popiah! Iâ€™d give them four stars for the authentic flavor, with that classic balance of crunch and softness. There was a bit of a wait since itâ€™s popular and plenty of people were ordering, so service wasnâ€™t super quick. The staff handled it wellâ€”though they werenâ€™t exactly friendly, they stayed calm and kept things moving smoothly. Prices are fair, so itâ€™s easy to grab a few rolls without spending too much. Worth checking out if youâ€™re around! - 3 months ago | (1â­) The staff wore the same hand gloves to collect payment (in cash), hand me the mobile phone to collect my phone number, and to my surprise make my popiah too! Oh god! To my dismay, the other staff that I saw wrapping popiah of the customer before me is washing dishes and touching the bin with the SAME PAIR OF GLOVES! I am not surprised if she uses the same pair to prepare food later. This is super unhygienic. No matter how good is the popiah, unfortunately I will not return again until this practice is discontinued. This defeats the purpose of wearing a hand gloves. - 5 months ago | (3â­) We loved the branch in SS15, so was excited for this one in Sunway pyramid. Sadly it's not as good. It's not crunchy like the one in SS15, most probably cause it's a franchise and they can't do things fresh from the kitchen here. Staff was super slow, was testing my patience ğŸ˜… most probably got to drive to ss15 for the best experience for now. Maybe after they figure out quality control for all their franchises, it'll be a lot better - 4 months ago | (2â­) Quite careless. Ordered shrimp popiah n right in front of me she's making seaweed popiah. There's no one else around so I had to say something for them to recheck and redo. If I didn't say anything that's what I would have gotten. Shrimp popiah uses the tiny shrimps with shells on. Not really my thing. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Super nice popiah, crunchy keropok combine with flavourful turnip. The sauce is very nice, a combination of spicy and sweet... yums. Can request for extra chilli if you like extra heat! Will definitely come back again! - 5 months ago

name: BRILLIANT
description:
Incepted in 2000 as Brilliant Time Enterprise, rebranded as Brilliant Watch Sdn. Bhd. in 2018. We started with selling low-cost and low-end watches in the morning and night market. Our transformation began with setting up counters at local supermarkets.
We have since grown to be one of the leading brands in the timepiece industry, with a total of 13 shops and kiosk across Penang, Perak and Selangor. Through the expansion and recognitions, we have upgraded our products from low-end to low-middle-end and high-end categories.

name: BUNGKUS KAW KAW
description:
Bungkus Kaw Kaw is famous for strong, full-flavoured traditional foods & beverages made
from our own secret family recipes. Our name comes from the Malay word â€œbungkusâ€ (take
away) and the Hokkien word â€œkawâ€ (thick).
Just say â€œbungkus kaw kawâ€ and youâ€™ll get an authentic, full-bodied Malaysian drink to go,
packed in a plastic bag and secured with a red plastic cord that also serves as a carrier sling.
Quench your thirst with authentic, traditional drinks like Teh Tarik, Kopi or Cham. We aim to
be in every town and city in Malaysia, so everybody can say â€œBungkus Kaw Kaw!â€
With the influx of foreign coffee franchises, it has become difficult to buy authentic
traditional beverages, especially in shopping malls and offices. Bungkus Kaw Kawâ€™s mission is
to make these familiar favourites widely available again, made fresh-to-order in the original,
full-flavoured way, at an affordable price. And like all self-respecting mamaks, kopitiams and
warungs, we have our own home-made secret recipes and pride ourselves on pulling no
punches in giving you the strongest, perfect traditional brew.
Our signature drinks, Kopi Kaw Kaw, Teh Tarik Kaw Kaw and Cham Kaw Kaw are made the
good old-fashioned way to ensure the taste of authenticity and traditional. Not only our
lokal drinks are great, we also offer a variety of foods such as Nasi Lemak, Chee Cheong Fun,
Loh Mai Kai, Bihun Siam, Kuih Muih, Roti Bakar, etc. That shape our Malaysian culture today!
Now we are available in Sunway Pyramid, this is a great addition for everyone to enjoy a
lokal authentic drink or food from its taste of Malaysia. To satisfy your lokal cravings, do give
Bungkus Kaw Kaw a try!
ratings:
(1â­) My first time breakfast here. Not coming back. Very disappointed. Overrated and overpriced. Food taste nothing special. Quantity below average. A small cup of teh tarik is RM6.70. Basic nasi lemak bungkus daun pisang with only half an egg is RM4.90. Like airline prices.

Not sure what the hype is all about. You can easily get better and cheaper alternatives for breakfast elsewhere nearby. - 2 weeks ago | (3â­) The taste of the nasi lemak bungkus is no longer what it was. The sambal udang taste was flat. Non-spicy.
The toasted bread had a tiny slice of butter. I would think that they have lost their charm.
Service, too, is dropping. - a year ago | (2â­) Normal, very normal. Hot Coffee at RM7.80 without the taste of coffee, only sweetness.
But they are conveniently situated in the mall, this is the expensive version of Old Town White Coffee. Nothing special. - a year ago | (5â­) Delicious Bungkus at Sunway Pyramid!

I recently visited Bungkus Kawkaw at Sunway Pyramid and was thoroughly impressed with my meal. The New Nasi Lemak Rendang was a highlight - the rendang sauce was creamy, spicy, and perfectly balanced, served with a side of fragrant coconut rice.

To quench my thirst, I opted for the Teh Kawkaw, which was a strong and bold black tea that hit the spot.

The ordering process was efficient - simply pay and wait for your food to be prepared. The wait was well worth it, as the food was freshly prepared and packed with flavor.

Overall, I highly recommend Bungkus Kawkaw for a satisfying and delicious meal. Don't miss out on the Nasi Lemak Rendang and Teh Kawkaw - a perfect combination! - 9 months ago | (4â­) Conveniently located in the mall. Super cheap and simple tasty food. Limited selection but I guess thatâ€™s the idea. Nicely packaged in paper and banana leaf for take away. Lot of drink options.Plenty of a sitting area. Takes both cash & card. - 12 months ago

name: Baby Stroller
description:
Shopping can be a tiring activity!
Let your children have a break with baby strollers, tandem, child wheelchair or toddler cart.
Visit our Concierges located on G Floor & LG2 Marrakesh to rent. Reservation is available via phone call at 03-7494 3100 or 03-7494 3102 OR via online booking on our Sunway Malls Super App. The reservation will be hold within 20 - 30 minutes of the reservation.
*Terms & Conditions:
â€¢ Children using the baby stroller must be below 100 cm & weights not more than 15 kg.
â€¢ RM 50 refundable deposit will be collected.
â€¢ 4 hours of usage.
â€¢ Do not leave child unattended.
â€¢ Do not leave your handbag/shopping bags on stroller/hanging on the handle unattended.
â€¢ Use the lift to access different floors.
â€¢ Fasten seatbelts at all times.

â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. While we primarily focus on serving banana leaf meals, we pride ourselves in serving only fresh ingredients with intense flavours in generous amounts to satisfy your banana leaf needs. We use the freshest ingredients and do not cut corners. If it isnâ€™t good enough to serve to our own families, we wonâ€™t serve it to our customers.
Taking inspiration from Indiaâ€™s streets, arts and cultures, Bananabro elevates your dining experience giving you a taste of its authentic southern region through modern and contemporary touches in our decor, dishes and drinks.
We are here to cater to the those who love food, and as Malaysians we all love food!

If you donâ€™t have one or hand, or you â€˜re in need of a new one, stop by Barry Smith at Sunway Pyramid to shop for that faithful travel companion! Each piece of luggage is designed to fit any travel scenario be it formal or casual, business or leisure, and are ideal for those who prefer a touch of class without forsaking functionality and practicality. Hardside luggage are available for travellers who like a solid and sturdier feel to protect fragile items in their suitcase. The brand also carries a line of softside luggage with multiple compartments on the inside and outside for you neatly organise your belongings, while giving you the option to expand the luggage if needed. Besides deciding on hard or soft luggage, they also take other aspects into consideration, such as the number of wheels, the size of the luggage and the colour range. Barry Smith also offers a range of pilotcases that are the portable with multi-compartments to sort your items. Easy to manoeuvre, durable and secure â€“ Barry Smith luggage are truly a reliable travel companion. The brand also has a collection of laptop backpacks for the traveller who needs to use their laptop on-the-go, with some even being equipped with USB charging ports so you wonâ€™t have to worry about your laptop battery running out if youâ€™re away from a power socket. Another essential for travelling is a well-organised wallet to keep all your cash and cards secure and organised. Shop their selection of genuine calf leather unisex wallets available with RFID blocking feature to keep the content of your wallet secure. Get a genuine leather car key holder wallet with card slots and an ID card window thatâ€™s easy for you to arrange your things in order for a smooth journey ahead!

name: Baskin Robbins
description:
From sweet celebrations during good times, to cherished memories with close ones, ice cream has long held a special place in each tasterâ€™s heart. Founded in 1945 in Glendale, California, Baskin-Robbins has grown to become one of the worldâ€™s largest chain of ice cream specialty shops while keeping true to its neighborhood ice cream parlor values. Baskin-Robbins was co-founded by brothers-in-law and ice cream enthusiasts Irvine â€œIrvâ€ Robbins and Burton â€œBurtâ€ Baskin. Robbins worked in his fatherâ€™s ice cream shops as a teen, while Baskin produced ice cream for his fellow U.S. Navy troops while serving in World War II. Upon Burtâ€™s return from war, the entrepreneurs made their vision of creating a family-friendly ice cream shop a reality.
In its early days, Baskin-Robbins 31Â® began with a selection of 31 flavors â€“ a different one for each day of the month. Today, Baskin-Robbinsâ€™ menu has grown to over a thousand delightful ice cream flavors and an ever expanding assortment of delicious treats â€“ often creating new delicacies to fit local tastes as well! From blended drinks, ice cream, frozen yoghurt, ice cream cakes, sundaes and even to milkshakes, Baskin-Robbins is sure to have something for everyone! Having received halal certification by IFANCA as well, Baskin-Robbins strive to uphold the standards and quality of their offerings at all times. There are many forms of enjoyment in life: thereâ€™s spontaneous pleasure, anticipated pleasure, there is long-term happiness and there are spur-of-the-moment joys. For people everywhere, ice cream has probably generated each of those types of pleasure. Sweeten your life with a trip to Baskin-Robbins today!

name: Bee Cheng Hiang
description:
Being a well-known name for Chinese delicacies, Bee Cheng Hiang takes its root in Singapore in 1933, where an enterprising street hawker peddled the streets of Chinatown selling freshly barbequed meat. Business was especially brisk during festive seasons for this high-quality traditional delicacy, which Mr Teo Swee Ee introduced as â€˜bakkwaâ€™. Through his passion for calligraphy and divination, he created the Bee Cheng Hiang brand name, ç¾çé¦™. Each character is composed with nine calligraphic strokes, signifying brand longevity and a representation of the Bee Cheng Hiang experience. Today, the brand has spread across many parts of the world, including our very own Sunway Pyramid!
Visitors to their shops are treated to the sight, smell and taste of our products. Unchanged since 1933, their recipe retains the traditional taste, and is uncompromising in quality. Each bakkwa are still hand crafted, over traditional bamboo sieves. Thatâ€™s why no two pieces are the same. The meat is smoked for hours over the slow burning flames of charcoal.
Bee Cheng Hiang is more than just a â€˜bakkwaâ€™ company. Their Vision is to be Asiaâ€™s leading food company: providing quality products and services to the global market. In a world where food safety is of utmost importance, customers can enjoy their products with a peace of mind. Each bakkwa are made with 100% natural ingredients, without added meat tenderizer, preservatives, artificial flavouring or colouring and MSG.
This has remained true since their inception in 1933 and remains true today. Today, with more than 370 outlets in 12 territories, Bee Cheng Hiang is still committed to their core mission to be the best at helping people to experience and share enjoyable moments in everyday life.

name: Beutea
description:
Beutea - a modern tea beverage brand using "Freshly Brewed Chinese Tea"
(a combination of ancient Chinese and modern tea beverage). Beutea practices the four ancient tea ceremony skills â€œmoistenâ€, â€œsoakâ€, â€œboilâ€, and â€œbrewâ€ using extract from the finest hand-picked tea leaves originating from tea mountains of Yunnan and Wuyi in China as the base of their beverages. It is then blended with modern flavours such as fresh milk and fresh fruits to brew unique, exquisite, aromatic and delicious fresh tea beverages.
â€œA sip of tea lingers, two sips come with a long aftertasteâ€ serves as the purpose of founding the brand as we aspire to be the top unique and delicious fresh tea beverage brand. Beutea has always adhered to and maintained the high-quality requirements for tea beverages.
Beutea originated from the love and pursuit of the perfect cup of tea in life. We pour our hearts and souls into crafting each store, integrating elements of â€œancient tea cultureâ€, â€œmodernâ€ and â€œaestheticsâ€ into the storeâ€™s interior design, creating a space with rich textures and bringing tea drinkers a multi-dimensional sensory experience! Order a cup of fine tea, savour the aroma and have great conversations while sipping the perfect cup in a relaxed and beautiful environment at Beutea!

name: Birkenstock
description:
Discover the timeless comfort and style of BIRKENSTOCK iconic footwear brand. With a rich history since 1774, Birkenstock has been synonymous with quality and wellness for generations. Birkenstock's commitment to craftsmanship and innovation propelled them to become a global leader in orthopedic footwear. Their signature contoured footbed, made from natural materials, offers unparalleled support and comfort, ensuring happy feet all day long.
At BIRKENSTOCK Sunway Pyramid, renowned for its vibrant atmosphere and diverse range of offerings, making it a hub for fashion and lifestyle enthusiasts, you'll find a wide range of BIRKENSTOCK products that cater to diverse lifestyles. From their classic Arizona sandals, featuring adjustable straps and a cork-latex footbed and sneakers, there's a perfect pair for everyone. Step into a world of wellness and style with Birkenstock at Sunway Pyramid Mall.

name: Black Tap Craft Burgers & Shakes
description:
Black Tap Craft Burgers & Shakes is an award-winning restaurant brand that specializes in mouth-watering craft burgers and its world-famous CrazyShakeÂ® milkshakes.
The first-ever Black Tap venture into Malaysia, this edgy, urban concept restaurant offers a casual vibe reminiscent of a classic American luncheonette with a distinctly New York feel, complete with 80s and 90s hip-hop and pop music and art covered walls. Sit back and savour an amazing array of all-American dishes, elevated to the highest level of whimsicality and originality, featuring a delectable menu of American comfort food, including burgers, sandwiches and salads! Diners can also enjoy some of the best craft beers from around the globe!
ratings:
(5â­) First-time customers. I came here with my family, and we all left with our bellies full and smiles on our faces. The food was great, everything we ordered was cooked to perfection. The music choice was very much appreciated (up tempo hip hop from the 90s and some new Jack swing) in the background while I watched the 2024 Olympics. The customer service we received from Cole, who gave us the best advice when ordering our food (and he makes excellent milkshakes). Wheng and Natsuha also made our experience lovely. We were made to feel very welcomed to the BLACK TAP. I would gladly go back and do it all over again. - 6 months ago | (4â­) Nice air conditioned restaurant, plenty of seatings. The burgers were mediocre, the burgers I ordered had dry patties that were under seasoned; quite disappointing but the milkshake and fries are good. Gotta love the over the top milkshakes.
Overall a good experience. - 5 months ago | (4â­) Ive visited here since it opened and with time, the lunch deals Portions has been getting smaller .

I can finish the food nowadays compared to the initial days when it opened :(
Taste still decent, but i prefer american portion for an american restaurant.
I like that the lunch menu expanded, and iced tea is now sugar free but my complain is the portion. - 4 months ago | (5â­) First time guest in blacktap. Had a Good atmosphere and excellent service! - 3 months ago | (3â­) The burgers were mediocre, but the milkshake and onion rings were good. Iâ€™ve visited many black taps, this branch pales in comparison to the others. Both burgers we ordered had dry patties that were under seasoned; quite disappointing.

Overall a below average experience. - 9 months ago

name: Boardriders
description:
We are pleased to announce the opening of the first Boardriders store at Lot F1 60 & 61 in Sunway Pyramid, Subang Jaya. Come visit us today as we weill be housing a range of leading brands such as Quiksilver, Roxy, Billabong, DC Shoes and RVCA!
Boardriders is a leading action sports and lifestyle company that designs, produces and distributes branded apparel, footwear and accessories for Boardriders around the world. Our apparel and footwear brands represent a casual lifestyle for young-minded people who are inspired by a passion for outdoor action sports.
#WeAreBoardriders #BoardridersMY
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Boat Noodle
description: Boat Noodle provides authenticity in taste, impactful flavour and an overall ambience that caters to your every celebration. Our noodles are served hot with a flavorful soup and in a small bowl. We bring the atmosphere of the streets of Bangkok, so our dÃ©cor is decked with wooden chairs and tables to evoke the Thai street food vibe
ratings:
(4â­) It's a fun spot for a quick and tasty bite! I sampled three boat noodle varieties:
1. Pathumtani beef rice noodle (soy sauce based)
2. Ayutthaya chicken spring noodle (stronger herbal broth)
3. Creamy tom yum chicken rice noodle (seasonal, spicy and yummy!)

Personally, I prefer the chewier rice noodles.  The soups were all good â€“ really depends on one's taste. I also ordered fried chicken skin; it was crunchy but average, still a fun snack. The Thai milk tea was decent. - a month ago | (5â­) I was disappointed when Boat Noodle closed down at Sunway Pyramid, but Iâ€™m happy to say itâ€™s recently reopened! The restaurant looks much better nowâ€”cleaner, more modern, and the interior design feels premium while still staying true to its brand identity. The service was quick and the staff friendly. My food arrived just five minutes after placing the order. Overall, I had a wonderful dining experience here - 2 months ago | (5â­) Warm and welcoming staff made me feel right at home, offering great dish recommendations. The boat noodles were perfectly cooked with a flavorful broth, tender beef, and fresh herbsâ€”small portions but packed with taste. The cozy ambiance and attentive service made the experience even better. Highly recommended for both food and hospitality! - 3 months ago | (5â­) I loveeeee the environment so much! Cosyyyy.

Service tiptop.
The foods were soooooo good. I had my normal meals Ayuthaya Rice Noodles and chicken skin. Soooo fresh and presentable as you can see in my photos.

Iced Lemon Tea is recommended, the sweetness level is just nice.

Keep it up!!

Located in Sunway Pyramid. I came early, 10 am sharp. Like always, by 10 am Sunway already packed with people, so plan your trip here. - 2 months ago | (5â­) A very warm welcome from all the staffs. name: Borneo Pearl
description:
Elegant and feminine, pearls are the perfect addition for achieving that classy appearance for any special occasion â€“ and Borneo Pearls at Sunway Pyramid is where youâ€™ll find a collection of pearls that youâ€™ll fall in love with. Having been in the industry for more than 20 years, Borneo Pearls has made its mark in the industry by offering high quality jewellery that is carefully handcrafted by trained artisans. These exquisite pieces come in various sizes, colours and styles to choose from - there's a pearl for every girl! They offer both freshwater and seawater pearls in the form of necklaces, rings, bracelets and earrings. Interesting fact about their products, freshwater pearls are formed in mussels, whereas saltwater pearls are formed in oysters! These exclusive pearls from Borneo will enhance any outfit whether itâ€™s with their classic or contemporary design.
They even offer Golden South Sea pearls, originating from the largest pearl-producing oyster, hence generally larger than most saltwater pearl varieties and take a longer time grow, estimated to grow between 2-4 years. So how are these prized South Sea beauties valued? It typically depends mostly on the colour of the pearl! Rare and highly desired, they range from beautiful shades of creamy white to deep gold, with shades of yellow and champagne falling in between. Pearls that have a deeper golden colour are considered more valuable, such as how the deepest golden colour, being referred to as 24 karat, is said to be the most valuable colour for South Sea pearls. However, these pearls may not be perfectly spherical as they have very thick nacre. When pearls are harvested, there is usually a large amount of drop pearls, baroque pearls, circle pearls and button pearls. With Borneo Pearlâ€™s wide offerings of designs, youâ€™ll find something to suit your taste whether itâ€™s a minimalistic or sophisticated design youâ€™re looking for.

name: Bread History
description:
Bread History originally is from Penang, Malaysia, now baking to serve at Sunway Pyramid. Bread History is an ongoing bakery organization specializing in developing quality bakery experiences throughout the Northern Region of Malaysia with additional diversified businesses associated with the industry.
Founded and driven by company entrepreneur, Mr. Simon Au Yong, the company was established in 2003, at Prangin Mall, Georgetown, and now operates more than 20 high driven quality bakery chains with exciting projects under development, in addition to the portfolio-associated businesses within the portfolio.
Bread History Sdn Bhd owns and operates our chains by partnering with international pastry/bakery chefs to facilitate the development of our brands in the Northern Region of Malaysia as we have built a strong platform in this industry. As a well-known brand in that region, we are aiming to expand our brand so everyone in Malaysia can experience Bread History.
To date, we are a multi-award-winning bakery chain with (15) boutique bakeries, (2) European bread bakery (Savour Bakery), (3) cafes under (1) central kitchen, with up to (320) employees and serving more than (100) types of buns, loaves, dry cakes and signature cakes every day and excite cake lovers with customized cake. Bread History Sdn Bhd are expanding our business by establishing (3) more outlets with 24 Xpress (mart) since year 2018 along with (3) Bread History Mart outlet.

name: Brooks
description: Regardless of whether you enjoy running as a past-time, or as a form of achieving that ideal body, as a competitive sport, youâ€™ll need a pair of running shoes thatâ€™ll help you to go the distance, and thatâ€™s just what youâ€™ll find here at Brooks in Sunway Pyramid! Founded in 1914, the American brand now focuses its energy on producing top-quality shoes for running, and concentrates on bringing the best performance technology to both men and women thatâ€™ll enable you to step up your game in the world of running. Encouraging you to follow your body and find your style of running, Brooks Run Signature lets you dial in how you want each run to feel so that you get more out of each stride, allowing you to choose from five different run experiences. Their Cushion line ensures that its soft and protective to cushion your every step. The Connect series is lightweight and flexible, enabling you to naturally feel your run. The Energize collection is responsive and springy, providing an extra lift to you stride. The Speed series is designed to be fast and streamlined so you can propel through your run. The Trail selection is created for you to venture out and trek the outdoor world. Brooks recognises that no two runners are the same, they offer various shoes that are suited for either roads, tracks, hiking trails or even cross-country runs. Using varying performance technology for the midsole, outsole, upper and the overall support of the shoe, youâ€™ll find the most comfortable fit that helps you perform at your peak on your next run. Their shoes also cater to different feet arches, whether you need a medium, high or flat arch. Available in different sizes and also widths, these shoes come in a multitude of eye-catching colours that are bound to match your style preference. Brooks also offers apparel, manufacturing top-quality sports bras, shorts, and tights that are suitable for women when they run, be it short or long distance. Men can also shop for tights and runnersâ€™ jackets here to match their pair of shoes.
ratings:

He took the time to provide detailed information about the different trail shoes, ensuring I found the perfect pair for my needs. What impressed me the most was his knowledge and dedicationâ€”he even taught me the proper way to tie my shoes for the best fit and support.

Manson is so great at recommending suitable shoes for my feet and also explain the functionality of the shoes and how to take care of it, plus how to wear it properly so you can protect ur feet/leg. 2) I went to the other shoe store and in summary was not satisfied with my encounter there.

By this time, the store owner arrived and I expressed my satisfying experience there. The owner requested me to write a review and this is why you can read this note now.
4) One lesson learnt is, respect and honour your customer well by employing a knowlegeable staff with the correct attitude and aptitude, like Mr.Syed. Tqvm. - 5 months ago

name: Burger King
description:
Every day, more than 11 million guests visit their local BURGER KING restaurants all around the world. And they do so because Burger King restaurants are known for serving high-quality, great tasting, and affordable food. Founded in 1954, BURGER KINGÂ® is the second largest fast food hamburger chain in the world.
BURGER KING commenced its earliest operations in Malaysia in 1997 with the opening of its first restaurant at the Sungai Buloh Overhead Bridge. Today, Cosmo Restaurants Sdn Bhd operates more than 50 BURGER KING restaurants all across Malaysia, where customers across the country can enjoy the great and healthy flame-grilled taste of Burger King products. Beyond just burgers, Burger King's menu has expanded from a basic offering of burgers, French fries, sodas, and milkshakes to a larger and more diverse set of products. In 1957, the "Whopper" became the first major addition to the menu, and it has become Burger King's signature product since. Burger King has also tailored its menu for regional tastes. With a local twist of variations to their burgers and menu, Burger King has introduced many interesting menus such as the infamous limited edition Nasi Lemak Burger and Satay Burgers, as well as the Nasi King combo to cater to their Asian customers. Even their drinks and side orders are varied from time to time, especially during festive periods such as Raya!
The original HOME OF THE WHOPPER, their commitment to premium ingredients, signature recipes, and family-friendly dining experiences is what has defined Burger King for over 50 successful years. First off a hot broiler in 1957, the WHOPPER, boasting a quarter pound of flame-grilled beef, ripe tomatoes, crisp lettuce, creamy mayo, ketchup, onions and crunchy pickles on a toasted sesame seed bun, has become the iconic burger for the ages and boasts generations of fans worldwide.

name: CHAGEE
description: CHAGEE is a modern and innovative premium tea house brand with rich cultural roots in Yunnan. As one of the earliest regional teahouse chains, CHAGEE remains dedicated to authentic tea culture. The Fresh Milk Tea series is beloved by tea enthusiasts and milk tea lovers worldwide, especially in Malaysia, positioning CHAGEE as a leading global premium tea house.

name: CHARLES & KEITH
description:
CHARLES & KEITH is the go-to fashion label for stylish urbanites, recognized for its curated collections of relevant designs. Founded in 1996 by entrepreneurs Charles Wong and Keith Wong with the purpose to spark joy and confidence in fashion-forward women by providing footwear designs that are versatile and appeal to on-trend sensibilities, the brand has evolved to offer a full-fledged line of footwear, bags, eyewear, accessories and costume jewelry.
Anchored by its four brand values â€“ Experimental, Desirable, Curated and Modern â€“ CHARLES & KEITH aims to celebrate and inspire women every day. With over 600 brick-and-mortar stores in its global network, CHARLESKEITH.COM extends the brandâ€™s reach through the United States of America, Asia Pacific and Europe.

name: CHATEAU DE C.A.F.F.E.I.N.E.E.S
description:
Operation Hour: 10AM - 11PM
Founded and fueled by passion for good food and hospitality, Chateau de C.A.F.F.E.I.N.E.E.S has grown from a humble coffee joint in 2006 to a unique cafe restaurant with a colorful mix of diners from young professionals to families and students.

Chateau de C.A.F.F.E.I.N.E.E.S is renowned for its fine coffees and offers a wide selection of international wines, beers and cocktails. Our menu offers an east meets west concept deisgned to satiate the palates of diners from breakfast to supper.

ratings:
(1â­) Totally a joke, I remember that gentleman who served me has totally 0 knowledge on the product, the funny part is we all should  how important a power supply is in a HiFi product. Quoting what that gentleman says "upgrading a lps for a DC in product makes no sense, as it's not 240V AC in type" you can't compare.

You are feeling a bit lost here? No worries, I believe he has no idea what he is talking about, they even bash their own product and having the mindset of expensive stuff must always be better. I believe a salesman who works in Hi-end HiFi shop should have the basic knowledge, having someone shytting on the brand they carry just because it's cheaper, and the fact that he doesn't appreciate the difference a good power supply can do in a system even for a DC in product, I don't think that guy is qualified for the job.

Furthermore, the guy is being very impatient and kinda rude, you will get a feeling of they don't want to serve you if you don't bring a stack of cash and put it on the counter to show them you are a serious buyer. Definitely would not buy from such guy even if I like the system.

As someone who has bought from other CMY branch, I feel disappointed with such service was provided.

There are more to add, when I try to test him out if he knows what he is selling. the product definitely said "analog volume", which switches between relays for the volumes control. When I bring up this topic, he is very sure that it's a false claim from the manufacturer, he claims that all manufacturers claim so, but it's a chip base digital gain volume control. So I would appreciate that if the salesman learn more about the product they are selling, if you are unsure, don't act like you know all of them. name: COMPASIA Trade-In
description:
CompAsia is one of the biggest names in tech recommerce across Southeast Asia. The CompAsia Sunway Pyramid store is the brandâ€™s first major retail establishment. After garnering major success through online transactions, patrons of the store can now experience the efficiency and reliability of CompAsiaâ€™s trade-in services in a tangible way. With over 10 years in dealing with preloved tech, the business has expanded, providing high quality products and services in over 10 countries. A strong 4.8 star rating on Google is testament to the outstanding customer experiences provided. Every device that goes through us is thoroughly checked to ensure functionality and security, inside and out. Our data wipe process adheres to global standards, making us one of only a handful of tech companies able to make this claim.
The recommerce of tech in other words, is the buying and selling of devices, prolonging its usability. Not only is this more cost effective to consumers, it is undeniably better for the planet. The manufacturing of smart devices consumes vast amounts of resources including power, water (during the mining process), precious metals and more. Some of the materials found in smart devices can also be toxic when disposed of irresponsibly. The mission of CompAsia is to extend the usability of devices, reducing the need to mass manufacture. According to Statista, around 1.5 billion brand new smart devices are sold each year, taking a massive toll on our planet and its natural resources. By properly ensuring the quality of the preowned devices that go through us, we are able to help consumers adopt a sustainable lifestyle that is also going to save them money.
Aside from trade-ins, CompAsia also sells, finances and provides care for smart devices. Additionally, CompAsia works with many well-known brands across telcos, tech manufacturers, retailers and more. Our strong partnerships, along with tried and tested solutions are in line with our mission to maximise affordability, while minimising e-waste.

Launched in 2007 by the famous Cotton On Group, the brand presents women with an assortment of products catering to every femaleâ€™s body type. Pair this with their range of workout tank tops and sporty singlets which are sure to become not only your workout essential at the gym, but also a necessity for your athleisure-look on a casual day. Their sports bras and active crop tops have you covered with its support and comfortable fabrics, suitable for every sport you play. Shop their selection of innerwear today! Youâ€™ll find matching lingerie sets, and an extensive range of bras including cotton bras, lace panties, bralettes, contour bras, bandeaus, push-up bras, strapless bras, wireless bras, and more. Browse their range of g-strings, bikinis panties, briefs, boyleg underwear and seamless panties that are comfy enough for everyday wear to keep you feeling confident. Your sleep session will never be the same with Cotton On Bodyâ€™s assortment of pajamas, nighties, sleeping gowns, loungewear and robes. Pampering yourself has never been easier as you slip into their comfortable sleepwear, perfect for a good nightâ€™s rest. With your beach body ready, itâ€™s important to get swimwear that flatters your figure, check out the brandâ€™s bikini tops and bottoms, one-pieces, and also beach cover-ups. For the mum-to-be or new mommies, who says you canâ€™t get in shape with a bump? Cotton On Body even has a range of maternity active wear just for you, to stay fit and healthy for you and your baby!

name: Calistee Accessories
description:
Calistee Accessories is now available at Sunway Pyramid! Calistee Accessories was founded in 2019, started out by selling accessories with small booths at various venues. The purpose of doing this is mainly to find and observe fashion senses from different people at different places. This would help in to understand and improve on our line of accessories.
Calistee Accessories are heavily inspired by South Korean's style. All the earrings that sold consist of 925 silver needles which are all hypoallergenic making them safe for everyone to wear. Besides that, there are also necklaces, sunglasses, socks, and various hair accessories. All the goods are carefully selected by us which ensures quality. The aim of this is to make customers enjoy browsing and shopping for accessories with us.
Sunway Pyramid is chosen to establish our first branch is because Sunway City is known as a strategic location compose of shopping malls, hospitals, hotels, tourist attractions, and other facilities which deliver people or tourists from a different region or nationality who visits. Calistee Accessories strongly believes that this will be a good opportunity to reach out to more customers to visit the store. Other than that, Sunway Pyramid is popularly known as Malaysiaâ€™s first themed shopping and mall full of entertainment. This landmark has attracted millions of visitors.

description:
Calvin Klein is a fashion lifestyle brand with bold, progressive ideals and a sensual aesthetic that is recognized worldwide. Our modern and minimalist approach to design, provocative imagery and authentic connection to culture has resonated with customers for over 50 years.

Founded in 1968 by Calvin Klein and his business partner Barry Schwartz, we have built our reputation as a leader in American fashion through the distinct Calvin Klein brand lines and a licensed range of products. name: Caring Pharmacy
description:
CARiNG Pharmacy was established in September 1994, starting off as a humble pharmacy located in Taman Muda, Cheras. The pharmacy was the result of 5 pharmacist course-mates coming together with a shared vision to provide quality and affordable healthcare solutions to the rakyat. At the time, the awareness of community pharmacy services was still low. The founders took these important steps to instill the value of pharmacists in the healthcare profession:
-Providing 12 hours a day, 7 days a week, full time pharmacist service.
-Providing easily accessible pharmacist counseling service, free blood pressure checks and other health checks at a minimum fee.
-Designing the store with a modern, open concept to maximize interaction with customers and merchandise.

name: Cars International
description: In the car beauty care industry since 1973, CARs International is well-known for its ability to deliver good-value service packages and long-term car beauty care for all customers. Offering a variety ranges of professional car restoration services, each carried out to the utmost level of care and quality according to the ISO:9001 tenets. You may pamper your car with vacuuming, interior and engine cleaning, washing, polishing, waxing and many more here! Furthermore, deodorizing or sterilization treatment for your car can also be done here! Adhering to their own professional services and premium quality policies, CARs have expanded more than 70 centres in Malaysia and over 200 centres in Asia-Pacific. Throughout the years, the brand had earned several accolades such as the Enterprise 50 Award (2001), Golden Bull Award (2003), the Largest Chain of Car Beauty Care Centres in the Malaysia Book of Records 2003, and the Superbrands Award (2005).

ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Cerruti 1881
description: The founder of Cerruti is Nino Cerruti, whom was an Italian stylist and fashion designer. He took over his family business when he was only 20 years old. From then, he was filled with vision and an expert in production procedures. By that, he began to modernise the textile manufacture to incorporate clothing production. Cerruti focus in producing luxury goods such as ready-to-wear, jeans, fragrances, watches and accessories. Nino and his team had launched a menâ€™s ready-to-wear collection in 1957 that received widespread coverage in the press and the public hailed it as a revolution in the fashion industry. By that, the House of Cerruti was known to be a Parisian Fashion House with Italian roots. In 1967, he established Cerruti 1881 which will be the luxury ready-to-wear line for men.

name: Chevy Original
description: Bags aren't only an accessory, they've evolved into a wardrobe essential, and if you're looking for a specific style especially in shades of navy green, army patterns, or neutral colours, drop by Chevy Original at Asian Avenue in Sunway Pyramid! Most of the products offered at this outlet are made from either canvas material or leather, making them more durable and lasting, and giving it a more masculine appeal. You can decide on getting either the leather or canvas products depending on where youâ€™re planning to use the bag. Going on a short hike with friends or for a family camping trip? Youâ€™ll definitely need baggage space to carry all your essentials, not to worry with their range of big canvas backpacks that have plenty of room and have multiple compartments to organise your stuff. These sturdy bags are ideal for these kind of trips, and the canvas material will help protect your items from any rainfall. Their leather bags look sophisticated and sharp, easily becoming your go-to bag for any casual day out. With a backpack you can keep your hands free and easy, convenient for carrying other things simultaneously. At Chevy Original youâ€™ll even find satchels also available in leather and canvas, that look cool and are completely functional, and itâ€™ll keep your belongings secure. One of the benefits of having the satchel is that you can easily reach inside and grab what you need without having to take off the bag unlike with a backpack. Otherwise, you could opt for a waist pouch, with the conveniences of both a satchel and backpack combined by keeping your hands-free and allowing you to retrieve your necessities easily. They also carry a range of card holders and wallets thatâ€™ll help you keep your cash and cards neatly organised so you donâ€™t misplace them.

name: Chicken Claypot House
description:
â€œChicken Claypot Houseâ€ is a contemporary, chicken-oriented claypot restaurant, serving delectable cuisines prepared with the finest ingredients in traditional Sichuan style. Our signature dishes which are best known for their pleasant aroma that greets our nostrils from miles away. They are prepared based on a certain secret recipe inherited from generation to generation, until it was discovered and auspiciously came to us today.

ratings:
(5â­) Short review:
Sesame Chicken Claypot â­â­â­â­â­
Suancai Fish â­â­â­â­â­
Long review:
In my 4th visit, I decided not to go for those chicken hotpot options and settled for a sesame chicken claypot and suancai fish. Yes, even Chicken Claypot House cannot deny the popularity of this dish now in Malaysia and has introduced it into their menu as a seasonal offer.
Sesame Chicken Claypot â­â­â­â­â­
I thoroughly enjoyed this dish. The sauce was really savory with just enough of that sesame taste. In addition to that, the finely chopped and pre-fried ginger gave this dish that extra fragrant taste. So it was not good for my dieting plan as I ended up having two and a half bowl of rice just because of it. The chicken was also pre-marinated I believe. It was flavorful although the kitchen staff gave me mostly chicken breast.

One criticism I have for this restaurant is its rice. It's very lumpy and has limited the joy of having this sauce on the rice. 1 star for the rice.

Suancai Fish â­â­â­â­â­
For this dish, it came in a humongous bowl. There's not a lot of fish slices but the quality of the fish is there. No earthy taste unlike Tai Er. For me, that is my number one criteria when it comes to eating fish. To be fair to Tai Er, the first and the last time I was there was about one and half years ago. I hope things have changed now for them. Coming back to Chicken Claypot House's version, the peppercorn soup gives you quite the heat after consuming it for a while. But it was good and I like the fact that the sourish taste did not go overboard as to render it acidic in taste. Another important thing to note is that it did not come with a THICK layer of oil unlike the others that I have tried before. So I did not have to spend time filtering away the oil. So it does hold up well to other restaurants that specialize in this dish. - 3 months ago | (4â­) Soups are super tasty and big bowl .love the fish soup portion reasonable come with é¾Ÿè‹“è† and herbal tea. Recommended. - 3 weeks ago | (4â­) 1. Signature claypot chicken: It was delicious and paired well with rice. The chicken was flavorful.

2. Herbal chicken soup: Just okay. The herbal taste wasn't particularly strong, with limited chicken pieces.

3. Fish head steamboat: A new addition to the menu. The dish had a decent taste.

Generally, the food here had a heavy flavor and left us feeling quite thirsty after the meal. It was enjoyable, but we would recommend having a beverage on hand to counterbalance the strong taste. - a year ago | (3â­) Indoor aircond environment, not to worry having steamboat even under warm weather. This eatery has few branches and their have several main dishes / pot soup to choose from, then you can add other ingredients.

Taste ok, nothing much to shout about. Definately not a cheap choice - 2 years ago | (3â­) First time there and I have to say it wasn't a happy experience. RM78 chicken herbal soup for two is steep. You have to pay rm2 for Condiments. We added on tongho vegy and just a small handful costed rm8.90. the pricing and portions didn't make any sense.

Worked out to over rm60/pax with just veg and tofu added, 2 small rice and one glass of Chinese tea. I can't say I have much to say about the service either. - 11 months ago

name: Child Wheelchair
description:
Shopping can be a tiring activity. If your child is tired, not feeling well, or is injured, our child wheelchair is ready for rent. Available at any Concierges.
*T&C Apply.
â€¢ Child using the child wheelchair must be either below 15 years old or weigh not more than 40kg.
â€¢ RM 50 refundable deposit will be collected.
â€¢ 4 hours of usage.
â€¢ Do not leave the child unattended.
â€¢ Do not leave your handbag/shopping bags on the wheelchair/hanging on the handle unattended.
â€¢ Use a lift to access different floors.

name: Childhood
description:
Snackeez Enterprise was originally conceived as a trading company for snacks and confectionaries in 2015. In 2016, a new business concept was formed when interest in childhood themed items was observed and the company repositioned itself to fulfil the niche demand.
The first Childhood concept store came in the form of a humble push-cart in IOI City Mall, Putrajaya. Its financial success led to the subsequent opening of a kiosk in Mytown Shopping Centre, Cheras in 2017 which proved to be an even bigger success. Since then, the business has continued to flourish and was featured in articles and interviews by respectable local publications such as Berita Harian, Kosmos, Harian Metro, Sin Chew Daily and BFM to name but a few.
ratings:
(3â­) Small store at LG floor of Sunway Pyramid shopping mall. They are selling all kind of items from the past, which reminds of childhood memories. You can find candies, cookies, pastries, toys, etc here. Items price slightly higher side.

Everything we ordered tasted amazing, and the portions were just right. The restaurant was quite crowded, but it didnâ€™t bother me too much as the atmosphere was still lively and fun. However, the service was just okayâ€”polite but a bit slow at times. It wasnâ€™t terrible, but thereâ€™s definitely room for improvement. We ordered their mushroom jack fajitas & monterey chicken. Both came piping hot. The highlight has to be the fajitas. My favorite at Chili's. We enjoyed our lunch. Will surely return when the Tex Mex cravings kick in. - 5 months ago

name: Chizu
ratings:
(2â­) Restaurant Review: A Disappointing Dining Experience

I recently visited this restaurant after being drawn in by a 50% discount promotion. Unfortunately, the experience left me feeling underwhelmed and questioning the value for money. Hereâ€™s a breakdown of my visit:

Atmosphere â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜† (4/5)
The restaurant has a cozy and inviting vibe with wooden tables and tasteful decorations. Since itâ€™s located inside a mall, the air conditioning keeps the space comfortable, making it a pleasant spot to sit and relax. However, the ambiance didnâ€™t quite make up for the other shortcomings.

Service â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†â˜† (3/5)
The ordering process is straightforwardâ€”you place your order at the counter, and the staff delivers it to your table. While the staff was polite, it took about 10 minutes for our food to arrive, which is reasonable but not particularly fast. The service was average, with no standout moments of hospitality.

Food â˜…â˜…â˜†â˜†â˜† (2/5)
The food was disappointing overall. The portions were noticeably smaller than advertised, and the quality didnâ€™t justify the price.
â€¢	Chicken Katsu Cromburger â˜…â˜…â˜†â˜†â˜† (2/5):
The burger looked promising at first glance, with fresh and soft bread. However, the chicken was tough and difficult to chew, which ruined the dish. I added scrambled eggs and vegetables for an extra RM8, but they were bland and didnâ€™t add much flavor.
â€¢	Chicken Pepperoni Croissant â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†â˜† (3/5):
This dish fared slightly better than the cromburger. The croissant was flaky and buttery, but the chicken pepperoni filling lacked seasoning and excitement. It was edible but not memorable.
The overall taste of the dishes felt uninspired, with no standout flavors or attention to detail in preparation.

Price â˜…â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜† (1/5)
This is where things went downhill fast. The 50% discount promotion was misleadingâ€”it only applied if you ordered an overpriced drink. I ended up ordering a Bloody Mocha with Cheese for nearly RM17, which was overly sweet and gimmicky. With additional charges like RM8 for scrambled eggs, my total bill for two people came to almost RM78 after taxes. For this price, I expected much higher quality food and larger portions.

Parking - N/A
Since this restaurant is located inside a mall, parking depends entirely on the mallâ€™s facilities. It wasnâ€™t an issue during my visit, but this will vary based on location and time of day.

Final Verdict: Not Worth Revisiting
With its tricky marketing tactics, overpriced menu items, and below-average food quality, I wonâ€™t be returning to this restaurant anytime soon. While the atmosphere was pleasant enough, it doesnâ€™t make up for the lackluster dining experience or poor value for money. If youâ€™re looking for better options in this price range, there are plenty of other restaurants that offer superior quality at a fairer price.
Ideal Times to Visit: If youâ€™re still curious about trying this place despite its flaws, visiting during off-peak hours might ensure faster service and a quieter atmosphere.

name: Christy Ng
description: Creating a haven of gorgeous handbags and footwear for ladies, Christy Ng is truly a Shoe Heaven when it comes to fulfilling your wardrobe wishlist. Local shoe designer Christina Ng made a name for herself when she ventured into creating this Shoe Heaven to help every girl achieve having a closet full of fabulous shoes without breaking the bank. As she aimed to turn every girlâ€™s shoe fantasies into reality by crafting unique footwear made of exceptional quality and offered at decent price tags, she began creating a line of stylish yet affordable handbags, because of course every beautiful pair of shoes needs a gorgeous bag to match! Choose from ever-expanding selection of ready-to-made shoes, including flats, heels, lower heels, peep toes, pumps, mules, wedges, sliders and sandals, and even wedding shoes! Available in a multitude of colours, you can opt for various shades such as beige, puce, cobalt blue, butterscotch, olive, pink, maroon, red, silver and many more. Try on different styles to see what youâ€™re most comfortable with, whether itâ€™s strappy shoes, slingbacks, slip ins or more. The brand also uses a variety of materials to suit your taste, be it leather, suede, lace, microfiber, PU, or synthetic materials. Youâ€™ll definitely desire to have one of their handbags once you lay your eyes on them, as each design comes in so many different vibrant colours, you may even want more than of the same design because itâ€™s so hard to choose between them! From top handle bags, saddle bags, clutch bags, bucket bags, cylinder bags, shoulder bags, satchels and more, the brand constantly brings in fresh designs so thereâ€™s always something for you to look forward to every time you enter their outlet. Match their bag with a super cute wristlet or accordion wallet to keep your necessities well-organised. With the perfect pair of heels and bag to go with it, youâ€™re all set to conquer the world girl!

name: Clarins
description:
The French skin expert since 1954 and the #1 prestige brand in Europe*.
Once upon a time in Paris, a visionary man named Jacques Courtin-Clarins opened a beauty institute. Guided by his instinct for beauty, respect for women and immense love for nature, he created plant-powered formulas that changed the world of skin care forever. Today his legacy lives on in our proudly family-run company, iconic products and innovative, sustainable approach.
Clarins is skin care, make-up and all things beauty, at every moment of your life.
* Prestige face care product sales value in 2011 / Sources: France, UK, Italy & Spain (NPD), Germany (IRI), Switzerland & Netherlands (Nielsen).

name: Clarks
description:
Renowned for its unparalleled comfort, British-based international footwear retailer Clarks has made its mark globally with its 1000 stores and counting, and weâ€™re proud to say they have an outlet here in Sunway Pyramid.
The brand became synonymous with its famous Desert Boots, a pair of distinctive ankle-high boots made from calf suede leather, with a crepe rubber sole. Catering to both the needs and desire of men and women, their footwear comes in vast range of styles and collections. Men and women who seek comfortable footwear that makes them look sophisticated and classy should stop by Clarks and try on these different collections: Clarks Originals, boots, sandals, shoes, CloudSteppers, trigenic and unstructured. Or if youâ€™re more inclined to a specific design, you can always opt to shop based on the various styles they offer.
For the men, if youâ€™re looking for something thatâ€™s easy to wear, try on their range of slips ons. Need something that you can move around quickly in? Check out their practical yet still fashionable pairs of sneakers. Loafers, lace ups, casual and smart styles are also available to cater to everyoneâ€™s preference.
Women can either don on a pair of heels or wedges to add on extra height while looking effortlessly chic. If youâ€™re required to walk around for hours and donâ€™t think heels are the most practical option, not to worry, Clarks has got you covered with their flats, loafers, slips on, lace up, sneakers, smart and casual styles as well.
Now Lion has an idea for those of you shopping at Clarks, why not both you and your significant other get a matching style or collection? Itâ€™ll look super cute and what better way to experiment with fashion together! With shoes from Clarks you wonâ€™t have to worry about buying shoes to fit different occasions, these pairs of footwear are in a class of their own and will look good just about anywhere.

Clinique was a trailblazer when we launched the first-ever line of dermatologist-developed skin care in 1968.
Our approach to ingredients is the same now as it was then: We avoid using allergens, irritants and ingredients in ways that could potentially harm skin. And as ingredient research evolves, so do our products.
Today, all Clinique products are free from parabens, phthalates and fragrance. They are thoroughly vetted through a full suite of tests to help ensure your skinâ€™s safety.
No parabens. No phthalates. No fragrance. Just happy skin.

name: Coach
description: Synonymous with projecting that effortless New York style, COACH is a design house leader in revolutionizing modern luxury accessories and lifestyle collections. With its long-standing reputation since 1941 and having worked with countless celebrity brand ambassadors, youâ€™ll find only the finest creations at COACH in Sunway Pyramid. The brand presents collections of bags, shoes, apparel and accessories that embody all of lifeâ€™s greatest luxuries for both men and women. Depending where youâ€™re headed, they have a bag to fit your every occasion, ranging from satchels, crossbody bags, shoulder bags, totes, carryalls, small bags and even backpacks. With a handbag as elegant as the ones at COACH, you need a wallet thatâ€™s just as classy to complement it. Fall in love with their range of wallets, available in an assortment of colours, sizes and types. From wristlets, or small to large wallets, they come in single colours, colour blocks, unique patterns and prints, and various styles such as trifold, accordion zip, double snap and more. Personalize your bag and wallets with their line of adorable bag charms. Ever-stylish yet always comfortable are the range of shoes at COACH, including flats, heels and even sneakers to suit you fashion needs. Their collection of ready-to-wear apparel is to-die-for, consisting of elegant dresses, trousers, skirts, shorts, blouses, hoodies, sweaters, t-shirts, jackets, vests and coats thatâ€™ll make you look like you just got off the fashion runway. Be the envy of everyone as you top off the look with their accessories such as their watches, sunglasses, necklaces, bracelets, earrings and rings. COACH empowers men to look their best while keeping them organised with their collection of bags, including briefcases, totes, messenger and belt bags and backpacks, large and medium wallets along with card case. For the men who have exceptional taste in fashion, their collection of ready-to-wear apparel such as jackets, trainers, sweaters, hoodies, t-shirts, trousers, shirts, sweatpants and caps will make every man look effortlessly sharp. Pairing these with their line of belts, watches and sunglasses, top off the allure factor by spraying on the fragrance for men by COACH.

name: Coffea Coffee
description:
Coffea Coffee is a comprehensive coffee company that truly takes care of everything when it comes to coffee. They are a multi-award winning establishment specialising in Specialty Coffee bean from top quality coffee farms in South & Central America and Africa. They import high quality green beans from partnership farms by way of direct trade for our own roasting purposes. In addition to that, they are a member of Cup Of Excellence and official bidder since 2010 that is able to handle most exquisite bean of current coffee market. They have also achieved many barista championships and have represented Korea to compete in World Barista Championships since 2004 which makes them the choice for many people.
Coffea Coffee imports 500 tonnes of quality green bean every year from direct trade partnership farms that are located in South & Central America and Africa to serve specialty coffee at a much price that is consistently stable. Their green beans stocks are reserved and kept with professional humidity and temperature control to maintain its freshness and quality. The beans are roasted with perfect techniques and machinery, our monthly capacity to produce roasted beans is more than 50 tonnes per month based on our own collected data and analysis for decades.
They have 4 different kinds of coffee beans used by them which are Maestro, Madonna, Quartet and Quartet S. Maestro provides a sweet dark chocolate coffee taste while Madonna has a more traditional European blend that offers a sweet, fruity aroma and fresh acidity. The Quartet is a blend of Arabica beans from Central and South America but offers a distinct taste of the sweet, nutty and fruity, and hints of spices and chocolate body. The Quartet S is similar to the previous one but with adds Ethiopian beans creating a fresh, fruity taste and exquisite aroma. Opening at Sunway Pyramid has allowed them to share their coffee expertise and artistry for everyone to enjoy.
ratings:
(4â­) I was there on a friday, from early when they opened until around 11am, and the vibes were pretty nice, the dark, wooden aesthetics are nice, and it was quiet and chill.

I got a pain au chocolat and a caramel latte for 9.50 and 16.00 respectively, totalling to 27.05 after tax, which is a little steep of a pricing to be honest, but its just a little more expensive than usual cafe prices nowadays, so its still acceptable.

the pain au chocolat was average, nothing extraordinary, it had nice layers and a fair amount of chocolate inside, but for the price, I personally wouldnâ€™t get it again, but itâ€™s not bad.
the caramel latte was actually quite enjoyable, it fit my tastes well, itâ€™s somewhat sweet with good caramel flavour, but not overwhelmingly sweet, and the coffee flavour was present but more mellow than others iâ€™d say, which is still quite nice. and their ice is really crunchyğŸ‘ğŸ§Š

service was standard too, order and pay at counter, get a beeper thing, take a seat and wait until it beeps to go get your order.

overall not bad, would be back again to try different things.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Corroco
description: Every fashion-forward lady needs a stylish handbag to hold and keep her essential organised as she powers through a busy day ahead, and here at Corroco in Sunway Pyramid youâ€™ll find exactly that! Specializing in quality handbags and luggage that originate from Italy, the brand offers an extensive range of bags with durable bags with timeless and classic designs. Manufacturing their handbags with mainly Monogram fabric material with leather trimming, you can be assured that these bags are designed to last and remain ever-stylish. Corroco handbags are designed with multiple compartments for you to neatly organise your items, with pockets and slots for your smartphone, cosmetics, wallet, mirror and more. Crafted from genuine leather, these handbags come in a variety of shapes and designs to cater to each individualâ€™s personal style. Their handbags are versatile enough allowing you to alternate between holding it as a top handle bag, or choosing to wear it as a sling bag with detachable plus adjustable shoulder straps for your convenience. The concept of most of their handbags are minimalistic using single colours that are easy to mix and match with different attires in your wardrobe. They also offer trendy backpacks for women who prefer to carry backpacks instead. Browse their selection of wallets and purses to find one that ideally complements your handbag. Their elegant wallets are available in different styles, whether you prefer those with zip top closures, with button fastenings or bi-fold types. With numerous slots for you to neatly separate your ID, notes, coins, receipts and more you wonâ€™t have to worry about misplacing any of these important items. Available in multiple colours, some have optional wrist straps and hand carry straps for you depending on your needs. Whether youâ€™re travelling for a business or leisure trip, a convenient and stylish luggage from Corroco will help you get your belongings sorted and transported safely. With a range of luggage varying in size and colour, whether you opt for hard side or softs side luggage, rest assured youâ€™ll have plenty of room and even extra room for your shopping haul!

name: Cotton On
description: Fashion giant Cotton On has a huge retail outlet in Sunway Pyramid, the perfect shopping haven to cater to all your fashion desires and wardrobe necessities! As one of the eight brands under the Cotton On Group, the largest global retailer from Australia, the brand has currently expanded over a span of roughly 30 years to set up over 600 stores worldwide. Cotton On is synonymous with its trendy selections of womenswear, menswear and accessories, and also its proactive initiatives in sustainability. The brand is said to deliver the hottest trends always with their own twist on it, and to inspire the community to have fun with it. The brand carries such a wide array of products youâ€™ll be there for hours. For bottom pieces, ladies can choose from short to maxi dresses and skirts, shorts, leggings, denim skirts, chinos or jeans (in different styles: skinny, wide, high-rise, mom, straight, cropped). Tops offered at their outlet included shirts and blouses, graphic T-shirts, long sleeve tops, T-shirts, basic tops, coats, jackets, sweaters and cardigans. Other apparel available includes active wear, sleepwear, lingerie, maternity wear and swimwear. Check out the shoe section for an assortment of sneakers, sandals, sliders and flats, and the accessory section where youâ€™ll find pretty necklaces, bracelets, earrings and hair accessories. Men also have a variety of apparel to choose from. Their choices of top pieces include basic tees, tank tops, t-shirts, polo shirts, long sleeve tops, graphic T-shirts, hoodies, sweaters, long sleeve shirts, short sleeve shirts, jackets and coats. Match that top with any of their pants (joggers, chinos, sweatpants), shorts (denim, chinos, swim), or jeans (skinny, straight, jogger, slim). Donâ€™t forget to grab a pair of shoes at the outlet too! The kids wear at Cotton On has a collection for babies including new-born essentials, bibs, tops, bottoms, overalls, playsuits, dresses, all in ones and bodysuits, swimwear and even knitwear. For the little ones that are slightly older, the brand has a selection of tops, bottoms, dresses, overalls, costumes, swimwear, socks, underwear, pyjamas and shoes for those between the ages of 1 â€“ 10 years old.
