name: Crossover
description:
Humble beginnings are often paired with the greatest dreams. The year was 2005. Crossover started as a small sneaker store in the capital of Johor to breathe and bridge a culture of fashion, music and lifestyle. The man accountable? None other than the self-proclaimed sneaker freak himself - a visionary and a believer of self-expression and the power of individualism.
In no time at all, Crossover was making the rounds across the local scene, criss-crossing for a local takeover like tic-tac-toe. And over a decade later, Crossover has established itself as the pinnacle exclusive sneaker and streetwear house
brand in Malaysia, owing to its adamant obsession and passion as the top playa and of course, the love and support from the local scene.
Its rising popularity has placed it on the radar as one of the leaders of the best-In-class streetwear retailers, delivering only the most authentic experiences in the industry.

name: D'NATUREL
description:
Dâ€™NATUREL is a brand, which offers Freshly Handmade cosmetic, skin care and personal care products, which are Vegetarian and Natural. Dâ€™NATUREL as a brand focuses on Better Living. KBI Direct owns the brand. The Journey of Dâ€™NATUREL started with the idea of bringing Natural, Handmade and Vegetarian cosmetic and personal care products manufactured in Europe to Malaysia and other ASEAN countries. Experienced producers using high quality ingredients manufacture Dâ€™NATUREL products in Europe. Organic products are deemed to be more beneficial for the skin as it is presumed there are little to no harsh chemical ingredients, and are marketed thus. It ensures the skin is not exposed to foreign ingredients such as parabens (preservatives) which could cause adverse effects, such as subjecting skin to allergies and possibly stimulating cancer cell growth, in a study that was revealed late last year. Dâ€™NATUREL business model of directly selling to consumers along with lower margins enable us to offer these quality products to all our consumers at affordable prices. Europe is one of the biggest and matured market for organic and natural products. Organic and Natural products come with a whole range of skin benefits and therefore it offers a healthy and better lifestyle. No harmful chemicals are used in them as compared to regular products. Dâ€™NATUREL ranges of products are natural, handmade and 100% vegetarian hence suitable for everybody. We offer organic products as well. The synthetics used in some of our products are 100% safe synthetics. Dâ€™NATUREL products range covers multiple categories and our aim is to keep expanding into other categories and make natural products affordable for everyone. All Dâ€™NATUREL products are approved by the National Pharmaceutical Authority of Malaysia and are SAFE to USE.
#BeautyTreats
ratings:

name: DR KO DERMACEUTICAL
description:
Brought to you by DR KO Skin Specialist, Malaysiaâ€™s largest skin specialist, laser and medical aesthetic center, DR KO Dermaceutical is now at Sunway Pyramid. DR KO Dermaceutical at Sunway Pyramid is the first skincare retail store by DR.KO, specializing in providing high-quality professional skincare catering to various skin conditions and problems.

Founded in 1997 by Dr. Ko Chung Beng, a renowned consultant dermatologist, Dr Ko Skin Specialist began as a small skin clinic in Klang, specializing in dermatology, lasers, medical aesthetic and cosmetic surgery. Realizing a lack of quality professional skincare products tailoring to our local skin conditions, Dr. Ko decided to embark on the mission to mend the gap. Together with a team of professional skin care experts, Dr. Ko formulated a professional skincare range to help solve everyday skin problems. With more than 23 years of clinical use track record, DR.KOâ€™s products are clinically tested, safe, and proven to deliver results.
DR KO Dermaceutical skincare products utilize only the highest quality, medical-grade skincare ingredients. Dr. Ko believes that with consistent use of skin care products tailored for your skin, a smooth, radiant complexion will not be just a dream. To date, DR.KO Dermaceutical has 4 ranges of skincare products, namely, Dermax Clinicare, Ko Dermacare, Three Series, and Ko Perfect. They are particularly famous for their acne and pigmentation range. Over the years of clinical use, these products change the lives of many who suffer from acne and pigmentation problems, helping them to regain their self-confidence and restore their naturally beautiful skin.
For our fellow Muslim friends, DR.KO Dermaceutical also has a Wudhu-friendly range of products, allowing you to use them confidently & conveniently.
If you are still searching for the perfect skincare products that suit your skin or looking for the right products to tackle your skin problems, look no further. Visit DR.KO Dermaceutical at 1.86, ground floor to discover their clinically proven, trusted by dermatologist, professional skincare.
#BeautyTreats

name: Daiso
description:
Daiso is a Japanese variety and value store that offers customers products with unrivaled greater value to help enhance your lifestyle. We pride ourselves on the quality, variety, and uniqueness of our wide-ranging product line, which includes everything from stationery, kitchen, cosmetics, home goods and many more.
Get a taste of Japanese culture with our origami paper, calligraphy tools, obento products, sensu fans, and other traditional Japanese items.
ratings:
(5â­) After our dinner at Shake Shack on the ground floor of Sunway Pyramid, we went to do some shopping in Daiso here. The place was rather busy n at one point , customers had to queue up at the payment counter to make their payment. We browsed through the various sections of this store. It was full of different types of goods ranging from cosmetics, household, clothes, kitchen utensils n cutlery,stationery to even food n beverage. You name it n you can find almost anything here. No wonder so many people like to shop here. The prices are really reasonable n most items are usually priced at only RM 5.90 only. Except for other bigger n more expensive items- these come with a higher price. You can shop at your own leisure without any sales person breathing down your neck. What I bought were a pair of bathroom slippers,a face towel, a plastic comb , a plastic brush, 2 pairs of reading glasses n a few packets of munchies. We had to queue up when making payments. - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) The staff in all the outlets, not just this store are full of Filipinos, I always thought that I were in Philippines more than in Japan or Malaysia when  I visited Daiso, until I heard of Japanese song & woke up from Manila. But during my recent visit in May 2024, it started to see some local staff working there, especially as Cashier. This store is popular among young people, student, foreigner & tourist, especially female. Even though, the Japanese Yen had been down to the Forex rate of 3.0 but the price is never down but keep on increasing. Previously back to 3-4 years ago due to high Forex of Japanese Yen, Daisho keep on increased the price. Please adjust the price or you will lose of business & customer. - 9 months ago | (4â­) Daiso is a store offering a variety of everyday essentials at budget-friendly prices. They have a wide selection of products for your home and personal needs, including stationery, kitchenware, home decor, storage solutions, cleaning supplies, and DIY materials. Whether you're looking for kitchen essentials, cleaning tools, bathroom accessories, or personal care products, you may find what you need. - 9 months ago | (2â­) I have always been a loyal customer of Daiso because it offers unique also practical items that cannot be found elsewhere. So I give an extra star of this review.

However, today (Oct 6) when I was about to check out, a local cashier was chit chatting with her colleague and didn't provide me with any basic payment info's properly. When I requested to scan my Sunway Pals, she impatiently told me I should have mentioned it earlier and processed it without saying thank you. Shouldn't it be her responsibility to ask the customer beforehand, rather than the customer having to make the request?

I hope the management here provides proper training so that poor staff attitudes don't affect the shopping experience of customers, especially in such a prosperous mall. - 4 months ago | (5â­) Very spacious outlet. Very nice to shop here. Many Christmas stuffs to due this holiday season. Very properly arrange the stuffs here. Brightly lit and easy to move around despite with many customers. I love to shop in Daiso outlet. Good place. - 3 years ago

name: Dandy
description: Dandy is your favorite everyday Mediterranean restaurant that serves wholesome dishes to an array of irresistible pastries and desserts. Unwind in our cozy ambience with impeccable hospitality from the Dandy crew. Watch our talented chefs, whip up hearty, made-to-order dishes in our open kitchen, using 100% halal-certified ingredients. Whether you're here for a lunch or dinner gathering, a quick bite, a coffee break, or planning an event, Dandyâ€™s the perfect place to be. Come by and enjoy a dining experience that feels just like home!
ratings:
(3â­) Ordered the mixed grill, falafel platter, and summer at the sea. The food was quite good. They were grilled and fried nicely, with balanced taste. However, the portion was quite small, considering the price was on the higher side. The Lebanese coffee was  good. Services were good. Staff were friendly and attentive. - 2 weeks ago | (4â­) We ordered 3 main dishes and 4 drinks. The quality, presentation and portion of the food is pretty good.

Our mix platter were generally okay. My son love the yogurt sauce and I think he complimented it at least 10 times. Lol. The lamb meat is a little on the tough, chewier side. The kebab is also a little dense. Chicken breast cutlets a little overcooked. Hummus needs more olive oil & I would prefer if you don't spread it so thinly on the plate. By the time it is served it almost dried out. Probably just spread on certain portion of the plate and keep it thicker.

The beef burger (served using a pita bread) is good. My only comment is the sauce used in it taste a little like cheap cheese sauce. Otherwise, the nachos, salad are good. The meat inside is flavorful but still also on the dense side. I think maybe is the same meat mixture as the kebab.

The buffalo wings batter is really crispy. The fries are done so well. Super crispy and well seasoned.

The drinks were all great in taste and presentation.

We love the atmosphere and the service attitude. â™¥ï¸ - 2 months ago | (4â­) First time had our dinner to celebrate new year eve. The food was well presented, tasted good & value for money. Service was fast & reliable. Loved to see their see thru transparent kitchen concept where you can view the chef in action. Hope their business will sustain in Sunway Pyramid as there are too many F&B outlets there. - 2 months ago | (3â­) Flavour of the pizza was bland. Saving grace was the Tabasco sauce. Seemed to have just the dough, cheese, green pepper, tomato and beef strips. Didn't taste any base sauce. The milkshake with mangos, grapes and mint with something red like raisins had more ice than vanilla ice cream. Wasn't sure whether it was ice blended or milkshake though it said it's supposed to be made with vanilla ice cream. Still might go back to taste the other food hoping my order wasn't their specialty. - 2 weeks ago | (4â­) Good menu variety, very unique fusion of modern mediterranean food. Place is comfortable and bright, and service is good. Loved the nachos and especially that dipping sauce that came with it.
Ordered the falafel wrap because it seemed pretty unique. Taste was great but somehow it didn't sit well with my stomach later on.
We got the free baklava set from signing up and honestly it was not too sweet and just nice. Overall, I'd recommend to still give this place a try. - 2 months ago

name: Dar Al-Arab
description:
The first and leading Middle Eastern Restaurant in Malaysia. Our dedication to using only the freshest and finest ingredients and incessant passion of a man's love for authentic and fine Middle Eastern cuisine has undoubtedly rendered TARBUSH's incredible success and growth for all these years.
Business Hours: 10 am - 12 am
ratings:
(4â­) Finding this restaurant is like a treasure hunt if you are coming here for the first time.  To find it you need to enter via the Sunway Lagoon side of the Sunway Pyramid Mall and then head to a little alley at the side of the Jollibee restaurant. Walk approximately 10-15 metres and then where you'll see the restaurant on your right.

Now the decor and atmosphere of the restaurant is a close replica of a typical Middle Eastern cafe in the movies unless you have actually travelled there.

The waiting staff is courteous and accommodating.  Furthermore the staff that waited on us was pretty proficient in Mandarin and Hokkien which was a delightful surprise to me and my friend.

Now for the food... What can I say. It was really yummy with the lamb stewed to falling of the bone and the chicken was fork tender. The mix platter kebabs was scrumptious as well with just a minor misharmony with the chicken kebab being a tad dry in this symphony of good food vibes.

The pricing for the food is quite reasonable with each pax coming to approx RM30-40.

The verdict. Definitely will come again for a special occasion or to have. A taste of the Middle East. - a week ago | (5â­) Their food is so so good!! Every dish we got were just *chefâ€™s kiss*. Their balcony/outdoor seating looks over Sunway lagoon so you can enjoy ur meal with a view! They have great service too, Mr Abdur-Rahman was very friendly!! - 5 months ago | (5â­) Delicious and authentic middle eastern food! We ordered the big platter and we satisfied. Service was fast. The place has a nice decor and cozy. Would return here the next time we are at Sunway. - 6 months ago | (5â­) Friendly and helpful staff who even came out all the way to the atrium to bring me into the restaurant. Nice place to celebrate birthday with family with freebie and discount. Delicious food with huge serving, tender juicy lamb - 4 months ago | (5â­) I missed Arabic food. Thus, I tried to search around kl but couldn't find many choices. Luckily, I found one inside the sunway pyramid shopping mall! Quiet place, nice food, fast serving, and very friendly waiter! Price wise, I think acceptable as the portion consider big (somemore inside shopping mall). If I ever miss Arabic food, here is my choice! - 10 months ago
displayNam: Dar Al-Arab Gourmet Restaurant (Formerly known as Tarbush Sunway)

name: DayOne DayOne
ratings:
(5â­) If you are new to this restaurant, you might consider to try out their signature noodles. I personally donâ€™t feel the noodle has much different with the other branches.

Only thing is that the staffs here lack of smiles. They would be more cute and handsome if they do. - 2 weeks ago | (3â­) Dry Noodles were alright. The beef stew was average. The broth was tasty but a tad too salty and with the star anise just made it not very nice. Personally I don't like it. The portions were small given the high price point compared to other noodle resto. Very little contact with staff cos order thru QR and they just serve. Not sure if I'd patronize this place again. - 2 months ago | (2â­) Had great experience in other branches and decided to have lunch here. The service here is not very bad but they seem to be much slower and also less enthusiastic.

Food, ordered their promotion bowl pork yakiniku, the taste is so weird with peppercorn in it, it never mentioned that this Japanese fusion bowl has a little bit of spice.. not what I expected from the menu. - 2 months ago | (2â­) I had good experience eating at other branches so I decided to have lunch here. Ordered the signature braised pork chew noodles and saw a decent amount of pork under the egg. But don't let that fool you. A good 60% or more of those were actually fats and there were barely any actual meat. Wanted to fill myself up with the pickled cucumber instead so I tried asking for a refill and got rejected. Only thing decent was the atmosphere. - 4 months ago | (1â­) The service was good. The staff was friendly. However, I was quite disappointed with the food, the crispy chicken didnâ€™t taste good at all. I understand now itâ€™s CNY period, maybe is busier than usual, but I do hope they can improve the quality of their food. - a month ago

name: DermaDarahPPUM
description:
DermaDarahPPUM is a static blood donation centre of University Malaya Medical Centre (UMMC). We are open daily from 1000 to 1630 at CP2-02. We welcome all whole blood donors to come forward to donate blood. All donations will be transported back to the Department of Transfusion Medicine for further testing and processing. Successful donation will be used for clinical transfusion for patients in University Malaya Medical Centre. You donâ€™t have to be a doctor to save lives. You can donate blood and save lives! Your donation is valuable to help our patients in need. If you have not donated blood before, donâ€™t be afraid. Drop by our static blood donation centre and our blood procurement team will be happy to assist you.
This static blood donation centre is made possible with support from Sunway Pyramid Mall, ROCHE diagnostics, Biomed Global, Terumo Malaysia, Story Frontier and MRT Corporation.

name: Diamond & Platinum
description:
The age-old phrase 'diamonds are a girlâ€™s best friend' still holds true, especially when you walk into Diamond & Platinum at Sunway Pyramid and your take in the sight of all their dazzling jewellery! For the past two decades, the brand has helped millions of girls celebrate precious moments and made them feel all the more special and memorable. From a humble beginning, this locally-started brand now operates over 10 outlets all across Malaysia and Brunei, and has proven themselves to be a brand that customers can always resonate with.
Diamond & Platinum has several renowned collections, such as Avant Garde, featuring the enchantment of floral beauty in each of its design, that can be worn as a ring or pendant, or in 3 different styles of earrings. Their Liberte collection features feminine yet bold pieces that are said to be a tribute to beautiful and strong women around the world, with its sophisticated pieces capturing a womanâ€™s curved journey to success.
Be in awe of the Fiore collection, featuring 6 brilliantly cut diamonds surrounding one larger and stunning diamond on an invisible setting, fashioned to portray a flower. They even have their pearl collection as well as their precious gems collections consisting of dazzling sapphires, rubies and more. For those of you looking to tie the knot soon, check out their bridal range, showcasing 950 platinum wedding bands in their Pure Love collection, white gold wedding bands in their Promise collection, platinum and gold wedding bands from their Unity collection and palladium wedding bands from the Earnest collection. Besides rings for that special occasion, Diamond & Platinum encourages you to share these precious jewellery with your loved ones as a gift for anniversaries, graduations, birthdays or simply to commemorate a special occasion!
Priding itself in its alluring and distinctive designs by the finest craftsmanship, the brand is determined to deliver exceptional experiences to every single customer that walks through its doors.
ratings:
(5â­) Diamond & Platinum is well known for its exquisite craftsmanship .

In terms of design, Diamond & Platinum offers a diverse range, from simple and elegant pendants to elaborate statement pieces. Their designs strike a balance between classic and modern aesthetics, making them versatile enough for daily wear or special occasions.

The customer service experience at Diamond & Platinum is also one of the best. Their staff is knowledgeable, patient, and willing to assist in finding the perfect piece that suits personal preferences and budget. Additionally, their certification process ensures authenticity, giving customers confidence in their purchase.

Definitely my preferred choice. - a week ago | (5â­) Great design with awesome service. Purchased our engagement ring here and returned for other accessories. Shout out to Sean Lee for his splendid service and follow ups on phone messages too. It's been a journey with D&P from engagement rings to wedding accessories. - 3 months ago | (5â­) I really love the design that D&P has. Jane is really helpful in helping me choosing the right fit for the ring! Definitely will come here again. - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) Bought my diamond chain and necklace from SA Vivian and sheâ€™s very patient in advising and gives honest recommendation on whats suitable. The designs are very modern, beautiful and competitive compared to other boutiques. Great service! - a month ago | (5â­) Came here to bought my engagement ring and special thanks to Jinnie Pung for her excellent services and follow- ups via WhatsApp. We have a pleasant experience from jewelry introductions to ensuring the ring was delivered to the most convenient location for us. name: Din Tai Fung
description:
Din Tai Fung was originally founded as a cooking oil retail shop in 1958. As the consumption patterns of cooking oil started to change in the early 1970â€™s threatening the survival of the business, Din Tai Fung was transformed to a restaurant in 1972 serving Xiao Long Bao (Steamed Dumpling).
The Hong Kong branch was awarded one star by the prestigious Michelin guide, Din Tai Fung is also ranked as one of the Worldâ€™s Top Ten Best Restaurants by The New York Times and is the only Asian restaurant on the list. Additionally, it was voted the Second Best Franchise for Travellers by CNN and ranked sixth in the list of â€œ101 Best restaurants in Asiaâ€ released by US-based food website, The Daily Meal. Locally, the Pavilion branch has been voted as the top Chinese restaurant in Kuala Lumpur by TripAdvisor and as one of the top rated Chinese Restaurants in the Chinese â€œDazhong Dianpingâ€. Din Tai Fung Malaysia was most recently awarded the Innovative Restaurant Award at the prestigious Malaysia Tourism Awards 2014/2015 and Best Chinese Restaurant at the Time Out Food & Drink Awards 2017.
Headquartered in Taiwan, Din Tai Fung now has more than 170 branches in Australia, China, Dubai, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, South Korea, Thailand, UK and United States. Din Tai Fung is inviting the world to this exquisite cuisine from Taiwan.
ratings:
(3â­) Food: it was good as usual. First time tried the crab meat xiaolongbao, it was ok, personally still prefer the pork xiaolongbao. The mushroom vegetables fried rice was surprisingly good.

Service: the waiting time is very long. We were being told the waiting time is only 30 minutes but we ended up waited for an hour. Not recommended if you are in a hurry. The service was just at an average level which personally found it to be under my expectations.

Atmosphere: it was conducive to have meal. - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) Vegetarian friendly for certain menu

name: Dior
description:
Dior Sunway Pyramid is always complete with the products in store. Christian Dior SE, commonly known as Dior, is a French luxury goods company controlled and chaired by French businessman Bernard Arnault, who also heads LVMH, the world's largest luxury group. Dior itself holds 42.36% shares of and 59.01% voting rights within LVMH. Sidney Toledano has been the CEO since 1997.
#BeautyTreats
ratings:
(1â­) I went to this store today with my mom. Maybe it's because we dressed casually, but when we entered, I tried some perfume samples and decided to buy a new one, as I had used it before. Unfortunately, an auntie SA suddenly approached us, briefly promoted the product, and then just left us there. My mom noticed that her expression seemed to suggest she thought we couldn't afford the price, and as a result, she didn't want to serve us . Immediately, my mom took me to another brand, where the SA was much more professional. Please make sure to properly train your sales associates. Cuz same price customer can get different service - a month ago | (2â­) The concerns raised in other reviews about the service are validâ€”donâ€™t expect exceptional treatment, especially from the older staff.

When I walked in and asked for input on specific product, I needed some opinions on what to get, an older staff simply pointed me to a section without offering any real help and quickly moved on to attend to someone else while also showing a strong attitude.

Only reason I'm giving 2 stars instead of 1 is because there's a chinese guy that is much friendlier and attentive compared to the rest. name: Dressingpaula
description:
With every step you take in your new outfit from Dressing Paula at Sunway Pyramid, youâ€™re bound to turn heads! Shop for unique and sophisticated apparel thatâ€™s perfect for the modern fashionista. With clothing and accessories that suit either work wear, formalwear, parties, eveningwear, or casual wear, this is the place to shop for your next new look. Be the center of attention at your upcoming event with their range of gorgeous dresses. Whether you have a preference for mini or midi or maxi dresses, youâ€™ll discover stunning summer dresses, party dresses, evening dresses, body con dresses and even work dresses.
If you prefer pants but still like the convenience of a one-piece that saves you time from trying to pair top and bottom pieces together, then browse through their selection of eye-catching playsuits, jumpsuits and rompers. For the girl who loves to experiment with mixing and matching clothes together, get a classy top piece from Dressing Paula, including blouses, shirts, and sleeveless tops that and ever-stylish and elegant. Pair it with their selection of pants, such as their wide-leg pants, straight pants, tapered pants, culottes, palazzo pants, leggings, and youâ€™ll look super confident in your outfit. If jeans are more your style, try on their comfortable cropped flare jeans, skinny jeans, straight jeans, cropped jeans, available in high-rise or mid-rise variations. With such hot weather, you can opt for their casual shorts, tailored shorts or even a skort.
If youâ€™re heading to a cold place (or just for the sake of showing off great style!) match your outfit with an outerwear piece, whether itâ€™s a cardigan, sweater, blazer, coat, vest, trench coat or bomber jacket. Or you could opt to bring along one of the many pretty and convenient scarves from Dressing Paula! They also offer a collection of accessories including belts, sunglasses, bracelets, necklaces and earrings to help you take your ensemble to the next level.

name: Drum
description: Express your individual style with the extensive selection of fashionable apparel offered at DRUM in Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid! This local fashion retailer has successfully expanded to open more than ten outlets across Malaysia to date. So why is this brand names after a drum that plays beats? At Drum, their products are their beats, the fashion beats, and they believe that just like how a beat is the core of music, fashion is the core of oneâ€™s personality. Offering the latest trends at amazing prices without forsaking good quality, the fashion selection here is varied to accommodate different tastes so you can shop the finest streetwear fashion for men here! T-shirts are a manâ€™s best friend, thatâ€™s why Drum brings you a selection of graphic tees, statement tees, print tees, striped tees, basic short sleeve tees, pocket detail tees, embroidered logo tees and more. Besides short sleeve T-shirts, they offer those designs in long sleeve variation with additional selection of raglan tees and button detailed tees. In need of a top that looks less laidback? Try on their button-down shirts that come in long sleeve and short sleeve versions, available in prints, stripes, pocket details, plain colours, denim and more. If youâ€™re not a fan of button-down shirts but still want something smart casual, opt for their collared polo tees. Throw on a piece of stylish outerwear too from their selection of cargo vests, bomber jackets, hoodie jackets, faux leather jackets, denim jackets, jumpers, hoodies and sweatshirts. Browse the range of comfortable short pants available at Drum, such as their chino pants and sweatpants available in colours that easily match your top piece, such as khaki, dark grey, maroon, army green, black and brown. If youâ€™re a fan of denim, try on their short or long denim jeans, whether you prefer ripped jeans, slim fit, washed denim colours or other variations. You can even shop for essentials such as underwear and boxes here. Besides that, enhance your style with their accessories including belts, suspenders, ties and bowties.

description: Retailing of Korean Restaurant
ratings:
(5â­) The food is amazing! Donâ€™t be fooled by the small portion sizes (for me)â€”they left me completely full by the end. However, the spicy chicken isn't very spicy, so if you're a spice lover, your cravings might not be fully satisfied here. - 5 months ago | (4â­) I order spicy seafood ramyeon and the food is exactly like the pic on menu, the set was included with drinks and side dishes for rm20. The ramyeon was really tasty, spicy enough and did NOT SOGGY! ...The roasted barley was good bcs i dont want to drink sweet peach tea ....but the side dishes was like meh to me... Only the kimchi was okey for me....staff service also polite and overall I rate 4.5/5!!! - a month ago | (1â­) Disgusting. Should have read the google reviews before coming. Posts that says dirty or food poisoning, mostly is 99% true. Went and had dinner, had few bites of the tofu stew, and then i saw the squid ring.

First time in my life i see squid ring has this â€œtextureâ€. I tried to scrap off with my finger and it came off easily. Made a complain to cancel the food and asked what was it. The staff came back later and say because its frozen squid ring, after cooked, the skin becomes like this cause of the bubbles. Really? Like really im supposed to believe that? Or is it a fly laid eggs on it thats why it has those white things? Donâ€™t say they are sesame seed also because they are smaller than that. Iâ€™ve asked a chef that has been dealing with frozen squid rings for years, he mentioned he never seen such thing before.

Third photo is an example of fly eggs (zoomed in) that was sent by my friend that works in pest control company. Not sure if its the same thing found on the squid, but better be safe than sorry.

Last visit for Dubuyo outlets. - 3 months ago | (4â­) Great food options with affordable prices and set menus available too.

Got the honey garlic chicken lunch set. Portion is worth the price.
But while the food was still tasty, the chicken did not actually taste like honey garlic. Food presentation for this dish could be improved. The iced barley tea was also extremely watered down. Tasted like nothing but ice water.

Would still come back but maybe try a different dish.

The soondubu and ramyeon looked good. - 4 months ago | (5â­) Great place! The food was delicious, the portions were big, and everything was satisfying. but there was a small mix-up with my friendâ€™s order. However, they quickly fixed it, so overall, it was a nice experience. - a week ago

name: Dunkin Donuts
description: Variety and freshness trademark our delicious donuts and Dunkin Donuts coffee is a must for regular coffee drinkers. We also serve scrumptious sandwiches and freshly baked croissants and buns.
ratings:
(4â­) I ordered a box of 3 Assorted Donuts through Grab and I got the Blueberry Filled, Bavarian Filled along with the Sugar Raised donuts for RM12.60. The donut flavours were not my first few choices since most of them were sold out around 5pm. It was also my first time having Dunkin' Donuts and the donuts were absolutely amazing! The Blueberry Filled donut was what I expected it to be but the Bavarian Filled donut had an interesting flavour, however I wish there were more fillings inside. You also cannot go wrong with the Sugar Raised donuts and honestly only getting one was not enough. I would definitely try more flavours next time since I really enjoyed my late afternoon snack :) - a year ago | (1â­) A Disappointing Experience

I recently visited a Dunkin' Donuts outlet and was left feeling frustrated and disappointed by the customer service.

When I was deciding on my order, the staff member insisted that I purchase four donuts to receive a box. While I understand the desire to minimize waste, it felt inflexible and inconvenient, especially for a smaller order.

Moreover, the lack of a larger bag to carry the individual paper bags was surprising. It seemed like a minor detail, but it added to the overall inconvenience of the experience.

While Dunkin' Donuts has historically offered boxes for smaller orders, this recent experience suggests a potential downgrade in customer service. It's important to remember that good customer service can significantly impact a customer's overall satisfaction.

I hope that Dunkin' Donuts will take steps to improve their customer service policies and training to ensure a more positive experience for future customers. - 2 months ago | (3â­) Sweet treat is not for me, but I do drop here to pack these colourful, vibrant, attractive and hunger calling donuts. Just so pleasant to look at, I opted for the 6 in a pack, chosen between the various types donuts, the latest to coincide with Spider-Man concept. Had just a tiny bite, when I dropped the pack at my friend's, sure, soft and fluffy, sugar rush treats. - 7 years ago | (5â­) One of the best Dunkin' Donuts, always fresh. Usually run out of the popular choices towards the ens of the night - a year ago | (1â­) Worst experience... Please refer to the pictures as evidence... I bought the half dozen dd n ice coffee with less ice... Unfortunately, my cup were half filled only... Hahaha... When i ask why is it like this? The staff said Because you only get 75ml of coffee... Hahaha... I say is it ok looking like this? The bright short round girl said yes its like that if less ice... Previously, i've work at F&B such as Subway, pizza hut in my study years n one thing commonly they teach us is courtesy and politeness towards customer... Put yourself in my shoes n imagine if u received ur drinks looking like this... All the best... - 3 years ago

The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: EICHITOO
description:
What is travel? Walking back and forth between extraordinary and daily, between city and nature. EICHITOO offers new choices for ladies who travel for vacation, daily life, and business trips. EICHITOO brings energetic and comfortable designs that can make you feel the warmth of your trip so, when you return and listen back to the voice of a heart filled with memories, you will feel more loved.
Originally from China, EICHITOO is now available at Sunway Pyramid! Founded in 2010, EICHITOO is a fashion-forward collection that is geared towards fashion and casual wear with design, purchase and sales segments tightly linked. By the end of 2016, it already has 625 stores in China. EICHITOO has an enormous impact on the fashion industry by infusing cultural aesthetic elements into modern fashion to create a distinctive fashion trend. The products are divided into three series: urban life, urban office and urban fashion. EICHITOO mainly focuses on fashion and style for modern women in cities. This helps them to redecorate their closets with fashion pieces from daily wear in casual or chic style to elegant and timeless office wear. EICHITOO is stylish yet subtle, simple yet refined, chic yet infused with a classical touch. Under the value price quality and service, EICHITOO with its urban elegance, popular colour and unique design has won the favour and pursuit of the majority of modern lady.
The target customer base of EICHITOO are females aged 18-35. The products mainly include sweaters, dresses, skirts, T-shirts, casual pants, etc. Every piece comes with a streamlined design that pays great attention to the smallest detail. The designer blends exquisite style with design that is inspired by urban life and fashion trends, and proposes the aesthetic concept of â€œLet design return to the
origin of lifeâ€. Its urban elegance and clean design capture the beauty of each lady's body, making them more confident and elegant. EICHITOO also offers accessories to compliment stylish outfits. Its high quality and modern design can fully meet a womanâ€™s demands when it comes to fashion.

ratings:
(1â­) Walked in and wasn't greeted. It's fine. When I was done chosing my clothes, asked the sales staffs, was ignored first and second time. Then I had to called for the third time, managed to get their attention. She wasn't very happy and just pointed to the fitting room instead of opening her mouth to give me direction. Mind you, I was the only customer in this shop and no one was there for them to serve.  The girl was busy fiddling with the clothes i had just touched.  WTH!! After trying on the shirt, I proceed to the cashier, asked if they have new ones instead of displayed ones. Instead of checking in her system, she just said that, these are the only ones available. What lazy staffs!! Would have bought more if it wasnt for the laziness and rudeness of these staffs. Will never shop here again.. name: Estee Lauder
description:
Original from American, EstÃ©e Lauder is now available at Sunway Pyramid. EstÃ©e Lauder is an American multinational manufacturer and marketer of prestige skincare, makeup, fragrance and hair care products, based in Midtown Manhattan, New York City. The company owns a diverse portfolio of brands, distributed internationally through both digital commerce and retail channels. The company began in 1946 when EstÃ©e Lauder and her husband Joseph Lauder began producing cosmetics in New York City. They first carried only four products: Cleansing Oil, Skin Lotion, Super Rich All-purpose Creme, and Creme Pack. EstÃ©e Lauder's Clinique brand became the first women's cosmetic company to introduce a second line for men when, in 1976, they began a separate line called "Skin Supplies for Men", which continues to be sold at Clinique counters worldwide. In 1981, the company's products became available in the Soviet Union. The EstÃ©e Lauder brand has had sometimes high-profile spokesmodels, sometimes referred to simply as 'faces'. Past 'faces' for EstÃ©e Lauder include Karen Graham, Bruce Boxleitner, Shaun Casey, Willow Bay, Paulina Porizkova, Elizabeth Hurley, Carolyn Murphy, supermodel Liya Kebede was the first African American 'face' of Estee Lauder, Anja Rubik, and actress Gwyneth Paltrow. As of 2008 the main spokesmodel for EstÃ©e Lauder was supermodel Hilary Rhoda. In 2010, the company added three more faces to the roster, Chinese model Liu Wen, Puerto Rican model Joan Smalls, and French model Constance Jablonski. Check out the best deals on EstÃ©e Lauder in Sunway Pyramid.

name: Eu Yan Sang
description:
Are you having difficulties in finding the right gift for your loved ones? Why not giving them a gift that can boost their health? Eu Yan Sang will be the ideal place for you to shop for health-care products!
Founded by Eu Kong, a China citizen from Foshand in Guangdong who came to Malaya for work. During the 1870â€™s to 1880â€™s in Malaya, tine mine coolies were suffering from opium addiction, which prompted the founder to open a Chinese medicine and herb shop in Gopeng, Perak. The shop was named â€˜Yan Sangâ€™, which literally means â€˜caring for mankindâ€™ in Chinese. His son, Eu Tong, continued his fatherâ€™s business and expanded the business to Singapore too. After on, he decided to brand the medical business more firmly with the attachment of his family name â€“Eu Yan Sang.
The brandâ€™s value is to care for mankind, which will remain constant and unchanging. With their ever-growing product range, you can get health products for women, men, and even infant. One of their best-selling products by are Bottled Birdâ€™s Nest (to promote general health) and Essence of Chicken (to replenish energy and nourish blood). Besides Chinese herb and medicine, other products that you can get are dietary supplements, health foods, and personal care products.
Remember, taking care of your health is vital for a happy life! Give them a visit at Level Lower Ground 2 (Blue Zone) now!

description:
The Beginning of Fila
In 1911, in Biella, a small Italian town near the Alps, the FILA brothers, who were interested in the textile industry, established a knitwear and underwear company, leveraging the town's abundant resources.
Over time, the business expanded by incorporating the artistic color sense unique to Italians into their clothing, laying the foundation for what Fila is today.
Globally known
FILA gained global attention for its instantly recognisable tennis apparel in the 1970s, and has since expanded their design portfolio to include sporting apparel across a wide range of codes including golf, training, running and compression wear.
While their technical processes are at the forefront of sporting design, the brand remains true to its time-honoured European aesthetic and outfits professional artists and athletes from around the world.
A century after its inception, FILA has become synonymous with both sport and sophistication, worn by world-renowned professional athletes as well as fashion-conscious individuals.
Collaborations with luxury fashion houses and influential designers have captured the attention of the fashion world, and the premium lifestyle sports brand continues to make its mark to this day.
FILA Tennis
By introducing colorful and modern designs to tennis courts, where players were traditionally required to wear mostly white attire, it brought a breath of fresh air to tennis fashion

name: Faber-Castell
description:
Faber-Castell has long held a strong position when it comes to premium stationery. Founded in Stein, Germany, Faber-Castell offers children and adults a wide array of quality-branded stationery products with true points of difference through its â€œCompanion for Lifeâ€ Portfolio. From child-grip friendly color pencils and crayons, to engraved fountain pens and top-tier paints, Faber-Castell provides a comprehensive list of tools for all your artistic needs.
Today Faber-Castell operates 14 production sites in 10 countries, markets its products through 25 sales/distribution organizations and is represented in 120 different countries including Malaysia. In addition, Creativity for Kids is represented in 50 countries around the world. The Creativity for Kids brand continues its well-deserved reputation as a consistent provider of quality, innovative, and thoughtful products for children that consist of both classic and trendy creative activities. Today, many Creativity for Kids products include Faber-Castell art supplies as components that enrich the creative experience. Creativity for Kids craft kits have received many awards from organizations such as Oppenheim Toy Portfolio, Dr. Toy, The National Parenting Center, ASTRA (American Specialty Toy Retailing Association) and the TIA (Toy Industry Association), plus recognition in national publications such as Parents Magazine and Good Housekeeping.
Faber-Castell is proud of its longevity and what it represents â€“ consistent delivery of a quality experience in all areas of business. More than 150 years after the companyâ€™s first appearance in the United States, Lothar von Faberâ€™s legacy is nicely summed up in his own statement, â€œFrom the start I was determined to raise myself to the highest rank by making the best that can be made in the world.â€ Faber-Castell is committed to staying true to this vision of quality, tradition, and innovation now and in the future.

name: Fabiano Ricco
description: Pamper your feet with a pair (or more) of gorgeous shoes from Fabianno Ricco, a treasure trove of pretty footwear at Asian Avenue in Sunway Pyramid! Offering more than just a galore of stylish shoes, they even retail bags that are equally appealing, so youâ€™ll cover both your shoe and handbags need in just one spot! Demure and ever elegant, shop their covered flats available in numerous colours and styles, from embellishments to oversized buckles to pleated fabrics. You can opt for a version that hover more to ballerina flats style, or a sandal type with ankle straps to hold your feet securely at the back. For the ladies who love a bit of heels to make you look tall and lean, try their covered heels available in different materials, whether you prefer velvet, suede, or even leather. With its array of pretty colours, these covered heels come in block heels or stilettos heels depending on what youâ€™re more comfortable in. If you love wearing mules or pumps, you can check out their range of pointed toe or square toe mules, asymmetrical slip on sandals, or strappy stiletto pumps. Sandal flats are the perfect companion for your feet, and it comes in different designs to suit various occasions, with some having ruffles, embellished straps, lace detailing, pearls and more! Youâ€™ll love browsing through their range of super classy sandal heels, such as their open toe block heels, knotted detail sandal heels, asymmetric strap block heels, strappy slingbacks and more! For a firmer grip you can opt for their wedges, some with transparent straps, sequins, pleated fabrics and many more designs. Complete the look with a bag from their gorgeous selection! Try on their crossbody bags such as their sling bags or satchels available in multiple colours. Check out their classic handbags that have various handle styles, whether you want double handles, circular top handles, chain straps. Functional and stylish, their shoulder bags and tote bags help you look great while giving you enough room to keep your essentials.

name: Family Parking
description:
For families with strollers and young children, a well-lit family parking area is available!
The family parking area is in close proximity to the mall entrances and lifts which will help ease convenience for mummies, daddies or guardians who are travelling alone with young children.
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Fipper, Feel The Rubber
description:
Inspired by colors, culture & the people who surrounded them, Fipper's objective is to convey their trendy lifestyle through unique products. Created in 2008, the timeless and colorful design of the Fipper collection comes in a variety of styles that appeal to the individual in a modern and colorful way yet conventional. Each pair is designed with the commitment to bring the customers the highest of quality, comfort and affordability. Now, Fipper is available at Sunway Pyramid and this will be Fipper's flagship store! In addition to a complete range of Fipper footwear and merchandise, we also provide a warm environment for Fipper's lovers, and set up a kids zone, where your child can play and select the footwear that suit your child.
Fipper is aimed at connecting sandal loverâ€™s feet to Mother Nature. At Fipper, our vision is to enrich the rubber experience to all our Fipper Lovers. We specialized in the team design of our very own brand of footwear.
At Fipper, we employed a dedicated team of professional designers that keep track of the latest design of slippers that suits the requirements and comfort footwear lovers, bring it indoors or outdoors. These designs shall then be delivered over to our carefully selected factories in Thailand for careful production. Whether it is the Fipper Basic series in a single color, or the Fipper Slim, Walker and Wide in a multi-color combination, they will provide you with the most comfortable walking experience. In addition, our newly designed Refitt, Trekker and Slip On will bring you a brand-new experience.
Fipperâ€™s success largely comes from the concept of combining our innovative design and combination of color for all footwear lovers. Having said that, our Fipper enjoys a good reputation for producing high quality, stylish design and comfortable footwear.

name: Formosa
description: Retailing in Taiwan street snacks.
ratings:
(4â­) 19.08.2024 Monday My first try at this place. The braised pork rice was quite tasty for me. I ordered their RM13 rice set with tofu and egg. Though it looked small bowl, but it's enough for a small eater like me. Food was hot and it was served quick. I will come back to try other dishes. More people come to eat after 12pm. I was there 1130am and the place was empty. - 6 months ago | (5â­) We were just walking by this place and saw the huge Taiwanese style fried chicken chop on other people's tables. We had to try it after seeing it. Can smell the Taiwan night market from their foods. - 3 months ago | (4â­) Ordered this set for only RM 13, it has braised meat rice, tofu and braised egg. It doesn't taste like your typical taiwanese braised meat rice, but it has its own unique and delicious taste to it! Portion is just nice too. Highly recommend! - 8 months ago | (4â­) Located within Sunway Pyramid Mall, Formosa is a venerable Taiwanese food stall that has stood the test of time as one of the oldest eateries in this bustling mall. It's a place where Asian comfort food takes center stage, and their Taiwanese Hot Crispy Chicken Rice Set exemplifies this perfectly.

This dish, priced from RM19.50, is a true indulgence. It features crispy, slightly spicy fried chicken served flat out, accompanied by their incredibly flavorful braised sauce and a bed of tofu rice. This combination of textures and flavors is nothing short of addictive.

The Taiwanese Hot Crispy Chicken Rice Set doesn't stop at the chicken alone; it includes a full meal experience. Alongside the crispy chicken, you'll find a serving of braised sauce-topped rice, with the option to add a braised egg, tofu, or both, depending on your preference. To complete the meal, it even comes with a refreshing bubble milk tea.

For those looking to elevate their culinary adventure, an extra plate of Taiwanese sausage is a wise choice. When everything is combined and generously topped with their garlicy chili sambal paste, the flavors harmonize in a symphony of deliciousness that's sure to leave your taste buds dancing.

Formosa has earned its reputation as a go-to spot for students in the area seeking a quick and satisfying lunch or dinner. With its reasonable prices and substantial food portions, it offers a dining experience that's not only delicious but also budget-friendly. - a year ago | (3â­) Lo bak spinach noodle not nice at all as it is soggy . The bubble tea consists of more ice than tea . - 3 weeks ago

name: Fresh
description:
The most inspiring skincare brand, fresh harnesses nature's potency from around the world to awaken senses and transform skin. Placing sensoriality at the heart of performance, fresh creates multi-sensorial indulgences that feel as good as they work. The brand was founded as a shop in 1991 by Lev Glazman and Alina Roytberg, creative visionaries driven by their curiosity about natural time-honored remedies and extraordinary experiences for the skin. An LVMH Maison since 2000, fresh is a global company based in New York offering skincare, lip care, bodycare, and fragrance in over 25 countries. Because nature is our destination for innovation, the brand is committed to protecting biodiversity where it sources ingredients -nurturing the skin of the earth for a thriving, harmonious world that is forever fresh.
#BeautyTreats
ratings: (5â­) I had a fantastic experience at Fresh Boutique in Sunway Pyramid. Jasmine provided wonderful service, and the treatment was incredibly relaxing. The tea, facial products, and massage were exceptional. They even personalize the room with your chosen EDP. After the facial, Christy patiently explained all the products used, detailing their ingredients and functions. Thanks to Sunway for offering such excellent complimentary treats for platinum members. Highly recommend! - 8 months ago | (5â­) Christy's service and friendliness was amazing. She was very patient while explaining each product that were suitable for my skin. Really recommend seeking out for her if you are planning to visit the Sunway branch! - 6 months ago | (5â­) I went to Fresh initially just to look around..but ended up buying a whole bunch of skincare due to Christyâ€™s explanation. she took the time to choose which product suitable for me and teach me how to use the products correctly. I would always come back to this outlet if i want to buy more skincare. Guys, if you want a really good sales assistant pls look for her!! Kuddos fresh. Thanks Christy!! - 5 months ago | (5â­) Had my facial with Jasmine, which was nothing short than relaxing. Following that I had a consultation with Christy, who was not only knowledgable in her products but very accommodating to my enquiries. Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. description: Hailing from one of the most iconic countries in the world of fashion, Furla was birthed as an Italian luxury goods company in 1927. With it expansion of exporting to over 70 countries, they have landed here in Sunway Pyramid to bring in Italian-designed products ranging from handbags to shoes to accessories. The right handbag is the perfect companion thatâ€™ll keep your belongings and help make you look effortlessly stylish, and thatâ€™s exactly what youâ€™ll find at Furla. Ladies will fall in love instantly at the sight of their handbags, offered in an extensive selection of colours, from bright reds to pastel blues and neutral shades. Unique designs and details on the bag make it distinct, youâ€™ll be the envy of everyone around you. From cross-body bags, to shoulder bags, tote bags, candy bags, top handle bags, satchels, pochette bags, dome bags, and more, youâ€™ll find these bags available in different sizes and in such a wide array of eye-catching colours and prints - choosing just one hardly seems like enough! Once youâ€™ve set your heart on one (or more!) of their gorgeous bags, youâ€™ll definitely need to shop for a pair of shoes that are equally as fashionable. Put on their heels, sandals, or pumps and hold on to that bag, trust us youâ€™ll feel like you can conquer the world! Browse through their line of wallets that are not only practical and spacious, but super classy. Match this combination with one of their classic watches and youâ€™re more than ready to be the centre of attention wherever youâ€™re headed to! Expect nothing short of perfectly crafted genuine bags, with unique designs, practical compartments and exquisite colours when you step into Furla.

name: Future Land
description:
A haven for VR fans, Future Land at Sunway Pyramid promises lots of fun and entertainment for the whole family with attractions and Virtual Reality experiences in all shapes and sizes! Using modern-day technology and sophisticated equipment, some of the notable attractions include the 360 Flight and ExoJet simulators, Mirror Maze, VR Hero, 6D Cinema, VR Car simulator. Future Land is perfect for a fun-filled weekend with the family or when you wish to add more thrill to your children's school holiday.
The 6 seater VR Family takes you on an adventure with special sound effects and movements suited for all ages. Select your VR movie with a choice of "adventure, horror or explore" where family with kids as young as 3 years old may opt for the explore story while adults may try out the horror mode. The VR Car Simulator gives you the experience of driving round a racing track where any accidents or impacts would be transmitted physically to the driver within a controlled system. Wish to take driving on-ground up into the air? The Flight Simulator 360 fits you right into a pilot's cabin where you will be manoeuvring a fighter jet. This ride is however suitable for kids above 9 years old as it rotates 360 degrees. On the other hand, the EXO Jet Simulator has 2 seats whereby one person may act as the pilot and the other the shooter. A perfect father and son or couple bonding time wouldn't you say? Another must to check-out is the VR Skateboard where there are 200 stunts to master as you skate, surf and swing from tall buildings. Tired or need a break before resuming the fun? Future Land also has a zone where you could enjoy snacks and drinks while relaxing on bean bags.
What other better place than Future Land at Sunway Pyramid to bring your kid for their birthday outing or host a team-building activity for your company.

Had an amazing time with the VR gamesâ€”totally next level! name: Future Trend
ratings:
(1â­) Iâ€™m not sure how this shop has such high ratings on Google, but my experience with their customer service was DISAPPOINTING. I purchased a phone case from this shop because my old one was broken. I asked the guy (circled in red) if they had a phone case for the Honor 50. He mentioned that since the Honor 50 is an older model, it was lucky they had one last piece in stock. Trusting his word, I decided to purchase it without asking the price, there was no price tag label on the phone case packaging.

At the counter, he started cleaning my phone screen without asking me first. After that, he charged me RM69 for the phone caseâ€”much more than I expected! When I politely asked if there was any discount, he only reduced the price by RM2, bringing it to RM67. I reluctantly paid and left the shop, but after discussing it with my friend, my friend and I felt that the guy "scammed" me since similar phone cases are sold on Shopee for RM10-30.

Within an hour, I returned to the shop with the receipt to request a refund. However, the guy refused, saying that once the package is opened, they cannot resell it. I considered reporting this to MDTCA, but the process would take too long. I strongly advise anyone to not visiting this shop. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Good service! Always come here to change my screen protector and finding uniq casing w cheaper price from machine - 5 months ago | (5â­) So many vape here good! Seller are good and responsible! Recommended! - 5 months ago | (5â­) Highly recommended!! Excellent services!! Friendly staff.. good job Jackson & DannyğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ the only  place know what you need!! - 3 months ago | (5â­) My go to place for all my phone accessories needs. Loved their services. - 4 months ago

name: GODIVA
description:
GODIVA is the worldâ€™s most iconic premium chocolate company, dedicated to opening peopleâ€™s eyes to a more wonderful world. What started in a humble home workshop in Brussels 95 years ago, is now available in Malaysia and at Sunway Pyramid!
Every piece of GODIVA is bursting with quality, Belgian craftsmanship, and the worldâ€™s finest ingredients. The underpinning of our incredible chocolate has, and always will be, an authenticity that flows from our proud Belgian heritage. Our Belgium 1926 logo reflects this spirit, paying homage to the time and place where our story first began.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: GORDON RAMSAY BAR & GRILL
description:
Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill in Sunway City Kuala Lumpur is located at Sunway Resort. This is the iconic British chefâ€™s inaugural restaurant in Malaysia and the first Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill outside the United Kingdom.
The restaurant blends Gordon Ramsayâ€™s British heritage with the grace and grandeur of Sunway Resort. A series of luxurious and intimate spaces include a trio of private dining rooms â€“ 8 Mayfair, 10 Soho and 12 Chelsea, a grand dining room with semi-private seating booths and a glittering cocktail bar with floor-to-ceiling windows, seating up to a total of 150 guests at a time.
The interior design features robust furnishings with a rich red and forest green colour scheme accentuated by polished walnut hardwood flooring, brass finishes, 24 karat gold leaf hand-placed ceiling and more. Monochrome portraits of British style icons by celebrated photographers Terry Oâ€™Neill and Arthur Steel feature The Rolling Stones frontman Sir Mick Jagger, the original 007 Sir Sean Connery, supermodels Jean Shrimpton and Twiggy, line the walls of the main dining room.
Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill features an exquisite menu inspired by one of Londonâ€™s most iconic restaurants, Savoy Grill, showcasing only the finest ingredients presented with culinary flair from the highly skilled, Gordon Ramsay-trained team. Diners can look forward to savouring prime cuts of meat dry-aged in-house and Chef Ramsayâ€™s most desirable dishes, such as his â€˜Classic Beef Wellingtonâ€™, served tableside, the â€˜Spiced Beef Tartare with Egg Yolk Confitâ€™, his must-try â€˜Arnold Bennett Twice-baked Cheese SoufflÃ© with Mornay Sauceâ€™, the â€˜Dover Sole with Grenobloise capers sauceâ€™ and more. For guests looking to wind down in the evenings, take a seat at our bar and sip on concoctions from a masterly crafted menu of classic favourites, cocktails with Malaysian-inspired flavours and a host of premium wines and spirits. Adjacent to the cocktail bar, a dedicated wine cellar showcases an extensive global wine list for wine enthusiasts and a private room welcomes intimate evenings for tastings, social gatherings and more.
ratings:
(3â­) Gordon Ramsayâ€™s restaurant at Sunway Resort offers a stylish atmosphere and impeccable service, but unfortunately, the food doesnâ€™t quite live up to the premium price tag. While the dishes are well-presented and the flavors are decent, they donâ€™t offer the bold, unforgettable taste one might expect from a Michelin-starred chef. For the price, the portion sizes feel a bit lacking, leaving it hard to justify the value for money. A nice experience for those looking to try a celebrity chefâ€™s restaurant, but there are better options for the price in KL. - a month ago | (5â­) My husband and I had a delightful afternoon tea here on Valentineâ€™s Day, and it was an experience to remember. From the moment we arrived, the staff were incredibly warm, professional, and attentive, ensuring we felt welcomed and well taken care of.

The ambience was elegant yet cosy, creating the perfect setting for a relaxing afternoon. To make the occasion even more special, a live violinist performed romantic melodies, adding a beautiful touch to the atmosphere.

The afternoon tea selection was beautifully presented, featuring a wonderful assortment of freshly made pastries, sandwiches, and fine teas. One of the highlights was Gordonâ€™s signature Beef Wellington, which was cooked to perfectionâ€”crispy on the outside, tender and flavorful on the inside. Every dish was crafted with high-quality ingredients and impeccable attention to detail.

Despite the exceptional quality of the food and service, the price was quite reasonable, making it a great value for the experience provided. Everything from the service to the ambience exceeded our expectations. It was a truly enjoyable and romantic afternoon, and we would highly recommend this place for anyone looking for an elegant yet affordable afternoon tea experience. We will definitely be returning! - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) We celebrated my husbandâ€™s graduation with lunch at the Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill in Kuala Lumpur, and it exceeded every expectation. From the moment we walked in, the luxurious atmosphere set the stage for a memorable dining experience. The service was impeccableâ€”attentive without being intrusive, with staff who went above and beyond to make our celebration feel special.

The food was simply exceptional. Each dish was a beautifully crafted balance of flavors, showcasing the high quality and precision youâ€™d expect from a Gordon Ramsay restaurant. We had high expectations, and every bite delivered. It was a perfect celebration, and we left feeling like weâ€™d experienced something truly special. Highly recommend this for anyone looking to mark a milestone or simply enjoy an unforgettable meal! - 4 months ago | (5â­) My husband and I had the most unforgettable birthday celebration here. From the moment we walked in, I was in awe of the stunning interior decor and the exceptional, five-star service. Anthony, who served us, and all the staff went above and beyond to make the evening feel truly special. They even surprised us with a beautiful card and a complimentary non-alcoholic gin and tonic, which added a thoughtful touch to the experience. Thanks a lot Anthony for your superb service and everyone there!

As fans of Gordon Ramsay, dining at his restaurant was a thrill, especially seeing a photo of the celebrity chef himself on the wall! Our three-course meal was incredible, every dish worth every penny. For any Ramsay fan, this place is a must-visit, perfect for a memorable celebration.

We canâ€™t wait to return to explore more of the menu and perhaps indulge in their afternoon tea. Highly recommended! - 4 months ago | (5â­) I recently dined at Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill in Sunway City, Kuala Lumpur to celebrate my wifeâ€™s birthday, and it was an unforgettable experience that truly lived up to its renowned reputation.

Food:
The food was nothing short of perfection. The Bar & Grill Burger was a standout, bursting with flavour and crafted to absolute perfection. The Grilled Miso Salmon was another highlight, with its rich, umami flavors and tender texture. To top it all off, the Blackberry Parfait was a dessert masterpiece, refreshing, indulgent, and the perfect ending to an incredible meal. Each dish was thoughtfully prepared and presented with finesse.

Drinks:
The drinks selection was outstanding, featuring a carefully curated range of beverages to complement the exquisite dishes. Whether you prefer a fine selection or something refreshing, the options are tailored to enhance the overall dining experience.

Service:
The service was impeccable. The staff were attentive, friendly, and ensured we had everything we needed for a special evening. They went above and beyond to make my wifeâ€™s birthday celebration memorable.

Important Notes:
1. If you make an online reservation, the payment made during booking will be deducted from your final bill, a seamless and convenient process.

2. For Muslim diners, the restaurant offers a â€˜Halalâ€™ dietary exception option when making reservations, showcasing their thoughtful consideration for all guests.

Overall, Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill offers a fantastic dining experience with exceptional food, drinks, and service. Highly recommended for special occasions or anyone looking to indulge in fine dining! - a month ago

name: Garrett Popcorn ShopsÂ®
description:
Garrett Popcorn ShopsÂ® - A Chicago Tradition from the USA since 1949
For over seven decades, Garrett Popcorn Shops has served gourmet popcorn using wholesome ingredients in their secret family recipes, passed down for generations. Custom grown, non-GMO butterfly and mushroom kernels are first hot-air popped in their kitchens, then enriched with flavor in seasoned, old-fashioned Copper Kettles. Because good things take time, Garrett Popcorn is handcrafted in small batches throughout the day.
Signature recipes include the fan-invented, original Chicago-style popcorn, Chicago Mixâ„¢, which blends the sweetness of CaramelCrispâ„¢ with the savory goodness of CheeseCorn; plus Buttery (a vegan treat!), Plain, CheeseCorn, CaramelCrisp, Almond CaramelCrisp and Macadamia CaramelCrisp.
Like no otherâ„¢, Garrett Popcorn enchants adoring fans around the world
