name: Genius Games
description: Remember your childhood days when it was so easy to find a store selling cheap PS2 or computer games and there are folders after folders of them for you to browse through while you need not feel the pressure of purchasing a game you love because of the high pricing? Genius Games brings this moment back as kids these days still crowd around the store to buy or simply have the thrill of flipping through the files to get updated with other games they may not know of and might be interested in buying. This is the exact store back then where many teens stop by to play the console attached to a TV up front at the counter when they did not have one at home. Your old-school game shop still exists here at Sunway Pyramid F floor outside of Asian Avenue so come on over to relive those nostalgic moments and check out the good deals on not only games, but also gaming hardware.

(1â­) Major issue with staff knowledge as well as honesty, recently wanted to get a controller for pc to use and for gaming but didn't have the console, at first looked at the X box controllers because they seem to work for all my friends but was too pricey, then they recommended me a ps4 controller and told me it works well. Bought it for a staggering price of 159 and turns out it doesn't work with pcs or any games I had but when I checked the games setting they all supported Xbox controllers while most of them didn't do PS4. name: Genki Sushi
description: Genki Sushi is a halal certified Japanese sushi chain brand that offers value-for-money dining experiences for those who desire a variety of authentic yet affordable Japanese sushi experience. It first began in 1968 when a 24-year-old Japanese sushi chef, Fumio Saito, created the concept of â€œKaiten Sushiâ€ and pioneered the use of a revolving conveyor belt to serve sushi. Through a Kousoku Express system, Genki Sushi brilliantly delivers dishes to tables, providing a quick and exciting dining experience. Genki Sushi seeks to serve the most professional and authentic experience and are dedicated to providing a variety of affordable sushi while never compromising their quality. Genki Sushiâ€™s menu ranges from Gunkan, handrolls to rice and noodles as well as desserts.

name: Geox
description: Find your perfect fit of classy and comfortable shoes at Geox in Sunway Pyramid! The Italian footwear brand was founded in1995 by Mario Moretti Polegato, and since then has been creating high-quality shoes that are functional without forgetting to make them oh-so-stylish. The special Geox technology incorporated into the timeless and well-preserved traditions of Italian shoe manufacturers make the brand stand out from all its competitors. Hailing from a country thatâ€™s renowned as one of the leaders of fashion globally, itâ€™s not doubt these shoes are designed in a way that makes you look classy and sophisticated instantly. Another unique feature about Geox shoes is that it makes your feet breather, thanks to the patented perforation in the outer soles that help to create natural air in the shoe, and the special waterproof and breathable membrane that ensures your feet are dry. This unique and innovative feature guarantees you a comfortable fit and air-conditioned feet no matter how many hours you wear their shoes. Available in numerous styles and designs, thereâ€™s a comfortable and stylish pair to suit everyoneâ€™s preference. For the man aiming to achieve a formal look, opt for their breathable and trendy Chelsea boots, durable and flexible desert boots, or the classic and versatile formal leather shoes, perfect for the man who wants to look refined yet have the comfort of a good old pair of sneakers. Classy loafers are super comfortable, breathable and light, and are available in leather and suede variations. Sneakers at Geox are no ordinary sneakers, with its technology allowing for air-circulation around the foot, activated by movement and enhanced by the materials used. Casual shoes are also available in contemporary versatile designs that offer a refined on-trend look. In this hot tropical weather, you may opt for open-toe sandals, for optimal breathability, total comfort and functionality combined into one trendy pair of footwear.

name: Giordano
description: A familiar name thatâ€™s been around in the fashion industry for several decades, Giordano has expanded from its origins in Hong Kong to open over 2000 stores across more than 30 countries, including the one right here in Sunway Pyramid. The brand offers a broad range of apparel for men, women, and children. For men, to create an easy-going look that still achieves a smart casual appearance, Giordanoâ€™s polos are available in various colours, and you can opt for embroidery or plain polos. Look sharp with their range of shirts, including long or short sleeved Oxford shirts, wrinkle-free shirts, linen-cotton shirts and more. Look stylish and casual with their selection of plain tees, pocket tees, stripe tees, printed tees, or long sleeved tees. Try on their sweaters, hoodie, sweatshirts and cardigans, or check out their range of light, heavy and down jackets for the perfect outerwear. Match these tops with a bottom piece from their assortment of joggers, jeans, khakis, pants bermudas, and shorts. Ladies can shop for classy and easy-to-wear poloss or look professional with the brandâ€™s options of long-sleeve Oxford shirts, half placket shirts, short sleeve shirts, and linen-cotton shirts. Achieve that feminine appeal with Giordanoâ€™s selection of skirts and dresses like their knitted dress, shirt dress, polo dress, Oxford dress, elastic waistband skirts, and more. If youâ€™re more comfortable with wearing pants, try on their range of joggers, jeans, khakis, long pants and shorts. On colder days, grab one of their sweatshirts, hoodies, cardigans, sweaters or jackets (heavy, light, down) to keep you feeling warm while ensuring you look ever-fashionable. Giordano even has you covered from head to toe with their line of essentials such as boxers, briefs, and undershirts for men, panties for the ladies, as well as unisex socks including ankle socks, invisible socks and crew socks. Giordano Junior caters to kids with its adorable collection of polos, printed tees, shirts, pants, skirts and shorts. For families, get the whole fam ready for an exciting day out wearing matching polos from Giordano thatâ€™ll make for a fun photo shoot!

Recognized as Malaysia's largest jewellery retail chain, Poh Kong is renowned for its impeccable craftsmanship in curating stunning pieces from gold, diamonds, jade, and colored gems. Among the brand lineup, Tranz stands for self-expression and modern style, while Happy Love features oriental gold jewellery symbolizing destined love's journey, the Auspicious incorporates 'Fengshui' elements, and Anggun showcases cultural beauty. Disney and Ms. Petite collections cater to the young.
Turning to diamonds, Hemera boasts the most brilliant diamonds with 101 facets, and D'first offers affordable luxury and the joy of a first diamond.

name: Green Pasture
description: Welcome to Green Pasture, where our 20 years of experience in portrait and caricature drawing blend artistry with imagination. Our talented artists craft unique, timeless pieces that capture the essence of individuals and moments. Join us in celebrating creativity and personal expression through our exceptional artworks. Explore the world of art at Green Pasture.
ratings: (5â­) Deborah is super kind and helpful. I wanted to make a small gift for my wife for returning to work and she helped me customise the drawings to perfection. Price is awesome, service is great. Highly recommend! - 6 months ago | (1â­) My mum ordered 3 hand pastel portraits from this girl in Dec 22, took 3 months and still was not ready in March 23, had to chase to to get the portraits, could not cancel as paid deposit. Had a first portrait hand drawn pastel that was done in Oct 22 - it was decent, so decided to have extra 3 more done which took longer, when received, the strokes of the the new hand pastel art looked different from the 1st received in Oct, looks really good and exact detailing, but on detail inspection - seems like a  combination of digital art and hand pastel? shown to another artists and 'digital art' was mentioned on first look without second thought. My mum called her and queried about the artwork and would like a replacement as she was not happy with it, but the girl say that she can buy a new one instead and deny digital art work by saying 'oh is there is such a thing?' to the word 'digital art'. Sounds very dodgy and would not recommend her unless she is drawing in front of you or made it clear 100% hand drawn. Very disappointed in how this is managed as the response from the girl is very questionable, with possibility of dishonesty and no transparency. We would be understanding if she would have declared if it was not full 100% hand drawn. - a year ago | (5â­) Paintings look vivid! - 2 years ago | (5â­) No Review - a month ago

name: Greenology
description: GREENOLOGY was launched in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia in 2012, with a range of naturally-inspired hair and body care. Formulations with finest quality ingredients from around the world at an affordable price. A sincere interest in modern simplicity design, we believe that good design makes it possible to improve our quality of life. Our research lab emphasis the practicability of products, simplifies application procedures, and aims at multiple functionalities of products. The product experience comes from satisfaction through pleasant sensory design: Smell, Touch and Visual appeal. GREENOLOGY product packaging design is driven by minimalist idea instead of a fancy packaging. Argan Oil from MOROCCO is the first key ingredient for GREENOLOGY hair and body care. This wonder oil extracted from the kernels of argan tree contains of high Vitamin E and Fatty Acid, ability to nourish, hydrate and moisturize our skin. It absorbs easily and is non-greasy and non-irritating, which makes it a great natural moisturizer.

name: H&M
description: Presenting to you the latest trends hot off the runway, Swedish multi-national fashion retailer H&M at Sunway Pyramid is a wonderland for all trendsetters. Believe us when we say that everything youâ€™re looking for is right here! The brand has gained a reputation for its fast-fashion apparel for men, women, and children. For women who like to keep their attire simple and minimalistic, opt for the brands range of Basic wear for a line of tops, bottoms, dresses, and outerwear thatâ€™s minimalistic and easily complements anything you have in your wardrobe. Youâ€™ll look like that emoji with heart eyes as you scan through their endless aisles of clothes. Shop for a new top as the brand features various t-shirts, graphic Tees, sleeveless tops, blouses, shirts, long sleeve and short sleeve tops, cropped tops and more! Now that youâ€™ve found your top, search through their range of bottoms, with several styles available for their shorts (denim, cotton, etc), mini to maxi skirts, trousers (chinos, joggers, flared pants), leggings and jeans (skinny, slim, straight, flare, etc). If you donâ€™t have time to match pieces of apparel together, opt for their range of dresses, jumpsuits or rompers! Mix up your ensemble with one of their outerwear by putting on their jackets, coats, cardigans, sweaters or blazers. Wondering how much better can the shopping get here? Check this out, they even have sections dedicated to swimwear and beachwear, lingerie, sportswear, accessories, shoes, and beauty products! Talk about housing all your needs under one roof. H&M is the perfect place for men who want to look good, with its range of shirts, T-shirts and tanks, hoodies and sweatshirts, cardigans and sweaters, jackets and coats, blazers and suits. A line of shorts, trousers and jeans, as well as wardrobes necessities such as underwear and socks are also available. Parents can delight in the fact that H&M caters to all their young onesâ€™ needs, as they offer a selection of clothing and accessories for children ranging from newborn to teenagers! Turn your next shopping trip at H&M into a fun family affair!
ratings: (4â­) H&M at Sunway Pyramid is a spacious and well-organized store, offering a wide variety of clothing options for men, women, and children. The layout is easy to navigate, making it simple to find what youâ€™re looking for, whether itâ€™s casual wear, office attire, or trendy accessories. The staff are generally helpful and friendly, though sometimes it can take a while to get assistance when the store is busy. name: HOTPOT KITCHEN
description: Hotpot Kitchen popping a fresh eating trend! The flexibility of selecting your favourite ingredients and level of spiciness has become one of the iconic trendy menus for the youngsters today! Have you try? Originate from Sichuan, the hotpot ingredients are about a variety of flavours: Spicy Flowery (Sichuan peppercorns), salty, sour, sweet & smoky. Frequently all those flavours are combined in one dish. The result is a cuisine with an incredible depth and complexity of flavour, hitting all sense receptors in your mouth, nose and gastrointestinal system at the same time. The flexibility of selecting your favourite ingredients and level of spiciness has become one of the iconic trendy menus for the youngsters today! Variety of our foodstuffs & ingredients are selected for its finest quality and freshness, thru high-tech sterilization, served in exhilarating platter filled with organic flavours and healthy cravings. Hotpot Kitchen always served non Pesticides, non-antibiotics and non-Hormones ingredients and food. Hotpot Kitchen proudly presents a series of value set lunch menus which serves to promote a balanced and healthy meal at the lowest price possible! These value packages available on weekdays during lunch hours on 12 to 4 pm. Do visit Hotpot Kitchen Sunway Pyramid now and donâ€™t miss it!

HYPEClothing was founded in 2012, owning its name to the evergreen American subcultures as well as to the ambitious people who envisioned great success for the brand. Since the opening of its first store, it became too apparent that HYPE was living up to its name, and the clothing brandâ€™s authentic vision to stay true to its American subculture roots has garnered an impressive following.
With the launch of its latest store in Sunway Pyramid, HYPE continues to push its influence for authentic American subcultures across Klang Valley, while bolstering a remarkable wealth of experience under its belt in the industry, pivotal in establishing long-lasting relationships with customers in the region. The label has not forgotten its long-term sale strategies and operates to serve its customers as it encourages growth and success within and outside of its bubble. While HYPE produces quality streetwear apparels for its customers, the brand doesnâ€™t shy away from encouraging new ideas for its products through established R&D and collabs. Through collabs alone.
HYPE has been able to instill its brand principles and philosophy to reach an even wider set of audience across the nation. Today, HYPE continues to show a competitive brand presence within its community of classic-modern apparel hunters with a knack for something truly timeless.

name: Haagen-Dazs
description: Pamper yourself with Haagen Dazs Ice Cream at Sunway Pyramid. Haagen Dazs make the best ice cream in the world using high quality, carefully selected ingredients. Haagen Dazs founder, Reuben believed that if you were going to indulge in ice cream, it should be a real and fulfilling experience rather than the 'cold and sweet stuff' of his time. HÃ¤agen-Dazs ice cream comes in several traditional flavors as well as several esoteric flavors that are specific to the brand, such as Vanilla Swiss Almond and Bananas Foster. It is marketed as a "super-premium" brand: it is quite dense means it is very little air is mixed in during manufacture, uses no emulsifiers or stabilizers other than egg yolks, and has a high butterfat content. It is sold both in grocery stores and in dedicated retail outlets serving ice cream cones, sundaes, and so on. HÃ¤agen-Dazs ice cream starts with real cream and milk, which we then blend with carefully selected ingredients, to create an ice cream with a unique velvety texture and unforgettable taste. Every mouthful of HÃ¤agen-Dazs is an absorbing, intensely pleasurable experience, so good that you can't help but share it with those you love. Always check out the best delas on Haagen Dazs Sunway Pyramid.
ratings:
(5â­) This store is located on the LG1 Floor (equivalent to Level 2) of Sunway Pyramid. Navigating to the store can be somewhat confusing using the mallâ€™s information guide.

However, its vantage point offers a significant view overlooking Sunway Pyramid Ice, a rink capable of hosting ice-skating and ice hockey activities.

The store is surrounded by various food and beverage outlets, contributing to high human traffic in the area. Its internal and external environments are clean, spacious, and brightly illuminated, fostering a welcoming and relaxing atmosphere.

Its interior design features comfortable couches alongside a high bar table and chairs, enhancing its inviting appeal. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Haagen-Dazs never disappoints! Yes, itâ€™s on the sweeter side, but the flavors are always rich and satisfying. The staff was super kind and patient, letting me sample all the flavors before I finally decided on my 3 scoops. Great service and delicious ice cream - 3 months ago | (3â­) I am the supporter & fan of Hagen-Dazs since 1998 (25 years). Good place for ice cream with good location to view ice skating. But the quality & taste of ice cream had drop tremendously but the price is also increased tremendously on ice cream creations. The colour of Green tea favour is NO longer dark green. There are many new comer & new brand in the market are much better taste than this brand. Please do more research & innovation or just close shop to prevent more losses - 9 months ago | (5â­) Their staff are very friendly, helpful and polite. Their ice cream is so delicious and gooodddd! I love their service and place to sit is comfortable. The best part is I got to taste the sample first before I can make my decision to buy. Overall, I love to buy my ice cream from here. I would highly recommend everyone to go here and get YOUR OWN ICE CREAM âœ¨ - a month ago | (1â­) I ordered coffee-flavored ice cream. To my surprise, for the price, I paid for a single scoop I was given a small scoop, nearly half of the cup. So stingy to be generous to give a nice big scoop that nicely fits the cup. I nicely complained to the Chinese guy about it, and all he said was that's how it's being served! He couldn't be careless to rectify the situation. I told him overseas they are so generous to give us a big scoop! I do not understand why the management failed to take action. There are plenty of ice cream companies that serve even better than Haagen Dasz. - 6 months ago

name: Haidilao Hotpot
description: There are personalized services in Haidilao Hot Pot, including free nail art on working days and hand care on holiday for female customers while they are waiting in the line. Customers can also have free leather shoe cleaning service, as well as free photo printing. The restaurant offers massage chairs for customers. Also, some stores have childrenâ€™s play rooms and are accompanied by special personnel. While eating at Haidilao Hot Pot, customers can view Sichuan's characteristic face-changing performance as well as a fusion of Chinese martial arts. The restaurant also provides customers with a variety of snacks, fruits, and games at their seats. Haidilao Hot Pot has won more than ten titles and honors such as â€œadvanced enterpriseâ€, â€œconsumer satisfaction unitâ€ and â€œfamous hot potâ€ in Sichuan, Shanxi, Henan and other provinces in China. From 2008 to 2012, it won the â€œTop 10 Hot Pot Restaurantâ€ by the public comment website for 5 consecutive years in China. At the same time, it won the honorary title of â€œTop 100 Chinese Catering Enterprisesâ€ for 5 consecutive years. On May 27, 2011, â€œHaidilaoâ€ trademark was awarded â€œChina Famous Brandâ€.

name: Halolo Park
description: Get ready for an unforgettable adventure at Halolo Park, the largest claw machine park in Malaysia! Step into a vibrant world filled with exciting claw machines offering plush toys, snacks, and trendy blind boxes. Perfect for families, friends, and claw machine enthusiasts, Halolo Park promises a fun-filled experience for all ages. Whether you're aiming to win your favorite plush, uncovering surprises in blind boxes, or simply enjoying the thrill of the game, Halolo Park is the ultimate destination for fun and entertainment.

name: Hana Dining + Sake Bar
description:
Hana Dining Sake Bar is introduced to Malaysia from Taiwan in 2015, setting a stardard to deliver a whole new modern Japanese dining experience. Nether fast food nor slow food: it's all about Fresh Food, because we prepare healthy food using fresh, quality products.
All of our dishes are prepared upon order using the finest imported ingredients as well as fresh sourced from the local market. At HDG, you choose what you want and how you want it, and weâ€™ll cook it there and then, so you can enjoy the best cuisine embodying our culture â€œSexy Ambience . Great Food . Good People . Chill Musicâ€.
Be part of us today, as there is certainly something for everyone â€œItadakimasu!â€
ratings:
(4â­) I frequent the Hana Dining restaurant in IPC quite a bit, so I was looking forward to trying this branch out. The food is about the same, so that's good. The service is also not bad. In those regards, they're the quite similar. The ambience and atmosphere, however, is much better here. There is a lot more space, and it's got a more chilled vibe in comparison. The menu is also extensive, so there's something for everyone. I would say it's a good place to visit for a nice dinner after shopping and/or a movie, especially if you love Japanese food. Recommended! - 2 weeks ago | (3â­) Decent japanese restaurant at Sunway Pyramid.

Service is pretty friendly. Seating is both ample and spacious.

Interior deco at the entrance has a Japanese feel.

The food however is mediocre is both taste and quality compared to the price you pay. Not bad but not great either.

The sake quality is also mediocre, At a range of RM150++, again you get what you pay for.

Overall, an acceptable place for a Japanese meal but nothing awesome. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Food was decent and also fresh during my dining. Staff was pretty friendly from start till end of the service experience.

The soothing atmosphere along with the music being played just makes the experience more delightful.

Great work - 5 months ago | (2â­) Those foods were not very surprised and the price was worth for nothing. Everything wasnâ€™t served hot enough and those sashimi werenâ€™t fresh alsoâ€¦ taste sour of tuna and the prawn was too fishyâ€¦ Maybe iâ€™d over expected to this restaurant before visited â€¦ - a month ago | (1â­) Skip this place! There were worms in the drinks, and the food and service are absolutely terrible. The staff have terrible attitudesâ€”ask them a question, and they wonâ€™t even bother responding. The few dishes I ordered that were supposed to be hot came out ice-cold, and they didnâ€™t even provide a spoon. To make matters worse, they only served the green tea after everything else. And that guy in the picture? His disrespectful glare and complete lack of customer service are infuriating. Worst of all, they let worms fly or crawl all over their teapot before serving it to customers. Avoid this place at all costs!!! - 2 weeks ago

name: Havaianas
description: Everyday can feel like a holiday when youâ€™ve got your pair of Havaianas on! Looking for flit flops and sandals but worried that it screams overly plan or laid-back? Trust us when we say that at Havaianas at Sunway Pyramid, youâ€™ll find only the trendiest and comfortable pairs that look so great youâ€™ll want to wear it everywhere. What was previously worn as an essential beachwear, has now become an icon of fun, fashion and casualness that will accompany you no matter how far your feet take you. With over 50 years of history in the footwear retailer industry, this Brazilian brandâ€™s first pair was actually based on the traditional Japanese Zori sandals which use rice straw to create the soles. How the brand makes its flit flops and sandals iconic is by it trademark design, creating the texture of their rubber soles to appear like rice grains. Even before crossing international borders, the brand first gained recognition from foreign countries when tourists would love to them home as gifts, or even to sell in their home country. Havaianasâ€™ footwear isnâ€™t just iconic, it gives you top quality to match its reputation, claiming that their flit flops and sandals donâ€™t lose their shape, donâ€™t smell and their straps donâ€™t come loose. Over the years, the brand has evolved and adapted with trends, which led to the birth of new footwear from them, including sneakers and espadrilles to cater to fans who live in countries with climates that require something warmer than flit flops. Translating the rubber flit flops into the soles of the sneaker showcases how the brand retains its symbolic feature into its latest creations. Havaianas constantly brings you fresh designs featuring eye-catching colours, fun prints, and even special collections (like their Frozen 2 range!). Priding themselves on footwear that is designed with comfort in mind, wearing their products will bring joy to your feet! The brand is also known for its sustainability efforts, donating part of its revenue to help preserve Brazilians forests, oceans, flora and fauna.

name: Herschel
description: If youâ€™ve ever hear someone say that backpacks arenâ€™t in style, theyâ€™ve obviously never been to Herschel in Sunway Pyramid. Manufacturing hipster retro backpacks and accessories since 2009, Canadian brand Herschel quickly became renowned for its status as a hipster bag brand. Its range of products consists of backpacks, duffel bags, luggage, hats and other accessories. Targeted at the age group of 18 â€“ 35 years old, the brandâ€™s products are designed to evoke a sense of American nostalgia, with its iconic logo that gives off a vintage feeling, synthetic leather straps and even its brand name which is named after a small Canadian frontier village. The design of the bags is iconic and easily recognisable, available in different collections, such as the Classics collection designed for the everyday traveller, the Studio Collection which expresses a unique creativity in each design, the BWH collection made up of experimental designs, and the Kids collection which is down-sized for children and youths. Men and women can opt for different types of bags depending on their occasion and style preference, such as backpacks, duffles, messenger bags, hip packs, totes and crossbodies. Their range of apparel includes rainwear, windbreakers, fleeced, insulated attire, jackets, tees, long sleeves, crewnecks, hoodies, shorts and pants. Complete your look with their line of accessories, comprising of headwear, wallets, laptop sleeves, travel accessories, and pouches. If youâ€™re ready for an adventure, a durable and fashionable luggage is an absolute must-have! Check out their selection of hard-shell and soft-shell luggage, carry-on luggage and check-in luggage, to find that perfect travel companion thatâ€™ll keep your belongings, plus have extra room to store your purchases! The brand even has a range of travel accessories such as passport holders, umbrellas, luggage belt, luggage scale, travel organisers and adapters laundry bags, toiletry bag, and shoe bag. Travelling with a little one? Worry not, Herschel even supplies products you need for your baby on a trip, such as beanies and changing mats! Theyâ€™ve got you covered for the entire trip!

name: Himalaya
description:
The Himalaya Drug Company was founded in 1930 by Mr. M.Manal with a clear vision to bring Ayurveda to society in a contemporary form and to unravel the mystery behind the 5,000-year-old system of medicine. In the years that followed, the brand has introduced many other iconic brands which have become household names.
Today, Himalaya's portfolios include Pharmaceuticals, Personal Care, Baby Care, Wellness, and Animal Health. Himalaya brand is synonymous with safe and efficacious herbal products. We operate in over 100countries, our products are prescribed by 400,000 doctors worldwide, and millions of customers trust us for their health and personal care needs.
Here in Malaysia, Himalaya is owned and operated by Embun Elit Sdn Bhd. With more than 200 products available in the local market. Always remember Himalaya with our tagline "Wellness in Every Household, Happiness in Every Heart".
For more information on Himalaya Malaysia, visit: www.shophimalaya.my

ratings:

The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

ratings:
(3â­) This Singaporean store had increased the price to 20% & 40% on all items in the store, compared to last year. Loved the ambience, choices of colors and the neatly arranged items for sale. Everything feels premium and of high quality regardless of which product you are looking for. Believe me - the quality of the items is the best! There is always the best discounts on the items In the shop! CHEAP COMPARED TO THE QUALITY YOU RECEIVE!

name: Hou Duck
ratings:
(5â­) New food shop located right beside Jaya Grocer. Tried the Peking duck (half), signature fried rice and braised noodle. Food was above average. Very tender duck meat and crispy duck skin. Popiah skin paired with duck sauce, cucumber, leek and crispy duck skin. Braised noodle in Hokkien style was generous with ingredients : prawn, fishcakes and squid

One downside is the fried rice is quite oily. - a month ago | (3â­) The roasted duck is super skinny ğŸ‘€.
The char siu is chewy and delicious.

The waitress seemed very kancheong rushing me to place an order and not giving time to think. The serving time was quite long too.

Overall, itâ€™s considered pricey for the portion they provide. - 2 months ago | (3â­) The whole Peking duck is really worth the value to try.
Whole duck come with twenty pancake (Chun Bing), each pancake with "divider" in between, not like some restaurant, the whole pancake stack together, hard to remove.

Nut the rice doesn't feel like it has any water, maybe the water ratio is not correct.
Noodle are too salty. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Peking Duck: Crispy, Full of Aroma, Juicy & tender

trio eggs vege: average, small portion

name: Hush Puppies
description:
With its memorable and iconic adorable basset hound logo, Hush Puppies Footwear & Accessories in Sunway Pyramid is where youâ€™ll find soft and breathable footwear of unparalleled comfort. Regardless of age, gender, lifestyle, or style preference, youâ€™ll want to embrace the everyday comfort that their shoes provide. Since 1958, this global brand has expanded to over 165 countries around the world, turning its beloved basset hound trademark into a cultural icon featured on footwear and apparel for men, ladies, and children.
For the ladies, treat your feet to comfy sandals and flip-flips that are lightweight, flexible and well-cushioned, designed to encourage natural alignment of the body to reduce fatigue. If you prefer footwear that keep your toes covered, try their slip-ons, espadrilles, boat shoes, loafers or ballet flats with soft and bouncy insoles to cushion your feet every step of the way. A selection of heels is available in different styles, with options for closed-toe or peep-toe variations, wedges heels, medium heels or kitten heels, rest assured this range are heels that youâ€™ll feel comfortable to walk in the whole day. For casual shoes, try their sporty and fun sneakers! Its breathable material allows for maximum ventilation, while its outer sole is built with lightweight material to ease your stride and the foot bed is comfortably cushioned so youâ€™ll feel as though youâ€™re walking on clouds.
For the men, versatile, comfortable sandals and flip-flops are available in different designs and materials such as leather, rubber, and suede, to suit wherever youâ€™re headed. If youâ€™re going to be walking a lot and need extra protection covering your feet, opt for their range of sneakers or smart casual slip-ons. Emphasizing a casual cool design, their sneakers are lightweight and have comfortable and bouncy foot beds to prevent your feet from getting tired out easily, and to provide flexibility and energy return with each step. The breathability of their shoes will also help you keep your feet dry and avoid any odour.

ratings:

Shiro special ramen is ok but the noodles was a little tough as I chose the normal option. - 2 months ago | (5â­) One of the good qc ramen in town, (but I feel last time yummier) haha

Green tea is free refill. - 3 months ago | (5â­) The restaurant is easy to find in the mall. Space big and comfortable. The only problem is music too louder. The food so far is not bad, the portion so far so good. - a month ago | (5â­) Missed Japan ramen, especially Ippudo Ramen.
Came to fulfill my temptation.

Staffs are friendly. Price reasonable. Big portion as i have small stomach.
Delicious broth with cha siew and ramen.

Now using UOB bank card, you will get free ice cream.
7th anniversary also u may win a prize too. Try your luck. - 5 months ago | (4â­) Come here on a weekday to skip the queue. Not my favourite ramen in KL but definitely one of the better ones. They maintain their quality and standards from Japan here. My go-to order is always the Kuro ramen but today I decided to try the seasonal Yokohama Iekei ramen that comes with Cabbages. Pretty much a ä¸­è¯ style ramen thats milder in flavor but still easy to eat and broth is still flavorful.
Would still recommend Ippudo if you're looking for quality ramen. - 4 months ago

name: Ichiban Ramen
description: Retailing of Japanese cuisine.
ratings:
(5â­) the food is good here, especially their ramen; the  broth is quite creamy and delicious! and dumpling filling is alot too.
recommended - 3 months ago | (4â­) Had lunch at Ichiban Ramen and tried the spicy Ichiban ramen. The ramen noodles were perfectly kenyal (springy) and had a nice texture, which I really enjoyed! However, the broth could use a bit more kickâ€”the spice level was milder than expected and didn't quite hit the mark.

The environment was comfortable, not too hot or too cold, which was nice. I ordered the lunch set, but it required an additional RM3 for an iced lemon tea, which felt a bit off since you'd expect the set to be a better value without add-ons.

The service was okay, though sometimes it took a while to get the staff's attention as they didnâ€™t always check for raised hands. Overall, an okay experience, but a few improvements would make it even better - 3 months ago | (3â­) Food was ok, even though it could have been better. The chicken slightly dry. Ramen also slightly pricey to compare with big bowl but normal portion (at least to us lah). Ramen soup also ok-lah just like that. AND do not add on extra chilli. Not worth it to pay for small chilli plate size. The kimchi fried rice quite decent. Can come and try but might not come again so soon. - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) Decided to go there for a quick lunch Service was great especially by the waiter Daniel He was super attentive Price was reasonable for the lunch set which comes with a drink, fruit and soup - 3 months ago | (3â­) Quite busy. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

Hello~ We are JC CONCEPT in Sunway Pyramid which transformed from JC My Closet Diary. It was founded in 2008 by Christine Lim together with her husband Joseph Pang.
JC Concept is now providing alternative of Fashion Clothing & Evening gowns from XS to 7XL~ Of course, alteration service (if needed) is still provided. For those who like unique designs clothing, please do not wait anymore, come & grab your favourite clothing~
Alright~ all outer wears are provided, how about inner wears? Well~ what you guess is right! We are providing inner wears as well. We are having shaping bra (from A to I cup) but not the normal bra. So, what is shaping bra? What is the function of shaping bra? Shaping bra is a bra which can help women to â€œre-shapeâ€ the breast. It contains negative-ions which could help to purify the blood in our body. We women understand women. Especially for the sisters who gave birth. Although we gave birth, we must always make sure our body is still â€œin controlâ€.
Our dream is to provide love & care to the sisters who are not confident with their appearances through changing their outfits.No matter what size you are, you MUST believe that you are much beautiful than you think. So, be confident to be the beauty in this world.
If you have any enquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: JOHNNYâ€™S RESTAURANT
description:
Come on over to Johnnyâ€™s Restaurants for a hearty meal. Newly opened in Sunway Pyramid, Johnnyâ€™s is well known for its Thai steamboat and many other Thai favourites â€“ loved by both children & adults alike!
Here in Johnnyâ€™s, we truly believe freshness is key to delicious meals. Our chicken soup is prepared daily every morning. This yummy broth truly brings out the freshness in the steamboat ingredients. Choose from an array of seafood, meat and vegetables of your liking, or steamboat sets for 2 pax and 4 pax for your convenience. Our house speciality items are not to be missed! Paired with â€˜Suki Sauceâ€™ â€“ our unique Thai dip sauce that constantly leaves you longing for more.
Our Thai favourites â€“ a range of rice, noodles & ala carte dishes are perfect for a wholesome meal any time of the day. BBQ Chicken Wings and Pineapple Fried Rice are kids all-time favourite while Tom Yam lovers canâ€™t get enough of our spicy & flavourful Tom Yam soup prepared fresh daily. Whether you are in the mood for something spicy or not, we have a variety of dishes to satisfy your cravings!
Come on over to Johnnyâ€™s for a great meal today!

I understand it's a peak season but please don't waste customers time waiting. - 2 months ago | (1â­) The customer service was very cold, odd & bewildering.
The atmosphere as per exhibited by the waitress was bordeline hostile.

Question:

1. Is it the SOP that takeaway customers are not allowed to be seated in order to view the menu & make the selection?

The restaurant was only a handful of customers since it was after lunch hour (1521 hours). Thus, there are a lot of empty tables. In addition, there were no customer queuing anyway.

2. Is it the SOP that takeaway customers is warranted to wait outside of the restaurant while awaiting for the meal to be ready?

It really baffles me that I was not allowed to be seated because I have chose to takeway my meals.

The waitress in a way insisted me to wait outside for my meal, whereas, I have ordered 2 drinks for dine-in (the drinks were noted as takeaway in the receipt, even though I have stated otherwise).

If not because of one (1) of the waiter (a gentleman), I would have to stand outside while waiting for my meal.

3. Is it the SOP as well for the customer to clear the table from the drinks which were consumed as dine-in?
(As aforementioned, the drinks were packed as takeaway, whereas I had it ordered as dine-in).

This is my 1st & final visit to Johnny's (Sunway Pyramid's branch). - a month ago

name: JOLLIBEE
description:
Jollibee, home of world-famous crispy and juicy Chickenjoy, has finally opened in Sunway Pyramid!
Jollibee is the flagship brand of Jollibee Group, and it is one of the fastest growing South-East Asian QSR with branches worldwide, including the United States of America, Canada, United Kingdom, Italy, Spain, Vietnam, Singapore, Brunei, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Qatar, Oman, Kuwait, Bahrain, Malaysia, and the special territories of Hong Kong and Macau.
Enjoy Jollibee's bestsellers such as the world-famous Chickenjoy - delicately hand-breaded for a crispy exterior, cooked with precision for maximum juiciness, and marinated to the bone for next-level flavour. For those who love a hot kick to their fried chicken, Jollibee offers Spicy Chickenjoy which is coated with fiery breading and infused with a signature spicy marinade. Some of the other crowd pleasers includes the Jolly Spaghetti, prepared with its signature sweet-style sauce, loaded with chunky slices of beef sausage and generously topped with cheese, and the Yumburger is Jollibeeâ€™s version of the hamburger and a favourite that can be ordered with or without cheese.
ratings:
(4â­) Came by for a quick late lunch since there was almost no queue at the ordering kiosks. The orders were quickly fulfilled via a numbered ticket on your order receipt.

Taste wise, biting into either their fried chicken or beef burgers is quite nostalgic if you have had their offerings from childhood. It still tastes pretty decent and some of the menu options on display do reflect the pinoy influence on the menu options here. All in all, a decent alternative to the competition at the Golden Arches and other similar outlets. Oh, and they have Mountain Dew. Recommended if you've never tried this or used to enjoy their offerings as a kid. - 5 months ago | (5â­) First time tried Jollibees. Love it. Fried chickens taste different from others franchise. Like the sweetness of the spaghetti (suit for my kid). Kinda fond with pineapple juice to cleanse the taste after the meal. Mashed potatoes not too soft and the gravy not thick which I preferred thick. Coleslaw fresh and sweet. Unfortunately service kinda slow. - 6 months ago | (2â­) This isn't my first visit here, but my most recent visit left me dissappointed with the food. I ordered the Burger steak thay comes with a rice and a burger patty. Needless to say, check out my photo to see how depressing that burger patty looks. I had to hold it up with a fork to take this photo or else its so thin that it sinks beneath the sauce. The taste was ok, but portion was really not worth the money.
The only saving grace was the peach mango pie which has been my all-time favourite.
Will I be back? Maybe, but I would go for the Jolly spaghetti or chicken next time. - 5 months ago | (4â­) My first time trying Jollibee yesterday. I ordered a set which had 1 piece of chicken, a burger, spagetti and a drink. And I added an ala carte hotdog so that I get to try a wide range of their food.
The burger was relatively small in size but the taste of the burger meat was pretty nice, compared to other fast food burgers. It had a pleasant distinct smoky flavour.
Am happy they had spagetti because I love spagetti.
The special thing about their fried chicken was their brown sauce which had herb taste in it. And the chicken seasoning was nice too.
The sausage in the hot dog tasted good too - it had a unique smoky taste to it too. The BBQ sauce was a tad too sweet and overpowering.
A bit disappointed their drink was not re-fillable.

ratings:
(4â­) Came for lunch at the spur of the moment. It is quite busy.

Spicy smoked duck oglio is pretty good. Duck is tender. It's not too spicy.

One can have add on of cake and coffee at a minimal cost. In fact add on of americano is free!

Americano is quite strong and to my liking. Oreo cheesecake is satisfactory.

Friendly staff. - a month ago | (3â­) Jardin Coffee & Tea at Sunway Pyramid offers a simple and relaxing ambiance, making it a nice spot to unwind. ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Jo Malone
description:
Jo Malone London is a British perfume and scented candle brand, founded by Jo Malone in 1983. It has been owned since 1999 by EstÃ©e Lauder. The brand is known for its expensive perfumes, luxury candles, bath products, and room scents. Jo Malone is a quintessentially British fragrance brand that has created some of the most celebrated perfumes in the industry. The brand became popular in the United States following Malone's appearance on The Oprah Winfrey Show. In 1999, Jo Malone sold the company to EstÃ©e Lauder Companies for "undisclosed millions". Malone continued to work for the brand as creative director until 2006, and was barred from creating a new fragrance or skincare line for 5 years due to a non-compete agreement. The brand is represented by English model and musician Karen Elson and model and actress Poppy Delevingne who have served as spokespersons for the brand. Check out the best deal on Jo Malone in Sunway Pyramid.
#BeautyTreats

(5â­) Had an amazing experience while shopping for gifts here.

Founded in 2020, Jordan Hong Kong Restaurant is a Hong Kong-style restaurant that not only serves authentic traditional Hong Kong-style cuisine, but is also committed to combining tradition and innovation. We aim to develop special dishes based on the traditional Hong Kong restaurant culture and basis. And all of this is brought to you by the Hong Kong-style restaurant chefs with 25 years of experience who use professional and custom culinary art to create various types of unique Hong Kong style cuisine of personal ingenuity. Jordan Hong Kong Restaurant adheres to the principle of "quality food and service". Full of dedication from the selection process to the cooking method, coupled with enthusiasm and considerate service.
Always be "customer-oriented, and excellence", it is bound to allow customers enjoy high-quality and innovative dining experience at 
all times.
ratings:
(4â­) Cozy Atmosphere with Hit-or-Miss Dishes

The atmosphere is cozy and comfortable, with air conditioning making it a pleasant place to dine. However, do note that weekends can get busy, and you might need to queue.

As for the food, the polo bun is a standoutâ€”fresh and flavorful. The cheese rice is decent but has room for improvement. The croissant egg tart, while unique, was a bit too sweet for my taste, though others might enjoy it more.

Overall, it's worth a visit for the cozy ambiance and to try the signature items. - 2 months ago | (2â­) Came in for lunch and we ordered the wanton soup noodle and the steamed pork patty with salted fish. description: Juice Works Malaysia is committed to creating and hand crafting fresh fruit juices and healthy smoothies using only the freshest and most natural ingredients we can lay our hands only. With over 30 flavours to choose from, it is impossible to not fall in love with one of our awesome creations on our menu.
ratings:
(5â­) Have been patronising juice work thru out their outlets across klang valley. Their quality are always consistent.

Few of my favourite are mango passion, strawberry kiss and banana blast. Havenâ€™t try their greenery option.

The only complaint will be the price point. Is getting way more expensive compared to other fruit beverage maker. Hopefully they can price back appropriately to the market level as around 20 ringgit for fruit juices is a bit too expensive. Should cap around 15 or lesser. Anyway hope they can sustain their market as competition are a lot and consumers have other choices too. - 3 months ago | (2â­) Had the dragon sparkle which was good as well as the lychee paradise which was a let down. Every mouthful was filled with mango fibers which even though the drink tasted good, the mango fibers made it so hard to drink I had to throw it away. With that said, itâ€™s a comfortable place to sit and rest - a year ago | (5â­) First time I go to the Juice work, the staff there is really 100% friendly.. they're so gentle and always smile.. they also welcoming people too... 2020 October 10 - 4 years ago | (1â­) Worst experience out of the juice works outlets we have been to. The staffs are rude and have no responsibility.
We ordered the healthy drink Power size with #myDigi app promotion. The staff poured the drink to the Power size cup and it wasn't full so she added a cup of ice and blended again to pour it into the cup to make it full. We drank it and it was too bland and tasteless. We nicely feedback to the staffs and the replies we got was it's bland because it's health drink without yogurt in it and both the staffs keep insisting that's the reason the juice got bland. We then told them that they have added so much ice into it and they kept insisting they only add in half cup of ice which we saw there are a total of 2 full cup of ice (before blended the first round and 2nd round another cup). They didn't want to take responsibility for it and just simply give reasons to shoo us away instead of helping the paying customers. We then went to the cashier to tell the cashier thinking she might be the person who could at least solve the problem but she just acted blur and turned away. The staffs also asked us to move away and not blocking the cashier for other customers to make payment which then there were no customers behind us. This is SUPER RUDE. One of the staff then get our drink and then asked to pour away the ice but it was blended and we wonder how she would do that to pour away the ice? We saw her just pour the drink out to the blender and pour some juice away into the sink then pour back into the cup. And guess what the content becomes even lesser and the TASTE IS STILL BLAND. The staffs are trying to CHEAT on customers CONSTANTLY. We were so tired of their NONSENSE. At last the staff took the drink back and pour back into the blender and add one tiny piece of pineapple to add abit of taste to blend. It had a bit of taste but still the TASTE IS OFF. We were so TIRED OF talking to them anymore which lead to deaf ears so we just walked away with the healthy drink that just taste like WATER. Such A HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT. - 3 years ago

description:
KENS apothecary first brought about a beauty and skincare retail revolution in May 2000, introducing cult brands into Malaysia, such as Annick Goutal, Caudalie, Diptyque and Marvis to name a few and have since evolved into household names when it comes to niche luxury labels in Malaysia.

name: KL MOBILE STREET
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

name: KWAN KEE STORE
description:
"Kwan Kee Store is renowned for its dedication to delivering authentic flavors and traditional craftsmanship. Specializing in Hong Kong ancient stone dessert such as 3 flavor type of Rice Bowl, Steam Cakes, Sticky Rice Roll and Baked Item, the store has earned a reputation for quality, consistency, and attention to detail.
Our commitment to culinary excellence has been recognized by the prestigious Michelin Guide, with Kwan Kee Store proudly receiving the Michelin Guide Recommendation for six consecutive years and known as Hong Kong number one pastry in Malaysia. This accolade highlights our passion for bringing time-honored recipes to life and delivering an exceptional dining experience to every guest.
At Kwan Kee Store, every dish is a testament to our pursuit of tradition, taste, and authenticity. We invite you to savor the flavors that have earned us this esteemed recognition year after year."
ratings:
(3â­) Restaurant Review: Kwan Kee Store

Kwan Kee Store, a Michelin-recognized spot, is a must-visit for those who appreciate traditional Hong Kong pastries. Their dedication to authentic flavors and quality ingredients is evident in their offerings.

The white sugar sponge cake stands out with its light, fluffy texture and just the right level of sweetnessâ€”perfect for those who prefer a more delicate taste. The steamed red bean cake and pandan cake are also excellent, packed with red beans and maintaining a balanced, natural flavor without being overly sweet.

However, the Musang King rice roll falls a bit short. While the concept is interesting, it lacks the strong durian fragrance that one might expect from Musang King, leaving room for improvement in flavor intensity.

Price is on the high side, some might think worth it but some might not. - in the last week | (4â­) I've tried a few items but I don't remember the names. The service was really good, there was a guy who was very friendly and explained the snacks to us. Sadly, this branch is just a no-seat brach that brings only a number of items. I've been eyeing other snacks from their instagram but it's a bit hard to go to the main store. Anyway, I really like the mango flavoured roll, not sure what it's called, but you can see the photo. - in the last week | (5â­) It's more like a take away concept, although there is a couple of seats, but it looks more like a waiting area. Many those I wanted to try were sold out that day. I like both the steamed Pandan Cake and Brown Sugar Rice Bowl Cake. - 2 months ago | (5â­) They provide samples to try before buying. I liked the black sesame layer cake, soft and flavorful. Also bought the signature White sugar sponge cake to try.
The store setup is pretty simple and mainly for takeaway. - 2 months ago | (3â­) The snacks are just average, the famous white rice cake, was abit sour when I ate it.
Donâ€™t think the desserts are worth the hype. - a month ago

ratings:

â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Kate Spade New York
description:
Ssince our launch in 1993 with six essential handbags, we've always stood for optimistic feminity
today we're global life and style house filled with handbags, of course. also clothes,
shoes, jewelry, home decor, tech accessories and so many other things that you use every day.
we value thoughtful details. we think a layer of polished ease looks (and feels) so chic.
and to us, modern, sophisticated colors make a personal style statement all their own.
itâ€™s these founding principles that define our unique style. we like that our style is synonymous with joy.
kate spade new york is part of the tapestry house of brands.

ratings: (1â­) First time trying so ordered chicken kebab and requested for add on chicken RM6 but Iâ€™m shocked to see the amount of chicken given! I spent RM11 for the original kebab and RM6 for the add on. Unbelievable! Small chicken bits and itâ€™s really daylight robbery. Will not buy again. Very disappointed. - 4 months ago | (1â­) Wanted to take away something quick for child on the way back home. This must be one of the worst kebab purchases I made locally. RM11 and it contains little chicken (taken from some Tupperware, not cut in front of you), hard bread and last minute 'put into toaster' action. Basically threw it away, regretful purchase. Nothing against the 'foreigner' manning this kiosk, it's just not worth it. Any Subway is few hundred times better. - 8 months ago | (1â­) This shop used to be my favourite back then. But recently came here for beef kebab + extra kebab + canned soft drinks that cost me RM30 (I didnâ€™t take the receipt since I always came here). The kebab doesnâ€™t really taste like meat kebab. More to kebab with chilli sauce & a lil bit of cabbage. I donâ€™t know why its getting so expensive but they donâ€™t maintain the service. How can you put extra charge and reduce the meat at the same time. Itâ€™s not worth it. RM30 can get better food elsewhere. Sila mereput. Bye. - a year ago | (1â­) Bought meat kebab. The owner must have told the staff to make like a million kebabs from the small portion of meat. Look at the photo. Hardly can see any meat. Not gonna repeat ever. - 2 years ago | (5â­) I understand they have to reduce meat because of rising costs and rent. Those who rely on a fixed income (makan gaji) will never understand. name: Kenangan Coffee
description:
Kenangan Coffee is the fastest growing grab-and-go coffee chain from Indonesia, founded in 2017. It has over 800 stores in Indonesia, and now available in Malaysia. Kenangan Coffee is known for its Kenangan Blend coffee beans and signature Kenangan Latte. It also offers coffee, tea, and food.
Download the Kenangan Coffee app to pre-order or find us at LG1.118A Orange Atrium

Been here twice now. Once with 50% promo for 1st time users & the other with certain amount off.

We had the avocado milk & avocado coffee on both occasions. There were good although a bit sweet. The coffee version is the best. Interesting combination. Avocado adds an interesting creaminess to the drink. Also tried their firecracker sausage & banana choco chip muffin. Average at best. Happy that they can warm it up for dine in.

Felt a bit too pricey for what it is. Even with the promos. Many better options around. - a year ago | (3â­) Heard of this so called famous Indonesian chain coffee. Decided to give it a try.
