name: Kiehl's Since 1851
description:
Kiehl's LLC is an American cosmetics brand retailer that specializes in skin, hair, and body care products. It started as a single pharmacy in Manhattan at Third Avenue and East 13th Street in 1851. Kiehl's was purchased by the L'OrÃ©al Group in 2000 and currently has more than 250 retail stores worldwide, and over 1,000 points of sale supplemented by sales in high-end department stores, select airport locations, as well as independent stockists. In contrast to its market competitors, Kiehl's is distinguished for its unorthodox marketing approach, exceptionally large male clientele base, and its products' simple and straightforward packaging. Find healthier skin with a personalised skincare routine tailored to your needs at Kiehl's Sunway Pyramid! Powered by science and nature since 1851, find out more about our all-time customer favourite skin care beauty products.
#BeautyTreats
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Kipling
description: Kipling's story is one of great passion, creative and entrepreneurial spirit. It all started in 1987 in a small flat in Antwerp, the city of fashion. Three keen enthusiasts decided to make their entrance into the fashion world with a trendy yet affordable collection of bags. Armed with a strong brand, a powerful image, and an extensive range of fashionable, practical and high quality bags, KIPLING has been busy conquering the world over the last 30 years. Every bag has its own mascot monkey dangling from it. Today, KIPLING plays a part in the everyday life of millions of women in 67 countries throughout the world. Their KIPLING accompanies them on their way to work, on their shopping trips, whilst playing sports, at work, and on their evenings out. No wonder because KIPLING bags are simply unique, they are not only super trendy but they are also of high quality, practical and affordable.

As first-time users of your membership program, we simply wanted to accumulate our membership points and sought guidance from a female staff member on how to do so. However, she bluntly told us, "No, you canâ€™t." When we approached her again later, she suddenly changed her response and said that the QR code had to be scanned before making payment. Unfortunately, she had not informed us of this earlier. Since there were other customers present, we proceeded with the payment, unaware that we would miss out on earning our points.

Feeling helpless and frustrated, we turned to a male staff member for assistance. Instead of offering help in a professional manner, he raised his voice in an attempt to intimidate us. When we reasoned with him, he accused my girlfriend of being rude and aggressive toward the female staff member. As a paying customer, I believe we deserve basic respect and proper service. I urge your management to address this issue, ensure proper staff training, and take necessary actions to improve customer service at Komugi Sunway Pyramid. - 4 weeks ago

name: Koong Woh Tong
description: Koong Woh Tong has been the household name to sought for traditional Chinese herbal teas and their famous â€˜Guiling Gaoâ€™. Their first shop was opened in 1990 at Kuala Lumpur, and now there are over 50 outlets in Peninsula Malaysia. Throughout the years, the brand continued to conduct researches on authentic herbs formula with a will to keep in tune with the modern dietary habits of the customers. When the body is overworked and immune system is weak, the risk of getting sick is higher too. So, we need to take care of our overall health! Are you having indigestion or constipation? Sleepless nights? Take Koong Woh Tong Herbal Jelly! There are many healing properties of this jelly such as promotes balanced body metabolism, detoxifies the body, eliminates body heat, eliminates pimples and acne, restores body wellness. Caught under the weather with flu/cough/sore throat/cold/fever? Wants to detox and relieves body heat? Take Ya Sei Mei herbal tea! This tea has been traditionally labelled as a healthy beverage due to its remarkable medical properties. Brewed from more than 20 types of Chinese herbs, this tea could boost your health! Want to boost your body energy? Try the Five Flower Herbal Tea! The healing effects of this tea are cooling and soothing, whilst nourishing the spiritual energy. Besides that, drinking this tea can moisturise the eyes and improves sight energy, clears body heat and expel dampness. Our liver is one of the most important organ in our body. This is because the liver removes toxins and harmful substances from your body. The â€˜Ji Gu Caoâ€™ or Abrum Cantonese Plant Tea is sweet and slightly sour, good in protecting and soothing the liver. Moreover, this tea is effective in alleviate body heat and dissipate blood stasis. Apart from that, the â€˜Xia Gu Caoâ€™ or Spica Prunellae Tea is good for up-flaming of liver heat. Symptoms of liver heat are dizziness, swollen eyes, headache, constipation, insomnia and dry mouth. Last but not least, for those who feel anxious from heavy workloads, smokes and drinks should drink the Ling Zi Momordica herbal tea. This tea specialise in healing throat discomfort from smoking and drinking, and improve blood circulation. Visit Koong Who Tong at Lower Ground floor (blue zone) to get your health in check!

Today, LAC has over 100 nutraceutical products focusing on the 5 fundamentals â€“ Beauty, Anti-ageing, Immunity, Energy, and Weight Management â€“ bringing consumers unparalleled solutions for their everyday health and wellness.

name: LANEIGE
description: LANEIGE, derived from the French word â€œsnowâ€, is a South Korean beauty brand launched in 1994 by Amorepacific, the largest beauty empire in South Korea. LANEIGE believes hydration is the fundamental key to luminous skin for beauty that radiates from within. With 29 years of dedication and expertise in moisture and skin research, LANEIGE developed its exclusive Water Recipe that transforms the water, the source of life, into dynamic moisture energy for clear and supple skin. LANEIGE was launched as the first brand under Amorepacific Malaysia in 2006. Its star products include the Water Bank Line, Water Sleeping Mask, Perfect R new Line, Radian-C Line and NEO Cushion.

name: LEATHER AVENUE
description: Here to help you fulfil all your wanderlust desires, Leather Avenue at Sunway Pyramid is a top-quality leather goods, bags, and leather luggage retailer that has all you need so that youâ€™ll be able to pack all your necessities for that next trip, and still leave room for your trip haul! Poised to be a leader in the industry, Leather Avenue carries several prominent brands including, Lushberry, Esfolar, Mendoza, Charles Berkeley, Valentino Creations, and more. Their assortment of products includes trendy and durable luggage bags and leather goods, including wallets and bags for men and women, which are crafted to be both fashionable yet functional. The Lushberry luggage, ranging from various sizes of 19â€ to 29â€ to cater to your travel needs, is the ideal travel partner. Each piece is designed to maximize style while minimizing hassles through its beautiful design and the premium and durable materials used to create outer shells that are tough enough to absorb impact, and flexible enough under stress. The travel experience wouldnâ€™t be complete without the perfect bag to accompany your every step. Leather bags from Brazilian brand Esfolar has a broad selection of bags, from totes to satchels and handbags to cross-body bags, available in numerous colours and designs, to suit each individualâ€™s style and taste. Crafted from the finest leather, their superior-quality and intricate designs, their bags are designed to last. High-quality and durable, Mendoza luggage and travel bags from Hong Kong has a wide array of youthful and vibrant products that make it the perfect travel companion. With it motto of quality, flexibility and versatility, the brandâ€™s luggage bags are unique and fashionable without foregoing quality and practicality. Synonymous with high-quality leather bags, wallets, and accessories for both men and women, Charles Berkeley products are crafted using specially treated leather to grant it impeccable durability and give it a fine finishing touch. Designed to be lightweight and functional, itâ€™s the perfect match for any occasion.

name: LIMAPULO
description:
Limapulo, a Michelin Select restaurant at 50, Jalan Doraisamy.
Limapulo by Baba Can Cook, was founded by the late John Tan Kim Chye (affectionately
known as Uncle John) and Alan Yun in 2014. Uncle John, a Baba, was the eldest son and
guardian of his family recipes. This is unusual as the kitchen was the domain of the
Nyonyas.
Alan and Uncle John both believe that the best way to preserve Peranakan heritage recipes
is by sharing them with the world.
Peranakan cuisine is a marriage of Hokkien flavours of soy and bean paste with the Malay
flavours of spice, coconut and tamarind. Dishes are labour intensive and elaborate, an
indicator of the wealth of the Peranakans.

name: LOVE, BONITO
description: Crafted to empower women all over to believe in themselves, Love, Bonito at Sunway Pyramid brings you not just any ordinary clothing, but fashion that will shape your lifestyle, enabling you to confidently express your unique self. This Singaporean brand believes that when you look good, youâ€™ll feel good too, hence using fashion as a tool to empower ladies to shine a little brighter as they grow into the women they desire to be! Designed to ensure you look your best wherever you go, they offer a range of mini, knee length, midi and maxi skirts to suit your mood and occasion. Classy and alluring, mini to maxi jumpsuits that never go out of style are available. For the fashionista who prefer to create an ensemble by mixing and matching their favourite pieces of clothing together, shop through their range of tops, comprising of blouses, camisoles, T-shirts, sleeveless tops and shirts. Style it your way by opting for either pants, shorts, skirts, skorts or jeans to complement the top youâ€™ve chosen. Finish off your perfect ensemble with their range of outwear, shoes, bags, and even accessories to inspire confidence as you strut along your day. With clothing ranging from different fabrics such as denim to knitwear, rest assured the brandâ€™s range is designed to cover every season and stage of each womanâ€™s life. All of their attire is created in-house, to cater to every size, shape and style. Love, Bonito doesnâ€™t practice fitting clothes on static mannequins, instead they fit them on real ladies just like you, and even re-enact real-life situations that every woman will face in a day (whether itâ€™s tying your hair, needing a place to grab a tissue fast, running after a bus). Crafting real clothes for real women, Love, Bonito is one fashion retailer where youâ€™ll find almost everything you need to express your amazing self unabashedly.

name: LUCKIN COFFEE
ratings:
(5â­) Visited this coffee shop during their launch week, and the place was understandably busy. The queue and waiting time were over 45 minutes, but I have to say, it was worth it. The coffee tasted great, and the pricing was reasonable.

Definitely a spot worth checking out if you're a coffee lover. Just be prepared for the wait during peak times, especially during their early days! - a month ago | (4â­) Last week I took a few friends who came from outstation to shop in Sunway Pyramid. We walked around this huge n complex shopping mall cos there were so many different exits n entrances. It was like a maze n you can easily lose your direction n get lost. We bought a couple of snacks n then on the ground floor we saw a large crowd queuing up outside a shop. Being curious n feeling kiasu, we went over to have a look. Wow it was Luckin Coffee the popular n famous brand of coffee from China. But why the large crowd? We discovered that they were having a promotion. Only RM 2.99 per cup of coffee of your choice from their menu. They offer a wide variety of coffees which range from RM 10 _ RM 15. So cheap n highly affordable. So we also joined the queue. The workers worked very fast n were very efficient in preparing the coffee. We didn't need to wait long before we got our coffee. They were very orderly n systematic in their operation too. First we had to scan the QR code n then download the app n then register n then choose your coffee n then you make your payment. Finally just wait for your order n then collect your coffee from the main counter. Everything went very smoothly n fast n without any mistakes at all. Wonderful experience for us all to see n watch how this China system worked. - 2 weeks ago | (4â­) During the launch week, I happened to visit Sunway and was able to use the offer rate to get a drink and handle the queue.
It took an hour to receive the drinks after making a reservation through the application because I was there during the first week. My friends purchased coffee, and the taste of my drinkâ€”chocolateâ€”was passable. According to the menu, the price seems reasonable. - a month ago | (4â­) Tasty coffee. Nice interior. Well built app. But due to the new opening offer, the queue and waiting time was too long. I waited more than 30 minutes to get my coffee. - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) Came here on grand opening day and waited almost 30mins to get my order! coffee was good, got nice promo on that day and staff are a lot and they serve pretty quick despite long q ğŸ‰ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ· - a month ago

name: Leo's Junior Kids Toilet & Baby Room
description:
Introducing... Leo's Junior Kids Toilet & Baby Room!
Welcome to our kid-sized washroom and baby room located at LG1 (Near to Yole, Faber Castell and Juicy) with colourful sanitary wares, sensory taps, air purifiers and more.. Just for kids!
Our rooms are cleaned frequently and sanitised every 4 hours during business hours!
To increase the cleanliness of our rooms, they have been misted with a Nano Coating Technology treatment by SmartCoat for virus disinfection purposes.
Built with you and your child's needs in mind, our baby rooms are equipped with kid-friendly toilets, diaper changing stations, private nursing rooms, hand sanitizer, baby lotion, baby soap, air purifier and hot/cold water dispensers.
For those who require to loan a nursing scarf or milk bottle warmer, kindly proceed to the nearest Concierge Counter, either at Ground Floor (near Main Entrance) or Level LG2 Marrakesh.
Partners: Rentokil Initial, Rigel, SmartCoat, Cuckoo, Pigeon, and Kimberly-Clark

ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

name: Lockers
description:
Storage for things you do not want to carry around while shopping. Locate the lockers behind Poh Kong @LG2 Blue Concourse. Terms & conditions apply.
Locker Sizes:
SMALL LOCKER : RM 10* per use
MEDIUM LOCKER Height : RM 20* per use
LARGE LOCKER Height : RM40* per use
HOW TO USE THE LOCKER?
Deposit:
1) Press [NEW LOCKER] and select your locker.
2) Set PIN & re-enter PIN.
3) Choose and remember the colour.
4) Pay with Debit/Credit card or eWallet.
5) Deposit belongings & close the door.
Retrieve:
1) Press [OPEN LOCKER]
2) Enter PIN & press on the pre-selected colour
3) Retrieve your belongings & close the door

name: Lollipop Pink
description:
Want to look good and chic? Make heads turn when you walk by, confidence brimming as you feel good that what you wear reflects who you are? Look no further, come right down to Asian Avenue, first floor and look for Lot number 7 and voila! You will reach Lollipop Pink in Sunway Pyramid, a place where you can shop till you drop. Hereâ€™s the catch, pick any two items from the shop, yes, and we mean any two items for just RM 99.90!
Lollipop Pinkâ€™s motto: â€œFashion is like eating, you shouldnâ€™t stick to the same menuâ€. Staying true to our motto and belief, we strive to bring you a variety of fashionable clothing and accessories, which ranges from women to menâ€™s attire, addressing different age groupâ€™s needs, and providing you the flexibility to mix and match any item in the store for RM 99.90. Simply said, we present you the access to chic and appealing everyday wear and accessories, without burning a hole in your pockets.
Lollipop Pink grew its roots over ten years ago, with a humble beginning retailing in babies and childrenâ€™s clothing. From then on, Lollipop Pink ventures into womenâ€™s clothing as her vision and passion grew to encompass fashion of the young adults. With this passion growing ever stronger, Lollipop Pink has now made her way to Sunway Pyramid, bringing an even broader range of fashion and accessories targeted at both the young and the mature. We are also proud to bring you an interesting and attractive range of muslimah fashion; a touch of feminine poise and elegance.
If youâ€™re looking for a change, for something different, a flair of fun and sparkle, or dash of class and maturity, you are in for a ride! If youâ€™re not sure what fits you, not to worry, swing by and we would love to assist you. So, come right over, weâ€™ll be waiting for you!

name: Love & Co
description: Reputable as one of the leading creators of bespoke jewellery, Love & Co. has been uniting unparalleled craftsmanship with modern interpretations of the perfect ring â€“ a symbol of an everlasting union. Love & Co. in Sunway Pyramid presents an extensive collection of wedding bands and diamond solitaires to delicately entwine the hearts of lovely couples for eternity. Whether youâ€™re looking for a pair of timeless wedding bands, or youâ€™re selecting that perfect diamond engagement ring for the love of your life, the brandâ€™s romantic jewellery is crafted with precision and dedication to last you forever. Their selection of Diamond jewellery consists of their Lovemarque and LVC Precieux collections. Love & Co promises that each of their Lovemarque diamond is responsibly sourced and delicately crafted, achieving the â€œUltimateâ€ grade of light performance in all four parameters: Brilliance (the intense bright light that shines from the diamond), Sparkle (dramatic flashes that occurs with movement of the diamond), Fire (vivid rainbow-like colours that are emitter from the diamond) and Light Symmetry (equal distribution of light reflected from the diamond). Under their LVC Precieux, youâ€™ll find exquisite lab grown diamonds that are chemically, physically and optically identical to naturally-mined diamonds. The only difference is that it is created by state-of-the-art technology to replicate the diamond growing process. These diamonds variate in colour and clarity, and are graded on the exact same criteria as natural diamonds. Cut to perfection, less expensive than natural diamonds, are more environmentally-friendly, these labs grown diamonds are still as pure as the top 2% of the worldâ€™s mined diamonds. Offering a range of exclusive wedding band collections, - LVC Aqueen, LVC Classique, LVC Desirio, LVC Eterno, LVC Noeud, LVC Poesie, LVC Promise, LVC Purete and LVC Soleiil â€“ Love & Co. is always here to help you and your loved one make a romantic declaration of your love through a style that best fits you. They also offer an alluring treasury of jewellery that can be gifted for special occasions in their LVC Charmes collection: Love Story locket pendants, Petit Bear pendants, Love Note pendants, Mini Ring pendants, and Ribbon pendants.

description: Taking the fashion accessories world by storm since 2010, Lovisa is a brand that has grown to be synonymous with the latest trending jewellery thatâ€™s uber stylish yet affordable. Lovisa in Sunway Pyramid prides itself in being a fashion-forward company that satisfies every womanâ€™s style needs. Originating from Singapore, the brand was created due to the need for trendy fashion jewellery at ready-to-wear prices. Drawing inspiration from couture runways to street style, the brand has expanded to having stores in over 15 countries, and delivers around 150 new styles to their stores on a weekly basis. With so many new styles brought in constantly, thereâ€™ll always be something you want to buy once you step into their store! Shop through their range of earrings, wrist-wear, rings, necklaces, hair accessories, body jewellery, and even kidsâ€™ accessories! For earrings, try on different styles such as hoops, studs, drop earrings, clip ons, ear cuffs, statement earrings, flatbacks and barbells. Opt for various colours such as gold, silver, rose gold, black, red, or multi-coloured, and choose from different types of plating too (sterling silver, gold, rose gold, surgical steel). If you donâ€™t have your ears pierced yet, not to worry, you can even get your ear piercings done right at their store! A selection of necklaces is available in the form of long necklaces, layered necklaces, and chokers. Match this with one of their stylish bracelets, bangles, watches and cuffs. How else can you beautify your delicate fingers besides a perfect manicure? With gorgeous rings! They have sterling silver rings, engagement rings, and band rings for you to choose from. Draw attention to your luscious locks with their hair accessory range, comprising of hair clips, scrunchies, headbands, hair scarves, flower crowns, hair vines and bridal hair accessories. For slightly less conventional yet amazingly stylish, try their range of body jewellery, such as anklets, nose rings, belly piercings, faux piercings or cartilage piercings. Mommies, bring your little princess here and have a fun time together choosing pretty jewellery and adorable hair accessories designed just for them!

name: Lung Ngen Claypot Coffee
description: Lung Ngen Coffee, a journey through exotic aroma & ingredients. Let's unlock the intricate flavors for a truly immersive tasting experience!
ratings:
(5â­) Opening Promotion till 11/11/24, buy 2 free 1.

Excellent coffee with a unique flavor where it is fused with Pandan leaves.

Do remember to ask for your preferred level of sweetness.

Good place to sit and watch the world breeze by. - 3 months ago | (4â­) Visited during the opening.

Ordered a Claypot Thai Milk Coffee.

Was so looking forward to an "immersive tasting experience". Unfortunately, none at all! Neither was there any touted "exotic aroma" nor "intricate flavours". Coffee was mediocre -- lacked strength and richness. Disappointed!

Also ordered Pak Lung's Roti Bakar. Pandan was good - smooth, rich, creamy and fragrant. But roti bakar was squashed as if someone had squeezed it and wasn't well toasted.

Nevertheless, splendid location with good vantage point to watch the world go by. Good pitstop to take a break from shopping. - 2 months ago | (4â­) The aroma is very nice when you are near the shop.
I like their menu choices, habe tried the thai milk tea and butterfly pea milk. Both refreshing and smells very nice.
Only downside is that its way too sweet for me. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Located at LG2, beside the escalator near Bungkus Kaw Kaw..

The atmosphere is great and comfy.. eventhough there is only 7 table at this shop.. to stop and take a stop is great here.. have your coffee or teatime here..

Currently the menu that i LOVE is Claypot Thai Tea Milk, Claypot Thai Tea Coffee, Claypot Thai Cocoa, Claypot Thai Horkasai, Thai Lemon Tea and Last But Not Least Thai Claypot Thai Green Milk Tea.. The Price is reasonable to upgrade only Add On RM1.. The packaging itself is nice and engaging..

Staff is friendly and great.. very helpful and help customer to guide what is their signature drink.. overall happy with this drink..

Recommended to try here in LUNG NGEN Thai Claypot Coffee.. â˜•ï¸ğŸµ

Just come here again.. as usual the service is topnotch.. :) - 4 weeks ago | (5â­) Honestly one of the good (not too sweet) tea or coffee if you like it Thai Style. The prices are in the reasonable range of about RM10-12. Should give it a try! - 2 months ago

name: MIX STORE
description:
Discover the worldâ€™s delicious at MiX â€“ Where you will find an abundance of your favourite imported snacks, drinks and food from all over Asia, including China, South Korea, Thailand, Japan, Indonesia, Taiwan & more.
Need a mid-shopping spree snack, get a self-heating hot pot, or if itâ€™s cheat day, indulge in our variety of delicious ice creams. We have it all here, at MiX Sunway Pyramid.
ratings: (4â­) 2days ago I went to this store in Sunway Pyramid to buy some snacks n nuts for my friends n guests who are coming to visit me during this Chinese New Year festive period. Previously I did buy some walnuts, cashew nuts n peanuts but my family members have eaten them all already. Since I was shopping in Sunway Pyramid, I walked into this store n was amazed by the huge varieties of different types of snacks, nuts , biscuits , chips n candies n jellies on sale. All these were packed n sealed in attractive n easy to carry packages. There were healthy snacks, instant vegetable snacks,childrenâ€™s snacks, candy n jelly n various nuts n drinks- all imported from China. As for the bottled drinks, they were selling sugar cane juice, lime juice n orange juice. As for the nuts, if you buy one big packet of assorted nuts , you will get another packet free of charge. These were all beautifully gift wrapped .  So I browsed around the shelves n bought some packets of mixed nuts n healthy snacks . - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) Took over Yubiso store....strategic location in Sunway Pyramid, become my frequent visited store. I like here because they have few good ready-make frozen seafoods dishes ( actually from local 5* restaurants and all info.written in Chinese words only )available here. Won't leave without empty handed, can't resist to try most of the snacks here....attracted by colourful bright and cute packaging...still the pricey comparing with China price. - 3 years ago | (1â­) Donâ€™t be fooled by huge variety. Stock expiry dates not checked properly. They sell expired goods. Family member did not check and bought this snack, tasted stale & realized itâ€™s expired. I wanted to buy their yogurt pack of 12, but luckily I checked and realized ALL the packs were expired 3 months ago - expired YOGURT left for customers to buy! - 2 years ago | (5â­) One of the best for snacks lover - 7 months ago | (5â­) Not sure why is this comment below was so hateful because I was there at that time, the lady at the cashier was very patient explaining to her that she didn't know your friend could not understand Chinese, as a customer you should explain nicely instead just bombard your attiude to the worker , I was there all along and to be honest is your own attitude that escalate the situation. - 11 months ago

With our vision care experts, we strive to continue accelerating and transforming the optical industry for the betterment of vision care to the community.
ratings: (5â­) I had an amazing experience purchasing my new spectacles! The staff (Mr. Azlan) was incredibly helpful, knowledgeable, and friendly. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great service and quality eyewear! - 2 months ago | (3â­) MOG Boutique at Sunway Pyramid offers a decent selection of eyewear, including trendy frames and reliable brands. Would absolutely recommend this outlet for prescription glasses and contact lenses - in the last week | (5â­) My prescription glasses lens fell out and I was finding for the nearest optical shop to help put it back. name: Madam Kwan's
description: As a young enthusiastic foodie, Kwan Swee Lian was inspired by the rich cultural mix of cuisine in Malaya. Today, Madam Kwan's combines elements of these diverse cultures to share her uniquely created Malaysian Cuisine for all food lovers to enjoy.
ratings:
(4â­) Taste is subjective. Tried ordering online & struggled. Thankfully waitress was helpful. Had the Cantonese fried beef noodle RM 24.90 & local ice coffee white RM 7.50. plus 10% + 6%.
I was expecting tough beef but it was nice & tender & piping hot. Coffee was nice to complete the meal. Good crowd helped me decide where to eat. - 3 months ago | (4â­) This is my second time dining at this outlet, and the food here continues to be the best compared to all the other outlets. We had dumpling soup, glass noodles with soft shell crab and otak-otak fried rice.

The dumpling soup is a delightful blend of flavours and textures. The minced prawn and chicken filling in the dumplings is succulent and well seasoned, providing a savoury bite with each spoonful. The broth is light yet flavourful, perfectly complementing the dumplings.

The claypot glass noodles with soft shell crab is a dish that truly standout. The glass noodles are stir fried in dark soy sauce, giving them a rich and umami flavour. The highlight, of course, is the soft shell crab, which is cooked to perfection. The crab is crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, adding a delightful crunch to the dish. The combination of textures and flavours makes this a must try.

Lastly, the otak-otak fried rice is a unique and flavourful dish. The rice is perfectly cooked and infused with the distinct taste of otak-otak, a special fish cake. The dish is well balanced and not overly spicy, making it enjoyable for a wide range of palates. Itâ€™s a creative twist on traditional fried rice that is sure to impress. - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) You must dine at Madam Kwanâ€™s at Sunway Pyramid. The Satay is the best i have tasted in my lifetime! Madam Kwan has perfected her Satay with the juiciest and perfect satay marinade and the satay sauce is also the best in terms of taste and consistency. Madam Kwanâ€™s Salted Fish Fried Rice is to die for. Its very rich in flavour, moist and the bits of salted fish is so crunchy and they do not stinge on it. There are even toppings of ikan bilis. We just had to order a second plate of the Salted Fish Fried Rice ! The Nasi Bojari is also the best so far. These dishes were recommended by their staff Ika who is very  friendly and her customer service is unparalleled!  We ended our meal with another recommendation by Ika - Fritters with Ice Cream. The batter was just right, light and tasty and the banana wasnâ€™t sweet and was complimented very well with the vanilla ice cream. Well done Madam Kwan ! - 2 months ago | (5â­) I can't lie about Madan Kwan's foodâ€”it's excellent as usual. I have nothing to complain about regarding the food; however, it was my first time visiting the Sunway Pyramid branch over the weekend, and the service was not as expected. It was much worse than I anticipated. I had to call the staff for everything, including utensils, plates, and even coffee, which was served with out sugar! I had to reach out multiple times for assistance. I hope they can improve this aspect of their service. - 2 months ago | (4â­) Service was slow in the beginning but improved when more staff sign in for work. Wide variety of menu choice. Would be better if they can serve plain water - 3 months ago

name: Mail Boxes Etc
description: Mail Boxes Etc. is a leading third-party provider of shipping, fulfilment, print and marketing solutions to consumers globally. Founded in San Diego, California in 1980, Mail Boxes Etc. has evolved into one of the worldâ€™s largest international networks of franchised entrepreneurs operating retail-based shipping, logistics, printing, marketing and communications solutions to business and private customers. With more than 2600 business service centers worldwide, the team will listen and craft custom solutions to fit each customersâ€™ unique circumstances. The products and services available are pack & ship, graphic design & print, retail logistics services, postal services and more. Drop by Mail Boxes Etc. at CP3 to get all your business service needs covered!
ratings:
(5â­) The guy in counter is soft spoken. despite the long line. he handled customers very well. Kudos to him and this place to set up a printing service in the mall. Paid M40 price for photostat IC but it was worth not going out in the hot sun to find another place - 3 months ago | (2â­) I went to collect my parcel today. After the foreign worker asked me for the pin, he asked me, "Sampai bila?" I was confused by his question and thought he was asking about the expiry or last collection date. So, I showed him my phone, but he started checking all the previous messages. I reminded him that the other parcels mentioned in the previous messages had already been collected and that he only needed to check the last message.

He spoke to me in an unfriendly manner and asked, "Parcel bila sampai?" That was when I finally understood his question. I informed him that the parcel had just arrived today. However, at the end, he said to me in a blaming tone, "Lain kali bagi tahu parcel bila sampai, sini parcel banyak."

Another staff member (Kakak with glasses) kindly explained to me that, because they have so many parcels, they usually categorize them by the received date.

I understand the workload, but I must say this:

Normally, I drop my parcels at the Mentari branch, but since that branch was full, I decided to use this branch instead. However, I will never drop my parcels here again.

Please provide proper training to your foreign worker in Bahasa Malaysia to avoid giving customers incorrect information and then blaming us for it afterward. - 2 months ago | (5â­) The malay staff is veryyyyyy friendly and provided good services! - 4 months ago | (5â­) Friendly staff, make easy process to shipping. Very helpful... - 3 months ago | (1â­) Dropped my parcels at 7pm  today, and they have 2 hours to scan before closing and yet they did not scanned it.

Thanks to them I have lost my Preferred status in Shopee due to "Late Shipment" even though I as a seller has already tried my very best to post it out on the very same day.  However, we seller being "punished" for these irresponsible staff working in this outlet.

Yes I know you need to serve your walk ins, but please be mindful to scan it la after serving them, so hard to scan ke?

Not demure at all. Not responsible at all.

Don't forget we platform sellers, are your customers too.

Update to reply owner:

Your reply already shows that you don't even bother about it. Thanks for proving my point. Again , I dont expect the parcels to scan IMMEDIATELY.  Expecting people to give you good review and rating while don't even have the means to reply customer that you will try your best to serve better? How you know that I don't bother to change my rating? Arrogant. - 6 months ago

name: Maisen Tonkatsu
description: For nearly 60 years, MAiSEN is renowned in Japan for its tender meat tonkatsu, affectionately recognised as, "Tonkatsu, so tender it can be cut with chopsticks.
ratings:
(4â­) This is my first visit.
The restaurant was busy during lunch time on Christmas.
Foods were served quite fast (within 15 mins).
I ordered 3 different dishes and they taste good.

I felt the seating was a bit too close. Not only lack privacy but also hard to move. - 2 months ago | (5â­) been often visiting this store since their first opening at Pyramid. I would rate this as my top 1 tonkatsu. Super juicy pork loin with many ğŸ§€ .Staff services were good. Unlimited refills for salad, rice, and miso soup. Often visit for the cheese tonkatsu. Price is considered a little high (40+ before tax) but worth it with the quality I got. - 2 months ago | (2â­) First try, the tenderloin pork is separate and not firm at all. Doesnâ€™t give you a good satisfied bite, the texture is just too weird. Cabbage is too thick and .Will think twice before I revisit. There is better tonkatsu next door ğŸ«¢ - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) First time here to try out iberico katsu, the texture are smooth & taste are sweet. Plus match with their specialize black sauce it's perfect! Free refill for rice & miso soup if order in set which comes with pickles, fruits & tofu. - 3 weeks ago | (3â­) My daughter ordered the Katsu Mabushi set, where there is a procedure of putting the rice in a separate bowl, add the garnishing then the soup. The taste was okay.

I ordered the Jumbo Tenderloin Katsu set to share with my parents. The pork was tender and nicely bartered and fried. It tasted better with the sauce, as it is a little dry. My parents liked that we can order refills for the cabbage, which we did, twice! And similarly, it was paired with a cabbage seasoning sauce. - 5 months ago

name: Manuka
description: Manuka Beverage
ratings:
(5â­) Really like this Manuka Honey drinks. It's colorful and pretty looking. That's what gets me all the time. What's more, it's Manuka Honey and not the pure sugar that is making it sweet. My choice of the Immune Booster was just nice with the sweetness level. Not that I'm hoping that my immune systems will get a boost from this, I'm not naive. But the drinks do suit my taste buds. - a year ago | (5â­) As a fan of health-conscious beverages, I recently tried Manuka honey drink, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in both taste and nutritional benefits.

Firstly, let's talk about the flavor. Manuka honey drink offers a delightful blend of sweetness from the honey with a subtle hint of earthiness. The richness of the honey provides a comforting warmth to each sip, making it a truly enjoyable experience.

Beyond its taste, the health benefits of Manuka honey are well-documented. Renowned for its antibacterial properties, Manuka honey is believed to support immune health and promote overall well-being. Knowing that each sip of this delicious beverage may contribute to my health gives me even more reason to indulge.

What I appreciate most about Manuka honey drink is its versatility. Whether enjoyed hot as a soothing beverage on a chilly day or chilled for a refreshing pick-me-up, it never fails to satisfy my cravings for something both healthy and delicious.

In conclusion, Manuka honey drink has earned its place as a staple in my beverage repertoire. Its delectable flavor and potential health benefits make it a standout choice for anyone looking to elevate their drinking experience. I highly recommend giving it a try â€“ your taste buds and your body will thank you. - 11 months ago | (5â­) Just nice packing and very gentle staff. Never get a chance on lucky draw, the Energy Boost is flavour full, just feel the rich honey. Hangover Cure, not much of a cure but it does refreshing, very cool drink. Also it is buy 1 and get free until 31st of March. Good chance to have an additional drink. - 11 months ago | (3â­) Can get drinks to try the honey before purchasing (currently there's some promo ongoing) ğŸ¯ honey were okay (slightly pricey as it's RM12.9 for a small drink) but the chinese girl staff wasn't too friendly - 8 months ago | (5â­) I like Signature 10 drink because Manuka honey mix perfectly with Konjac jelly texture to give us a refreshing and satisfying taste while providing us  healthy nutrients, immunity booset and skin care elements. - 10 months ago

name: Medifeet
description:
We take care your feet from inside out!
Medifeet creates super-cushioning, conforming, and comfortable shoes with varying medical, therapeutic, corrective, protective, user-friendly, and supportive features built-in or inserted-in to fix all foot problems. Medifeet started-out humbly with only dealers and no retail shops but in just over 5 years they have grown to 34 branches throughout Malaysia, including in Sunway Pyramid.

Itâ€™s whatâ€™s on the inside that counts MEDIFEET as a high technology designed to feel like cloudsâ€”soft, ultralite, swaddling your feet like baby and it all begins right beneath your feet.
Our footbeds and shoe designs are carefully engineered using the finest materials like high-grade memory padding, contoured orthotic systems to create a cushion that molds to your feet and absorbs the shock of all those steps youâ€™re taking. Theyâ€™re anatomically shaped to help spread weight evenly for a comfortable stride, and in many cases, our footbeds are even removable specially made for diabetics. Just replace with a new one or a custom orthotic to kick up the walkability of your MEDIFEET in seconds.
Taking care of your feet is our priority, as we know FEET IS OUR SECOND HEART!
Medifeet emphasizes on building-in health and comfort components into health shoes while maintaining the beauty aspect. Upon working closely with their podiatrist, Medifeet has their very own creation, the innovative Orthotic System, which when used with our readymade range helps make the semi-custom-made range possible.
The Orthotic System comprises insole support built-ins according to individual needs such as their built-in with arch support for solving flat feet problems. Their Spine Guard using Japanese technology and 3-point support built-in inside shoes are examples of their other 6-7 technologies.
Competitors claim their products are similar to Medifeet but really canâ€™t match its technological innovation, creativity, and quality.

name: Meiko
description:
MEIKO is a leading brand name by Goldlife Marketing Sdn Bhd, a budding Malaysian company that specializes in healthcare products since 2007. Over the years, MEIKO had received numerous prestigious awards and recognition such as the 2018 Malaysia Health & Wellness Brand Awards, the 2014 International Corporate Award International Brand, the 2015 SME 100 Awards - Fast Moving Companies, and others for their continuous effort and innovation to ensure Meiko consistently deliver the best quality product and service to their consumers.
Our golden years can be more than just survival where we deserve to live our life confidently and flexibly. The tagline â€œMoving lifeâ€ portrays that Meiko helps people to continue moving actively to anywhere and do anything at any time they wish, enabling them to create new memories and enjoy meaningful lives even in their old age, rather than fear of disability during old age.

name: Mission-Q
description:
Mission-Q (Real Escape Game Room in Malaysia) brings you 5 unique adventurous escape rooms, each with its own theme. The objective is to physically escape from the room within an hour by collecting items, identifying clues, and solving puzzles and riddles. This game requires observation, teamwork, creativity, communication, and courage.
Mission Q provides entertainment with difficulty levels ranging from 3 to 5 stars, players can choose to enjoy the expedition while overcoming moderately set challenges or put their wits to the test. Nevertheless, the kid-friendly and safe environment promises a family-oriented experience traversing a multitude of scenarios.
Worried about getting stuck? Fret not for a "help" bell can be easily located in each room to contact the Game Master for assistance whereby hints will be given to aid the player.
ratings:
(5â­) Was a great experience and very fun and interactive! The physicality was great with a lot of rooms and different challenges with various puzzles. Nicole and Noelle was great hosts and game masters explaining the game very thorough and helpful!
Amazing stuff, will come back for more rooms! - a week ago | (5â­) Such an awesome adventure playing Tomb of Life & Death - one of my fave games so far. Besides Midnight Inn at the 1 Utama location. Daniel and Elisha were super awesome crew guiding us thru the whole amazing experience. Loved the design and challenges. Will def come back! Great work!!!! Highly recommended escape room!!!! - a month ago | (5â­) Just done experiencing one of the best escape room in Sunway! The environment of the front desk is very welcoming, we were served by Nicole, as she's our master for the game. I played saving King Arthur, and it was fun! We did used 2 hints, and Ken came and helped us with the hints! Fun games, indeed. Recommended! - a month ago | (5â­) Elisha & Nicole were extremely helpful throughout the game! We did the game â€œsaving king arthurâ€, the story and puzzles were enjoyable! However I did wished certain exits couldâ€™ve been more discreet - itâ€™s a bit difficult to escape (physically) where people walk in&out staring at us. Regardless, wonderful experience, would definitely return to try other rooms! - a month ago | (5â­) I had such a fun and challenging time at Mission Q! It's a puzzle-based escape room experience with different themed rooms, each with its own unique story. We tried the "Saving King Arthur" room, which involved rescuing a king, and "The Harvest," a backstory with missing organsâ€”both were creative and engaging! The difficulty levels and physical activity vary per room, and even though we chose the lower difficulty ones, they still tested our brainpower quite a bit! ğŸ˜‚ We managed to escape both rooms we attempted, which was a great accomplishment for us. Youâ€™re also allowed up to three clues from the staff, which definitely helped without giving too much away.

Speaking of the staff, Elisha and Ken were fantastic,both were super helpful and polite throughout. Whenever we got stuck, they provided just the right amount of micro clues, letting us figure things out without spoiling the puzzles. I really appreciated that. They were also knowledgeable and answered all our questions with ease.

Overall, it was a fun and interesting experience, and I thoroughly enjoyed it with my siblings. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a challenging yet enjoyable escape room experience!You're lucky if you had the same staffs as mine, Elisha and Ken. - 4 months ago

As u can see from the picture, I didn't eat it yet (only stir a bit) but the amount of the ice cream was 3/4 of the cup. Is this normal? 5 bucks for this amount? Maybe I'm wrong but the quantity really doesn't align with the price shown. It is tasty but the price really aint worth the price. - 5 months ago | (5â­) Best Mixue I have. The tapioca pearls were chewy soft and firm, perfect consistency compared to the mushy ones I had in Melaka. The ice-cream soft served was  great, flavor with hint of vanilla, not icy or watery at all. Have to admit after two disappointing tries in other branches this one definitely got me hooked! - 6 months ago | (1â­) Severely understaffed, only 1 person working the peak lunch hours in sunway pyramid (as at 1:30pm, 17 Oct). Please improve, this is unacceptable given the volume of orders. - 4 months ago | (1â­) ğŸ˜­ Disappointing Experience at Mixue Sunway Pyramid Branch âŒâŒâŒ

As a loyal customer of Mixue, I am deeply disappointed with the experience I had at the Sunway Pyramid branch recently. Here's what happened:

I purchased two beverages â€“ Lemonade and Lemon Jasmine Tea â€“ with no special requests, expecting the usual quality that Mixue is known for. However, when I shared the drinks with my friend after about 15 minutes, we were shocked to find that both beverages were completely tasteless, akin to plain water. This was far from the consistent flavor weâ€™ve come to expect as regular customers.

Hoping to resolve the issue, I rushed back to the shop (within 25 minutes of purchase) despite knowing they were about to close. I politely explained the situation to two Malay staffs, stating that both drinks lacked flavor and requested an exchange. To my surprise, one of the staff members simply added sugar to one of the drinks and handed it back to me, insisting that this was the solution.

This approach was unacceptable for multiple reasons:
1. The ice had already melted, and the original flavors were beyond repair.
2. The staff dismissed my feedback and offered no meaningful resolution.
3. When I requested a refund or a fresh replacement, they outright refused, claiming it was not possible since they were closing.

When I asked for an explanation, I was told the drinks were prepared according to SOP, and the company had implemented a new policy of using only 25% sugar. However, this explanation doesnâ€™t justify the complete lack of taste in the drinks, as even the Jasmine Tea didnâ€™t have its usual flavor.

What frustrated me most was the staff's refusal to acknowledge any mistake. They even stated they couldnâ€™t taste-test the beverages themselves, leaving me with no choice but to leave the drinks and receipt at the counter in frustration.

This experience reflects poorly on Mixue's quality control, customer service, and refund policy. For a brand operating in a prestigious mall like Sunway Pyramid, such an unprofessional response is disappointing. I donâ€™t believe this is how a company aiming for growth and expansion should handle loyal customersâ€™ concerns.

To summarize:
- Both drinks lacked flavor and quality.
- The staffâ€™s response was dismissive and unhelpful.
- No proper resolution, exchange, or refund was provided.

I hope Mixue takes this feedback seriously and improves its customer service and quality assurance. Itâ€™s not about the RM7 â€“ itâ€™s about principle and respect for customers who expect better from such a reputed brand.

*remark: I don't have photo or video evidence as the receipt and drinks I left it at counter! - 2 months ago

name: Monki
description:
Monki is a storytelling brand that offers great fashion at competitive prices, aiming to be kind to the world and the people in it. stand up for themselves â€” and others.
Bringing its unique blend of Scandi-cool and Asian street style, Monkiâ€™s design team has stayed on the pulse of interesting trends and personal inspiration since 2006. At the core stands the Swedish fashion brandâ€™s aim to empower young women everywhere to express and feel great about themselves. The brand mixes Scandinavian cool with creative street style and is all about being brave, friendly and fun while empowering young women to stand up for themselves â€” and others.
Monki has always been inspired by its creative community of fans who show their personal style, using the global hashtag #monkistyle. The brand is now available in Sunway Pyramid!
With 115 stores in thirteen markets across Europe and Asia and an online store that delivers to 19 European countries, Monki has grown consistently since it was founded in 2006.

name: Monobo
description:
If youâ€™re a fan of jelly shoes, hereâ€™s a brand to check out! Monobo, with its foamy PVC-EVA heel and girly, glittery designs, is another alternative to other brands of jelly shoes in the market.
Jelly shoes are shoes made of PVC plastic. Its name refers to the semi-transparent materials with a jelly-like sheen. The shoes became a fad in the mid-1980s. Like many other fashion trends from the 1980s, jelly shoes have been revived a number of times since the late 1990s, because they are so wearable and stylish. In fact, jelly shoes are so comfortable and versatile that celebrities with vastly different styles like Katy Perry, Anne Hathaway, Rihanna and even the First Lady Michelle Obama have been seen sporting them in their downtime!
Whether youâ€™re into flats, wedge heels, or even loafers, Monobo offers comfy options that can be easily paired with a flare dress or capri pants for a weekend jaunt into town, or a blouse and pencil skirt combo for a dressier, pulled together look. The shoes come in a rainbow of on-trend colours such as sweet lilac, hipster mustard-yellow, electric blue and show-stopping red, so youâ€™ll always have a pair to suit your mood!

With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! name: Mr Bean
description: Started in 1995, Mr Bean is the leading chain soy bean F&B retailer in Singapore with more than 70 stores island-wide. Mr Bean offers a variety of fresh soy drinks, Japanese obanyaki pancakes, soy ice cream and desserts. Only the finest ingredients and premium grade of Non-GMO (Non genetically modified) soy beans goes into our products while our vital secret ingredient remains our heart, research and dedication to customers.
ratings:
(4â­) I had a pleasant experience visiting Mr Bean at Sunway Pyramid. The menu offered a variety of fresh soy-based snacks and beverages, perfect for a quick, healthy treat. I tried their signature soymilk, which was delicious and freshly prepared. The staff service was okay but could be improved, as it took slightly longer than expected. I hope it will be quicker next time. The outlet was clean and well-maintained, making it an inviting spot to relax. - 2 months ago | (4â­) Healthy tasting dessert. Recommend for soy milk lovers!

We ordered:
â˜‘ï¸ Ginger soup Tau Fu fah â€”  mild spicy ginger kick. Taro balls are chewy. Recommend for ginger lovers.
â˜‘ï¸ Original soy ice cream â€” prominent soy bean flavor which I loved. Recommend!
â˜‘ï¸ Chocolate Japanese Obanyaki Pancake â€” chocolate flavor is jot too strong. Tastes like what you would expect.

Staff are friendly and service is quick. - 3 months ago | (1â­) Iâ€™m really disappointed with my recent visit to MR. Bean. I ordered a soya bean curd with taro ball add-on, which cost RM3 extra, but it only came with 4 mini taro balls. This was shocking, so I questioned the cashier. They added 2 more mini taro balls, but it still felt like very poor value for money.

Additionally, the soya bean curd itself lacked the rich, authentic soya taste I was expecting. It was bland and did not meet the standard Iâ€™ve experienced at other similar shops.

Overall, this was not a good experience for the price I paid, and I hope the shop can improve its quality and portion sizes. - 3 months ago | (4â­) No, this Mr Bean has nothing to do with Mr Bean the classic comedy series. Yes, it is yet another dessert chain outlet that serves overpriced artisan Tau Fu Fah.

I've nothing against such outlets as it is good that the traditional dessert is enjoying a sudden resurgence of late. However, Tau Fu Fah is a rather simple dessert and I've always found it difficult to swallow the sky-high prices.

Prices aside, the Tau Fu Fah here is smooth and creamy, just the way I like it. It is nice that customers have options on the type of sugar and the sugar level but on the other hand be prepared to pay up to RM2 more for some of the sugar options. Ironically, you don't get a discount if you opt for just 25% sugar level.

Besides the soya items, they also serve Japanese Pancakes with a variety of both sweet and savory fillings. These are pretty good but also pretty pricey. - a month ago | (4â­) the pancake is a bit dry, filling is very less and only the dough is thick. for the dessert is decent - 2 months ago

Yet another Thai restaurant I visited in search of the perfect Mango sticky rice pudding. The sticky rice was so sticky we needed a knife to cut it through, the coconut milk was too salty, the Laksa had an underwhelming flavour but the show stealers were the green chilli sauce that was the condiment on the table and minced chicken that came with the set meal. name: Murad Skin Care
description:
Murad Skin Care in Sunway Pyramid believes that your skin deserves a one-of-a-kind facial. Howard Murad, M.D., FAAD, is recognized around the world as a leading visionary for his unmatched scientific innovations. A board-certified dermatologist, trained pharmacist and Associate Clinical Professor of Medicine at the Geffen School of Medicine, UCLA, Dr. Murad has personally treated over 50,000 patients.
For more than 30 years, Murad has been committed to developing clinically proven, cruelty-free products that meet the meticulous standards for safety, efficacy and care youâ€™d expect from a doctor. Plus, theyâ€™re supported by Dr. Muradâ€™s industry-first research for the most advanced formulas that donâ€™t just consider a symptom or concern, but rather address total skin health.
Now available in Sunway Pyramid, Murad offers clinically proven Professional Facial Treatments and skincare product range to addresses skin concerns such as blemish/acne breakouts, dull and tires skin, dark spots & pigmentation and fine lines & wrinkles.
Murad Method Facial System is a uniquely designed personalised facial that will engage and create a personal bond between the therapist and client for a truly personalised facial journey. Not all skin types are similar, the personalisation allows our therapist to identify clientâ€™s specific skin health needs and adapts flexible protocols to treat 2 skin concerns at once for a complete skincare treatment that leads to outstanding results for a healthier looking skin.
â€œSkincare is not superficial because it is healthcare. When you have beautiful skin it is a sign that you have a healthy body and mind.â€ Dr Howard Murad M.D

name: MyeongDong Topokki
description: Retailing in Korean Street Food
ratings:
(1â­) Ok first of all, I was shocked menu changed already and I asked nicely regarding the promotion for 10% off for value set and which is the value set? Oh wow didn't know you all changed the menu already and no free tea in my order anymore. I had to purchase separately and next the person at the cashier can't reply me nicely and was super lazy to even layan. If you're that tired, don't work. I'm also a working person and just finished work to just eat. Refill for side dishes now also up to 3 times only. Anchovies also not provided anymore haha. Was my favourite but I guess no more. Oh also no soup provided nor allowed to refill the sauce anymore as have to pay. As for this bibimbap no more mushrooms and replaced with corns ?!?! Myeongdong topokki has disappointed me very much now. It used to be my go to place all the time. As for this branch, pls improve your customer service as not everyone knows about your new menu/promotion and such. Dah la I'm not in my mood cuz of previous person also lazy and wanted to shoo me away from the shop. - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) I ordered the Kimchi Fried Rice with tamago and corn, the Korean Milk Tea and a piece of hotteok. The fried rice had a generous portion (which is good but its too much for me). The korean milk teas was sweet but not too sweet (if you mix it properly). The hotteok for me was not something I'd get again because the filling was way too sweet. Overall experience = 8/10, will come back to try other food - a month ago | (5â­) Located near the blue atrium.. Near Like Small Shop Places.. Place is nice and comfortable.. well maintain by staff...

Staff girl at cashier and yang kemas semua sangat professional.. bile nak order well prepare and always smile.. smooth ordering.. just my opinion at one point i am glad that my order come fast but my point of view is, if there is other customer please serve them accordingly by the number.. not jump2 number.. some might not be okay with that.. kitchen my alert DONT JUMP ORDER...

Food taste is nice.. well cook and season.. as this is my 2nd outlet i visit after ioi city mall.. the price is quite worthy and You Get Free Flow Panchan and Green Tea Drink..

Overall is rekemended and nice to visit and taste Korea Cuisine.. :) - 4 months ago | (1â­) This place was nice before the menu change. What's with the crazy amount of mayo? Where's the anchovies and soup? No more free green tea? This place is terrible now. To top it off, the cashier lady was terrible and rude. Never coming back again. - a week ago | (4â­) First time here for early dinner. Ordered chicken ramyun, ramyun with teokbokki and seafood jigae. Overall, service was ok though the food took about 20mins to be served. - 6 months ago

name: Myfeet
description:
In 2006, Mr. Wong discovered trend and rising demand of comfortable insoles in Hong Kong. Curious about why would anyone purchase insoles, he began to journey to understand more on shoes and leg pain problems. During abroad, he obtained the principle of bio-dynamics, helping him to further understand insoles and their purpose. He began trying different insoles on himself.
After 6 months, he realized that his own knee problems have improved. Since then, he decided to venture into the making of insole business â€“ MyFeet. He imported digital scanning machines from Korea to analyse customers feet problems and custom made insoles that solve their feet problems. After many years of analysing, feet problems can be categorized into a flat arch, high arch, bowleg, knock knee, overpronation, and supination. These problems will lead to an imbalance of body biodynamics, causing stress on the rest of the body such as foot pain, knee pain, and back pain.
Mr. Wong created MyFeet to help more people to solve pains caused by the feet. The sandals in MyFeet Sunway Pyramid are carefully engineered using the finest materials like high-grade memory foam, shaped and moulded to fit each wearer feet condition. All our sandals are shaped to help spread weight evenly for a comfortable walk and bring back balance to the body biodynamics.
ratings:
(1â­) I have been shopping with MyFeet for many many years... it was such an unpleasant experience today as I went there to get another pair as mine spoilt after 1 year+... all these years it was the male store assistant serving us... this time he was busy with other customer... so the female store assistant served us... she showed horrible customer service... as we are browsing around.. she had no intention to serve at all... I asked her for my size, which one got stock she just pointed but we saw there was another design of the size we needed on display so took and put on.. asked her can we have that... she just answered rudely "I told u no stock, that is display!".. we tried to be patient and ask so which got stock? She again answered rudely "I told you already only this design"... so we asked which one? She just kept saying "I told u already!!"... so we asked her, can't you just tell properly and at least let us try since u already have limited stocks.. she still continued to mumble "I already told you!"

This is really truly disappointing... this is a good shoe but with store assistant like that, it is just horrible!!! I hope the management takes action on this!!! - 2 years ago | (1â­) Bought a pair of slipper back in February this year. And the slipper broke. Went for an exchange for a brand  new pair in June. It broke again. Such bad quality for a slipper worth RM299?. Will never buy again. Not even a cheap slipper and it can only last 3-4 months. On top of this, they don't even provide free repair - 2 years ago | (5â­) Mr. Sofian was very polite, helpful, and knowledgeable ğŸ™ - a week ago | (5â­) We were amazed with the service the male sales person offers! He explained everything about our arch and how important for us to wear a sandals with good support.

Customization soles is also available here at around 400++, which takes about 1-2weeks. Whilst other sandals are priced at RM299.

The male sales assistant also showed us what exercises to do, and run analysis on our feet (flat feet/high arch also show us which designs suit for bunions), explaining how myfeet can help our condition.

Thumbs up! - 2 years ago | (1â­) I have been buying MyFeet sandals for  years also but I find the quality nowadays is not good .
The sandal base
tend to open up after a few months, I even got 2 pairs that broke into 2. As I always buy and keep a spare pair of sandals, recently I wore the new pair, after walking at the shopping complex for 2 hrs, the base came off. Omg I had to slowly inch my way to the car park to change to another pair of sandals.
The outlet in Sunway Pyramid says they don't repair anymore. I took to the roadside cobbler, he told me MyFeet sandals he can't glue as he has experience glueing them and a week later customer brought back to him after it came off again.
Now I don't know where to send for repairs as this is a new sandals that cost RM299. I hope MyFeet can advise.
I have another 2 old pairs where the base has also open up.ğŸ˜¡ - 2 years ago

name: NANYANG CAFE
description:
NANYANG CAFE is a Malaysia-based fusion gastronomic culinary brand which bases its culinary essence on the exquisite amalgamation of the unique palate of Nanyang cuisine and the rich-in-heritage Malaysian Chinese cuisine and it is NOW available in Sunway Pyramid!
Gourmet noodles and freshly baked bakeries are the 2 core differentiating products of NANYANG CAFE. A tasty serving of noodles requires the collective elements of a well-qualified chef coupled with the freshest and highest quality of ingredients. NANYANG CAFE also offers Hong Kong-originated gourmet tempting bakery & pastries product as a perfect choice for HiTea or snacks for the day.
NANYANG CAFE offers an all-day dining experience in casual and relax ambience with a touch of natural sunlight to delight your day! Signature favourites include Hong Kong Style Wanton Noodles, Freshly Baked Polo Bun, NANYANG Coffee & Milk Tea and Pork Chop with Curry Rice.
ratings:
(4â­) First things first, the food is very good.

Straight to the point we ordered their famous wanton noodles and butter buns and they were out of this world.

Their other food items like we ordered such as Luncheon meat noodles and rice , and yam bun were okay at best but still acceptable as they tasted very fresh and weren't too salty which means the limited usage of MSG which is a positive in my books ğŸ‘ğŸ»

However, the reason why I'm rating it a 4 star is the delay of the food arrival as I understand there are a lot of customers but the kitchen staff should combat this and push dishes out quicker.

Environment wise, the cafe is very clean and has a vibrant decor which makes it welcoming for potential customers. There is an open window area on the side for people to look outside and embrace the nature where you can even see Sunway University in the distance.

If you are looking for a quick snack or have no idea what you should eat in a mall as big as Sunway Pyramid, then this place could be suitable ğŸ‘ğŸ» - a month ago | (5â­) November 2024. Had a great lunch here with good choices for elderly parents and kids alike. Some items were missed out but it didn't take long for them to serve it after we reminded the staff about them. Staff were definitely very accommodating and helpful. Food is consistent since the last few times we were here. - 3 months ago | (3â­) Noodle nothing special and the vegetable is not fresh (see photo). Luckily didn't find any worms. Had the Seafood option, limited items, just few pieces prawn and fish (compare advertised photo vs actual served). The peanut polo bun is good. Waiter not so attentive providing stained cutlery. Have a good view of the lagoon. - 5 months ago | (2â­) limited menu, poor location. definitely not worth coming unless you are staying in the hotel.

wantan noodles are second to the Sahara desert in terms of dryness, dumplings are ok. - 2 months ago | (3â­) UPDATE: The food standard here has dropped. From 5 stars, I have no choice but to give 3 stars as the taste of the dishes does not meet expectations. But the staff here are as helpful and service is fast. Seating is still comfortable. Itâ€™s just the dishes have suffered. What a shame.

This place looks great and the food tastes great. The staff are very attentive to your order and will even clear your plates when youâ€™re done. The noodlesâ€™ texture is sparingly and slightly chewy. I loved the pork trotters noodle and really enjoyed it. The serving is generous. Most notable is the Ying Yang coffee and tea combo. Itâ€™s aromatic andâ€¦ just really nice. Not easy to find good coffee tea combo done right. - a month ago

name: Nars
description: Nars Cosmetics is a cosmetics and skin care company founded by make-up artist and photographer FranÃ§ois Nars in 1994. The cosmetics line began with twelve lipsticks sold at Barneys New York. Since then, NARS has created various multi-use beauty products and now is a subsidiary of Shiseido. After the falling out in the contract with YSL, Shiseido's investment upon merging with NARS in research and development led to the wide range or products for both Females and Males. The company's aim is to create products that suit all genders without discrimination. Evident in the recent collections of palettes, the main darker shades centered around Blue, Gray etc represent the compatibility with males. After taking on YouTuber Jeffree Star's comments on unity in strength amongst all genders, NARS Cosmetics decided to expand their horizon in various designs and color schemes to accommodate all people of color, shapes and sizes who are expressing themselves through makeup. Nars is no longer a cruelty free brand. In 2017 NARS announced that, despite being against animal testing, it was a requirement for selling products in the China market. In a public statement the company said: "We have decided to make NARS available in China because we feel it is important to bring our vision of beauty and artistry to fans in the region. NARS does not test on animals or ask others to do so on our behalf, except where required by law." The statement elicited a number of critical responses, some suggesting a boycott of its products.

name: Nespresso
description:
Welcome to the world of Nespresso. Discover our promise to the finest and freshest coffee in the world that preserves the best of our world. We do this by selecting the rarest beans, crafting them with care and creativity to elevate a daily routine into a unique experience.
 
We believe that quality and sustainability are closely interlinked. We created our AAA Sustainable Qualityâ„¢ Program to safeguard the supply of high-quality coffee, while protecting the environment and enhancing farmer livelihoods. We use aluminium for our capsules as it protects the quality of our coffee and itâ€™s infinitely recyclable. We are committed to improving our recycling rates, reducing packaging and accelerating the use of recycled material.
 
At the touch of a button on Nespresso coffee machines, you get to enjoy fresh, high-quality, sustainably produced coffee, consistently cup after cup. You can easily craft a fresh cup of espresso or with fresh milk, just like a barista at home, made with high-quality beans and savour the precise roast and the generous crema as you sip your coffee.
 
There is a Nespresso coffee for every taste and occasion, from rich ristretto, bold espresso to easily recreated fresh milk recipes, Nespresso has a variety of permanent coffee, with addition of our seasonal blends and Limited Edition coffee. Come for a complementary coffee tasting in our boutique located at Level LG1.33B, Lower Ground Floor One and begin your journey with us.

name: New Balance
description:
New Balance began as a Boston-based arch support company in the early 1900's, developed into a specialized shoe manufacturer in the 1970's, and has grown to become a leading global athletic products company. Today New Balance is a family of brands including New Balance, Dunham, PF Fleyers, Aravon, Warrior and Brine.
Since the days of selling arch supports to police officers and waiters, New Balance has been brand concerned with meeting the needs of the everyday athlete. Part of producing superior footwear and athletic apparel is manufacturing it to fit all widths and sizes, because a better fit produces better perfomanace.
To ensure the best fitting, best performing shoes and apparel, we focuss on improving our tehnology and production methods. A big part of that is maintaining five manufacturing facilities here in the United States where we continue to produce shoes and apparel that meet the standards we've employed for more than 100 years. We have also remained commited to a core set of values that include integrity, teamwork and total customer satisfaction.
