name: Nike
description:
NIKE, named for the Greek goddess of victory, is the world's #1 shoe and apparel company. It designs, develops, and sells a variety of products to help in playing basketball and soccer (football), as well as in running, men's and women's training, and other action sports. Under its namesake brand, NIKE also markets sports-inspired products for children and various competitive and recreational activities; it also sells sportswear under the Converse and Hurley brands.
NIKEâ€™s vision statement uses the word â€œremain,â€ which indicates that the company already considers its brand as the most authentic, connected, and distinctive in the global market for sporting goods and related products. The â€œauthenticâ€ component of the corporate vision statement shows that the company aims to make its products deliver high performance to consumers. On the other hand, the â€œconnectedâ€ component is about ensuring consumersâ€™ personal connection with the brand.

description:
O.W.L is an eyewear brand that designed frames to satisfy the demands of young adults and fashioners who required comfort, protection and optimum vision.
O.W.L Glasses are not only a fashion statement but a symbol of authenticity. Being one of the most sought after brands. Each individual frame from the OWL Glasses range is crated like an art piece to satisfy the need of consumers.
If O.W.L were a person, we would be the friendly neighbour, the easy-going friend - always sincere and approachable, candid and democratic
ratings:
(5â­) Good service! I love how their treat their customer! - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) This outlet has been very helpful.

Broke my old glasses. Called them to see if the can get my new glasses done within the same day.

Guess what. Done within 1 an hour

Thanks to Mr Reeve. Cheers - a week ago | (5â­) Mr.Rheeve's service for eye contact lenses is truly exceptional.From the moment I walked in,I was greeted with a warm and welcoming atmosphere.His customer service skills are top-notch.He is incredibly patient,taking the time to listen to my concerns and answer all my questions in detail.He made sure I understood every aspect of the contact lenses,from how to properly insert them to the best care practices.

What sets Mr.Rheeve apart is his genuine care for his customers.He went above and beyond to ensure that I was comfortable and confident with my new lenses.His attention to detail and expertise in the field are evident in every interaction.The fitting process was seamless,and he made sure I left with the perfect pair for my needs.

I highly recommend Mr.Rheeve's eye contact lens service to anyone in need.His professionalism,combined with his friendly and approachable demeanor,makes the experience truly enjoyable.Thank you,Mr.Rheeve,for your excellent service! - a week ago | (5â­) Very good service Scha.. Also very friendly.. Highly recommend.. Thank you so much! - a week ago | (5â­) Great service by the staff. Reeve attended to me and was patient to my inquiries as well as being knowledgeable. Frames and lens are affordable compare to other places.  I checked out few shops and finally decided on O.W.L. Happy to get my lens and frame at my targeted budget price with good, friendly service.

Recommended. ğŸ‘ - a year ago

name: OBJET
description:
HOMEâ€¦ where memories are made and laughter is shared.
The ultimate experience is to relax in the luxuries of a home. At Objet, that becomes a reality. Objet stocks a variety of merchandise and products designed to furnish every living space of a home, from kitchen to dining room, living to bedroom and bathroom to every imaginable nook and cranny. Intricate or simple, lavish or cozy, opulent or post-modern minimalism â€“ Objet has something that suits different moods, styles and tastes for any and every occasion with family and friends.
Objet Sunway Pyramid is our very first store. The aisles of Objet are stocked with functional items that accentuate beautiful moments, with a wide range of products that fulfill homely desires. Home-owners will be spoilt for choice with an array of competitively-priced products that range from classic to stylish and from decorative to functional. There is something for every home at Objet.
ratings:
(4â­) This store offers a wide variety of products for home decoration and enhancement. For living spaces, they have stylish nightstand lamps, decorative candle holders, and elegant ceramic vases.

In the dining area, you can explore their selection of ceramic serving dishes, decorative serving bowls, and charming glass teapots. They also carry glass jars, cups, and containers, perfect for storage and organization.

To add cozy touches around the home, browse their plush door stoppers, dried floral arrangements, and fashionable tissue box holders. You'll also find beautiful rattan baskets for storing household items as well as comfortable cushions in vibrant colors and designs.

Their diverse inventory may have just what you need to create a warm and inviting living environment. With so many stylish options, decorating your dream home is made easy. - 8 months ago | (3â­) Newly opened homewares store on 1st floor within Sunway Pyramid. Concept is very much similar to Hooga so i guess the more the competition, the better for us consumers. Their range is not as diversed as Hooga, but they do have some interesting stuff on display. Pricing is a little more on the high side, but overall its still quite ok. - 3 years ago | (4â­) Exceptionally affordable pricing for homeware, kitchenware and tableware (hardly anything over $30aud!!!)ğŸ¤¯ğŸ˜±

My haul was substantial due to the crazy good deals to be hadğŸ¤­, and they were very accommodating, wrapping each piece of flatware, as well as allowed me to inspect the tea box before finalising my purchase.

I'd say Objet is the Malaysian equivalent to Kmart here in Sydney. Good value, not the highest quality items but still worth it - For example, the tea box I bought had a knob that I needed to buy the correct screw for, in order for it to sit securely on the lid and thus be functional. Not a deal breaker for me, but would be annoying for those not into figuring out a surprise DIY project ğŸ˜…ğŸ›  would return nonetheless!

Thanks Objet!!ğŸ¥° - a year ago | (5â­) In love with this shop all item i want have also have membership right now lot of benefits i get . All staff very helpful and service bring my item to car also will repeat come â€¦ - a year ago | (5â­) Merchandise are really cute and good overall. But store is quite hard to find.
Its located on LG1 nearby ice skate rink (This should help people pinpoint its location better) rather than current photos and bad address. - 2 years ago

name: Obermain
description:
An icon of comfortable dress shoes, Obermain which has made its mark among competitor brands, is now back in Sunway Pyramid!
1888 was the year Obermain began creating quality shoes and boots in Burgkunstadt, a town on the Upper Main River whose leather goods were sought by elite professionals in turn of the century Germany. Burgkunstadtâ€™s legacy of craftsmanship and material excellence lives on today â€“ in shoes, bags, and accessories designed by Obermain to continue our proud tradition.
Obermain invites men and women to step into a new kind of comfort, the kind that overcomes outdated compromises that pit form versus function, wearability versus appeal, and tradition versus modernity. Where quality workmanship and materials assure durability. Where special comfort features make every step â€“ leisurely on brisk, on carpet or concrete â€“ lighter, softer, more flexible, and more secure. Where style means a contemporary touch and updated details that set you at ease weekdays and weekends. The perfect union of quality, comfort, and style. Obermain is made for striding with confidence through every walk of life.
We design our products to be loved and used for a long time. We may apply classic silhouettes or re-interpret them with a twist. If we do this, we must keep the shoe silhouette recognizable. We are not slaves to fashion, yet we may adapt trends as touches of modernityâ€”subtly and tastefully.
â€œOBERMAIN = PROFESSIONALSâ€â€¦â€¦â€¦..â€¦..Who value quality, expecting total comfort from their daily attire. They are the reason and the inspiration for everything Obermain stands for Elegant | Refined | Confident | Smart | Urban I Sophisticated | Intelligent | Charming

name: Oga Tea & Dining
description: OGA, a Japanese Premium Tea-Centric Brand. We invites you to a world where contemporary living and authentic Japanese tea culture harmonize.
ratings:
(4â­) This cafe offers great value for some of its dishes. The green tea is particularly impressive, flavorful, and worth the price. Although the spaghetti is on the pricier side, itâ€™s worth it, with fresh prawns cooked perfectly. We also tried the big breakfast, and while the sausage was surprisingly deep-fried instead of pan-fried, it was still tasty. The salad was fresh and enjoyable. Overall, the food quality justifies the prices, making it a nice spot to visit for a satisfying meal. - 2 months ago | (3â­) Overall, I think this place has potential, but it's not quite there yet.

We ordered tea and dessert, which tastes really good and reasonable to the pricing. However, management needs to put in the time to train their employees to elevate the place.

I looked at the menu and saw so many different types of teas. This is for people who are willing to pay the money to try out nuances between different types of teas.
The place presents itself as a more sophisticated place, not just your regular cafe. So, I asked the waitress for recommendations.

To my disappointment, the waitresses there were clearly part-timers hired to only serve tables. They also didn't have a person dedicated to recommend teas or talk about why is it brewed a certain way.

This should have been the selling point of the place-- yet it is not fully utilized.

From this experience, it goes from a potential spot for tea lovers who want to try different types of teas-- to suddenly just a regular cafe.

To be honest, the staff were polite, I find no fault in the service itself. I just can tell that no further training was given for them -- or 1 dedicated person -- to make the experience better. Again, I wouldn't write this much if it's just a regular cafe.

I can see that there is potential, and I can tell what the initial vision was.  I hope to see the place improve over time, or, to accept the route of being a regular cafe, where customers will start to ask about the price versus what you're getting. Just food for thought! - a month ago | (3â­) The price vs environment doesn't match. It is a tad pricey for the food portion and serving doesn't come together if you come in group. Personally I find it awkward that I have to sit at the outside and it is so noisyto chill. The dessert is nice and matched with the price. Overall is alright but with such price, repeat visit is less - 2 months ago | (3â­) The chazuke at OGA is really nice and stands out as the highlight of the menu. However, the restaurant has very limited space, making it feel a bit cramped during busy hours. Desserts are popular and tend to sell out quickly, which can be disappointing if you arrive late. While the food quality is ok, the prices are quite high, and I feel they might not fully justify the overall experience. A decent spot, but thereâ€™s room for improvement. - 3 months ago | (3â­) Overall, the food looks good but the taste could be improved. The dashi for the ochazuke is not hot enough. It was served just slightly warm. The houjicha burnt cheese cake was not as strong as I'd like it to be, and it is pricey for the price. The place was also small so the tables are pretty close together. - a month ago

Ogival has been outfitting pool-lovers and beach-goers for the last 20 years. The swim collection includes bikinis, tankinis, one-pieces, briefs, trunks, burqinis and wetsuits. The brand has been the active-wear range that caters to gym-goers, yoga enthusiasts and cycling fans. Featuring trendy designs that appeal to those who require comfort while indulging in sports, this collection incorporates yoga-wear, gym-wear and cycling and exercise shorts.

ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Old Nanyang Coffee
description: Nanyang is the old name for Southeast Asia. Since the end of the Ming Dynasty, due to the war and poverty, Fujian and Guangdong, mainly people, have drifted across the sea to the south for their livelihood. Malaysia is one of the important destinations for Chinese migration. Its cuisine is generally seasoned with curry, SAMBAL, ASAM and winter spices, with sour and spicy flavours and bright and rich colours. Most of the ingredients are cattle, sheep, chickens, ducks, fish and shrimps. The arrival of the Chinese had added a new demeanour to Malay cuisine, Cantonese morning tea, Cantonese pastries, Wenchang Hainan Chicken Riceâ€¦ With food as the coordinates, it has witnessed the change of history and culture, creating a special memory of the times. We want to add innovative flavours to the traditional food and Malaysian-friendly styles in the old Nanyang Ocean, which will bring the public a brand-new visual and taste buff food experience and satisfaction. Old Nanyang Coffee is now available in Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid.
ratings:
(5â­) Food was super value for money. Not only the value is there but the taste is good. A great variety to choose from makes the eating experience better for a choosy eater like me or diner with kids. I love the red bean soup, many people canâ€™t cook red bean soup well so itâ€™s hard to find a restaurant with nice red bean soup. The abalone mix roasted meat rice will be the reason why we return again. A feedback for the owner, pls wash table cloth properly, the table we first sat stink, we changed seats immediately. - 3 months ago | (5â­) My family we always hunt for nice or decent Siew Yok (roast pork belly).

This place serves a nice one. It is crispy skin, with the nicely tasty seasoned base. And most important, the meat doesnâ€™t have the after taste or frozen meat smell!

You can see we even ordered extra siew yok to savour again! - a month ago | (1â­) 1.  Spaghetti (Bolognese)
- The sauce appears watery, pooling around the edges of the plate, which indicates poor consistency.
- The sauce-to-spaghetti ratio seems off, with an excess of liquid making the dish look less appetizing.

2. Chicken Chop with Fries and Coleslaw
- The chicken chop looks over-sauced, which might result in a soggy texture, especially if it's fried.
- The sauce consistency appears thin and overly glossy, which might make the dish feel greasy.
- Fries seem undercooked or lacking a crispy appearance, making them look unap

3. Iced Drink - Ribena Longan
- The iced drink has a murky appearance, which could be due to uneven mixing or dilution from melted ice.
- The lemon slice is visible but seems more like an afterthought rather than a deliberate garnish.

Our dining experience was further diminished by poor service. When we arrived, the waiter insisted on showing us to a smaller table, despite us expressing our preference for a larger one. While we understand that some larger tables were reserved, the staff made no effort to check for other unreserved options that could have accommodated us comfortably. This lack of initiative and effort left a poor impression and made us feel like an inconvenience rather than valued customers. - 4 months ago | (5â­) Came here for a quick lunch. Food portion were quite big and arrived quickly. Overall an enjoyable experience. Recommended - a month ago | (5â­) My fav spot to yumcha with friends and family. Very relaxing & comfortable atmosphere and most importantly the air conditioning in this area is NOTICEABLY MORE COOLER. Will definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a place to unwind at Sunway Pyramid!

name: Ole-Ole Bali
description:
Ole-Ole Bali is best described as â€˜an immediate accessible respite from your hectic dayâ€™. A dining place for quick dive into a visual and sensory feast.
Our cooking is a collision of ideas, cultures, techniques and gestures. Serving you high crafted delectable Balinese inspired dishes in cozy atmosphere that play along with mellow ambient.
Ole-Ole Bali is where you feel the gesture and flavours of Bali.
Selamat Makan.
Business Hours: 11am-11pm
ratings:
(5â­) As a plant-based diner, finding a satisfying meal at a predominantly meat-centric restaurant can be a challenge, but Ole Ole Bali at Sunway Pyramid pleasantly surprised us with its thoughtful vegetarian options.

During a recent lunch treat by my boss, I opted for the Grilled Vege Ciabatta, a delightful combination of chargrilled vegetables nestled in a warm, crusty ciabatta. The flavors were well-balanced, and the fresh ingredients made for a hearty and satisfying bite. Accompanying my meal was the Lemongrass Mojito, an incredibly refreshing drink that was the perfect antidote to the sweltering afternoon heat. The vibrant mix of lemongrass and mint was both cooling and invigoratingâ€”highly recommended for those looking for a non-alcoholic thirst-quencher.

While my colleagues enjoyed their respective meals, I truly appreciated the effort put into crafting a flavorful and well-prepared plant-based option. Ole Ole Bali may not be a fully vegetarian restaurant, but it certainly caters to those seeking fresh, wholesome, and delicious plant-based alternatives.

Here are some pictures of our mealsâ€”because good food deserves to be shared! - in the last week | (4â­) Excellent ambience. Makes you feel you are in Bali more than Malaysia. Food presentation is good & food is served relatively quickly. The portion is huge and more than adequate for two persons to share. Only the grilled chicken seems a bit tough. Would have been better if they had used fresh chicken. - 2 months ago | (3â­) 2nd visit to this chain restaurant.

Personally the dishes aren't quite my taste, everything seems a bit bland or not much flavor n  too oily for me either grilled or fried dish.

The same side dish is served at every rice set dish.

Chicken chop looks a bit over fried, it is a bit too dry.

Grill chicken is very oily.

Original serving of the pulut hita drink is too sweet... Should request for less sugar.

Somehow the food presentation is awesome.

Everyone has got different expectations n preferences on food taste.

The management has a great way of promoting the restaurant with a free birthday meal...... - 2 months ago | (5â­) Big portion. We only ordered 2 mains and a dessert, and left the place full! Delicious grilled chicken and nasi campur. The pisang bakar dessert was outstanding as well. The wait can be a little long. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Loved this restaurant! It has a stunning Bali vibe, and the decor is simply amazing, perfectly complementing the Indo-Bali cuisine. It was our first visit, as we came to celebrate a birthday. All the dishes were great, the Tipat Cantuk stood out as my favorite.

Visited on a weekday around 7pm and waited about 20 minutes in front of the restaurant after receiving a waiting number. A phone call/watsapp notification for our turn would have been more convenient. - 2 months ago

name: Ooppa
description: Crafted by designers for the fashionista in you, OOPPA curates vision solutions for students and young working adults looking for the best of style, quality and price. Enjoy an extensive vision consultation covering vision needs and optical styling to deliver a fun vision care experience for a unique optical makeover.
ratings:
(5â­) Went here right after an eye condition diagnosis. I was assisted by Mr Alan Yam and oh god, he was extremely helpful and dint push any sales more than what I was required.
Each and every single concern of mine was attended well and he was there, truout my one hour visit to make sure i am extremely satisfied with the frame I chose.

Definitely a to go place hereafter. - a month ago | (5â­) Well stocked, well trained staff in a very humble shop in Sunway. When you're faced with competition from the other bigger chain specs stores, the only way to stand out is with customer service. And both Nelson and Izzah excel from start to finish.

During an initial visit, I tried on many different pairs and was attended to by Nelson, who politely and calmly helped me with my choices. But, I didn't get anything, thinking that I should look around first.

However, I didn't receive the same treatment elsewhere, even though I found something I really liked. And because of that, I went back to Oopa to get two pairs because of the service level.

The range that they have here may not be as much as others, but you feel really satisfied spending your money here for the service and care that's shown as a customer - and that's priceless.

Keep up the good work! - a year ago | (5â­) I was served by Izzah. She was very attentive to my needs and actually provided good recommendations for my frame and lens. I found the whole experience very relaxed and easy-going so would definitely recommend this to my friends. - 8 months ago | (5â­) I recently visited this spec shop and was thoroughly impressed by the excellent service I received. The staff were incredibly knowledgeable and helpful, guiding me through the selection process with ease. They took the time to understand my needs and preferences, ensuring I found the perfect pair of specs.
The quality of the products is top-notch, and the overall experience was seamless.

I highly recommend this shop to anyone in need of new specs or eyewear.

Kudos to Ms Izzah Tajul, Maryam.

Five stars all the way! - 7 months ago | (5â­) I bought two glasses at this store and Izzah was very patient and attentive with my questions and the glasses preference. She explained really well on the lenses and as well was very accommodating for the frames choices as I was really contemplating with the designs. Please get izzah for assistance needed because sheâ€™s very helpful, friendly and nice! - 4 months ago

name: Optical 88
description:
Established in 1988. Optical 88 owns the largest professional optical retail network in Hong Kong now. With approximately 200 shops, our branch network spans in China and Southeast Asia, including Macau, Singapore, Thailand and Malaysia. Our high-quality, customer-oriented services have helped us not only gain customers' praise and support, but also recognition as a leader in the industry.
Being the dealer in a variety of international brands, Optical 88 offers a broad and diverse choice of product types and styles. Thanks to their modern and chic design, as well as reliable quality, our products have proved to be extremely popular in all the markets we operate in.

name: Oriental Kopi
description: Oriental Kopi prides itself in serving mouthwatering NanYang cuisine that is borne of age-old recipes and traditions. Signature dishes include Oriental Coffee, Portuguese EggTart & Polo Bun.
ratings:
(5â­) Oriental Kopi at Sunway Pyramid is a consistently popular spot, drawing crowds with its lively atmosphere and efficient service. Whether youâ€™re grabbing a quick bite or settling in for a meal, the staff ensures a smooth and welcoming experience. The menu features a great mix of local favorites, with their signature egg tarts being a standoutâ€”crispy, buttery pastry filled with a rich, velvety custard. Their coffee is equally impressive, strong and aromatic, making it the perfect complement to their sweet and savory offerings. Despite the long queues, service remains quick, and the vibrant setting adds to the overall charm. A great place to enjoy classic flavours in a bustling yet comfortable environment. - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) Awesome food and service here. Love the speed of food served and quality. Their egg tart coffee is famous. I like their chicken rice

Warning. Come early to avoid long queues

Baby seat limited but we got a sofa. Think its something they need to work on - a month ago | (2â­) Food was so so. Not worth the queue and calories. Was expecting to be awed but the taste of the food which I had ordered did not meet my expectation.

Service is good and staff are friendly. The only consolation I had from the meal was the Coffee with Cincau. That's the best I had!

Had visited the highly raved place but will never go back for food except to have my coffee take away. - 3 months ago | (4â­) A popular and well-visited restaurant that offers good food with high quality. There is always a queue to get in and it is worth the wait. Today I tried Malay Fried Rice, Egg Tart and Cincau Cold. It was tasty and refreshing. - a month ago | (4â­) This restaurant has a pretty long cue when we arrive. Thatâ€™s just natural given how popular and the reputation it has among the locals like myself. I only visited their branch in KLIA but not the one here.

So when my family arrived at this branch this morning, there was a pretty long cue. But what I admire most was how quick their staff got their act together in ensuring each waiting customer gets welcome and directed to their seats while not getting them to wait too long. I personally thought their service was pretty professional and efficient.

Their environment was pretty spot on as it gives off the classy kopitiam vibes.

Now, when it comes to their food & beverages. Their coffee is certainly not bad but is definitely not the best Iâ€™ve tried. Their famous Ipoh Hor Fun was rather bland and am not too sure why itâ€™s much to shout about. I certainly have tried much better Ipoh Hor Fun out there. But donâ€™t let that ruin your entire experience at this restaurant. The saving grace for me and is one of their must try dishes if youâ€™re here is their Nasi Lemak and their Kaya & Butter Toast bun as well as their Oriental Polo Bun. Am glad that it wasnâ€™t a completely letdown and negative experience.

Itâ€™s definitely a good place to have breakfast or tea time. Be sure to check this place out! - a month ago

name: Oriental Sun
description:
The newest addition to the Oriental Group opens this September in Sunway Pyramid. Spoiling you with views of Sunway Lagoon through floor-to-ceiling windows, we strive for nothing short of elegance here at Oriental Sun.
Oriental Sun brings you the best of modern Cantonese cuisine. Aspire to excel in dim sum and a great selection of the group's signature dishes and house specialties by combining the freshest ingredients with the precision and skill of our experienced chefs.
Four private dining rooms are available for corporate gatherings and family celebrations accommodating intimate groups of 10 or up to 24 pax.
ratings:
(5â­) We love their traditional Shunde dishes and local dishes such as claypot loh shu fun and dim sum . Best claypot loh shu fun we had in KL ! Dim sum of superior ingredients and their daily specials such as pig stomach soup is flavorful and delicious. 2nd time here within 3 months  and will return to try their other special Shunde dishes ! - a month ago | (3â­) Bill total below RM850. Tofu with crab roe sauce was fishy tasting. Usual Oriental group fare. nothing earth shatteringly good. - a month ago | (5â­) Dim sum selection which includes truffle infused ones and very quick service with dedicated servers every few tables. Too bad the Sunway Points takes 2 weeks to be credited. - 4 months ago | (5â­) Had my simple tea ceremony and dinner at their private room. Food is excellent  and Mr Samuel very accommodating to my requests to have the room decorated by my team and even willing to slightly switch the package menu dish. All staffs are very friendly and helpful.

Definitely recommended to have a celebration events here. - 8 months ago | (4â­) Delicious dim sum. Attentive service. Tables are arranged slightly too close. And some of the furniture looked worn out. - a month ago

name: PENANG CHENDUL
ratings:
(2â­) Penang Chendul at Sunway Pyramid was a bit of a letdown. The service was slow and unremarkable, with food delivery feeling sluggish. While the coffee was strong and sweet, the overall dining experience didn't stand out. The ambience was quite plain, lacking any unique charm. Given the number of better dining options nearby, Iâ€™d rate this restaurant 2 stars. Thereâ€™s definitely room for improvement. - 5 months ago | (3â­) For those craving for the famous Cendol at Lorong Selamat, Georgetown, Penang, can come here for temporary enjoyment. During the 1st 2 years from opening, the green cendol, Melaka sugar and coconut milk were very good, original and same as the original stall in Penang, but the taste and quality had dropped after that and recently it was back to standard but not that original since it opened anymore. The restaurant right now more look like Warong or Malay Restaurant, just come here for a bowl of cendol is more than enough or just drive up to Georgetown for the original type. The owner of this Cendol, not the owner of this restaurant as it is the franchise restaurant, Mr. Tan Chong Kim and his family (Jimm, Florence & Owen) should regular visit and spot check on the quality and standard at the franchise restaurants before the franchise restaurants screw up the taste and image of his father or grandfatherâ€™s (Mr. Tan Teik Fuang) hard created cendol. You may consider to terminate the franchise agreement with them, if you feel that the taste is not as original or tasty as from your stall - 3 months ago | (5â­) Currently got first sign up gift buy one free one signature chendul, claiming process is very fast, and muarchi Rm3 with any purchaseğŸ‘ğŸ»
Asam laksa and rojak was delicious hereğŸ‘ğŸ»
Only setback was not enough air-conditioning here. - 5 months ago | (5â­) I was contemplating to eat a good cendul until I came across Penang Chendul in Sunway pyramid when the staff Verral approached me.
He was very attentive and keen to let me know the current promotion and also suggest what to eat in the shop.
I'm very happy with the services and would come again for sure! - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) One of my favorite places for cendol. Can redeem with maxis or hotlink for a cheaper price. Food ok. - 4 months ago

name: POP MART (Vending Machine)
description:
POP MART is a market-leading character-based entertainment company and a global champion of designer toy culture.
They have set foot in more than 23 countries and regions through their network of 350+ offline stores and 2000+ Roboshops catering to a diverse audience of cultural pioneers and art fans. Some of their best-known characters include MOLLY, The Monsters, DIMOO, Skullpanda, and others â€“ each created by one of their artist friends and regular collaborators.
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: PRISM+
description:
Singapore-based consumer electronics company, PRISM+, is now available at Sunway Pyramid! Having launched its ecommerce business in Singapore in 2017, the brand was known for its premium value gaming monitors that offered the best performance at wallet-friendly prices. Following its success in the gaming space, the brand then launched its own brand of Android TVs, which it is best known for today.

In 2021, PRISM+ brought its brand of direct-to-consumer ecommerce business model to Malaysia to great reception. The brandâ€™s introduction of its 86â€ Android TV, the Q86 PRO-QE, shook the market for large screen TVs at never-before-seen prices. â€“ and quickly became the top-selling Android TV and Monitor brands in e-commerce. Since then, the brand has moved from strength-to-strength and is now looking to venture beyond its ecommerce origins with its very first experiential store at Sunway Pyramid. Its store in Sunway Pyramid is the first of its kind outside of Singapore, which launched its first physical stores in August 2022, and sees the brand name Malaysia as a key market for its growth. Not forgetting its gaming roots, PRISM+ has also partnered with Logitech to offer gaming peripherals at its offline store, as part of its commitment in offering customers a holistic experience. The brand will continue to expand its offerings in Malaysia, with the Sunway Pyramid store serving as a physical touchpoint for its fans to experience its latest product launches. As the first physical store in Malaysia, PRISM+ at Sunway Pyramid is a signal of ambition from the fast-growing consumer electronics brand as it gears towards its next big move. In Singapore, the brand recently announced its first smart home appliance, the PRISM+ Zero, and has teased that it will move in the same direction in Malaysia â€“ while continuing to offer the best deals for Android TVs, productivity, and gaming monitors and more. Donâ€™t believe us? Come and check it out for yourselves!
ratings:
(5â­) Good service and staff Reen is very friendly to introduce the products to us. Definitely will come back again when we need anything prom prism+ - 4 months ago | (1â­) I am beyond frustrated with Prism+. They promised a simple one-on-one exchange process for warranty claims, but the reality was far from that. Instead of a straightforward exchange or repair, I was forced to jump through countless hoops and complete endless steps just to get any kind of response. After all of that, they didnâ€™t even exchange or repair the defective product.

What makes this worse is that they donâ€™t even have a service center to handle issues directly. Itâ€™s all just a frustrating online back-and-forth with no actual support. I regret purchasing from this company and would advise others to stay away unless you want to deal with endless delays and a complete lack of customer care. - 3 months ago | (2â­) I bought a Google TV Q series in 2022 via PRISM online platform (it comes with 2 years warranty).Now - Nov 24, my TV is 2 years 10 months old, it starts having problem, blank (black) screen after power on. Spoke to customer support, since my TV is after warranty period (even though is only 10 months after warranty) the TV is less than 3 years old, they told me they cannot help and offer me a 15% discount if I choose to buy a new unit of TV.

name: PRO MEDIC
description:
Operating Hour:
Weekdays : 8.00am - 9.00pm
Saturday/Sunday/ Public Holiday : 8:00am - 5:00pm
Healthcare, the most important aspect of our life and is also often the most neglected. Our dedicated team of professionals from Pro Medic would like to remind you to take care of your health with our innovative and modern health solutions. By having a clear insight and awareness on health, we provide conventional and alternative solutions for communities to stay fit & healthy.
Here in Sunway Pyramid Mall, we would like to provide a convenient access to healthcare and keep you safe while you enjoy a Unique Lifestyle Adventure!
Our Doctors:
1. Dr Tang Meau Cheng
Dr Tang is a Family Physician in Pro Medic Clinic. She graduated from University Malaysia Sarawak (UNIMAS) in 2012. She did postgraduate studies and obtained Graduate Certificate in Family Medicine Programme in Year 2021. She has more than 10 years experiences in treating acute and chronic illnesses, mental health, preventive care, child health, women and maternal health services. She is a very understanding and trusted doctor who provides personalized care to her patients.

2. Dr Cheong Wi-Liam
Dr Cheong is a Physician and Co-founder of Pro Medic. He graduated from Melaka-Manipal Medical College(MBBS) in 2010. Having experiences serving as an assistant to Orthopaedic Surgeon and Cardiothoracic Surgeon, he developed a passion and a strong sense of devotion to preventive medicine. He believes that the best way to provide medical care is by educating, promoting and creating health awareness to communities to maintain health and well-being, which enable effective prevention of disease, disability and death.
Medical Service Available:
1. Medical Examination
2. Laboratory Test
3. Resting E.C.G.
4. Ultrasonography(Abdomen & Pelvis, Gynaecology Ultrasound)
5. First Aid & Emergency Care
6. Immunizations/Vaccination
7. Minor Surgeries
8. Wound care
9. Physiotherapy
10. Influenza, Dengue, COVID-19 Diagnostic and Rapid Screening tests
11. Chest & Soft Tissue X-rays
12. Pap Smear
13. Health & Nutrition Advice
14. Medicine and Supplements
15. Family Planning & Contraception (Hormonal, Implanon, IUCD, etc.)
Health Screening Programs
1. Wellness and Health Screening Programs
2. Insurance & Medical Examination
3. Panel Clinic
4. Pre-employment Health Screening
5. Student Health Screening
6. Travel Health
7. Foreigners / Malaysia My 2nd Home
8. Mobile Health Screening
9. Genetic Screening
ratings:
(5â­) Thank you dr tang and nurse, uma for treating my scalded skin. Had to move to another clinic as my burned wound was not healing properly in the previous clinic. Both of them deserve more than 5 stars and Iâ€™m glad Iâ€™ve found Pro Medic in time!

To Dr Tang: thank you for treating me so carefully and itâ€™s really recovering better on my second visit after just few days!

To nurse Uma: thanks for offering your hand knowing that Iâ€™m in pain and I hope that I didnâ€™t squeeze your hand too hard! ğŸ¤£

You guys rock and thanks for taking me in today although itâ€™s during your lunch hoursğŸ’• - 2 months ago | (5â­) I had an exceptional experience at Pro Medic Clinic. The medical team thoroughly explained my condition and treatment options, answering all my questions with patience and clarity, making me feel genuinely cared for. The doctor at this clinic is incredibly accommodating. They took the time to listen to my concerns and provided thoughtful advice tailored to my needs. It was evident that they genuinely care about their patients' well-being.

Additionally, the assistant was equally friendly and helpful. They made the entire process smooth and comfortable, ensuring that I felt at ease during my visit.

One of the standout features of this clinic is its spotless cleanliness. The environment was well-maintained, which added to my overall comfort and confidence in the care I received.

I highly recommend the Pro-Medical Clinic at Sunway to anyone seeking quality medical attention. You wonâ€™t be disappointed! - 2 months ago | (5â­) The clinic is clean and well-organized. The process from registration to the doctorâ€™s check-up and receiving medication was smooth.

Overall, it was a great experience. - 4 weeks ago | (5â­) As a foreigners visiting Malaysia all the way from South Africa, my husband and I just wanted to leave a note to say how grateful we are to Pro Medic Clinic staff. name: Padini Concept Store
description:
Over the years, PADINI Sunway Pyramid has solidified a reputation as a retail provider with durable and trustworthy products that are fashionable and current. In line with our vision 'to be the best fashion company ever', we work to bring you up to the minute fashion items to suit your changing lifestyle and taste.
While fast and efficient service is the base of what we do, we also believe that it is possible to look stylish without breaking the bank.
As you explore our store, you will find attractive collection of apparels, footwear, bags and accessories for consumers of both genders and all ages through our widely popular brands from Padini Concept Store: Padini, Seed, Padini Authentics, PDI, P&Co, Miki, Vincci and Vincci Accessories.
With a wide range of brands and products to choose from, we guarantee you will exit our site with nothing short of a satisfied purchase!

(2â­) A fashion store aimed at young and trendy customers. The clothes are of varying materials and quality. The interior is bright and welcoming. The fitting rooms are clean and bright. There was a long queue to the fitting room, which was of course a negative experience. - a month ago | (2â­) 3 staff at the fitting room being rude and very not friendly. Siap jeling2 at customer. Worst experience here - a month ago | (5â­) It is good after the renovation. The clothing choices are more varied compared to other outlets. I like shopping here - a month ago | (5â­) One of their current flagship retail stores. This concept store by Padini is host to a variety of numerous house brands including popular names like Vincci, Padini Authentics, P&Co, Seed, Miki and many other labels. The layout is decidedly shopper friendly and large lanes allow leisure browsing by shoppers.

All in all, a very pleasant experience when we came by to do some Christmas and Lunar New Year shopping for the kids and there was quite a fair amount of choice along with quite substantial discounts on certain labels. name: Palsaik Korean BBQ
description: Enjoy a unique taste of Korea at Palsaik Korean BBQ, home to the renowned Palsaik (Eight Colours) Samgyupsal pork belly. The rainbow of colours come from flavourful marinades such as Ginseng, Wine, Pine Needles, Garlic, Herbs, Deonjang, Curry and Gochujang. Each all-natural marinade entices your tastebuds and enhances the flavour of the barbecued pork. Once you taste the juicy, tender meat, you will want to enjoy this experience over and over again!
ratings:
(5â­) Palsaik is one of the best, if not the best, Korean BBQ restaurants around. Palsaik is the whole package in terms of the quality of their meats and their sides. I've never had a bad time going to Palsaik and always leave satisfied. The service is also excellent as servers are constantly nearby. They cook for you as well, and they do a good job at it, too. This particular branch is really nice as it's the most spacious I've seen. They also have a nice kids' room attached to the restaurant. Price-wise, it is on the high side compared to other Korean BBQ places. However, what you get for your money is worth well it! Definitely and highly recommended! - 4 months ago | (5â­) Had a great meal here! There were three of us, and we went for their set for twoâ€”it was just the right amount. Also got the vegetable pancake, which was super crispy and delicious!

The staff were friendly and attentive, and the biggest win? We walked out not smelling like oil or smoky bbq. You know that scent that usually clings to your clothes after Korean BBQ? None of that here!

Oh, and the banchan were refillable, which is always a plus. Highly recommended! - in the last week | (5â­) New dine in place in Sunway Pyramid. The interior design is nice and comfy, the staffs are friendly and helpful. Itâ€™s a cozy place for gathering and dine in. The is a playroom available for kid 3-12 years old too!

The taste of food is average according to my own preference. The menu did mention about the weight of the pork slice for 2 pax but personally think itâ€™s small portion ğŸ˜… I definitely pork lover hence the portion is small for me.

Yummy yoghurt ice cream and itâ€™s free flow, so with the bancan!

Overall happy with the dine in experience! One suggestion is if there is more choices for kid menu, thatâ€™s definitely perfect as itâ€™s limited choice for toddler. - 2 months ago | (5â­) First time invited by my friends in this place.. will be come again for bring my family due to play room provided for parents eating with peace.

Very uncomparation with other BBQ and hot pot restaurant perfect matching 2 in 1 set , affordable price and enjoying unlimited free desert ice cream with quality yoghurt ice cream free flow.. The pity of staff restaurant keeps refilling until the machine needs time to freeze ice cream. But lucky with display-hanging
"Notice preparation on progress." Good practise every 5-7minutes. I still can enjoy the ice cream!

I also never expected free-flow side dishes/vegetables in here , Normally, we ask only to provide as normal restaurants practise.

Good to gain memory. At least, this is my future place for dine perfect combination. Never try, Never know.

Impressive in detailing informing customers service from time being, Even busy weekend still manageable but still feel provide services.

No choice. I've to become a regular guest here as a service provider, and alertness attention from the manager meets up my expectations.

As Mention enjoy peacefully, play room is temptation for me.. hehe.

Food is quite affordable price and has more choices for me in different varieties of BBQ, even Ala Carte.  Good space and large table suitable for family gatherings, so far this  place is the most plenty big table. But lucky do a reservation early.

Friendly and comfortable environment better than other restaurant I went before. Great recommended overall, but this is not a super fine dining restaurant expected but a friendly, caring, and comfortable restaurant as my thoughts. - 2 months ago | (5â­) love the foods, services, and dining ambience. ordered mini palsaik set, including their signature 8 flavours pork belly. generous food portion v reasonable price and superb services. staff will BBQ the meat for customers and let u know when the meat is done. they will give advice or recommend based on the dishes u order. for example, we planned to order the fried rice but the fried rice taste not good if paired v the hot pot soup we had ordered, so the waitress gave us advise to change the fried rice we choose earlier. they provided free ais cream n free flow side dishes. if u don't want pork, they also served beef, chicken, and seafood for BBQ. there is a playroom for kids, bonus for them. - 3 months ago

ratings:
(4â­) The atmosphere is great, with seating available for both small and large groups.

I ordered the Big Breakfast and upgraded the complimentary black coffee to a latte for an additional RM 5.00.

**Big Breakfast:**
- Taste: 9/10
- Portion: 5/10

The tomato was too large and not grilled for added flavor. It would have been better if it were served in smaller pieces. Additionally, there was only one small piece of bread.

The service was okay, though only one counter was open and card payment was unavailable. However, the food was brought to the table. - 2 months ago | (4â­) Many choices and types of breads, buns and pastries to choose from. They also provide cooked foods such as big breakfast. The buns were quite good, soft, balanced between the sweetness and buttery. Coffee a bit bitter but overall it was hot and nice.

Services were reasonable. Prices were above average. - 2 months ago | (4â­) Garlic Bread with Cream Cheese was very garlicky, with quite a strong raw garlic taste (iykyk). Mushroom soup in bread bowl was abit expensive, and very salty for my taste. Overall, good to try once but would not return again. Plenty of seating options and choices of pastries. - a month ago | (1â­) Your staff on New Yearâ€™s Eve is disappointingâ€¦. How can you serve customer with melted plastic cup??? Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Pet Lovers Centre
description:
Require necessities from a trusted pet store for your beloved pet? Sunway Pyramid has just the right outlet with all that you need including shampoos, pet food, accessories, cat litter, hamster beddings, treats and toys to ensure your pet receives the care and love they deserve from their owner. The store also has cute dog clothes with a select few custom-taylored for festive events. Pet Lovers Centre at Sunway Pyramid also has a few small live animals for sale such as bunnies and hamsters.
Being a multiple award winning pet retail and service chain, The firm launched its own brand of pet accessories called Trustie in 1980, and in 1996, launched its food brand called Burp! PLC became a franchise-able brand in 2008. The chain boasts a state of-the-art management system and endears its customers with the widest and freshest range of products and prompt and warm service. PLC has received numerous awards over the years in recognition of its achievements. PLC is known for its ability to offer the widest and freshest range for pets, coupled with vet-trained pet care consultants stationed in their stores to provide professional advice on pet care.
Pet Lovers Centre also values its customers with membership privileges such as exclusive member pricing for regular priced items and services with minimum spend of RM20 in a single receipt or Special Birthday Offer. Members can collect loyalty points and redeem cash vouchers

name: Pineyard
ratings:
(4â­) Pineyard is a new cafe that opened up in the Oasis section of Sunway Pyramid. They were having a 20% discount offer for their hot food offerings when I visited.

I ordered the chicken pie that came with a side of brown gravy and mashed potato. The pie crust was okay although I wished it was a little lighter and fluffier. It was also not as warm as I would have preferred it. Nonetheless, the filling was flavorful with a mix of chicken and mushroom. For the price however, they could have given more pieces of chicken.

Service was relatively fast although there were only 2 occupied tables. Seating was comfortable and the decor had a nicer minimalist look that I appreciate. - 2 months ago | (4â­) I popped into Pineyard at Sunway Pyramid with my mum recently, hoping to find a cosy spot for brunch. We decided on the grilled sourdough sandwich first; it was nicely buttered and crisp on the outside but turned out rather hard and chewy. The filling of mushrooms, spinach, and cheese had a lovely flavour, albeit a bit on the oily side.

The carbonara was rich, creamy, and made even more indulgent by a runny poached egg. The deep-fried chicken ham added a satisfying crunch and extra savouriness. We also had an iced gula melaka and an orange juiceâ€”both decent choices.

Price-wise, Pineyard leans slightly towards the higher end, but I must say the service was prompt and friendly. - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) I had their carbonara for dinner and it was so good, I really love it. I also bought their pasties and they're really soft even if you eat it the next day.

The price for the dish and pastries are slightly expensive but I'd say it matched with the quality of the food.

Staffs are excellent, they're friendly and professional.

Overall my experience here was lovely and I'd love to drop by this place again in the future. â˜ºï¸ - a month ago | (5â­) The food here is absolutely amazing! Every dish is bursting with flavor, fresh ingredients, and beautifully presented. The service is friendly and attentive, making the experience even better. Highly recommend this place if youâ€™re looking for a delicious meal! - 2 months ago | (4â­) I am not usually a fan of pastries but their salted egg croissant was unexpectedly delicious. Shame about their latte though its quite bad, so because of that have to minus 1 star. - a month ago

description: PlayMade is a bubble tea brand known for its handcrafted drinks and freshly made pearls, which are handmade daily. As the first in Asia to offer flavoured boba, PlayMade features unique options like pink cactus, black sesame, and burnt caramel. With high-quality ingredients and vibrant, playful drinks, PlayMade is a popular choice for bubble tea enthusiasts.

name: Poh Kong
description:
Recognized as Malaysia's largest jewellery retail chain, Poh Kong is renowned for its impeccable craftsmanship in curating stunning pieces from gold, diamonds, jade, and colored gems. Catering to various preferences and budgets, the collection offers something for everyone with its personalized creations and wide appeal.
Among the brand lineup, Tranz stands for self-expression and modern style, while Happy Love features oriental gold jewellery symbolizing destined love's journey, the Auspicious incorporates 'Fengshui' elements, and Anggun showcases cultural beauty. Disney and Ms. Petite collections cater to the young.
Turning to diamonds, Hemera boasts the most brilliant diamonds with 101 facets, and D'first offers affordable luxury and the joy of a first diamond.

name: Polo Haus
description:
Indulge in a great shopping experience at Polo Haus's new store which is located at Sunway Pyramid now! Polo Haus started out as a small fashion retail store that sold footwear exclusively for men in the 1980s. A gradual transformation took place in the 1990s where the brand introduced casual men ready to wear attire. After mastering the art of dressing men, Polo Haus extended and embraced the creation of its Polo Haus Women and Kids line in the late 2000s. At present, the entire family can be dressed by the well-loved brand of Polo Haus.
Throughout the years, Polo Haus had and shall continue to strive for excellence in the quality of our products in particular, the materials that we use as well as keeping up to date of the latest fashion trend. We take upmost pride in dressing our customers for all occasions, be it a casual outing or daily business and office attire.
Our extensive range of clothing is conveniently available at our boutique stores as well as outlets located within major departmental stores throughout the country. To keep abreast with the ever changing market and to ensure continued easy accessibility to our customers, Polo Haus is also readily available through our website and various on-line shopping applications.
Here at Polo Haus, we strive to exceed our customerâ€™s expectation everyday to ensure that every visit would be pleasantly unforgettable. For this purpose, our well trained retail assistants are ready and happy to ensure that our customerâ€™s every attire need is met with the highest level of customer satisfaction so that they would continue to look great in a Polo Haus. As a token of appreciation, we had also initiated a customer loyalty program that offers better deals for our regular customers. Till date, we have 17 outlets & 70 consignment counters in Malaysia, and we continue to expand our service.
ratings: (5â­) I came here to get a birthday gift for my uncle. I actually went through their website and opted to buy a wallet and belt set. name: Polo Ralph Lauren
description:
In 1967, Ralph Lauren launched the Polo Ralph Lauren brand, which quickly became a symbol of American luxury and sophistication. From its humble beginnings, Polo Ralph Lauren expanded into a well-known lifestyle brand, offering a diverse range of products that encompass fashion, coffee, home furnishings, and more.
Ralph Laurenâ€™s distinctive brand image has been consistently developed across an expanding number of products, price tiers, and markets.
Ralph Lauren aims to create the highest quality products with minimal harm to the environment. At the heart of the brandâ€™s offerings are its exquisite menâ€™s fashion items. The iconic Polo Shirts, available in a wide range of colours, are a true wardrobe staple. The brandâ€™s menswear line extends beyond their Polo Shirts. The store offers suits, knitwear and stylish outerwear that exude prestige and unmatched quality.
Moreover, Polo Ralph Laurenâ€™s range of exquisite accessories complements any ensemble. Renowned for its exceptional craftsmanship, the brand offers products from leather belts and handcrafted leather shoes, these accessories add perfectly to a manâ€™s outfit.
The new store opening of Polo Ralph Lauren Men at Sunway Pyramid Mall aligns seamlessly with the brandâ€™s vision. Situated in the vibrant city of Kuala Lumpur, Subang Jaya Selangor, Sunway Pyramid Mall boasts a perfect blend of tradition and modernity â€“ much like Polo Ralph Laurenâ€™s approach of timeless elegance.
Malysiaâ€™s diverse and fashion forward trends has accelerated the opening of multiple Polo Ralph Lauren and Ralph Lauren stores all around the country. Its rich culture offers the brand a platform to showcase its appeal of high-quality products. Ralph Lauren has created a name for itself through its expansion within Southeast Asia.
Visit us to enjoy the allure of Men Polo Ralph Lauren store at Unit G1.08, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid Mall, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Selangor, Malaysia.

name: Pop Mart
description:
POP MART is a market-leading character-based entertainment company and a global champion of designer toy culture.
They have set foot in more than 23 countries and regions through their network of 350+ offline stores and 2000+ Roboshops catering to a diverse audience of cultural pioneers and art fans. Some of their best-known characters include MOLLY, The Monsters, DIMOO, Skullpanda, and others â€“ each created by one of their artist friends and regular collaborators.
ratings:
(4â­) If you are travelling to KL, instead of going to PavilionKL outlet, try this one. Lesser queue. Place might a bit packed. Payment using CASHLESS only, prepare your card. The queue at cashier may take some time, staff are a bit slow. - 3 months ago | (5â­) I don't understand the low reviews.
I had a really pleasant experience from the staff, especially the cashier, was so sweet and explained everything patiently.

I got two labubus. No preorder or booking necessary. Also got some other blind boxes.

The guard at the door was also pleasant and friendly.

The only ones behaving badly were many of the customers. Violently shaking boxes, pinching and squishing even, and sometimes just being a general nuisance by blocking shelves without buying anything. Seriously - there's nothing wrong with the shop or staff. It's the customers. - a month ago | (3â­) Expected better shopping experience. Perhaps next round I should try the outlet at 1 Utama instead. name: Popular
description:
Established in January 1984, Popular Book Co. (Malaysia) Sdn. Bhd. has become a household name in Malaysia and has now grown to more than 75 stores nationwide.
It is recognised and listed by the Malaysia Book of Records as the largest bookstore chain in Malaysia, with over 700,000 square feet of retail space.
Popular Book Co. (Malaysia) Sdn. Bhd. is 100% managed by Malaysians and is strongly positioned as a trilingual bookstore catering for everyone from all walks of life.
POPULAR sells a wide variety of fiction, non-fiction and general interest books in English, Chinese and Malay languages, as well as text & assessments. In addition, it also offers a large selection of stationery, Gadgets & IT products, gift items and CDs & DVDs.
ratings:
(4â­) Popular at Sunway Pyramid is a pretty decent bookstore with a nice variety of books and a great selection of stationery. The place is neat and organized, so itâ€™s easy to find what you need. The stationery section really stands out if youâ€™re into that kind of thing. Service was just okayâ€”nothing special, but they get the job done. Itâ€™s a huge store, and it has everything youâ€™d expect for a quick browse. Overall, a reliable spot if youâ€™re in the mall and need books or supplies, and definitely worth checking out! - 5 months ago | (5â­) Hi I was a tourist that visited this bookshop on Thursday and I had asked for a Malaysian cook book to cook nasi lemak and satay skewers and chicken rendang the two young Malaysian hijab girls were very helpful and stopped what they were doing and walked with me to the section and flicked through the pages to find the perfect one I canâ€™t thank them enough give them the recognition they deserve (also they didnâ€™t have name tags but I will attach photos of the books) terima kasih - a month ago | (5â­) They always have a special price. They have Dragon Ball comics, etc. but perhaps Popular can put a chairs like other bookstores. Iâ€™m a disabled person & it is hard for me to take a rest while shopping in the store. Thereâ€™s no place for me to sit for a while. - a year ago | (1â­) Popular Sunway pyramid store manager, please manage your cashier counter as customer queue is not moving at all for 10 mins, do not exploit or mistreat your customersâ€™ trust and support. - 3 months ago | (4â­) This is probably one of the biggest Popular outlets around and it has a variety of books to choose from, especially their English fiction section. I love that they're always adding and updating more new books, and that they regularly have promotions going on.

However, sometimes they have too many overlapping promotions that even their system cannot handle and the staff are not familiar with. There have been too many instances where I find same books (same publication, size etc), but they're tagged different prices. Some books are tagged a certain amount but when I got to the counter, they said they were tagged wrongly and the price was actually higher than displayed by the tag.

As a regular patron, this had happened too many times especially when they have many different promotions at the same time (ie all books for 20% for 2 books or more but they also have 10% on fiction so if you buy fiction, even if you buy 2 books or more, you're only entitled to get 10% each). This makes the shopping experience here very unpleasant. The only way to know for sure how much you have to pay exactly is by checking at the counter, which is troublesome especially if there's large crowd.

However, other than this, I really like this outlet because of the variety of books available. Hope they'll improve on the system and pricing especially when they want to have overlapping discounts. - 2 years ago

name: Power Scooter
description:
Power Scooter is available at concierges for your convenience. Available for rent at any concierges.
*T&C Apply.
â€¢ Our power scooters are suitable for patrons below 120 kg or above 18 years old.
â€¢ RM50 refundable deposit will be collected.
â€¢ 4 hours of usage.
â€¢ Usage for mobility-impaired persons, elderly and pregnant ladies.
â€¢ Use a lift to access different floors.
â€¢ Do not carry passengers.
â€¢ Remove the key before getting off.
â€¢ Do not leave handbags/valuables unattended.

name: Pull & Bear
description:
Pull&Bear started up in 1991 with a clear international mission and with the intention of dressing young people who are engaged with their environment, who live in the community and relate to each other. Young people who have a casual dress sense, who shun stereotypes and who want to feel good in whatever they are wearing. To meet their needs, Pull&Bear takes the latest international trends, mixing them with the influences that are seen on the street and in the most fashionable clubs, and reworks them according to their style thus turning them into comfortable and easy to wear garments.
Pull&Bear Sunway Pyramid evolves at the same pace as its customer, always watching out for new technologies, social movements and the latest artistic or musical trends. All of this can be seen reflected not only in its designs but also in stores. Inspired by the legendary Californian city of Palm Springs, the product lines are constantly being updated. All stores worldwide receive new merchandise twice a week
ratings:
(5â­) Trendy clothes, lot of to choose from, love those collaboration collections! Average prices consider reasonable. Bought a few clothes from this store, some of the knitwear looks nice, bought one as well. Would love to see more of collaborations! Keep up the good work! - a month ago | (1â­) Clothes are alright, just that the staff are questionable. They crowd together rather than helping customers. One of the male staff shouted really loudly which gave me a bit of a scare. The changing rooms are technically open for people to peek through. - 4 months ago | (4â­) Design, quality, price and sale are better a lots than Zara and Mango. The staff there will reply you in Malay when you ask them in English, the management should give more priority to employ the English speaker to work there as here is not kampung area, East Coast or Northern - 7 months ago | (1â­) Wanted to change the size of the shirt after my girlfriend brought the shirt. Salesperson did told her that she could take out the price tag and change it within 30 days. Today I went to Pull&Bear in Sunway Pyramid, they said as per the policy the price tag cannot be taken out.

Dear Pull&Bear, please do take this seriously as your staff are not properly trained. Show us your the purchase and refund policy.

Such ridiculous staff you had there. Donâ€™t even care to look at the receipt.

Need an explanation for this matter. Thanks! - 3 months ago | (1â­) We experienced extremely unprofessional behavior from Eva, a Malay lady staff with glasses who works at the counter on November 3rd.

When we informed her that the clothes we had reserved were no longer available, she not only failed to apologize but also displayed a dismissive attitude with side-eye, which is entirely inappropriate for someone work in the customer service industry.

P&B HR department please look into this matter, as such conduct is unacceptable in a customer-facing role. - 4 months ago
