name: Putien
description: Retailing of food and beverages
ratings:
(2â­) Visited a few Putien restaurants and always enjoy the dishes served. However, recent visit to this particular Putien restaurant located at Sunway Pyramid was disappointing. Perhaps it was due to Chinese New Year that the dishes from the set meal were served in a rush and a few of the dishes were served at the same time.

The table is not big enough and the staff were busy transferring the dishes to smaller plates. It was chaotic and customers were not able to eat in peace. The acoustic was poor and it was really noisy. The squirrel fish was over fried and stingy with the sauce. Would not recommend to dine in this particular branch. - 2 weeks ago | (3â­) Visited today for dinner. Female Staff taking Q n waiting list is very kind enough to bring me to see the atmosphere of the restaurant .
The food is slightly below average.  The chicken meat is very dry...
Ending our 7-8 courses meal. The guy staff left the order list on the table and quickly keep our dirty / finish plate.
At this moment, felt like they are rushing us...  needed to improve on the service  n food - 2 months ago | (5â­) Love their food very much, it is fresh and very delicious, the service is very good, attentive and thoughtful, and the environment is clean. Worth coming again - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) Great Fujian Michelin restaurants inside the Sunway Pyramid. Food quality is excellent and well maintained.
There is a meal set that suits 3-4 people with only RM188. We normally will order the meals set that comes with their popular dishes, eg. Deep Fried Squirrel Fish, lychee meat, special spinach, crispy oyster etc. And added a few more side dishes.
The service is good and friendly staff. Their price is on the high side, and it is good for business dining or for some special occasions. - 4 months ago | (5â­) Two of us had dinner at Putien this evening. We decided to have Braised Bean Curd with Chinese Cabbage and Fried Heng Hwa Bee Hoon. The Braised Bean Curd had a simple broth but the ingredients made it very flavourful. Putien is generous in their ingredients content. The Bee Hoon vermicelli is very fine and though the condiments look very basic, it was the best Bee Hoon we had tasted so far. The service by Alvin Lim was really great as he introduced himself to us and said to call on him should we need further assistance. He was very polite and attentive. We ended the meal with a very refreshing and complimentary dessert. We strongly recommend having a great meal with good service at Putien ! - 4 months ago

name: QCD
description: Retailing as Apple Service Centre
ratings:
(2â­) Overall, my experience with this service provider is HORRIBLE.

On the 21/11/2024, I bought my AirPods 4 in Nu Sentral @ Machines.
However, on the 29/11/2024, I found out that my left side AirPods had this windy sound which should not be there. I went to the nearest Machines and they told me that I have to go for their service provider, which the nearest is Sunway Pyramid for me.

First Visit (29/11): After getting my AirPods diagnosed, the staff and the technician said it was fine. I was very doubtful, and I left. BUT! The issue came back again! So, I booked another appointment with the service provider.

Second Visit (30/11): I left my AirPods with them again and I agreed to the 3-7 days checking.

Third Visit (3/12): I was told that my AirPods were fine. SHOCKED with the outcome, I tested the AirPods in front of them and the issue is STILL THERE. I even told the staff to try it out, and the staff let the technician tried it out too.
Guess what? THEY JUST CONFIRMED THE ISSUE RIGHT IN FRONT OF ME.

I was like: Wait, I waited FOR NOTHING.

The pissed off moment was: Even though I bought my AirPods on the 21/11, I have not done ANY damages to it (why would I? RM829 weyh), I solely DESERVE a full-on exchange of the product.

But? The service provider staff SAID NO. You have to leave the AirPods 4 AGAIN to check if the issue persists.

I was like: WAIT. HOLD UP. You just confessed that there IS an issue. Why do you need to wait for it again?
I demanded a full-on exchange of the ENTIRE product. The staff had to go back and called the manager (WHO, BY THE WAY, HE/SHE ISNâ€™T EVEN IN THE OFFICE).
Furiously, I demanded to talk to the manager on the phone, but the staff refused to.
After the bickering, the staff went back in the room, came out, and agreed to swap THE LEFT SIDE OF THE AIRPODS 4.
I was like, NO WAY. I am entitled to have a full exchange of the product.

Conclusion:-
1. I am still waiting for another 3-7 days.
2. I want a full-on exchange (didnâ€™t get it)
3. And the manager isnâ€™t there at all.

Unprofessional and betrayed by the service of Machines and this service provider.

I will keep on updating my complaint.

10/12/2024
Update:-
My issue has been resolved on the 7/12/2024. There was a Malay lady and Nabil who attended me when I went to pick my AirPods 4 up.  - 2 months ago | (3â­) I sent my phone for repair since itâ€™s still under warranty period, the personnel told me it will take 3-7 working days. I called after 7 working day as the phone is not ready for collection, the person who pick up the call is so unfriendly, anything I asked also reply with one word, usually â€œ Noâ€ is the answer. Donâ€™t she knows that she is in servicing line and need to handle customersâ€™ queries? Not helpful at all, end up I have to Apple directly - 3 months ago | (5â­) I recently had an issue with my phone battery and was assisted by the staff, Nabil. He was incredibly helpful and explained the problem clearly, mentioning that the battery replacement would require removing my brand-new screen protector. I was a bit sad about that, but he reassured me he would try his best to save it. Not only did he manage to save and perfectly reapply the screen protector, but the entire process was completed in precisely 3 hours as promised. His attention to detail and excellent service really stood out. Highly recommended! - 5 months ago | (5â­) QCD has taken my complaint about the green screen problem seriously. They explained clearly on the conditions for replacement of the screen with estimated duration. QCD staff politely answers all my curiosity and questions. name: REEF & HYDRO FLASK
description:
Whatever adventure youâ€™re planning, weâ€™re in. From cross-country skiing to stories by the campfire. From morning meetings to sunsets in the park.
Weâ€™ll bring fuel worthy of the moment: wickedly hot coffee, just-out-of-the-cooler cold beverages or water that stays icy cold for hours.
Every hour of engineering that goes into each Hydro Flask product we makeâ€” itâ€™s all for one thing: to be part of the moments that make life more fulfilling.
Thatâ€™s how we design each product in our line todayâ€”always premium, always better than anything else weâ€™ve ever used, and never lukewarm. From our original 18 ounce bottles to our award-winning soft coolers, we want you to love every Hydro Flask product you ever own just as much as we loved perfecting it. Because for us it has never been just about making something, it has always been about making something awesome.
Today is wide open. And weâ€™re up for anything.Founded in 2009 in Bend, Oregon, Hydro Flask is the award-winning leader in high-performance insulated drinkware products. Inspiring an active and joyful life on the go, Hydro Flask innovations showcase TempShield double-wall vacuum insulation to lock in temperature, 18/8 stainless steel ensuring pure taste and durable, ergonomic design for the ultimate trusted sidekick.
While the brand is best known for its stainless-steel water bottles, Hydro Flask has evolved over the years and now produces an extensive line of items, such as wine tumblers, food jars, tote bags, and cooler bags.
â€˜Reef since 1984â€™ is more than just a date on a timeline.
Itâ€™s a symbol of our passion that compels us to bring people the absolute best footwear products in the world. What drives us to reimagine, redefine and redesign everything we know about sandals, and do that again, and again, and again.
Itâ€™s the pride we have in ourselves and what weâ€™ve stood for since day 1 â€“ delivering the freedom of surf life through expertly crafted experiences.
Itâ€™s having long lasting trust in our partners to bring our brand to life in the most authentic way possible and working together through whatever the world throws our way.
â€˜Reef since 1984â€™ is more than just a number. Itâ€™s who we are.
In 1984, two entrepreneurial brothers from South America named Fernando and Santiago Aguerre founded REEF out of a love for the beach and surfing.Their idea was to create high-quality, super comfortable products that fit the lifestyle they loved.
Fernando and Santi walked everywhere, so they created sandals that could take them to the beach, into town and wherever they wanted to go â€“ in comfort.
The brothers redefined, redesigned and reengineered every component of the sandal. That attention to detail and an uncompromising standard of quality made Reef the most comfortable sandals anybody had ever worn.
The innovations that started in 1984 have evolved into the Reef sandals we love today, becoming a symbol of a free, comfortable and happy lifestyle.

One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Rakuzen
description: Rakuzen is committed to providing genuine Japanese food at affordable prices, in cosy ambience, such that patrons of all levels and ages can enjoy dining with us in a warm, friendly, welcoming & homely environment. Our menu provides a wide selection of sushi, sashimi and range from seasonal dishes to exclusive personalized omakase sets, to give our patrons a very unique Rakuzen dining experience.
ratings:
(4â­) Food is decent but Service was a tad slow . Waited almost 20 minutes for sushi to arrive. Perhaps it was due to peak hours. Worth the try . Unagi based dishes were good. - 4 months ago | (3â­) Raised has been our favourite Japanese restaurant despite there are some other more premium restaurants. However, tonight experience is not favourable. Food quality deteriorates a lot. All the dishes that we ordered are our regular dishes, but the quality has been very poor this time. Probably caused by long serving time after the food ready by the kitchen. The ingredients also seems to cut off from standard menu. - 9 months ago | (2â­) It was my first time visiting this place. This was the quality and look of the menu once I was seated. It was gross and the entire place looked tired and shabby. First impression is the last impression. Says it all. Quality of sushi averaged very small bites especially the maki and sashimi. - 4 months ago | (4â­) Rakuzen is almost always consistent in terms of food and service. They've lasted through the years, and that in itself is a statement of how good they are. They were also one of the earliest Japanese food franchises, and it's a credit to them that they have maintained their standards for the most part. Their sushi and bento dishes are very good, and it's perfect for a meal for one. If you're a sharing group, their ala carte dishes are also terrific. The same goes for their varied rolls. Service is mostly good here, although they can sometimes be slow getting to the tables if they're crowded for the evening. Overall, recommended! - 11 months ago | (3â­) I hate to leave 3 stars but the food came late (10min after all the food on the table) and was a bit on the cold side.
The tempura veg was oily (not drained well).
Portion size was great. Miso soup good too. - 8 months ago

name: Ramen Bankara
description:
The word â€œBankaraâ€ is a colloquial term that was once used in Japan to best describe an individualâ€™s outstanding and unique style amidst the swarm of conformist society. Bankaraâ€™s brand values and product offerings are unmistakably Japanese, yet differentiated from the market competitors in tantalizing the customers dining experience, namely the palette and sensory immersion.
Embracing the philosophy â€œCooking by Heartâ€â€™ the Bankara brand is the result of Mr. Kusanoâ€™s desire to constantly innovate and improve the taste of Japanese ramen. Drawing upon his familyâ€™s expertise handed down through the generations, Mr. Kusano embarked on a request in selecting the finest of ingredients and cooking techniques, to develop a new ramen soup recipe.
In 1998, the â€œImpactâ€ taste so broadly associated with the brand, heralded the arrival of the Bankara Signature Ramen. The journey to tantalise our customerâ€™s five senses; taste, smell, sight, sound and touch, begin here.
(Taste & Smell) â€œCooking by Heartâ€, Bankara Ramen Malaysia serves four authentic Japanese ramen styles namely Bankara Signature, Tonkotsu ramen, Miso ramen and Tsukemen. Each ramen style is clearly defined by the soup and accompanying noodles of varying thickness and texture. We are proud to serve the same quality and flavour in every bowl of ramen, as one would come to expect if one was dining in Japan. Selected ingredients imported from Japan, attention to details and preparation ensures we serve the most authentic â€œImpactâ€ taste ramen that you will truly savour and crave for.
(Sight, Sound & Touch) True to the brand values, Bankara Malaysiaâ€™s stores draws its design inspiration from various traditional Japanese architectures, art and design elements.
ratings:
(4â­) Tried their recommended Kakuni Bankara, the broth base is shoyu, so expect a quite high level of saltiness. The pork belly has been cooking for so long, it just melts as soon as your chopsticks touch it. Not my kind of noodles, it's on the thicker side, but it grabs onto the broth very well. Just wished they given us the option to choose the level doneness of the noodles. The tsukemen is probably three times the salty level of the ramen, but it's good none the less. The option to add garlic tableside was great. Really elevates the flavour of the broth. - 2 weeks ago | (4â­) Tried their tonkatsu broth and is flavorsome and thick. Although too salty for me, but will probably suit those who prefers strong flavors. The kakuni and chasiu is tender and juicy,  5 â­. If there's a bone to pick, I would prefer to savour a bowl of ramen that costs more than RM40 from a ceramic bowl rather than melamine ones. The rest is all good.

Service is excellent with friendly smiles. - 3 months ago | (5â­) Ramen Bankara at Sunway Pyramid offers a fantastic dining experience for ramen lovers. The tonkotsu broth is rich, flavorful, and comforting, and the noodles are perfectly cooked. The menu offers a variety of options, from classic ramen to delicious side dishes. The ambiance is cozy, and the service is friendly and efficient. Itâ€™s a great spot for a hearty meal, especially after a day of shopping. Highly recommended for anyone craving a satisfying bowl of ramen! - 2 months ago | (4â­) They have a wide range of ramen on their menu. Since it was our first time eating there, the staff shared how to get the most enjoyment from eating what we ordered.

Kakuni Ban broth is light but flavourful, adding garlic to it enhances the taste. They also provide a garlic press at the table to crush the garlic cloves. Tonkotsu Chashu has a rich broth and adding sesame seeds enriches the broth. Miso broth is already rich, great for seasoned eaters. Make sure the steamed rice and chopped chashu, marinated in sweet soy sauce, are mixed well for Negi Buta Meshi. The taste gets better by adding cut ginger into it.

Food arrived fairly quick and staff were attentive in refilling our green tea when we needed it. - a week ago | (4â­) Ramen Bankara at Sunway Pyramid is another nice place for ramen lovers. The shoyu broth is a mildly flavored soup and the noodles served is medium thickness ramen. The menu offers a variety of options, from classic ramen to delicious side dishes. The service is friendly and efficient. Itâ€™s a great spot for a hearty meal. - 3 weeks ago

name: Ramen Matsuri
ratings:
(4â­) One of the most satisfying ramen I ever had. Tried the spicy & black garlic ones..., Both were equally delicious. Worth repeating if the soupy craving hit me again.

Also tried the fried dumplings. It was edible.. not too bad but I wished they fried it properly. So it's nice and crispy

Service was nothing to write about. It's neither good nor bad. Unmemorable actually.

Food was served in reasonable time, considering I was in my  hangry mode. - 4 months ago | (4â­) I recently visited Ramen Matsuri and ordered the Black Garlic Special Ramen. The dish was superbâ€”packed with rich, bold flavors, and the ramen itself had that perfect stringy texture I love. The broth was delicious and well-balanced, making every bite enjoyable.

However, Iâ€™m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because I noticed the staff brought out the rubbish bin through the front door in front of customers, which wasnâ€™t ideal. Apart from that, everything else was fantastic! Definitely worth a visit for the ramen alone.

Feel free to tweak it as you like! - 4 months ago | (5â­) I have always love simple ramen and in my opinion, Matsuri Ramen have the best Toripaitan Ramen. The food are served hot and fast, services are good too! - 5 months ago | (5â­) One of my favourite places to get simple ramen. I usually get the Torikoku Original, which is a ramen dish with lightweight but flavourful chicken broth. They're always super generous on the chicken - they're so thick and big, and I'd struggle to finish everything unless I'm absolutely starving.

I also love the black fungus topping - it adds a nice crunch, and they give plenty of chopped green things (don't know what it is but it adds nice flavour).

I love the noodles they use too. They're nice and thin, and never undercooked or overcooked. They always taste on point. The chicken broth tastes best hot (always served hot anyway) and is great for rainy days.

I'm surprised it's almost always empty when I come here haha. I think the price charged for the quality of food is very reasonable. I hope more people will come here more often because I don't want one of my favourite ramen places to close down...I haven't found any other place that serves ramen like this ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™

The ventilation can improve a bit more though. Last last ime I went it was so very stuffy. It's been improving though. - a year ago | (2â­) The Ramen Matsuri restaurant offers an underwhelming experience with its Red Spicy ramen lacking in umami richness and depth of flavor. While the spiciness is detectable, it fails to compensate for the overall lack of taste. Additionally, the green tea leaves much to be desired, as it tastes stale, raising concerns about its freshness. Overall, the dining experience falls short of expectations, failing to deliver on both taste and quality. - 11 months ago

ratings:

Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Rocku Yakiniku
description:
ROCKU Yakiniku is a casual, upbeat and edgy Yakiniku restaurant serves Japanese cuisine with various live performances.
ROCKU Yakiniku, a casual, upbeat and edgy Yakiniku restaurant. Delivering a fresh concept to traditional Yakiniku joints, ROCKU Yakiniku defies convention by melding a traditional style of Japanese dining with modern entertainment, perfectly characterizing Japanese pop culture.
Guest can savor their food hot throughout the entire meal, and thereâ€™s no better way to enjoy the tantalizing cuts of meat, ranging from beef to pork and chicken. ROCKU also entertains and enthralls its guests with modern music of Korean, Japanese and Mandarin Pop-Rock variety.
ratings:
(5â­) We chose this restaurant for dinner on a Wednesday afternoon, and the kebab was very tasty, with some of the sauces marinating the flavours. But I personally liked it best plain without the seasoning. The gentleman who served us was also very responsive! Changed the charcoal for us and was very appreciative of the service. Will be back next time! - in the last week | (5â­) From the cozy, Japanese-inspired decor to the sizzling grills at each table, this Japanese grill offers an unforgettable experience. We ordered a selection of meats, and the quality of every ingredient was top-notch. The beef was incredibly tender, and the rich, marbled flavor paired perfectly with the house sauces. Maybe due to shortage of staff and not able to attend to us immediately and need to call for 2-3 times.However, I still highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for an authentic Japanese grill experience with buffet style, eat as much as you can! - 4 months ago | (5â­) Iâ€™d like to take a moment to share my experience:

1.    This was my first time dining at the restaurant.
2.	I was particularly impressed by the front counter staff member, Nicole, who provided an excellent introduction to the menu. Her friendly demeanor and warm smile made the experience welcoming, and she explained the menu thoroughly, understanding customersâ€™ preferences and offering tailored recommendations. Her attentiveness and professionalism in promoting the dishes contributed to a positive first impression.
3.	Regarding the dining experience, there was one point of dissatisfaction with the garlic butter side dish. Although I ordered garlic butter, it arrived without any butter. I requested it a second time, but unfortunately, it was still served without butter. I also noticed a customer at a nearby table sharing similar feedback with the staff.
4.	When I mentioned this issue to Nicole, she was genuinely surprised and expressed her intention to relay the feedback to her supervisor. Her responsiveness and willingness to address the concern, despite it being a minor issue, were greatly appreciated.

Overall Impression: Aside from the missing butter, the overall dining experience was enjoyable, thanks largely to Nicoleâ€™s kindness and helpfulness. Her proactive approach to resolving the issue demonstrated her commitment to customer satisfaction. - 4 months ago | (3â­) I was here 23/12/24 and i came here to eat at 2.22pm till around 4.15pm. I am not sure what these staff were doing but tables that are uncleared SHOULD not be left unattended but still can welcome new customers to come into the restaurant.. plus, the trolley that is used to collect the plates and cutleries were left where customers are eating.. this for me is unacceptable.. the food is good here.. but this is shocking for me! name: Royal County of Berkshire Polo Club
description:
THe ROYAL COUNTY OF BERKSHIRE POLO CLUB(RCBPC) is the most exclusive Polo Club in England. It started in Royal County of Berkshire and brings together not only the lovers of this aristocratic sport but also the most prestigious strata of english society.
In 1985, the legendary Bryan Morrison wanted to create a club that combined talent and natural British sportsmanship with elegant surroundings and ambience. With the same vision with which he produced music for Pink Floyd, Wham! or the Bee Gees, Morrison set up an Icon of Englishness which he devoted himself to immediately.
So resonant was the success of the Berkshireas it is affectionately knowri.The Prince of Wales soon became an honoured lifetime member. Always a lover of prestige and distinction and a professional designer in his youth, the club that Morrison envisioned was also to be leading light in fashion.
Again his vision returned to set a trend.
Since then, RCBPC has become a premier international brand, chosen by those who demand unmistakable class and style also wanting the best things in life.
Today, that label is finally available across the world.

name: SEGWAY-NINEBOT
description:
Segway is the worldwide leader in personal transportation. Founded in 1999, Segway has always strived to provide high-quality, safe, and reliable products for its customers. Segway-Ninebot is a global enterprise in the field of intelligent short-distance transportation and service robots. With world-renowned intellectual property, Segway-Ninebot aims to lead the users and the entire industry into the future. With chronic traffic congestions in Southeast Asia, particularly in Thailand, Indonesia and Malaysia where a ballooning numbers of internal combustion engine (ICE) vehicles are introduced each year, these markets were identified by Segway-Ninebot as a crucial area where its products can solve the congestions in these countries. With Sunway Pyramid being at the heart of Klang Valley, a densely populated area with an ever increasing number of vehicles crowding the roads, the introduction of Segway-Ninebot micro-mobility vehicles could solve the various issues arising from traffic congestions.
Need a last-kilometre transportation solution to your nearest public transit station? Segway-Ninebot eKickscooters can zoom you to your destination effortlessly. Worried that itâ€™s too bulky to bring along with you into your train? Rapid KL has got you covered with Bike & Ride stations, or just bring it along with you when you ride! Foldable scooters are allowed on all Rapid KL trains. With various safety features built-in, Segway-Ninebot strives to provide you with a quality, safe ride thanks to the Battery Management System. With dual safety systems built-in into the eScooterâ€™s charging adapter, control boards and battery systems, rest assured of its charging and operating safety. All these are backed by a standard TWO (2) years manufacturer warranty.
Extra features include:
1. Powerful Motors (Nominally powered up to 250W and 350W respectively on D18W and D38U models, or boost up to 900W Max Power on the Max G2 model)
2. Smart & Durable Battery with Battery Management System
3. Anti-skid 10 inch pneumatic tyres
4. High-Toughness Carbon Steel Structure, rated to carry up to 120kg.

name: SHABU-YO
description:
SHABU-YO has 270 branches in Japan and 30 branches abroad,
with 4 branches in Malaysia.
It is the largest SHABU SHABU restaurant chain in Japan.
Japanese Shabu-shabu, we also provide
a sauce bar with around 30 different options, allowing
our customers to customize their flavors according to their preferences.
This is a truly authentic SHABU SHABU restaurant experience.
ratings:
(5â­) I love this place. They have reasonable price for buffet and their meat and veggies choices are so much more than other japanese buffet. I also like that they have high quality onzen egg that you could eat raw. - a month ago | (1â­) The worse steamboat buffet I've ever been, this will be my first and last in this restaurant. All the staff have to go through deep and serious training. Even the foods was so so only, everywhere is very messy tot think that it's not that busy. And even though on busy times should not let your buffet bar messy, dirty tissues everywhere, veggies all over the place. Staffs no basic manners, clear table just take plates, serve the food just bang on your table without saying anything. All are black face and not talking, robot is better at least they greet but these people nothing. But when they are chatting while clearing tables their voices are so loud and happy back to customer gave you poker unhappy face. Most of the waitresses hair are so messy too not appropriate in F&B standard. Kitchen door widely open can see how messy and dirty inside, staff room door open too showing us all shoes while eating is it? The another long hair waitress arranging all the pots banging so loud makes the diners disturb if not happy why not go back home. Ice cream melted, waffle bitter and put there no cover at all. Your golden soup is the worse I've ever tasted too no taste at all, other beef cutting is wrong side making it so tough. Most of the sauces are all chili taste without any saltiness or sweetness I know we can add on seasoning but do we need to adjust everything on our own meh? I came here because it was recommended by my colleague who always eat at Sunway Velocity, she said must try very nice. I was totally in regret that I tried and paid full price with 10% service charge without even providing any service. - a month ago | (5â­) food are 9/10! especially their ice cream is sooooo CREAMY and not too sweet. Got superior dining experience there! Thanks my friend irvin, sak and ronan served us, and also entertaining us! Hahhahaha - 4 months ago | (5â­) Decent, nice, and well maintained dining spot inside Sunway Mall. Wide variety of fresh vegetables.

They have rice, fries, takoyaki, chicken karaage, desserts like ice shaved, and waffle making in the buffet menu. Which is very reasonable for its price.

The buffet is about 40 rinngit gross, but that includes the mains to drinks and desserts.  Dining limits to 90 mins.

Quite a few choices of base soup. it's less tasty than arashi, though, but very accoetable for its price. . Many staff were  around to help.

Overall definitely worth it. - 6 months ago | (4â­) We have delicious  lunch at shabu yo,Sunway pyramid on 28jul24. Sunday.

All you can eat. At rm32.90 +weekend surcharge +rm5=37.90. Add 10%+6%= @rm44. Per adult.

Offer choice of 2 tray pork. For shabu. Many choices of soups to choose.

Many sauces & spices to add.
Many vegetables, sausage,bean curb , noodles, mushrooms to choose from.

Many choices of ready cooked fry, deep fried chicken pieces. Japanese specialty.

Many  soda soft drinks, hot drinks, from coffee, milo ,tea. Ice cream, make own pancakes , topping. Varieties of desserts & sauces.

Occasionally come for a relax & non control meals.

Duration of 90mins.  Start at 12.30pm. Ended almost at 2pm. Friendly reminder 5mins before time up for our eating section.

Accept many type of payment.

Thanks to Shabu-Yo. We enjoyed our lunch. - 7 months ago

name: SHISEIDO
description:
"Shiseido has defined the concept of beauty and spread its knowledge and power onto the world for 145 years.Shiseido Company, Limited is a Japanese multinational personal care company, that is a skin care, hair care, cosmetics and fragrance producer. It is one of the oldest cosmetics companies in the world. Founded in 1872, it celebrated its 140th anniversary in 2012.Shiseido has always been about doing things a little differently.Shiseido continues to thoughtfully fuse Eastern and Western philosophies and innovations together to serve as a beacon of beauty inspiration especially the Japanese sense of spiritual beauty for women all over the globe.Beauty is a shared feeling; it is diverse, and it is unifying. When we feel beautiful and confident, we canâ€™t help but feel inspired to go out into the world and make a positive difference to other peopleâ€™s lives. By inspiring empathy, beauty is the ultimate force of goodness that makes us feel truly alive.
"

name: STUFFâ€™D
description: Serving Mexican & Turkish cuisine, our Kebabs, Burritos, Quesadillas, Daily Bowls and Tacos are made daily from scratch, because we believe food tastes better when itâ€™s made fresh. Through Stuffâ€™d, we aim to define what real food should be: freshly cooked, nutrient-dense, ethically sourced, minimally processed and delicious. Letâ€™s indulge in daily dose of goodness by building your own scrumptious meal with your choice of main protein, salad base, sauces and toppings!
ratings:
(3â­) Good place for healthy, light meals. Taste-wise its really not bad and they don't skimp on ingredients.

Ordered chicken kebab today (though I almost got hurt biting into a bone chip). Saw another review here that they also found bone chips in their kebabs. Something that I've not encountered in their other outlets. Perhaps a quality control issue.

The newly renovated stuff'd now uses machine ordering. The machine lagged when I was making payment, and staff were too busy to entertain my problems because Grab riders were more of a priority. After awhile, one of them rerouted the payment to the normal counter cashier (what was the point of the machine, then?)

Waiting time: Almost 20 minutes for a kebab. Not really acceptable considering most customers are here during their short lunch break. Like I've mentioned up there, they prioritize Grabfood more than walk-in orders.

The space is too tiny for the amount of customers that drop by. Best to takeaway.
Probably won't be back in a long time until they've fixed their machines and service. - 4 months ago | (3â­) Update**
Bought kebab today and it's absolutely soaked. Dripping everywhere as soon as I start eating and towards the end it was hard to even take a bite with all the water. Maybe teach your staff to properly drain the vege so we don't end up with damp kebab.

Frequent this place, always order chicken, today first time order beef and regretted. There were 3 bone chips in my beef kebab, could easily had chip my tooth. - 9 months ago | (3â­) so is it burrito or kebab?

if the former, then it simply isn't as good as the competition round the corner.  which is the general dilemma of "premium" fast food. - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) As was ordering for a lunch meeting, pre-ordered the bowls.

The bowls were made just prior to collection as they were packing up when I reached.

It's a hearty meal & with options to add or omit as desired.

The veg bowl option selected is  guacamole (hummus is the other, or can add it with a charge).

The sauces selected were habanero sauce (fiery & it lit my day) & mayo cucumber. The cilantro rice has a good flavour.

Will certainly be back. - a year ago | (4â­) [holiao]
1) Overall - kebab shop selling healthy food that comes with varieties of fresh ingredients to choose from, good service with online ordering too, limited seating, great place for quick lunch and takeaways, food selection are burrito, beef taco, chicken quesadilla, salad bowl and kebab from
Stuff'd @ Sunway Pyramid - a year ago

name: SWATCH
description:
An iconic provocative timepiece that saved the Swiss watch industry, thanks to its visionary founder Nicolas Hayek. Colorful, happy, loud, shrill and forever re[1]interpreted in different ways. Swiss Made and, thanks to industrial production and only 51 parts, available at a democratic price.
In a very short space of time Swatch has become one of the most famous brands in the world â€“ and all the while remaining true to itself. On average, a new Swatch design is created once every one-and-a-half days, keeping time as part of a monthly release or as a Special Collection.
ratings:
(1â­) I visited Swatch to replace my strap. Unfortunately, the new strap was scratched during installation. When I pointed it out, the staff explained that it was due to the difficulty of installing the strap and said they couldn't do anything about it.

I even tried polishing the screen afterward, but the scratches remain visible. (Image in reference). While I understand challenges can arise, I expected more care and a better resolution. I hope the team can improve their service for similar situations in the future. - a month ago | (4â­) Energy For Life's free battery replacement comes with a key condition that many are not aware nor it is stated in their Swatch Malaysia website. The condition is that the watch must be presented for the free battery replacement with the old battery regardless whether it leaking chemical or in any condition. Even if you have to remove the chemical leaking old battery, you must keep it for them.

I strongly suggest Swatch Malaysia amend their website to state this condition clearly and also train their staff to advise customers accordingly.

P.S. Gratitude to supervisor Ms. Yong Han and staff Shafiq of Swatch Sunway Pyramid for their assistance earlier. - 2 years ago | (5â­) Very knowledgable staff. Knows the latest trends.

I showed him my another watch of Stranger Things last year. He knows the latest news like the new watch featuring Star wars too.

Forgot to ask for his name but very friendly and knowledgeable person. - a year ago | (5â­) Firstly, I'm very glad that Swatch reopened here so I can get battery replacement easily since it's nearer to me. After that, got my first watch purchase from the Dragon Year collection at this outlet and was attended by Joe, the senior sales executive.

He was nothing but amazing in his service. Took the time to chat with me and my husband. He answered our queries very well, showing his extensive knowledge about the company and products.

What a good representation of Swatch! I will be coming back for more. Well done! Keep it up! - a year ago | (5â­) Trainee Danish was very helpful and offered excellent customer service! I am very happy with my purchase. - a year ago

name: Sacoor One
description:
Sacoor Brothers was founded in 1989 at number 127, Rua Pascoal de Melo, Lisbon. Sacoor began by selling articles for men and women, on its single selling point.
In 2015, Sacoor Brother launched Sacoor One, a new brand that promotes a more casual style as an alternative to the traditional style. It is created for a slightly younger target and presents a more casual, practical look while maintaining the expected quality and refinement of Sacoor Brothers.
ratings:
(5â­) I came to purchase a suit for formal occasions, and was pleasantly surprised by the range and quality of options. The suits here are ready-made but will be altered to fit to your specific body shape.

The highlight of my visit was the excellent customer service from Izzul. He was respectful, attentive, and also proactive in making recommendations based on his experience and taste. This is a level of professionalism that sets a new standard in Malaysia. Well done Sacoor One and Izzul! - 3 weeks ago | (1â­) Teribble shopping experience! Will not be shopping here anymore or any sacoor one outlets! Bought clothes and paid for the clothes and just went it for pinning and alteration. But the service was teribble, the female staff seemed very rude, untrained and questioned me on my purchases. I had to produce a receipt before she was able to retrieve my purchases which I had already paid for. There was no manager on duty and i couldnt lodge an official complain. I have since requested a full refund as I will not be treated as such after spending RM1.2K. I will take my money else where and shop else where. You just lost a customer of 5 years! - 3 months ago | (5â­) I recently bought a suit from Sacoor One at Sunway Pyramid, and the experience was exceptional, largely thanks to a sales associate named Izzul. He was professional, offering great advice on suit alterations and how to match clothing for any occasion.

What stood out was Izzulâ€™s patience; he made me feel comfortable and confident in my purchase. I also want to extend my gratitude to abang tailor for his professionalism. The alterations made to my new suit were impeccable, fitting me perfectly.

Beyond the excellent service, the quality of clothing from Sacoor One is top-notch, ensuring that each piece is not only stylish but durable. I highly recommend visiting Sacoor One and asking for Izzul if youâ€™re looking for quality clothing and outstanding service. If the management reads this, please consider giving Izzul and the tailor a pay raise or incentives for their exceptional customer service. ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ - 11 months ago | (1â­) Bad experience, bought 2 shirts for a wedding and couldnâ€™t use them since they screwed with the sleeves. - 6 months ago | (5â­) I just bought two suits from here and shoutout to Izzul for the great customer service and shopping experience!! Thank you so much for spending so much time with me and giving me great advice in picking the right suits for me. - 8 months ago

name: Sakae Sushi
description:
Welcome to Sakae Sushi â€“ Fresh & Innovative, thatâ€™s the Sakae way!
Step into the world of Japanese flavors as Sakae Sushi promises an exquisite dining experience that celebrates the art and essence of Japan's culinary heritage. Immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of tastes, textures, and traditions that define our diverse menu.
Embark on a delightful journey through our menu that showcases an array of sushi, sashimi, tempura, bento, and much more. Each dish is meticulously prepared with the utmost care, using only the freshest ingredients to ensure a symphony of flavors on your palate.
Our skilled chefs masterfully craft sushi with finesse and creativity, delivering hand-rolled delicacies that reflect the epitome of Japanese gastronomy.
Taste the ocean's bounty in its purest form with our premium sashimi, served with an artisan's touch for an unparalleled sashimi sensation.
Savor the delightfully crisp and succulent tempura, capturing the essence of Japanese culinary craftsmanship in every bite.
Experience the harmonious blend of flavors in our thoughtfully curated bento boxes, presenting a balanced and satisfying meal that reflects Japan's cherished lunch tradition.
Elevating your dining experience, our tablet ordering system allows you to effortlessly customize your meal and conveniently manage your selections.
Relish your dining journey amidst the inviting ambiance of our newly revamped outlet, creating the perfect backdrop for intimate gatherings and joyous celebrations.
At Sakae Sushi, we take pride in upholding the essence of Japanese culinary heritage and providing our patrons with an unmatched dining experience. Join us at Sunway Pyramid and allow your taste buds to explore the timeless flavors of Japan.
ratings:
(1â­) Waaaah, happy to see Sakae sushi offering other types of meals than sushi. It shock me to see the food come out this way. Big brand, but presentation and food quality is totally out. Ordered the Sundubu Jjigae RM26 (soup is cook with chilli flakes. Too much, it tends to be bitter), taste like f*&^%.....oooops mind my language, tofu smashed, eggs gone, my jjigae become a pile of vomits (check out my photo & Sakae photo). Kimchi fried rice RM22 (portion was unbelievable small) & finally Kyushu Paitan Ramen Rm20 (Soup terribly oily, noddles overcook, taste wise ğŸ¤¢ğŸ¤¢ğŸ¤¢ğŸ¤¢ğŸ¤¢) . Well, bye-bye & tata to this restaurant. Horrible meal. I seldom give 1 star unless it's really terrible. - 2 months ago | (2â­) Had the worst shoyu ramen today. Soggy noodles, tasteless broth. It's a large portion of noodles, which is usually a good thing for me but with this one it felt like it took forever to finish it because it just wasn't good. Added probably 2 tbsp of their table soy sauce into the soup. It's possible the dish was left too long before it was served, because there was very little soup - maybe all soaked up by the noodles ğŸ™ˆ  Even my husband, who likes his noodles soft, didn't enjoy this.

The kimchi lava fried rice was also mediocre - the rice was mushy (my husband liked it that way tho), not enough flavour so this also had to be eaten with their soy sauce. The "lava" is just a runny egg omelette - you need to top up cheese to get the cheesey effect shown in the photos. At least we got a 20% discount for this dish though.

Service was decent, place is clean and tidy. But never coming back here. Super regret that we decided to try this (enticed by the photos!) instead of going to our regular noodle place 2 doors down. - 2 months ago | (4â­) Less crowd this section of place. Food could be better, but with the quietness of the area, we like to eat it here. - 5 months ago | (4â­) An outlet in the famous Sunway Pyramid Mall. Quality is ok. Design is ok. Staffs look very young. Overall is ok. Most importantly, it looks clean and well maintained. Hygiene is one of if not the most important thing. This is located in a corner area near G2000, which is a little hidden and not so easy to find. - a year ago | (2â­) Rather expensive for a sushi restaurant so I thought maybe then it would be good. Albeit the food was okay, the environment wasn't very clean. It looks clean from the outside but small cockroaches are walking around on the table. It really put off the mood to eat. Regretful that I didn't check the reviews before coming here because it seems like it's been a problem for a while. Took a picture despite being grossed out by it.. ğŸ¤¢

Overall, my first time experience here was not great. Staff was good, food was okay, cockroaches... ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ Probably won't come back until they fix the ğŸª³ problem. - 3 years ago

name: Samsonite (Pop Up)
description: Founded in 1910, Samsonite is the worldâ€™s leading luggage brand with an extensive legacy in trendsetting travel solutions. Renowned for breakthrough research, development and its commitment to innovation, Samsonite has since its inception excelled in a number of industry firsts, including the exclusive use of the revolutionary Curv material in luggage arena. Samsonite offers an extensive range of travel, business, kids, casual and personal accessory products to help travellers journey further, with ever lighter and stronger products.
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Samsung Service Centre
description: Samsung Phone services
ratings:
(1â­) I am writing to formally lodge a complaint regarding the poor service I experienced at your authorized service centre in Sunway Pyramid. The lack of communication, persistent stock shortages, and difficulty in reaching the service centre have caused significant inconvenience. Below is a timeline of the incident and my key concerns.

Timeline of the Incident:
16 February 2025 â€“ I contacted the Sunway Pyramid service centre to schedule a screen replacement for my Samsung S23 Ultra. I was informed that the screen was out of stock but would be restocked on 18 February 2025. Following this, I requested to book an appointment for 22 February 2025, and the service centre advised me to send my details via WhatsApp. I did so, and they acknowledged my request with a "noted" response. Based on this, I assumed my appointment was confirmed.

22 February 2025 â€“ I called the service centre to reschedule my appointment to 23 February 2025. It was only then that I was informed that the screen was still out of stock.

Complaint Points:
Poor Communication â€“ If I had not called on 22 February, I would have traveled to the service centre on 23 February only to find out the screen was still unavailable. Why wasnâ€™t I informed in advance that the stock had not arrived? As a service provider, the service centre should proactively notify customers if their scheduled repairs cannot proceed due to stock unavailability.

Frequent Stock Shortages â€“ Why does the service centre frequently face stock shortages for essential replacement parts? Does this mean customers will always have to wait indefinitely to get their devices repaired? Being unable to use my phone for an extended period has caused unnecessary inconvenience, and potential financial losses.

Extremely Difficult to Contact â€“ I found it extremely difficult to reach the service centre. As an authorized service provider for a global brand like Samsung, the service centre should have a more accessible and responsive customer support system.

The poor service I experienced has been frustrating and unacceptable. As a loyal Samsung customer, I expect better service quality and a more reliable repair process - in the last week | (2â­) Left my fold 4 with the center on Saturday, received a call to collect in on Thursday. They claim to replace the screen but I can see that it is still the same screen (there is a slight mark on the screen. It is still there, meaning it's the same screen). They fix the issue with the phone turning off when using the inner screen. However, the center returned my phone with scratches and screen bubbling. They do not handle your phone with care. I suggest take lots of photo and video as evidence before you hand over to them. - 6 months ago | (5â­) came in with a flip 3 samsung that half of the screen was damage, i want to tranfers my data from that phone but couldnt since the screen cant be use. the obvious solution was to replace the flip 3 screen that cost rm1k but i dont want to do that since it was an old phone and already have a new one. however, there was this nice uncle samsung worker who go out of his way to help me, even took out a usb mouse to help me tranfer the data. couldnt be more grateful for the uncle - 2 weeks ago | (1â­) Brought my s20 to repair for cracked screen but after repair my screen have issues with tapping which it move around itself. Visiting 2nd time within a week and informed that my phone when sent it to them it is already have this issue which supposed I am sure supposed not to be. As luckily I have video record as proof my phone condition before left my phone to them.

The problem didn't been solved and I don't wish to send my phone there again. Now it become my backup phone and I bought another new phone because of their poor workmanship.

Please be reminded they may told you estimated 4 to 5 working days but you still need to chase them for a follow-up and at last can be taken even more than 1 week time to collect your item. Worst thing is your phone's problem didn't get solved after long waiting time.

I am a Samsung users for more than 10 years but tbh if your phone have problems, it is better you find phone repair specialist rather than their authorized service center. Why? because my new phone's screen cracked again and i decided to bring my to phone repair specialist. Price is similar to them but service lagi tip-top. - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) Am really happy with the attentiveness and the problem solving measures done by the customer service personal. He explained well and was very friendly. Keep up the good work!! - a week ago

name: Sanctury
ratings:

The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Secret Recipe
description:
Founded in 1997, made its mark, renowned for its extensive range of fine quality gourmet cakes. It has since evolved to become one of the fastest growing lifestyle cakes and cafÃ© chain in the region with over 380 cafÃ© outlets to date. Secret Recipe Cakes & CafÃ©â€™s concept can be found in prime urban locations and shopping malls in major cities in the region including Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand, Brunei, Maldives and Bangladesh.
Secret Recipe Cakes & CafÃ© offers a friendly and personalised full-service dining experience for customers and incorporates a modern contemporary and vibrant interior concept with comfort ambience, and great food. It provides a great respite for customers to enjoy good food and quality time with friends, family or associates, after a long day at work.
ratings:
(5â­) "Secret Recipe" at Sunway Pyramid is a well-loved establishment that consistently receives positive feedback from its customers. The vibrant atmosphere, coupled with its diverse menu, ensures that patrons keep coming back for more. The restaurant offers a wide array of dishes ranging from Western classics to local Malaysian favorites, catering to different tastes and preferences. Their cakes, which are a signature of the brand, are especially popular, with flavors like chocolate indulgence and cheesecake often earning rave reviews.

Many visitors appreciate the consistent quality of the food, as itâ€™s always freshly prepared and served with care. The portions are generous, making it a satisfying dining experience for both individuals and groups. The attentive staff are another highlight, with many customers mentioning how friendly and professional they are, adding to the overall pleasant dining atmosphere.

For those who value convenience, Secret Recipe at Sunway Pyramid is conveniently located within the bustling mall, making it an ideal spot for a break from shopping or after a movie. The ambiance is perfect for casual outings, family gatherings, or even business meetings, offering a relaxed yet stylish setting.

Whether itâ€™s the delicious food, the great customer service, or the convenient location, Secret Recipe continues to receive glowing feedback from its patrons, earning it a solid reputation as one of the top dining options in Sunway Pyramid. - a month ago | (5â­) I love going to secret recipe...fairly easy to order through the QR for dine in and claim the voucher and points at the payment counter after eating...I love all their cake slices...they also have promotions for the heavy meals, pastry and cake at specific times. I definitely recommend coming here...price wise is standard. - a month ago | (5â­) I love their customer service so much. When I enter the shop, they greet me with big smile on their face and assist me to my table. I love the staff especially all the waiter that serve me and I remembered few staffâ€™s name that serving me that time, if Im not mistaken their name is Asyiqin and Sarah.. both is so friendly and helpfull. They always smiling while serving their customers . The food was amazing too. Very delicious and tasty. My favorite is their Mee Kari and manggo lassi. So sedap and sangat banyak! â™¥ï¸ - 5 months ago | (5â­) I had an amazing experience at Secret Recipe today! The staff were friendly, courteous, and incredibly attentive. I was pleasantly surprised by the complimentary fish crackers, and they were more than happy to switch my spaghetti to chicken since I canâ€™t eat beef. One of the staff even brought me extra serviettes without me asking, as she noticed mine were already filthy â€” such a thoughtful touch! Their exceptional service truly made my day. Highly recommend! - 6 months ago | (5â­) Food here was awesome, Service was also great. Waiters were friendly and food also came quick.

name: Seen
description:
Seen (also known as Proeyes Studio) is a high-end optical retailer for the upscale market that offers customer not only the most exceptional and fashionable eyewear collection but also with outstanding customer service and distinctive image.
Shop for the latest eyewear looks and hop on the hottest trends with Seen's quality collections, made and handles with Seen (also known as Proeyes Studio) is a high-end optical retailer for the upscale market that offers customer not only the most exceptional and fashionable eyewear collection but also with outstanding customer service and distinctive image.
Shop for the latest eyewear looks and hop on the hottest trends with Seen's quality collections, made and handles with care. Experience personalised fittings by Seen experts, and see the world in a whole new light! Besides glasses, choose from a variety of contact lens brands including Acuvue, Alcon, Bausch + Lomb, Blincon, Clearlab, Cooper Vision and Freshkon. Feel free, uninhabited and at ease with these comfortable lenses and contact lens care!
For frames, accentuate your best features with your choice of square frames, round frames, aviator frames, oval frames and more, all available in various materials like titanium, metal, plastic and more. Consider various lens material in terms of clarity, weight, scratch and shatter resistance and lens colours based on how and when you use your glasses. Prescription sunglasses or polarized eyewear that removes UV and eliminates glare are great to protect the eyes of those who drive for long hours in the sun! For those who spend long hours in front of the computer, consider blue light glasses to shield your eyes from prolonged screen exposure.
ratings:
(5â­) I am very impressed with the customer service at this shop.  I was immediately greeted when I stepped into the shop early in the morning.  The guy happily smiling with his warm greeting made my experience in the shop very pleasant.  I asked for his name - Aizad.  He gives honest advise , professional and friendly. Staff are knowledgeable and spent time ensuring it was the right fit. I recommend it highly ğŸ«¡ - 2 months ago | (5â­) I had a fantastic experience at Seen Sunway Pyramid! If youâ€™re planning to shop here, I highly recommend looking for Ms. Lee Jin. Her professionalism, dedication, and attention to detail made the entire process enjoyable and stress-free.

Thank you, Seen Sunway Pyramid, and an even bigger thank you to Ms. Lee Jin for the outstanding service! - 2 months ago | (4â­) Recently, I had some issues with my glasses, and the gentlemen here was very kind to fix the issue for free. Recommended to come again! - 4 months ago | (5â­) Haven't been here for years. But I came over with some Muslim friends and got the superior package. The tiger prawns and salmon was awesome. name: Sephora
description: Sephora operates over 2,600 stores in 34 countries worldwide, with an expanding base of over 460 stores across the Americas. Sephora opened its first U.S. store in New Yorkâ€™s Soho neighborhood in 1998, its first Canadian store in Toronto in 2004, first Mexico store in Mexico City in 2011, and first Brazil store in SÃ£o Paolo in 2012. The Sephora Americas headquarters are located in San Francisco, with corporate offices in New York, Mexico City, Montreal, Toronto and SÃ£o Paolo.Sephora features a variety of beauty products from more than 300 brands, including NARS Cosmetics, Make Up For Ever, Too Faced Cosmetics, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Urban Decay, Benefit Cosmetics, Amazing Cosmetics, First Aid Beauty, LancÃ´me Cosmetics, Sunday Riley Skincare, philosophy, Jo Malone London, Atelier Cologne, YSL Beauty by Yves Saint Laurent, Tatcha,Huda Beauty, Kat Von D, and Bobbi Brown Cosmetics. Sephora also features its own make-up, skincare, beauty tools and accessories. Packaging for the line features the company's elongated flame logo in standard black print.Sephora has grown quite a bit over the last three decades. The company has forged ahead into several countries, making a name and a brand for itself. The cosmetics industry continues to grow, and it's very likely that Sephora will expand and grow right along with it.
ratings:
(4â­) The sales girl assist well, she introduce according to your needs, but some ready stock might sold, please double check the stock first when you eye on certain product to avoid disappointment.
She also assist me to get the sold out item in Sephora apps and I receive the product in 1-2 days time after payment done. Itâ€™s free shipping, if you still considering whether to get the product or not, ask them check the stock in apps too, so that you can consider a few more days.
Shop smart! - 2 months ago | (1â­) I recently visited Sephora to inquire about a tinted moisturizer, and while the consultant initially seemed helpful, things took a sharp turn when I decided not to make a purchase. Her attitude shifted noticeably, and she walked off without so much as a polite closing remark. I understand that not every consultation leads to a sale, but being professional and courteous shouldnâ€™t depend on the customerâ€™s buying decision.

It was disappointing to feel dismissed for simply taking time to consider my options. Sephora is known for creating a welcoming shopping environment, but this experience fell short. I hope this feedback can serve as a reminder to maintain consistency in customer service, regardless of the outcome. - 3 months ago | (5â­) Had a wonderful experience with Alice from Sephora Sunway Pyramid today.
Thank you Alice for being so helpful and kind in helping me with my exchange today, and also for going out of your way to ensure I would be able to get what I needed! Your attitude is exactly what many other Sephora sales associates should strive to emulate. - a month ago | (5â­) We had a couple of great experiences shopping at Sephora in Sunway Pyramid.

Just for your information, the beauty consultant Ms Alya Wong is very well versed in beauty products. On top of that, she is also very approachable and listens to the needs of her clients.

All in all, we are very satisfied with her professionalism and the assistance she had rendered us while shopping at Sephora (Sunway Pyramid).

Thank You, Ms Alya Wong... - 2 months ago | (5â­) They have stock for most of the items. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Tourists get 5% off when they show their passport ( hard or soft copy). - 7 months ago
