ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Shake Shack
ratings:
(4â­) Second Shake Shack outlet in KL, had the Double Shack Burger, 50-50, and the fries. Burger had sufficient crust and the meatiness came thru. I appreciate a burger thatâ€™s more about the meat and cheese and less about the sauce itâ€™s drowned in. Was better than the one in TRX.

Fries were fresh, crispy and well salted but Iâ€™m not a fan of crinkle cut. The 50-50 had a strong lemony taste with a hint of tea. Not too sweet.

Overall not too bad, though go into it like youâ€™re getting a burger at a sit down restaurant, not fast food as the prices are definitely not cheap. - a month ago | (2â­) Honestly expected a lot from a burger for this price range I mean its not five guys lol.

Taste was average or should I say no taste at all ? Loads of meat does NOT equal to good food.

Exorbitant price for the burger and it comes on its own ? Bro are you serious no sides I mean at least should mention that on the menu so that we can order the sides together.

Well tried both the normal fries and cheese fries both were below average.

Nothing in particular that stands out except the hype.

In short doesnâ€™t taste like what it looks like. - a week ago | (5â­) Located at the entrance of Sunway Pyramid. This is the second Shake Shack American burger restaurant in town (1st outlet at TRX).

The burgers here looks small in size but really packs a punch! Their signature smoky flavours makes it quite hard to stop eating as soon as you take the first bite. Go for their hot favourite  "Double Shack" burger and addictive crinkled cut fries. Hot dog is on the menu too.

Wonderful experience with each and every bite! Definitely worth returning. - a month ago | (3â­) Not the best, but certainly not the worst burger joint either. Would say that I'd rate Shake Shack a little higher if the prices wasn't so outrageous.
I ordered the Avocado strraky beef burger. Taste-wise, I do l like their burger buns, but the burger itself was lacking any smokeyness or flavor. The ice cream, was just like any other ice cream. And lastly the Malaysia-exclusive Bunga Raya Shake, which was way too sweet too the point that I couldn't finish it.
But other than that, service was great, and the whole place had a nice vibe to it. - 2 months ago | (2â­) I wouldnâ€™t say the best burger in town. I only love the fact the crispy beef streak was good and the burger is juicy and not greasy. The hotdog was hard and dry. I canâ€™t say I like the shake, too sweet and not thick enough. I didnâ€™t taste the malt. The fries is a big disappointment - just a normal frozen store bought crinkle cut fries and comes with the broken small bits. With that price, should be a fresh thick cut real potatoes. - a month ago

name: Shiino Pieces
description: Offering Japanese and Korean inspired outfits, Chiino Pieces is a fashion retailer you can't miss when you're in Asian Avenue at Sunway Pyramid. You totally need to get your outfit for the next big occasion here, as you'll fall in love with their to-die-for evening dresses. Youâ€™ll be spoilt for choice here with their various styles of cocktail dresses and evening gowns. From minis to maxis, you can opt for different necklines such as off-shoulders, togas, cold shoulders, halter neck, strapless and more. Their gorgeous dresses are available in varying materials like velvet, satin, chiffon, lace, and silk, and come in both neutral and vibrant colours. With so many options you can create your own style whether itâ€™s elegant, class, sexy, alluring, or sweet! No need to worry about wearing off shoulder dresses or backless dresses, they sell silicon nude bras and silicon pad inserts in normal and push-up variations that can be easily worn with your dress. An extra advantage of getting these handy accessories is that they can even be inserted into your lingerie or bikinis for that added boost. Did we mention? Chiino Pieces also offers a selection of swimwear, talk about having all your wardrobe needs covered! Pick up a cute and playful bikini here thatâ€™s ideal for your next beach vacation or pool party with your friends. The shop also brings in beautiful dresses that are slightly more festive when Chinese New Year and X-Mas is around the corner, so you can drop by when looking for a modern cheongsam for that CNY gathering here. If youâ€™re looking for something more casual and comfortable yet fashionable, you can browse through their range of t-shirts, rompers, blouses, denim skirts, corset tops, ruffle tubes and more. Not only are the clothes here a treat for your eyes and are super comfortable, but everything here is priced with an affordable price tag too.

name: Shiseido Pop-up
description:
Shiseido has defined the concept of beauty and spread its knowledge and power onto the world for 145 years.Shiseido Company, Limited is a Japanese multinational personal care company, that is a skin care, hair care, cosmetics and fragrance producer. It is one of the oldest cosmetics companies in the world. Founded in 1872, it celebrated its 140th anniversary in 2012.Shiseido has always been about doing things a little differently.Shiseido continues to thoughtfully fuse Eastern and Western philosophies and innovations together to serve as a beacon of beauty inspiration especially the Japanese sense of spiritual beauty for women all over the globe.Beauty is a shared feeling; it is diverse, and it is unifying. When we feel beautiful and confident, we canâ€™t help but feel inspired to go out into the world and make a positive difference to other peopleâ€™s lives. By inspiring empathy, beauty is the ultimate force of goodness that makes us feel truly alive.
#BeautyTreats

name: Signature Healthland
ratings:
(5â­) Definitely will be back for our thai massage here. Our masseurs were very skillful.

At first they suggested for us to take packages, but we werenâ€™t sure whether we would like the massage as many masseurs were not that good based on past experiences.

But they proved us wrong. Next trip we will take the package and visit at least once or twice a month.

We were served by two different receptionist and both were polite with us. After seeing the reviews here, we thought we would experience the same rudeness. Glad that they have improved their customer service.

Kudos! - 2 years ago | (5â­) Had a 90 minutes foot, head and shoulders massage here. It was amazing. Overall I'm happy with the service provided by the staff , from the front desk staff to the masseuse. They served cold tea before the massage, which was perfect on a hot sunny day. The massage took place in a cinema-like room and they would play a movie during the whole process. After the massage, the masseuse served us hot ginger tea. The only thing that spoiled my whole experience was a group of customers who were being so loud and talking on the phone. Good thing they arrived when my massage was about to end. I hope Healthland can impose a rule for customers to be quiet and phones should be on vibrate/silent mode. - 5 years ago | (5â­) Finally enjoyed a nice 2 hours Aroma Oil treatment massage and it was legendarily great. Very professional masseuse and the whole place was beautiful, quiet and relaxing. Most probably advisable to go there in the early hours of their time to avoid the rush hour. All in all, I will definitely come back again and again... Your body feels extremely relax and calmer after the massage here.. - 2 years ago | (5â­) For the promotion price of RM130 for two hours worth of message (foot + traditional Thai) this is a steal!  The atmosphere and facilities was top notch you could even say the best. Guess thatâ€™s why this is â€˜signatureâ€™. Thumbs up to their service and masseuse too! - 7 years ago | (5â­) Had a very great 2 hours massage from the Therapist no 1112.  I had back pain for a while. And she managed to relief it. Will definitely come back . They have different types of massages. I choose the Aromatherapy. - a year ago

name: Skechers
description:
A renowned leader in the performance and lifestyle footwear industry, Skechers designs, develops and markets more than 3,000 styles for men, women and children. Skechers' success stems from its employees, high-quality, varied product offering, diversified domestic and international distribution channels, and targeted multi-channel marketing.
Skechers offers two distinct footwear categories: a lifestyle division and performance footwear. Through licensing agreements, the company also offers branded apparel, accessories, eyewear, bags, socks, caps, hats and more.
Celebrity product endorsees for Skechers' lifestyle collections include multi-platinum recording artist Camila Cabello and athletic legends like David Ortiz, Tony Romo, Sugar Ray Leonard and Howie Long. The Skechers Performance Division's roster of elite athletes features marathon champion and Boston Marathon winner Meb Keflezighi, elite runner Ed Cheserek, and pro golfers Matt Kuchar, Brooke Henderson, Russell Knox, Wesley Bryan, Billy Andrade and Colin Montgomerie.
Skechers sells its footwear in department, specialty and independent stores. From sports, casual, walk, wide-fit, work shoes to relaxed fit, arch fit, stretch fit and all sorts of kidsâ€™ shoes, Skechers offers loads of options for all occasions. Slip on a pair for a leisurely stroll, a game of golf, a workout, training in the gym or a weekend out with family.

name: Smiggle
description:
"Where a smile meets a giggle!"
Smiggle was founded in 2003, aiming to be the ultimate creators of colourful, fun, fashion-forward stationery. From humble beginnings where the first Smiggle store opened in Melbourne, Australia, word spread fast about the bright pens, notebooks and gadgets that filled a tiny, but very special place.
The colorful concept took off and Smiggle soon hit 20 stores nationwide, where it caught the eye of Just Group - Australia's most exciting fashion & apparel retailer. Smiggle joined the Just Group in August 2007 and has not looked back since!
In 2008, Smiggle jumped overseas and opened its first international store in New Zealand. By 2011 Smiggle has expanded into Singapore, and in 2014 Smiggle opened its doors in the United Kingdom. In 2016 Smiggle said hello to Malaysia, Hong Kong & Ireland! It's all part of the grand plan to be the world's most exciting and famous stationery brand.
Smiggleâ€™s product range is exclusively designed in Melbourne, Australia, and the range is now bigger and better than ever, with the team at the Smiggle Design Lab drawing inspiration from all over the globe! Look out for special designs all throughout the year, with seasonal goodies and festive surprises! Our ultimate goal is to inspire and develop the creative spirits of our customers, by delivering original, fun and affordable stationery.
Smiggle products are all about great design and innovation, bold colors, quirky graphics, great value and most of all - giving our fans the tools they need to have fun!
So come on in, experiment, explore, poke, prod and play, because a visit to our stores is just like a hug from your best friend. Where a smile meets a giggle, it's the world's greatest place.

name: Snowflake
description:
Snowflake is the perfect place to indulge in shaved ice desserts inspired by traditional Taiwanese treats. Whether you're craving something refreshingly fruity or delectably creamy, we offer a wide selection of options for you to enjoy.
We also have our seasonal specials for those adventurous or curious ones or stick with our crowd favorites like mango or our signature grass jelly.
ratings:
(5â­) Snowflake has been a favorite of mine for years, and their black sesame supreme is the highlight of my visits. The shaved ice is incredibly smooth and finely shaved, creating a melt-in-your-mouth experience with every spoonful. What sets it apart is the generous and rich black sesame flavor that infuses each bite. The black sesame balls served alongside are soft and chewy that complements the ice perfectly. Whether indulging in it as a sweet treat after a meal or simply enjoying it as a refreshing snack, itâ€™s often the perfect dessert to cool down and satisfy my cravings whenever I'm at Sunway Pyramid or Pavilion! - 3 weeks ago | (4â­) There aren't many Snowflake branches around anymore, so it's good to see this one doing well. For after-dinner desserts, Snowflake is a great option. I particularly like the Mango Delight and the Soya series here. There are also hot and ice desserts, whichever you're in the mood for. The branch isn't really big, but it's cosy enough to have a sit down and have a nice chat. Recommended.

Update: They recently went through a renovation, and it looks a lot better. There's also more seating because of it now. So there's more reason to visit. - 2 months ago | (4â­) Great dessert or any time snack.  Prices are a little high but the stuff is tasty.  Staff are friendly and quick with your order.  They have hot and cold items all which are made to order.  You can order from Grab as well.  Free Mall WiFi.  Seating area is clean but the chairs are too hard. - a year ago | (4â­) Iâ€™m in KL for the weekend.. Went to Sunway Pyramid for window shopping. Had the delicious desserts at Snowflake.. Not too sweet, one of my favour. - a month ago | (5â­) The matcha one tasted great. Taro balls were fresh and chewy. Grass jelly and all other toppings were good.
One downside was the temperature of the restaurant. It was hot in the area where the shop located and think it was due to construction work nearby. - 7 months ago

name: Sox World
description:
SOXWORLD is a Malaysia born brand dated back in the 80's. Starting with only socks, we are now the leading retailer of socks, hosiery, undergarments, winter accessories, sleepwear, and caps.
SOXWORLD is a brand for everyone! Starting from newborn till senior, we have something for you in each stage. Allow us to walk beside you along this fabulous journey.
From various lengths of socks â€“ invisible, calf, low cut, sleeve, sports and even toe socks, SOXWORLD has got you covered! Choose from comfortable socks available in both men, women and kids ranges, in colours like neon colours, solid colours, nude, white, black, grey, yellow, blue and more. Besides socks, shop for caps in various designs such as prints, colours, characters and more.
Be it a casual, formal, school or sports, thereâ€™s socks fit for all occasions to keep you warm, comfortable and protected!

ratings:
(5â­) They delivers exceptional service and unbeatable rates, far better than the other branches. Itâ€™s a weird why more customers donâ€™t know about this fantastic shop. Donâ€™t miss out this is the place to go! - 3 weeks ago | (1â­) Good rate but bad attitude.

I went to the G floor branch (next to Parkson).

The first time I went to counter 1 to change A currency, I said I wanted to split two receipts, he said he couldnâ€™t split the transaction and asked me to queue up again.

OK, Second time I went to counter 1 again (only 1 counter is open) and changed A currency.

Seeing that there was no one in line behind me, I said I wanted to change B currency, he said no, he could only change money from one country per person at a time, which means I had to wait until someone came to queue up to change money before I could change money for the third time?

name: Spenco
description:
Finally Spenco is available at Sunway Pyramid. Spenco is a medical healthy footwear from Texas, USA since year 1967. It has received the Prestigious Seal of Acceptance Award from the American Podiatric Medical Association. Its special features on footbed is rarely seen in others footwear in the market. It is based on the design of highly successful insoles and incorporates with Cushioned Heel, Deep Heel Cupping, Orthotic Arch Support, Metatarsal Dome, Lateral Arch Support, Forefoot Lifting, Non-Slip, Impact Absorbing, Lightweight, Ultra-Fresh Antimicrobial, Water Proof Material.
Combination of these features with TOTAL SUPPORT Technology, Spenco created â€œThe Shape That Feels Greatâ€ which is suitable for everyone and able to ease the symptoms of most common foot ailments such as Flat Foot, Supination, Pronation, Plantar Fasciitis, Metatarsalgia, Shin Splints, Achilles Tendonitis, Knee, Heel, Ankle, Arch and Lower Back Pain & etc.
Spenco offers both Total Support Footwear and Insoles. Quality products and customer service are what Spenco focusing on. We are 100% committed to exceeding your expectations in products and service as you find solutions for your health and foot care needs.
Generally speaking, we hope you feel fortunate to be part of our Spenco Family. We strive to honour the diverse needs of all in our daily actions and we look forward to expanding our relationship with you at Sunway Pyramid.

description:
Retailing in coffee and cake.
Business Hour: 10 am - 10pm
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Stellar
description:
Stellar is Number one Ear Piercing in Singapore, is now in Sunway Pyramid!
Ear piercing is an important milestone for all young girls and we want to be the one to witness and celebrate this milestone. Every piercing done with us with be given a â€˜Piercing Certificateâ€™ to commemorate this special occasion.
Through our vast retail experience in jewellery industry, we identify the importance of providing products that are "reliable", "safe" and "sterile".
Stellar is committed in providing a wide range of fashionable hypo-allergenic jewellery that is suitable for all skin types. Our diverse range of jewellery selection across all stores will surely suit your personal preference for all age groups.
We provide a safe and sterile piercing service that is desirable for sensitive skin. Using the most advanced technology from USA and highest quality jewellery, we create a memorable piercing milestone for both parents and their kids. Our piercing studs presents high grade material, ranging from medical grade titanium, 14 karat and 18 karat gold. With our enhanced aftercare solution, our team goes the extra mile to ensure customers understand the importance and how-to care for the newly pierced ears. Stellar provides 2 complimentary aftercare consultations service within 2 months to monitor your piercing's healing process. Aftercare is an important step to ensure that your piercing is healing well to achieve that beautiful look. Our technicians are here to help you in every step of your piercing journey from choosing of design to the healing aftercare process.
STELLAR RECORDS MORE THAN 10,000 PIERCINGS ANNUALLY! Our experienced technicians are able to provide you with the best advice on the most suitable ear piercing studs and ear piercing positions regardless of shapes and sizes of your earlobes.
Let us introduce our yearly â€˜Stellar Girlâ€™ campaign!
â€˜Piercing with confidence at Stellarâ€™
Started in 2018, to encourage children to feel more confident to pierce. Each year has a creative theme in order to make it a fun and fulfilling experience for the kids. The winner will also be the face of the brand for the entire year.
With service excellence, we create trustworthy relationship with customers and henceforth being recognised as the most preferred piercing in Singapore. We look towards continuous improvement to enhance every customer experience and satisfaction!

name: Subway
description:
In 1965, SubwayÂ® Restaurants was founded by 17 year-old high school graduate Fred DeLuca, along with family friend Dr. Peter Buck. The first restaurant opened in Bridgeport, Connecticut, USA in 1965 and was called Peteâ€™s Super Submarines. The first franchised SubwayÂ® unit opened in Wallingford, Connecticut.
Today, the SUBWAY brand is the world's largest submarine sandwich chain with more than 44,000 locations around the world. We've become the leading choice for people seeking quick, nutritious meals that the whole family can enjoy. From the beginning, Fred has had a clear vision for the future of the SUBWAY brand. As we continue to grow, we are guided by his passion for delighting customers by serving delicious, made-to-order sandwiches.

name: Sunway Lagoon
description:
With more and more attractions being added since its inception, Sunway Lagoon is a bountiful wonderland of entertainment just waiting for you to explore! Divided into several sections, highlights of the Sunway Lagoon include:
â€¢ Sunway Lagoon Extreme Park
It is the best place to get your adrenaline pumping! Feel the rush with aerial attractions like bungee jumping, flying fox, riding a Go Kart or an ATV, wall climbing and so much more!
â€¢ Sunway Lagoon Water Park
The Sunway Lagoon Water Park is a great stop to beat the Malaysian heat. From daring water spins in the African Pythons loop ride, to the Congo Challenge, Vuvuzela and Waterplexx 5D, be ready for a grand, wet day out in the sun! For those looking for a more relaxing pace, drop by the Surf Beach, which is said to be the world's largest man-made surf beach (arrive early to grab a curtained gazebo for that extra tropical feeling).
Of course proper swimming attire is required for this section of the park, changing rooms and lockers are provided.
â€¢ Sunway Lagoon Amusement Park
Do not want to get wet? You can explore the amusement park and walk on the bridge in Sunway lagoon theme park which is known as Malaysiaâ€™s longest pedestrian.
â€¢ Nickelodeon Lost Lagoon
This is Asia's first Nickelodeon themed park and includes exciting water rides and attractions. Enjoy your day in the company of memorable Nickelodeon characters from Spongebob Squarepants, Dora The Explorer and even the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as you explore around with the kids (souvenirs are aplenty too).
â€¢ Wildlife Park
Wildlife Park is a great little zoo specializing in cute, cuddly, friendly animals and a few not-so-cuddly ones like eagles, pythons and tigers. The petting enclosure is a major attraction with families, where you can enjoy hand-feeding the rabbits, tortoises, guinea pigs and petting the ponies too!
â€¢ Scream Park
Finally, there is the Scream Park, a modern take on the old house of horrors. With special effects and great actors, let your fears come alive!
ratings:
(5â­) Had a really great time with the whole family. The wife was happy to watch some of our stuff near the small wave pool while the kids and I hit the rides. It was a great time for us to go as there were not very big crowds meaning it did not take very long to get on the rides other than climbing all the steps to get up to them. Highly recommended for all the family from young kids to young adults. The big wave pool with 5m high waves every 1 minute from 4.30pm was a highlight too. Make sure you get to the front. - a month ago | (5â­) Each park was truly fun. There are a lot of activities for you to do despite age. There are many water activities. So, it's wise you wear your swimwear and roam around. There are lockers in every park as I remember and you can rent a locker to keep your belongings safe. I went on  weekend so there were too many people and had to wait in lines for a considerable amount of time. But enter the place when it opens and you can enjoy every activity. Overall really fun day! Recommended! - 2 months ago | (4â­) A family fun water park having a big wave pool, water rides and an area train to reach various fun areas of this big park. Apart from the water park, Sunway Lagoon has various other attraction parks like a small zoo, Scream room a 5 D theatre and many other attractions. You get an entrance band to go to all activities. Once you reach the park you need to go down with multiple level escalator. There are many changing areas separate for both men and women with showers and different size lookers to store your belongings and clothes. Overall it was a family fun for the whole day. - a month ago | (5â­) My wife and I recently booked the villa package for 2 days and 1 night at around RM1.6K, and we had an amazing experience! A big thank you to Sunway for allowing us to check in early at 11 AM instead of the usual 2 PM. This thoughtful gesture made our trip so much smoother, as we could head straight to the theme park without worrying about our belongings.

The villa itself was spacious, beautifully designed, and incredibly comfortableâ€”perfect for a relaxing retreat. A special shoutout to Shahmin and his team for their outstanding hospitality; they were friendly, helpful, and truly enhanced our stay. While the food was decent, it could be improved to match the overall high standards of the experience.

Overall, we would rate our stay 8.5/10 and would definitely consider returning. Thank you, Sunway, for a wonderful time! - in the last week | (1â­) Disappointing Experience â€“ Not Worth the Money

I genuinely cannot understand why this place gets 5-star ratings. The ride attendants are rude and unhelpful, and customer service is cluelessâ€”even the so-called â€œcustomer specialistsâ€ donâ€™t know how to handle guests. The park itself is old, decaying, and poorly maintained. The shacks and huts are a complete waste of time, and the wave pool only operates for 45 minutes at the very end of the day. The whole place smells bad and feels like itâ€™s falling apart.

For a family of five, we spent $700 AUDâ€”absolutely not worth it. There are so many better places in Malaysia to visit for a fraction of the cost. Even with a quick pass, there was no need to wait for rides, which only made the purchase feel like a scam. The photos online are misleading, so donâ€™t fall for the marketing.

This was our experience in January/February 2025. Save your money and your timeâ€”there are far better options out there. - a month ago

name: Sunway Lagoon Hotel
description:
â€œRelax with Perfectionâ€
Located in the heart of scenic Sunway City, the 4-star Sunway Clio Hotel is conveniently linked to the west precinct of the Sunway Pyramid Mall and is also within walking distance from the main entrance of the Sunway Lagoon theme park. Sunway Clio Hotel forms part of the cluster of hotels in Sunway City, where the 26-storey hotel feature 401 guestrooms, each including convenient touches such as complimentary Wi-Fi and wired broadband internet access, USB charger outlets, 42â€ LED Smart TV with satellite news, sports and movie channels, flexible workspaces, high pressure walk-in rain showers, ample closet space, in-room electronic safe boxes and beverage making facilities.
Beyond just hotel rooms, the Sunway Clio Hotel provides the right balance between work and play with 5 fully-equipped function rooms with a seating capacity of 20 to 160 persons and a host of other additional facilities to further enhance your time with us.
Some other key features of Sunway Clio include:
â€¢ Located just 35 minutes from Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) and 25 minutes to Kuala Lumpur city centre.
â€¢ Sunway Clio Hotel has 401 Deluxe Plus guestrooms with a vast selection of rooms with unimpeded views of Sunway Lagoon theme park or the cityâ€™s skyline (subject to availability).
â€¢ For a more luxurious experience, enjoy your stay in our Deluxe Plus Executive Rooms, which boast wider space and exemplary creature comforts.
â€¢ Additional facilities you can revel in here include an all-day dining restaurant, meeting rooms, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre.
â€¢ Over 170+ restaurants and outlets to cater to every craving imaginable, all within a stoneâ€™s throw away in Sunway Pyramid Mall and the surrounding shop lots.

Service was efficient, and the staff accommodated most of our requests immediately.  The room was clean except under the bed because we tried to put the bed together and hence found out about the pile of dirt under it. Equipped with most necessities. Including ironing board.

The pool is only open until 7 pm, which is quite early if you are out the whole day, you wouldn't get to enjoy swimming.

Breakfast has quite a wide spread. Good enough. Couldn't complain. But not much changed within a 5 day span of stay.

Excellent location. Lot of restaurants nearby, even down the hotel itself. - 6 months ago
opening_hours_list: N/A

name: Sunway Lagoon Kedai Runcit
ratings:
(5â­) Had a really great time with the whole family. The wife was happy to watch some of our stuff near the small wave pool while the kids and I hit the rides. It was a great time for us to go as there were not very big crowds meaning it did not take very long to get on the rides other than climbing all the steps to get up to them. Highly recommended for all the family from young kids to young adults. The big wave pool with 5m high waves every 1 minute from 4.30pm was a highlight too. Make sure you get to the front. - a month ago | (5â­) Each park was truly fun. There are a lot of activities for you to do despite age. There are many water activities. So, it's wise you wear your swimwear and roam around. There are lockers in every park as I remember and you can rent a locker to keep your belongings safe. I went on  weekend so there were too many people and had to wait in lines for a considerable amount of time. But enter the place when it opens and you can enjoy every activity. Overall really fun day! Recommended! - 2 months ago | (4â­) A family fun water park having a big wave pool, water rides and an area train to reach various fun areas of this big park. Apart from the water park, Sunway Lagoon has various other attraction parks like a small zoo, Scream room a 5 D theatre and many other attractions. You get an entrance band to go to all activities. Once you reach the park you need to go down with multiple level escalator. There are many changing areas separate for both men and women with showers and different size lookers to store your belongings and clothes. Overall it was a family fun for the whole day. - a month ago | (5â­) My wife and I recently booked the villa package for 2 days and 1 night at around RM1.6K, and we had an amazing experience! A big thank you to Sunway for allowing us to check in early at 11 AM instead of the usual 2 PM. This thoughtful gesture made our trip so much smoother, as we could head straight to the theme park without worrying about our belongings.

The villa itself was spacious, beautifully designed, and incredibly comfortableâ€”perfect for a relaxing retreat. A special shoutout to Shahmin and his team for their outstanding hospitality; they were friendly, helpful, and truly enhanced our stay. While the food was decent, it could be improved to match the overall high standards of the experience.

Overall, we would rate our stay 8.5/10 and would definitely consider returning. Thank you, Sunway, for a wonderful time! - in the last week | (1â­) Disappointing Experience â€“ Not Worth the Money

I genuinely cannot understand why this place gets 5-star ratings. The ride attendants are rude and unhelpful, and customer service is cluelessâ€”even the so-called â€œcustomer specialistsâ€ donâ€™t know how to handle guests. The park itself is old, decaying, and poorly maintained. The shacks and huts are a complete waste of time, and the wave pool only operates for 45 minutes at the very end of the day. The whole place smells bad and feels like itâ€™s falling apart.

For a family of five, we spent $700 AUDâ€”absolutely not worth it. There are so many better places in Malaysia to visit for a fraction of the cost. Even with a quick pass, there was no need to wait for rides, which only made the purchase feel like a scam. The photos online are misleading, so donâ€™t fall for the marketing.

This was our experience in January/February 2025. Save your money and your timeâ€”there are far better options out there. - a month ago

name: Sunway Mega Lanes
description:
Experience is Everything! Sunway Megalanes is a world-class bowling center equipped with 48 professional bowling lanes with the latest Brunswick lane and scoring system, upgrading your bowling experience to the next level! Head over to Sunway Megalanes and experience the fun bonding and chilling sessions with your family and friends with a thrilling game of bowling!
Our Megalanes Proshop offers the latest Brunswick and Storm bowling equipment with expert drilling services to satisfy your bowling needs! Don't forget to check the signature local dishes at our very own Megalanes Cafe!
Sunway Megalanes! The Future of Bowling!
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.

â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

Visit us today at Lower Ground floor to get your health in check!

name: Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre (SPCC)
description:
Offering 7,157 sqm of unobstructed function space, the Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre (SPCC) forms an integral part of the vibrant, integrated Sunway City as an event venue. Capable of accommodating large exhibitions, conferences, trade shows and even gala dinners, SPCC has been the venue of choice for many high-profiled events. With 24/7 security and well-equipped facilities such as storage areas/rooms, prayer and changing rooms as well as the flexibility in customizable options of layouts, SPCC boasts ample and varied spaces to explore new possibilities and exceeds expectations in showcasing ideas and events of all magnitudes.
Located just within the premises of the Sunway Pyramid Mall, which itself is located just 35 minutes from Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) and 25 minutes from Kuala Lumpurâ€™s city centre, SPCC is directly accessible via a network of major highways and expressways, providing ease for delegates and attendees driving in. A purpose-built flyover leads directly into the convention centreâ€™s parking facility that is built for up to 10,000 vehicles across the inter-connected parking of the Sunway City.
The convention centre also comprises eight function rooms complemented by 60 conference and event venues in the adjacent Sunway Resort Hotel & Spa, Sunway Pyramid Hotel and Sunway Clio Hotel. Being a part of Sunway Pyramid mall that is also interlinked to the hotels, delegates and event goers can enjoy the convenience of having accommodation options within walking distance as well as the various entertainment, food and beverage outlets there.
From intimate business meetings and social gatherings, to large conventions, trade shows and weddings, no matter the size, all you need is the right venue and Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre is what youâ€™ve been looking for!

name: Sunway Pyramid Hotel
description:
â€œCrafting unforgettable family memoriesâ€
As part of the cluster of hotels in Sunway City, the 4-star Sunway Pyramid Hotel is located in the heart of the scenic Sunway City. Taking cues from its name, the hotel is linked to the infamous Sunway Pyramid Mall and is also conveniently close by to the Sunway Lagoon theme parkâ€™s Surf Beach entrance.
Tired of finding rooms that are just too small, or lacking in the right set of facilities for your family? Come stay in our purpose-built Family Room or Family Suite, which has been specially designed with the comforts of a travelling family in mind. Showcasing a collection of 564 Deluxe guestrooms and the afore-mentioned Family Rooms and Suites to cater to the needs of a new generation of travellers, each guestroom reflects bold patterns and vibrant colors and complemented by enhanced in-room facilities and technology upgrades for a most memorable stay.
Some other key features of the Sunway Pyramid Hotel include:
â€¢ Located just 35 minutes from Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) and 25 minutes to Kuala Lumpur city centre.
â€¢ Sunway Pyramid Hotel features a collection of 564 Deluxe guestrooms, family room and suites; with options of rooms with unimpeded views of Sunway Lagoon theme park or the cityâ€™s skyline (subject to availability).
â€¢ Additional facilities you can revel in here include an all-day dining restaurant, meeting rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, and even access to the Balinese spa at the Sunway Resort Hotel & Spa.
â€¢ Over 170+ restaurants and outlets to cater to every craving imaginable, all within a stoneâ€™s throw away in Sunway Pyramid Mall and the surrounding shop lots.
â€¢ With over 10,000 parking bays within the entirety of Sunway City, the ample parking spaces welcomes all visitors, and parking is complimentary for all in-house guests.
Be it an exciting chain of adventures with your kids, or a relaxing vacation with your loved ones, let your family experience the best of times with the best of stays with us.

name: Sunway Pyramid Ice
description:
Sunway Pyramid Ice is a popular recreational destination in Malaysia which attracts approximately 15,000 skaters each month. Being the first world class ice sports entertainment in Malaysia where you can enjoy a day of ice-skating to escape the heat of Kuala Lumpur, Sunway Pyramid Ice has played host to numerous international sports competitions and musicals since 1997. With a rink size spanning 39m x 22.5m, shoppers can have a breathtaking view of this ice-skating rink's sleek-modern design from above thanks to glass panels surrounding each level. On and off, you can catch a sight of experienced skaters practising their routines and perfecting their stunts, as Sunway Pyramid Ice is part of ISIAsia (Ice Skating Institute Asia), which trains professional figure-skaters in Malaysia.
Spend only a total of RM20 on weekdays, RM25 on weekends and RM28 during school and public holidays to enjoy the ice-skating rink as much as you like. Although it is a prerequisite to wear gloves and socks when ice-skating, these items are readily available at the ticketing counter for RM6 and RM9 respectively.
It is the birth place where many local skating talents are born and trained by Sunway Pyramid Ice very own coaches through its Skating Academy. Beginners without skating knowledge may opt to take up 30 minute lessons with rates starting at RM70 on weekdays and RM75 on weekends. As you get better in your ice-skating skills, advance lessons may then be an option. This could be a good opportunity for children and young teens to pick up a new skill during school holidays with packages and interesting discounts for classes. Due to its close proximity to Petaling Jayaâ€™s many five-star hotels, universities and colleges, as well as the Sunway Lagoon Theme Park, Sunway Pyramid Ice can get very crowded during the weekends, so it is highly recommended for customers to arrive early to avoid the long queue.
ratings:
(1â­) You ride in a huge puddle, if you don't skate very well, take a change of clothes with you.

According to their rules, you must ride in gloves, gloves can be bought at the entrance for 9rm (their cost price is not more than 2rm) - I think everyone understands why it is necessary to ride in gloves.

I rented PREMIUM skates - they gave out ancient, worn boots with torn clips and laces ğŸ˜…

And most importantly, the skates are absolutely not stoned, it's impossible to skate.

The lockers are free, it's good, but I literally had to bend the lock and lock the door to close my drawer.

The toilet is free (thank you), but it doesn't smell very good.

In general, a dubious pleasure for Overprice - 2 weeks ago | (1â­) "WE WERE GLIDING ON WATER, NOT SKATING ON ICE" âŒâŒâŒâŒ

HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE THIS TUMEâ›”â›”â›”

We booked Season 3, it was already wet and watery
Within a few minutes, it became sooo watery and slippery you cannot skate anymore

PLUS

So many people were skating and falling which made it impossible to enjoy it this time. - 3 months ago | (5â­) Recommended place for ice skating. RM35/per head on school holidays, buy online RM30 only. - 5 months ago | (3â­) Overall we had a good time however, there are room for improvements. The floor is wet and just worsen over time. So if you fall, expect to get soaked in cold waters. The surface isn't as smooth as other place I've visited.

They provide free locker rental. - 4 weeks ago | (5â­) Malaysia's 1st proper ice skating rink that is world-class standard and always has people skating. On weekends, the rink can be crowded. I am happy to know that this hobby is available in a tropical country. - a year ago

name: Sunway Resort Hotel
description:
SUNWAY RESORT HOTEL KUALA LUMPURâ€™S MOST ICONIC HOTEL
Step into a spectacular world of business, leisure and culinary wonders at Sunway Resort Hotel. This luxury 5-star hotel is located in the heart of Sunway City Kuala Lumpur, Malaysiaâ€™s premier entertainment and hospitality destination.
Sunway Resort Hotel presents 477 smart, environmentally-friendly and intuitively designed rooms and suites fitted with state-of-the-art technology, including speciality suites that are perfectly tailored for different types of guests; from business travellers and families to wellness and luxury seekers. Discover exclusive lounges and family zones like the Aquaventure Playland and Wonderland Kids Club, and have an extraordinary dining experience, from world-class cuisine at Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill to the vibrant market-style buffet at The Resort CafÃ© and laid-back poolside dining at Fuzion. Being inter-connected to the Sunway Pyramid shopping mall and Sunway Lagoon theme park, guests will be able to hop from elegant boutiques to exhilarating rides within minutes.
Asiaâ€™s most outstanding events are also created in Sunway City. With our comprehensive meeting and events facilities featuring world-class spaces and the latest state-of-the-art technology, you'll be able to organise an event or a gathering to your exact requirements. From international conferences and exhibitions at the convention centre, brainstorming sessions and meetings in the fully-equipped meeting rooms, intensive team teambuilding at Sunway Lagoon, to spectacular wedding celebrations in the Grand Ballroom and exclusive corporate dinners at the Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill, we've got what it takes to create exceptional experiences for you and your guests.
The options are simply endless at Sunway Resort Hotel!
Some of the key highlighted features of Sunway Resort Hotel:
â€¢ 477 specially designed room and suites fitted with state-of-the-art technology, perfectly tailored for different types of guests, including speciality suites.
â€¢ Family Zones such as Aquaventure Playland, Wonderland Kids Club, The Leisure Club and dedicated kids buffet corner during breakfast.
â€¢ Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill in Sunway Resort, the multi-Michelin starred chef and TV starâ€™s first flagship restaurant in Malaysia.
For more information, visit https://www.sunwayhotels.com/sunway-resort/

name: Supamala Hotpot
description: SUPAMALA hotpot - Hot Pot for Everyone. Mala has found fans among Malaysians, especially those who love a strong sensation to their foods. At SUPAMALA, we aim to serve customers of every kind with our distinctively unique pork-free hotpot cuisine. Now, everyone can dine worry-free at SUPAMALA with friends and families.
ratings:
(5â­) I had lunch here with my friends, and it was a wonderful experience! We didnâ€™t make a reservation, but luckily, they had a table available. We were attended by Ms. Hana, who was incredibly helpful and attentive throughout our meal. We requested the staff to sing the birthday song for our birthday celebration, and Ms. Hana kindly fulfilled our request even though it usually requires a booking.

The restaurant offers a wide variety of meat choices and set menus with varying prices. The meat slices were thick and satisfying, and itâ€™s free flow, which is fantastic! I highly recommend trying their mango + red bean bingsuâ€”itâ€™s absolutely delicious.

Overall, the food was great, but what stood out the most was their top-notch customer service. Weâ€™ll definitely be coming back! - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) Iâ€™d love to share my first dining experience at Supamala Hotpot in Sunway Pyramid. We received outstanding service from Ms. Hanna, who explained the menu to us in detail. The highlight of our visit was Ms. Hannaâ€™s thoughtful effort in organizing a birthday celebration, making the experience even more memorable ğŸ¥° .This was my best lunch experience here ğŸ©· Highly recommended and I will definitely be back! Thanks a lot Ms Hanna ğŸ«°ğŸ» - 2 weeks ago | (5â­) This hotpot buffet restaurant offers unlimited beef, lamb, and seafood ingredientsâ€”a paradise for meat lovers!â€¨â€¨âœ¨ Ramadan Special Lunch Deal (11AM - 4PM)â€¨âœ… 90-minute dining timeâ€¨âœ… ğŸ†“ Free buffet set upgrade! Order the Basic Set and get upgraded to the Meaty Set, or the Meaty Set to the All-In-One Set! No extra cost, just more enjoyment!â€¨â€¨We tried four soup bases:â€¨ğŸ”¥ Sichuan Spicy Butter Soup â€” authentic and fiery!â€¨ğŸ² Japanese Sukiyaki Soup â€” sweet and savory, perfect for meatâ€¨ğŸ” Collagen Chicken Soup â€” mild and smoothâ€¨ğŸ„ Wild Mushroom Soup â€” great for those who prefer a lighter flavorâ€¨â€¨The main meat options include:â€¨ğŸ¥© Lamb shoulder, lamb leg, beef slices, and brisketâ€”all premium cuts!â€¨Paired with a variety of veggies like potatoes, lotus root, spinach, broccoli, and soup-absorbing crispy rolls. Noodle lovers can enjoy Supamala noodles too!â€¨â€¨Unlimited refills of Teh O Ais (iced tea) to keep you refreshed throughout the meal!â€¨â€¨Overall rating:â€¨ğŸ½ï¸ Food: ğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸâ€¨ğŸ‘¥ Service: ğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸâ€¨ğŸƒ Ambiance: ğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸ - a week ago | (5â­) I recently had an early dinner with my family at Supamala Hotpot, and it was a great experience! The service was excellentâ€”friendly staff and quick with bringing everything we needed, which made the meal smooth and enjoyable. The hotpot buffet was a hit with everyone; it was fun, tasty, and had plenty of options to keep both adults and kids happy. The restaurant was spotless, and the view of Sunway Lagoon from our table added a nice touch to the atmosphere. Perfect for families, including young kids, though I think they could improve by adding a better variety of Malay kuih muih to the dessert selection. Definitely worth a visit! - 4 months ago | (5â­) This is our fifth visit to Supamala Hotpot and once again, the food has exceeded our expectations. The quality and taste have remained consistently impressive, it is a go to spot for hotpot lovers.

Our favorites soup is the Wild Mushroom and Chicken Collagen Soup. It's rich, flavorful, and perfect for a comforting meal. The combination of the earthy mushrooms and the creamy, nourishing collagen broth is a standout.

The service is another reason we keep coming back. The staff is always friendly, attentive and ready to assist, ensuring a smooth dining experience.

Weâ€™ve enjoyed both their buffet and a la carte offerings and both have been great choices. .

Overall, Supamala Hotpot continues to be a place that guarantees a satisfying meal every time.

The pictures are from our first visit here. - 3 months ago

name: Superdry
description:
At Superdry, our clear brand positioning is centered on creating amazing clothes, through an obsession with design, quality and fit and is underpinned by relentless innovation and commitment to operational excellence in everything we do.
Our customers are loyal and global and are defined by attitude, not age. Core to the brand DNA is the combination of market-leading quality and design detail delivered at astonishing value for money. Superdry has democratic appeal, offering affordable, premium-quality clothing, accessories and footwear complemented by newer lifestyle categories such as Sport and Snow.
Our mission: build a creative and product led brand to inspire and engage the contemporary style obsessed consumer - always. Don Superdryâ€™s jackets to stay warm in air-conditioned environments, available in loads of styles such as hydrotech waterproof, jet jackets, coach jackets, flight bomber jackets, track jackets, windcheater, puffer jackets and many more. Known for style and quality, Superdryâ€™s iconic T-Shirts are available with an embroidered or emblazoned logo, in various colours from white to black, orange, pink, tri colours, green, blue and many more styles.
Besides outerwear and shirts, try Superdryâ€™s Polo shirts, swimwear, knits, shorts, sweats, tops, underwear & sleepwear, bags, hats, belts, flip flops, pants, wallets, pencil cases, pouches and more.

name: Sushi Jiro
description: Sushi Jiro is a conveyor-belt restaurant that offer fast and freshest sushi at RM2.88 per plate. Meet Jiro boy to enjoy the goodness of bite-sized Japanese food today.
ratings:
(5â­) The environment feels so cozy and calm. I really like the vibe during weekdays, not too many people and too busy. I ordered some salmon or tuna set(i forgot) as you can see in one of the pictures.  It was good and the price really affordable for 1 set. The most delicious dish in the shop was chawanmushi. I like it soo much, it was not too smelly like a fishy smell(coz of the egg). It really cleans your taste buds after eating the fresh tuna/salmon(dip too much sauce,salty). One thing, I didn't like about the place was that you needed to order through the QR code provided on the table, i have a problem connecting it for 15Minutes and gotta call the staff to help me. Overall, a great and delicious delicacy to dine in here. - 5 months ago | (5â­) Good service and explanation from the staff name Joanne.  The sushi was awesome especially the salmon sushi and sashimi, perfect portion and quality.
The vibe was great we get to serve to seat on conveyor belt even the shop was in full house situation. We had a great dinner and will definitely visit  again. - 7 months ago | (2â­) Often to eat sushi jiro in mid valley branch and we love that, is my first time in here, the food quality here need to be improve, we often order lady finger in mid valley, but the lady finger here was overcooked, and for the ramen and chawanmushi, the hot dish supposed to be serve in hot ( in my mind set ) but sorry we get a warm dish here, a lot of menu items is sold out, btw I never seen menu items sold out in mid valley branch even we walk in at 9pm, quite disappointed in here - a week ago | (4â­) Dishes here are average, salmon sashimi isnâ€™t as fresh.
But in general a good and simple place, if you are craving japanese food. - a month ago | (4â­) This value for money Japanese Sushi offers really good tasty foods. I particularly love their Unagi don.
Will definitely return for more flavoursome choices.
Superb ğŸ‘ - 5 months ago

name: Sushi King
description: Sushi King is the largest Halal Japanese chain of restaurants that serves quality sushi and other Japanese cuisine at affordable prices in a warm and friendly environment. What sets Sushi King apart is the personal touch of serving freshly made sushi on the kaiten for customers to pick up and enjoy.
ratings:
(5â­) I had a wonderful solo lunch at this sushi shop today. The food was fresh and flavorful, and the restaurant had a pleasant, inviting ambiance.  But what really made my day was the exceptional service I received from William. He was friendly, attentive, and genuinely made me feel welcome.  A great place for a delicious meal, whether you're dining alone or with friends. - a month ago | (5â­) Located beside the lift near the parking area.. in front of it is the ice skating.. (Below it)

First of all.. the food is nice and fast.. and the converyer machine is always have food.. one of the best place to eat sushi king.. is this outlet.. all item have...no problem to ask any of the staff ..

The service itself is tiptop.. feel welcome when you come to eat here.. if have a question the staff explain it.. just ask them.. really good service.. anyway shout out to service team and cashier Dian for great service..

Rekemended to come here if other outlet is poor service or rude.. so give this outlet a try. :) - 2 months ago | (4â­) Food is good. The food is piping hot when we received eventho it taking quite abit of time. The portion is also not to bad. Its not something that prepared half hearted.

The only complain is their seating. Hard to get up when the sent the ordered menu thru kaiten belt (with the train like item. Haha. Idk the name). Unless i put my leg on the seat, only then can comfortably take the food as itâ€™s place quite high (problem for short people).

Overall ok. - 3 months ago | (5â­) The food is good, can also redeem the birthday complementary during the birthday month.
The service is good - Thanks Willam for providing the good service while serving the ice cream.
Atmosphere is also good. - a month ago | (1â­) Absolutely disgusted with my experience at Sushi King. The service was beyond atrociousâ€”an unacceptably long wait for everything. The sushi? How is that even possible in this day and age? And seriously, ONE robot to serve the entire restaurant? What a joke! The whole place felt like a chaotic mess with zero regard for customer satisfaction. I wouldnâ€™t step foot in this place again if they paid me. Avoid at all cost !

Costumer service priority first my Ass
Norwegian salmon your mother

name: Swich CafÃ©
description: Cake and Gelato Salon.
ratings:
(5â­) Once upon a time, there was a cafe serving cakes and coffee at the old former HP Towers, this was many years back. And somewhere last year we patron a cafe of the same name at Atria without realizing it was the same ownerâ€¦and now they have opened a new outlet at Sunway Pyramid and come to â€˜realize againâ€™ that the owner is a good friendâ€™s sister hahahaâ€¦they serve really nice cakes like the durian and cempedak cakes, valhorna chocolate croffle, tiramisu, gelatos and not forgetting good coffeeâ€¦should give it a go. 20250121 back here with the missus, the durian bomb is still the best - a month ago | (4â­) Nice cosy cafe at Sunway Pyramud new wing with good seating.

Prices for cakes, drinks and waffles come at a slight premium of RM20+

Deco is clean and simple.

Cakes, drinks and waffle are quite tasty.

Worth the quick dessert stop. - 2 months ago | (5â­) New cafe located at Sunway Pyramid's newly renovated space, The Oasis. Randomly walked past and saw the variety of cakes sitting in the fridge display.

They have alcoholic and non-alcoholic options. We tried 2 non-alcoholic cakes, cempedak cake and chocolate valrhona cake. The cempedak cake was an absolute delight - sponge layer was soft and light, while the cream was sweet and fresh. Couldn't get enough of it!

Unfortunately, the chocolate valrhona was quite disappointing. The supposed mousse inside was hard and didn't taste fresh. Actually, the whole cake felt pretty tough and hard to cut and chew. It just felt like i was eating a few days' old cake.

Besides cake, they sell gelato, waffles and other desserts too. It's definitely worth a try. - a month ago | (5â­) Their tiramisu gelato is the best tiramisu gelato iâ€™ve had. Itâ€™s not just tiramisu flavour but as if youâ€™re having bits of tiramisu. We had their delicious buttermilk waffle topped with Sicilian pistachio gelato. We were greeted and served by wilson who is amazing. - a month ago | (5â­) I always love their cakes since they started in Atria. I went to the one at sunway last week- and Cempedak cake is still as good as i remembered. Friendly staff and good place to chill over coffee and desserts ! - 2 months ago

name: Switch
description: Appleâ€™s largest official partner in Malaysia, Switch was established based on a vision of a handful of friends, to get people to â€œswitchâ€ from PC to Mac in 1995. The founders saw the good in Apple that they have decided to bring their vision to life in 1997, by setting up their first store in Penang. With a huge growing number of outlets all over Malaysia, Switch extends to Small and Medium Business owners alongside college and university students with attractive discounts and exciting workshops.

name: T&T Kidzpark
description: Enjoy a funfair-like mini amusement park in the comfort and air-conditioned environment of Sunway Pyramid Mall. T&T Kidzpark has a variety of rides for your kids to enjoy including bumper cars, carousel, a flying-go-round and a mini train ride as well as other kiddy rides at a cheap rate. With the colourful and well-maintained equipment, the kids will have a good time in this wonderland of fun.

name: T&T Station
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: TACOBELL
description:
Founded by Glen Bell in 1962, Taco Bell opened its first store serving Crunchy Tacos to satisfy hungry mouths of Southern California. With a dream to share Tacos, Burritos, Quesadillas, and much more with the world, we opened our first location here in Malaysia in April, 2021. Now, in 2022, we are pleased to be bringing Taco Bell to Sunway Pyramid!

Taco Bell is known for Mexican inspired foods with bold flavors like our Taco Supreme TM, Grilled Stuft Burrito TM, and Crunchwrap Supreme TM. Our menu is crafted to please everyone, whether it be eating out with friends, a meal for the family, or a lunch for the office. With customizable protein options like Seasoned Ground Beef, Ground Chicken, Grilled Chicken, and Black Beans, we can accommodate any cravings.

ratings:

name: TANYU æ¢é±¼
description: TANYU is a grilled fish brand originating from Shenzhen, China, having over 300 outlets across the Asia-Pacific region. Well known for its signature flavor Grilled Fish with Fresh Green Pepper, TANYU made its debut in Malaysia in 2023, providing incredible dining experience to everyone. Catering to the diverse tastes of local Malaysians, TANYU makes use of a variety of cooking methods and offers 8 kinds of grilled fish flavors ranging from mala, savoury, to garlicky and more. Come and have a delightful fish feast at TANYU located at Oasis Zone (Blue Atrium)
