name: TGV Cinemas
description:
With Sunway Pyramid housing the largest branch of TGV cinemas since its advent in 1994, countless moviegoers have came and left with memories of a special day out. From blockbuster movies that keep you at the edge of your seat to intimate romance-comedies that make your heart flutter, TGVâ€™s diverse range of entertainment means thereâ€™s something for everyone.
Come for a regular movie screening or dive into the more immersive IMAX experience where the theatre is custom-designed to deliver the ultimate audio and visual experience. The unique design of the screen which spans wall-to-wall and floor-to ceiling is also curved in a way that it brings the audience closer while placing them in the center of the action regardless of where you are seated. What's more, the surround sound system with strategically placed speakers around the hall changes the way the sound travels throughout the room. With every loudspeaker laser-aligned to accurately channel soundwaves to the audience, nothing could beat this ultimate audio experience. Looking for a more comfortable seat for your viewing pleasure? TGV Beanie offers comfortable two-seater bean bag sofas with adjustable seating positions so you can get as cozy as possible while you enjoy the movie. One more reason to visit TGV at Sunway Pyramid is to try out the TGV Luxe with plush red velvet seats that gives the viewer an elevated position. Adding to the comfort are the extra wide armrests and custom-made individual tables where you can place your food and drinks.
ratings:
(1â­) Attend for Red One Premiere, I hate the person in charge just too restricted on checking time on my phone just telling not use phone, Hello I am not using phone, try to understand your customer before say something.

Not to come this place again - 3 months ago | (5â­) Nicest movie theater in town. The cinema screen, sound system are brilliant for me. - 2 months ago | (1â­) They need to REVAMP this ENTIRE CINEMA.

1) It smells so bad, like a pungent smell, something like stinky, musty socks EVERYWHERE here. Either it's coming from the nasty and dirty carpets, or the mold growing on the ceiling.

2) I remember when this cinema used to be one of the coldest cinemas I went to, and now, it's so stuffy and warm here. Broken AC or just being a cheapskate?

Please CONSIDER these two problems but please deal with problem no. 1 especially. Avoiding this cinema until they decide to actually fix the smell and the mold problem.

Do not go here if you are very sensitive to nasty smells. - a month ago | (2â­) The movie experience is always fantastic, and the IMAX is superb. The only thing that could be improved is the popcorn. The signature caramel popcorn is often staleâ€”fresh and crisp popcorn would make the experience even better! - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) The sound and picture are great.  Theaters are at a good temperature. The IMAX theater is awesome.  All the theater seats are so comfortable. The beanie theatre is pretty cool. Clean washroom.  Lounge area available.  Exits are well lit. No WiFi.  There's always a display you can interact with even within the mall. Make sure to snap some pictures. - a year ago

name: THE OWLS CAFE
description:
The Owls Cafe landing at Sunway Pyramid!
The Owls Cafe started as a cozy neighbourhood cafe in Bukit Jalil, and thanks to the support from our owlsome customers, word spreads fast around Klang Valley. Our much loved Owlsome Waffles - fruity â€˜Rebeccaâ€™ and nutty â€˜Davidâ€™ are perfectly that fit everyoneâ€™s taste. Waffle batter are made from scratch with our very own secret recipe. After toasted to crisp, the waffles are topped off with freshest fruits and hand crafted ice-cream by our local brand, Forty licks, which gives all our waffles their distinctive and unforgettable yumminess.
Beside the Owlsome Waffles, The Owls Cafe also serves great variety of brunch, pasta and specialty coffee. We strive to provide fusion meals that interlard Malaysian flavour with western style.
Experience our owlsomeness now at Sunway Pyramid!
ratings:
(2â­) For a cafe that heavily advertises their waffles, be prepared to wait at least 40 mins for 1 waffle order. We went at 4pm, off-peak hour. They said they only have 2 waffle maker machines, and each waffle order takes time to prepare. Imagine ordering more than 1! The staff will try their best to avoid you knowing that you will ask for your order. Once the order is delivered, there were no apologies as they will rush off and away from you as fast as they could. Also, the photos showed whole blueberries and bigger strawberry pieces on the waffles, but you only get them in halves. Who cuts blueberries that are already tiny anyway? ğŸ˜‚ The price charged for the food and service was not worth it. The staffs were not welcoming either, maybe theyâ€™re new and donâ€™t know how serve customers. Very disappointing ğŸ˜¢ please do better. - 2 months ago | (3â­) I recently visited the owl cafe and while the product was fine, I was disappointed with how I was treated by the staff. Unfortunately, I encountered rude and unprofessional behavior, which left a negative impression on what could have been a good experience.

From the moment I walked in, the owl cafe they seemed dismissive and unwilling to help with a rude tone? Did they refuse assistance?. I expect a certain level of courtesy when I visit any establishment, but this encounter made me feel disrespected and unwelcome.

Itâ€™s unfortunate because I had heard good things about the owl cafe but the unprofessionalism of the staff really took away from the overall experience. I hope management takes this feedback seriously, as customer service is often the most memorable part of any visit.

I would be hesitant to return unless I see improvements in how customers are treated. - 4 months ago | (4â­) A cozy cafe in Sunway Pyramid, near the Sunway Lagoon Hotel side. I like the owl themed deco, with the light streaming through the glass wall overlooking Sunway Lagoon theme park. I shifted my table there but realized it was a little too warm at 6pm, and shifted back to the other corner where there were cushion seats.

The salad made me feel so healthy - it was colourful and delicious. I wanted to try the savoury chicken waffle, but ended up eating the chicken with the salad, and treating the fluffy waffle as my dessert! ğŸ¤£ - 6 months ago | (5â­) The Owls Cafe in Sunway Pyramid offers a delightful selection of desserts that are sure to satisfy any sweet tooth. From waffles to cakes, each dessert is crafted with care and bursts with flavor. The cafe's location provides a stunning view of the Sunway Lagoon Theme Park, making it an ideal spot for visitors to take a break, relax, and enjoy the scenery. With its cozy atmosphere and delicious treats, itâ€™s the perfect place to unwind after a day of shopping or exploring the theme park. - 5 months ago | (4â­) part of the charm here is expectation of management, which is executed here at maskirova levels.  we managed to order off the waffle and breakfast menus, besides notices that both were unavailable.

the chicken and waffles was very good.  the shasukha less so.  the latter came in a portions too dimunitive, and with a taste profile more italian than moroccan.  so some call to tinker there, and to not reuse the pasta sauce.

this is a pricey joint, so expectations would be higher. - 3 months ago

name: TISSOT
description: In 1853, Charles-FÃ©licien Tissot and his son Charles-Ã‰mile had set up Tissot in the small town of Le Locle, Switzerland. Since then, the beauty and reliability of Tissot timepieces had received numerous awards. The brand had continuously strived for innovation in both design and technology, and also staying true to its slogan â€œInnovators by traditionâ€. Do you know that back in the days, Tissot had sponsored several famous car racing brands such as Renault Alpine, Porsche and Lotus? Tissot had collaborated with racing teams in Formula 1 and many famous racers had owned limited timepiece as well. Apart from that, Tissot had a break-through in the fashion industry as it caught the eyes of famous celebrities. For instance, French actress Sarah Bernhardt and world-proclaimed opera singer Carmen Miranda. The wristwatch and pocket watches are the IT thing that all people wants. Fast forward to today, Tissotâ€™s ambassadors are not foreign to us such as famous Chinese actress and singer Liu Yi Fei, NBA player Klay Thompson, MotoGP World Champion Marc MÃ¡rquez, and the latest NBA rising player Trae Young. There are several Tissot collections that are unique to each of our own preferences and styles. The T-SPORT collection is an inspiration from the numerous partnerships in the world of sports such as the NBA, MOTOGPâ„¢ and Tour De France. Besides that, the T-CLASSIC collection focus on the fine craftsmanship that strives to provide accuracy and quality at every level. Tissot also had a dedicated range for the ladies, namely T-LADY collection, which were designed to reflect the current trends with their colour, material and style. For those who prefer classic watches, the T-POCKET collection is not a miss! Since its foundation in 1853, Tissot has been creating pocket watches to this day. Pocket-watches are exceptional accessories and gift as it will stand out from all others. Do check out Tissot at Ground floor (blue zone) for more Tissot collections.
ratings:
(5â­) Called the outlet to enquire about a certain model. Ms Joanne put an extra effort by WhatsApp-ing pictures of a few models together with price. name: TMT Megastore by Thunder Match
description: The Largest Tech Retailer in Malaysia. Discover amazing deals on the latest tech from leading brands in computers, smartphones, smart home, and more!
ratings:
(4â­) I wanna give a very honest review on this.

So I bought a logitech mouse for 300+ which sells between 250-300 on lazada. You have to understand that all shops here especially the tech shops in Asian Avenue will sell items at higher prices. This is because rent for pyramid is high. Those who give ratings such as *overprice* without a good reason - no comments.

I did NOT buy a laptop so I am not aware of the quality of service this place offers and so you have to take ur own risk when buying from here.

Pros: You can exchange faulty peripherals with other peripherals from other brands within 14 days of purchase if u are a member. (Rm300 purchase gives u free membership).

You also get 1 year warranty.

Cons: Slightly more expensive.

_________

My personal opinion: I try not to buy from lazada and stuff for electronic devices because they is no certification that it is original and it is very difficult to exchange or send ur device for warranty when u purchase it online. I would pay the extra RM 50 for the reassurance from this shop. (Peripherals ONLY)

For laptops: I can't give a review so do keep that in mind. - 6 years ago | (1â­) Worst store ever. I've let them changed my HDD to SSD. name: TONKATSU BY MA MAISON
description: Originating from Nagoya, Japan, Tonkatsu by Ma Maison exclusively serves up a variety of tonkatsu or deep-fried golden brown pork cutlet - one of Japanâ€™s most loved dishes. Founded by restaurateur and chef Akinori Terazawa, Ma Maison is an indulgent celebration of traditional Japanese cuisine with more than 30 restaurants in Japan, Singapore and Malaysia. Proudly rated as â€œTop 10 Tonkatsu Restaurant in Tokyoâ€, we serve up a variety of tonkatsu or deep-fried pork cutlet using only the highest-grade ingredients prepared meticulously by our chefs.
ratings:
(3â­) We went on Monday around 6:40 PM, there was no queue.

No one bothered to show us to a table. After waiting for a few minutes, a staff member finally told us to sit wherever we liked. Once we sat down, no one brought us the menu until we asked for it.

The restaurant has a good ambience and a nice view, overlooking part of Sunway Lagoon.

The fried pork was very crispy, but it had an unpleasant smell and wasnâ€™t tender. The side dishes, like cabbage, rice, and soup, were refillable but not for sharing. Since we were still full, we only ordered one set. - 3 months ago | (4â­) As it is tonkatsu, the menu looks very same for different item, kinda hard to decide what to order.

The pork is hard and take much effort to chew. It's marinated quite well with a unique taste.

Chicken curry is very nice, but chicken portion much smaller and not enough for my liking.

There is a lot of condiments available to mix-in with your meal, the soup and cabbage are freeflow refillable.

Waiters are not very responsible and tend to be a bit slow. - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) Right from the first staff who allocates you table, to the waitresses who took care of our table - huge thank you for making our family dinner such a pleasant one! Your attention to detail (wait staff saw our uncle gesturing eating rice with spoon to one of us and before we asked, wait staff had come over with a spoon already) and doing your best to get us a big enough table to sit comfortably deserves a huge applause.
Environment was cosy, food was good, and staff were generous in giving us our refills or offering refills when she saw our cabbage/miso/rice were almost done.
Overall a very nice evening, and feeling lucky that we chose to dine here ğŸ˜„ will definitely be back again, highly recommend! - 2 weeks ago | (2â­) Came here for the 2nd set of katsu for 50% till 28th Feb onlyâ€¦ this place is honestly a missâ€¦ you wonâ€™t regret it if you have been passing by here often and telling yourself that youâ€™d like to try it one dayâ€¦ Iâ€™d say.. keep walking becauseâ€¦.. both loin and fillet I ordered wasss DRYâ€¦. DRY AFâ€¦. D.R.Y!!!! Itâ€™s not enjoyable at ALLLâ€¦.. the fats on the pork did not do justiceâ€¦ knowing the breadcrumbs around it will
Definitely cut the top of your mouth but expecting the pork meat to be tender or atleast melts in your mouthâ€¦. ? NOPEâ€¦ all is dryyyyyyyy it was hard to chew throughout 6piecesâ€¦. My jaw was tiredâ€¦. Flavor wise, not much, very mild, itâ€™s not mind blowing.

The only Thing that was good was the miso soup that came together.
Service of replenishing cabbage was ğŸ‘
Choice of white rice or multigrain and comes with tea iced or not.

This will be my first and my last.. - in the last week | (1â­) Same incident happened again. Iâ€™ve saw others put a review regarding their service, we really feel disrespectful and being looked down by their staff just because we ask for refill cabbage and soup.

Before we ordered, we did ask the waiter can we share one main course by adding another side dish? If not we just add in the bottomless refill package. (Here i need to mention that Iâ€™ve dine in at another branch - Mid Valley so i knew it was workable. And the reason for us to share is we really canâ€™t finish all if we order two main course)

The waiter said OK without explaining anything. But when we ask for refill he take the menu to us said that if u want to refill you need to add the bottomless refill, but we did ask at the very beginning. He said OK! And the way he explain to us is really make us uncomfortable is like we asking for food. But hello? Itâ€™s just cabbage? How much it cost? And fine, i know you have your own rules, but why you didnâ€™t mention it clearly at first?

And after that we said nvm, we continue having the rest of our food. After that he suddenly come over and refilled the cabbage for us, without saying anything. This really makes us feel uncomfortably and disrespectful.

For those who want to dine here, pls think twice before you walk in. Other branches is fine, only this. - 4 months ago

name: Tai Er
description:
TAI ER was launched in 2015 Guangzhou, is a unique chain restaurant that featuring Suancai & Fish and aims to introduce classic Sichuan Cuisine to the world. Currently have 560+ branches in most of the cities in China, such as Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Shenzhen. First oversea branch is located in Singapore. TAI ER are spreading their wings to more new market at Singapore, Malaysia, Canada, Thailand, Korea and United States in the coming future, hoping the world enjoys this unique and flavorful Sichuan taste.

ratings:
(5â­) Overall, the experience here is pleasant. The food tastes good but leans towards a heavier and oilier base. If you can't handle spicy food, Iâ€™d recommend avoiding the dishes I ordered.

Portion-wise, the servings are generous, but the pricing is on the higher side. For example, the medium-sized Spicy Sour Soup Dory Fish costs RM108, but it's enough to be shared among four ladies. The åŒæ¤’è¾£å­é¸¡ costs RM49, which I find a bit overpriced because the chicken cubes are really small and mixed with other ingredients. Based on the taste, I believe theyâ€™ve added fried potato cubes, so most of the dish consists of vegetablesâ€”mainly two types of chili and potato cubes. The potato is fine to eat, but the chili depends on your spice tolerance.

Service-wise, I was impressed. They have a unique way of calling for staff using a peace âœŒğŸ» hand sign, which I found interesting (but personally for me as an introverted person, I was really shy to do it). The service team was attentive and had a good attitude.

I might return, but Iâ€™d definitely bring at least two more friends to share the portionsâ€”if you're a small eater, you wonâ€™t be able to finish everything on your own! - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) Today finally managed to get a chance to dine here after 2 times failed to get in for the past 1 year. name: Tea Garden
description: At Tea Garden, we aim to serve the country's best-known gastronomical icons as Malaysia is a proudly multicultural country and our food is a clear reflection of that. Most of our recipes are homemade because there is no shortcut to serving authentic, wholesome flavours. It's definitely worth the effort simply because you deserve the best from us.
ratings:
(5â­) â­â­â­â­â­
Tea Garden Restaurant at Sunway Pyramid is an absolute gem for anyone looking for delicious Halal-certified Chinese cuisine with a great variety of dishes. The food was fresh, flavorful, and well-presented, making for an excellent dining experience.

We ordered the fried rice, porridge, and stir-fried radish cake, and every dish was perfectly cooked with the right balance of seasoning. The fried rice was aromatic, packed with shrimp and eggs, while the porridge was silky smooth with crispy shallots and fresh spring onions. The radish cake had a nice crisp exterior with soft, flavorful bites.

The ambiance is warm and inviting, perfect for families and friends. The service was fast and friendly, ensuring we had a pleasant meal. With their Halal certification, this restaurant is a great spot for Muslims who love authentic Chinese flavors.

Highly recommend for those craving quality comfort food in a cozy setting. Definitely coming back! - 2 weeks ago | (4â­) Food is not bad. I actually wanted to go to another restaurant but they were having blackout issue so my Mrs suggested this shop and their Radish Cake.

Itâ€™s really nice. The coffee was also as how I asked for it, less sugar.

Service is good. Nice ambiance.

Ohh and they have HALAL cert. - 3 months ago | (3â­) The Restaurant is serving local food. The local bread dish like roti bakar is not up to the local standards. Can get better options. name: Texas Chicken
description: Founded in San Antonio, Texas, USA in 1952, Texas Chicken is a highly recognized brand name in the Quick Service Restaurant sector and is one of the largest quick service chicken concepts in the world. Texas Chicken serves up freshly prepared, high quality, authentic American Southern-styled fare, to provide customers with value-for-money, complete meal options. The Texas Chicken menu includes flavorful chicken both Original and Spicy, crispy tenders strips, burgers and wraps, classic side dishes and hand-made from scratch honey-butter biscuits.

name: The Body Shop
description:
The Body Shop launched a new store concept â€“ the first of its kind in Malaysia, at Sunway Pyramid recently. The Body Shop Activist Makersâ€™ Workshop is an interactive â€˜activist workshopâ€™ that encourages people to explore products and discover how â€“ together â€“ we can fight for a fairer and more beautiful world.
The Body Shopâ€™s new Activist Makersâ€™ Workshop store is a place for play and discovery, where shoppers can get stuck in and get inspired by the brandâ€™s legendary beauty products and ethical purpose.
Customers of the new store will experience new features at this The Body Shop store, one of the most sustainable in Malaysia:
Refill station: The Body Shop is on a mission to use as little plastic as possible with aluminium refill bottles that can be cleaned and brought back to the store to be refilled from 12 of the brandâ€™s best-loved shower gel, shampoo, conditioner and hand wash.
Sustainable store fixtures: The store has been outfitted with sustainable fixtures made from reclaimed wood and recycled plastics to help minimise its environmental footprint. Examples include a metal facade constructed in aluminium, which requires less energy production than other materials and is infinitely recyclable. The store also boasts worktop surfaces that are manufactured from 100% recycled material otherwise destined for the landfill.
The Body Butter Tower: One the most beloved The Body Shop products, The Body Shop body butters are displayed in full glory in a towering rack. With an attached sink, customers can test out different hand wash and shower gels before slathering on their favourite body butter or body lotion at this testing station.
The ACT Wall/Station: This is where brand campaigns and values are shared to customers to create positive engagement with them. From our environmental causes to women empowerment, this wall will be a place to advocate our values.
#BeautyTreats

name: The Brew House
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
description: The Coffee Bean & Tea LeafÂ® is a premium global coffeehouse that has been crafting the finest coffees and teas since 1963. Stand by our commitment to quality, The Coffee Bean & Tea LeafÂ® sources only from the top 1% of Arabica beans and the finest hand-picked tea leaves from across the world, delivering a distinctive flavour in every cup. Our cafes provide a welcoming, community-driven space where every cup connects people over exceptional taste, making it a beloved destination for coffee and tea enthusiasts alike.
ratings:
(1â­) One of the slowest coffee bean cafe. Queue is super lengthy despite have 6 workers. I had terrible experience ordering for Spanish latte. I request without sugar but they remove the vanila powder . Not only that, the cashier was hesitate to accept card payment. I insist since i left my wallet at home. I heard an indonesian girl feels upset as she do not have cash at that time and want to use card payment. Usual order usually takes 30 mins for a cup of coffee. The queue was the most painful part - 2 months ago | (4â­) The atmosphere is good for a quick break or catching up with friends. The service was fast and efficient. Had their cold brew and  bagels, coffee was good and bagels were absolutely delicious. Definitely a spot I'd recommend for anyone looking to relax and enjoy a good snack or coffee. - 3 weeks ago | (1â­) My experience with Coffee Bean usually good But this one at Sunway Pyramid is worst.  When ordering, this cashier shown a sour face.  Don't answer question. And show me an impatient attitude in ordering.  It's Saturday 14 sept. As usual a busy weekend. But I felt the customer does not deserve a sour face.  The cashier can smile or laugh with the staff/ colleagues but not to the customer is something very wrong.
If you the management of coffee bean, pls do something. Improve staff competency and attitude. You are in the F&B industry.
I believe you can find your staff at the receipt attached. - 5 months ago | (5â­) A very convenient joint located at G floor of Sunway Pyramid. You can enjoy your coffee and meal while watching people skate. Or it is a perfect place to have a sip or two while waiting your loved ones do their shopping .

This is not my first time here. Been here many times for their nice food, good coffee, good vibes, and yes.... clean toilet is nearby. What a good  setup.

Great service too. I think it is an enjoyable place to meet up with friends or to complete simple paper work, as I always see people with their laptops.

Starting your day with a perfect blend of good coffee and being surrounded with many people from all walks of life....is always amazing. - a year ago | (2â­) First CBTL outlet that refuses to give me a straw for iced drink. Staff said straws are reserved for â€œice blendedâ€ beverages only. Is this policy only applicable to this outlet? Coz other outlets just give me one straw for each cold beverage without any problems. - 5 months ago

name: The Elixir Kombucha
description:
The Elixir Kombucha is a proudly Malaysian brand specializing in premium kombucha and the first to open an in-mall retail outlet in Malaysia. Our drinks are a refreshing, health-conscious choice for todayâ€™s active lifestyles.
Brewed with natural ingredients, low in sugar, and packed with probiotics, our kombucha supports gut health and overall well-being. Featuring eight tea-based flavours blending tropical fruits, florals, and spices, we also proudly offer Malaysiaâ€™s first truly coffee-based kombucha, brewed directly from coffee beans for a bold, innovative twist.
Founded by brothers Darren and Jarrel, The Elixir Kombucha has grown from pop-up stalls to Malaysiaâ€™s first kombucha outlet at Sunway Pyramid, championing eco-friendly initiatives and vibrant flavours for all.

name: The Face Shop
description: As Korea's pioneer beauty company committed to nature, THE FACE SHOP creates products from approximately 600 natural ingredients such as flowers, grains, plants, fruits, mineral water, and oriental medicine to nourish and revitalize the skin. THE FACE SHOP introduced its new brand identity, a circular emblem depicting Demeter, the goddess of beauty and the brand logo around her describing THE FACE SHOP heritage. The elegant new symbol centres around natureâ€™s timeless beauty and willingness to deliver endless beauty to customers. Launched in 2003 as Korea's pioneer beauty brand committed to nature and with a global presence of 3,000 stores in 35 countries including USA, Canada and Middle East, THE FACE SHOP is the most commercially successful and recognizable Korean brand with its famous tagline 'Natural Story'. THE FACE SHOP arrived in Malaysia in 2006 and grew under the direction of branding and retail specialist LG HOUSEHOLD & HEALTH CARE MALAYSIA SDN. BHD. THE FACE SHOP has more than 50 stores across Malaysia up till 2017. THE FACE SHOP products are made with natural ingredients. THE FACE SHOP is inspired by nature and believes that there is natural beauty to everyone. THE FACE SHOP provides high quality products at affordable prices. THE FACE SHOP is committed to making a wide variety of products that customers want. The Face Shop products range from makeup, skin care, body and hair products; such as Hydro Splash BB Cream, Extreme Volume Mascara-Lash Stretch, Gel Eyeliner, and Natural Sun SPF 45. Original from Korea, The Face Shop is now available at Sunway Pyramid.

name: The Parenthood
description:
NOTE: The Parenthood Pre School operating 8.30pm - 5.30pm from Monday to Friday only during MCO period.
With the establishment of the first London Street Family Park in Malaysia, The Parenthood is a place for the whole family to play and learn together, all under one roof. The flagship outlet is located in Sunway Pyramid and has Indoor Playlands uniquely designed for a fun-filled playtime in a safe yet engaging environment. Emphasising the theme of London Street are familiar architectures such as Big Ben , the red London bus, British flags and red post boxes. Parenthood strives to make your journey enjoyable as it answers to all your children and parental needs with this one-stop edutainment centre.
As of 2019, the Enrichment Hub was introduced which offers a variety of learning programmes, activities, and workshops for children and even parents to have an enjoyable and wonderful time together such as Kids Kick Boxing, Kids Dance Class, Kids Gym, Art & Craft, Robotics and language classes. On top of that, structured classes are also offered here from academic to sports and personal hobbies, all conducted in a safe and positive environment so your children can play and learn while building their self-confidence.
Besides being a playland, The Parenthood also has The Parenthood Preschool located only at the Sunway Pyramid outlet which unlocks your childâ€™s potential beyond education by developing skills in literacy, mathematics, understanding of the world, and expressive Arts & Design.
Parents can also shop for baby care essentials, toys, clothes, stationery and gifts from the wide selection of products by a mix of tenants and baby brands around the park. There is also a restaurant tucked at the corner of the family park where families can indulge in a hearty meal.
ratings:
(2â­) This place is more suitable for older children and not toddler as all the slides are quite high up and the surface not soft enough for toddlers. Furthermore there is a bus area whereby there is some kitchen toys and soft blocks available for play but the condition is very bad, the soft blocks has been chew off and there isnâ€™t much kitchen utensils to play with, only an empty kitchen counter there. Worst still there are many uncovered electric plug points there whereby toddlers will be able to touch it freely, the electric plug point shouldnâ€™t be built there or at least it must be covered up with child protection measures. My young daughter went to play with the switch and i have to constantly tell her not to touch it! This is unacceptable as this is a children playground. Overall this place are more suitable for older kids whereby they can climb higher and know not to touch electric points. There isnâ€™t much things available for toddlers i would say. - in the last week | (5â­) We celebrated our sonâ€™s birthday at Parenthood, and it was an incredible experience! The staff was wonderfully attentive, making sure everything was set up perfectly and that all the kids were having a blast. The play areas were safe, clean, and full of fun activities that kept the kids entertained for hours. They even offered a variety of options for party themes, and the decorations made it feel magical. The food was kid-friendly and tasty, and they took care of every little detail, so we could just relax and enjoy the day with family and friends. Highly recommend Parenthood for any birthday celebrationâ€”our son had the best day! - 4 months ago | (5â­) Came across this huge playground and had the pleasure of trying with my child one weekday.

Entry was swift. Staff are helpful and accommodating. Siligent on cleaning even on a non busy day. It has different play sections, which is good, so older kids will not hurt by accident the younger ones. There are lots of slides, which is fun even for small built adults.

The entrance fee is very reasonable for a whole day play.  About 30 ringgit on weekday / 60 ringgit on weekend, public and school holiday.
Re entry is allowed as long as within that day and with a guardian or parent going in together. Extra guardian or parent is charged 5 ringgit.

Socks is needed to enter like most playgrounds. They charge a reasonable 7 ringgit in case you need it.

There's also a cafe inside where parents could rest while waiting. Opposite the playground is a  shop for kids stuff.

Overall, it's worth it to try. - 6 months ago | (3â­) A beautifully designed play area for children, with the London bus outside being the most attractive feature! Itâ€™s a fun place for kids to explore and enjoy.

However, I felt a little disappointed as the playground space is smaller than last year, and the horse carousel ride is no longer there. The area feels shorter than before, which affects the overall play experience.

One major concern is safetyâ€”the staff should keep an eye on kids playing rough, especially on the big slide. Since children of all ages play together, some older kids donâ€™t follow the play rules, making it scary for kids under 7 to enjoy themselves.

Hope the management can improve the playground space and safety monitoring in the future! - in the last week | (5â­) It was so much fun to be in parenthood lot to do with your kids . Entry ticket 60-70 Rm or less not very sure. But please wear socks and carry water bottles for your child . A must visit one time. - 5 months ago

name: The Under Shop
description:
THE UNDER SHOP was started in 1999 to serve a very specific purpose. A straightforward, no-frills store selling menâ€™s undergarment to cater to the needs of customers who wish to find a range of different brands, cuts, colours and designs, all under one roof. As the materials, packaging and designs of our products evolved, so did THE UNDER SHOP. Being the leader in this segment means that we have to be the trendsetter, pioneering the way under garment retailing needs to adapt to the changing needs of consumers.
Today, THE UNDER SHOP Sunway Pyramid has evolved to feature multiple brands catering to men and women. Some of the well-known brands include BUM Equipment, Alain Delon, Body Glove, Diesel, Hummer, Renoma, Joe Boxer, RCB Club and more.
For men, choose from various underwear cuts â€“ such as trunks, boxers, full briefs, minis, shorties or even thongs. Shop for all essential undergarments like undershirts, muscle tees, singlets and V-Necks to keep you warm and comfy all day long in all conditions. THE UNDER SHOP also sells socks of assorted sizes, lengths and designs, depending on your needs. For women, THE UNDER SHOP offers various types of underwear such as minis, hipster panties and socks of various designs at affordable prices.
Head on over to THE UNDER SHOP to get all your undergarment needs taken care of!

name: The Walking Hotpot
description:
The Walking Hotpot now serves more variety of soups including Chong Qing mala spicy soup, Sour Radish and Tomato soup which is non spicy.
Our signature Mala soup is made of spicy and numbing seasoning of Chong Qing peppercorn and Chili. Mala has become one of the most popular ingredients in Chinese cuisine, spawning many regional variants.
Our vision and mission is to provide consumers to custom made his/her own favourite ingredient including vegetables and meats in their hotpot bowl.
Once try, I promise you will never forget the sensation of The Walking Hotpot. So, what are you waiting for? Come to First Floor Asian Avenue now!
ratings:
(5â­) Good place to eat if you craving for hotpot. Portion is good and mala soup also very nice. Can give it a try! - a week ago | (5â­) I recently visited The Walking Hotpot for the first time, and it was an absolutely delightful experience! This cozy spot offers individual hotpot servings, allowing everyone to enjoy their favorite flavors without compromise.

The moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and inviting ambiance. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, guiding me through their extensive menu and helping me choose the perfect broth and ingredients.

I opted for the spicy mala bowl, and it did not disappoint! The flavors were rich and robust, with just the right amount of heat to keep things exciting. I chose the beef bowl, and the beef slices were thin, delicious, and generously portioned with lots of fresh ingredients. I heard itâ€™s specially made for mala lovers, and I really loved it.

One of the highlights was the Osmanthus Ice Jelly â€“ a must-try! The unique taste of this cool drink was both refreshing and tasty, making it a perfect complement to the hotpot.

Additionally, I would highly recommend the Australian Beef Slice, Pork Slice, and Lamb Slice. All the meat slices were incredibly fresh and enhanced the overall dining experience.

The portion sizes were generous, and the pricing was reasonable considering the quality and experience. It's perfect for both solo dining and small groups who prefer a personalized touch to their hotpot meal.

Overall, The Walking Hotpot exceeded my expectations. It's a gem for hotpot enthusiasts looking for a personalized and flavorful dining experience. Iâ€™ll definitely be back to try more of their broths and ingredients!

Highly recommend! - 7 months ago | (5â­) This is the perfect place for solo diners who want to eat hotpot. For RM19.90 you can get a hotpot with 4 items and a drink. Very worth it. Food was served fast and it was pretty delicious. The portion was very filling for me. Will definitely be back again. - 5 months ago | (5â­) Nice place, went here before they expanded the space. Food very nice - a week ago | (4â­) I ordered the set hotpot here, costs RM19.90 for just 4 different sides with a broth of your choice. Price wise if quite okay for small eater, but you if you consider yourself a big eater, you might need to top up more sides. Some sides like pork slices or fish slices have surcharge so do take note when ordering the set. - 5 months ago

name: Tim Hortons
ratings:
(5â­) First time trying this Canadian franchise cafe. Staffs were really friendly and nice. The coffee and donuts were good. I like the donuts here. Not oily. Dough texture is fluffy and not very sweet. Price is also very reasonable compared to other cafes in this mall.
I didn't know there are 5 Tim Hortons branches in the country. Will definitely return again. - a month ago | (5â­) I visited the new Tim Hortons Signature store at Sunway Pyramid and was impressed! The Maple Cinnamon Latte was perfectly brewed, and the Truffle Mushroom & Cheese Sourdough Melt was delicious. The craft bar concept adds a unique touch, and the donuts were a perfect sweet treat. Great atmosphere, friendly staff, and a must-visit for coffee lovers! - 2 months ago | (5â­) Tried the signature maple cinnamon, about what you'd expect sweet but the cinnamon isn't over powering like the sbux variants. The coffee also came at warm temp not too hot which is ideal.
Had the plain sugar donut, so light just like eating baked flour. I don't think it's anything special given everyone can do donuts these days.
The toasted sourdough sandwiches are pretty decent for the price. Only thing was given only 30% occupied still takes a while to toast. Can't imagine what happens on a packed lunch time.
Also customer service at the tables were poor most tables have cutlery, plates lying around and are unwiped. This would never happen at McDonald's - a month ago | (5â­) Had great time indulging good coffee and light bites at this 2nd outlet of Tim Hortons! The atmosphere is cozy, the staff are always smiling, and the good coffee ğŸ˜ highly recommended to experience their coffee craft bar and must try Kyoto Drip! And of course the donuts! Truly like the line on their box â€œAll you need is ğŸ© & â¤ï¸â€! - 2 months ago | (3â­) Canadian coffee chain similiar to starbucks and Dunkin Donut combined ğŸ˜‚, it entered Malaysian market last year and expands rapidly. Place is well set up, spacious, very cozy and clean.

Service is rather slow, waited for 10 minutes when thereâ€™s a really just a handful of patrons in the cafe when we came in. Coffee is served in the paper cup despite they have the ceramic coffee cups displayed (really annoying). Coffee tastes average just like any commercial big chains. Price is reasonable ğŸ‘â­ï¸.

Overall nothing much to shout of besides their maple leaf table ğŸ˜‚ , maybe for anyone still wants to boycott Starbucks this could be an option before Donald Trump makes Canada an American stateğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ - a month ago

name: Timberland
description:
Hard work, innovation, and a love of the great outdoors are all big parts of the Timberland story. They have been since the very beginning. Stepping outside in any kind of weather was a problem Timberland was born to solve. In 1973 our original waterproof boots called the â€œTimberlandâ€ were invented. They were rugged, well-crafted, andâ€”thanks to an innovative injection moulding technique which was new to the footwear industryâ€”they withstood the elements.
These premium â€œyellowâ€ boots set new standards for waterproof performance in the footwear industry. They became equally popular with outdoor enthusiasts who needed protection in all conditions, professional trade workers who needed rugged dependable gear, and many others who just wanted a great looking pair of boots. These boots defined our brand. They were so groundbreaking that in 1978 Timberland renamed the entire company.
Today, Timberland Sunway Pyramid is the go-to place for heavy-duty boots and footwear, fit for all harsh elements and weather conditions. Their signature boots are made with durable premium leather consisting of billions of recycled bottles and plastic, an anti-slip rubber lug outsole and anti-fatigue technology with moulded foam footbed to absorb shock and energy while delivering stability and support. For wet and cold environments, Timberlandâ€™s waterproof, water-repellent and insulation technology used in their leather and inner footwear membrane will keep you dry, warm and insulated.
Timberland has also developed numerous technologies for all footwear needs â€“ from lightweight soles for long-lasting cushioning in everyday wear to revolutionary grip stick rubber soles for enhanced traction on different tracks and trails. To keep you dry, protected and warm/cool depending on the weather, Timberlandâ€™s all-season apparel packs a punch with their specially designed and tailored fabrics such as water-resistant windbreakers, waterproof parkas, cotton linen shirts, packable hoodies for easy storage, organic cotton shorts and tees, stylish polo tees, print tees, stylish construction jackets and much more. Their ranges are available for both men and women, and adaptable for outdoor and indoor.

name: Toddler Cart
description:
Shopping can be a tiring activity! Let your children have a break with baby strollers, tandem, child wheelchair, or toddler cart.
All are available for rent at any Concierge!
*T&C Apply.
â€¢ The child using the toddler cart must be below 3 years old or weigh up to 12 kg.
â€¢ RM 50 refundable deposit will be collected.
â€¢ 4 hours of usage.
â€¢ Do not leave the child unattended.
â€¢ Use the lift to access different floors.
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Triumph
description:
It all began in a barn: The transformation of Triumph International from a tiny Southern German corset factory back in 1886 into one of the worldâ€™s leading manufacturers of lingerie and underwear. Triumph develops, produces and sells underwear, lingerie, sleepwear and swimwear, fusing excelling quality in workmanship, unrivalled fit and the latest in fashionable design.
At Triumph you will find bras in a number of cuts, colours and sizes that are able to suit every female figure. Whether you are looking for a practical bra, a sexy push-up bra or a T-shirt bra for everyday use âˆ’ you will find the perfect bra to suit you here at Triumph. For a sexier look, Triumphâ€™s iconic Aqua range has been giving women the perfect push-up. Made using specialist Aqua padding, the Aqua range offers high impact push up for every occasion. Choose from styles including the plunging Deep V neckline for the ultimate seductive look or the balcony bra for everyday wear. "
With Triumphâ€™s innovative new Magic Wire, you will forget you are wearing a bra! The range features a new flexible silicone support 'wire' enclosed inside the bra. Made with smart memory cushions, Triumphâ€™s Sexy Cushion range moulds perfectly to your body contours. Itâ€™s soft and comfortable, yet offers the snuggest support, the most natural lift and a stunning cleavage.
The comfortable, super-soft Everyday bras from Triumph will leave you with the ultimate feeling of freedom. Designed for everyday wear these lightweight bras come in a variety of designs and colours including non-wired and push up. Smooth cups make them perfect to be worn underneath T-shirts or blouses. The large selection of shapewear products from Triumph ensures that every area of your body is toned and firmed. Get familiar with Triumphâ€™s range of body toning, high-waist panties and shaping bodysuits to shape your breast perfectly for any occasion. The subtle colour palette in this range is sensuous and sexy, enabling you to playfully mix and match any Triumph shapewear you own.
At Triumph, discover the perfect sports bra, whatever your needs. From lightweight bras for low impact exercise like yoga to high-impact bras designed for running, your every sports need has been considered. Triaction bras have special designed features including sweat wicking fibres and in-built extra supportive padding.

name: Under Armour
description:
Under Armour started with a simple plan to make a superior T-shirt; a shirt that provided compression and wicked perspiration off your skin rather than absorb it; a shirt that worked with your body to regulate temperature and enhance performance. Founded in 1996 by former University of Maryland football player Kevin Plank, Under Armour is the originator of performance apparel and gear engineered to keep athletes cool, dry and light throughout the course of a game, practice or workout.
Under Armour's mission is TO MAKE ALL ATHLETES BETTER THROUGH PASSION, DESIGN AND THE RELENTLESS PURSUIT OF INNOVATION.
The technology behind Under Armour's diverse product assortment for men, women and youth is complex, but the program for reaping the benefits is simple: wear HeatGear to stay cool, dry & light, ColdGear to stay warm, dry & light, and AllSeasonGear to stay dry, light & comfortable.
Stroll through Under Armour Sunway Pyramid to explore the latest in sporting technology and gear for Men and Women. Shop according to individual sporting needs â€“ training, running, golf, basketball, military, soccer or sports lifestyle. From essentials such as training shorts, joggers, T-shirts, leggings, sports bras to jackets, hoodies, backpacks, gym bags, socks and headwear, Under Armourâ€™s got you covered.
Famed for their footwear technology engineered for performance, efficiency and comfort, Under Armourâ€™s shoes are a must-try. Slip into their UA HOVR signature range and experience the bounce, fit and cushioning, all made with durable, solid material. Dash across the court with Under Armourâ€™s CURRY 7 basketball shoes, designed with a breathable, lightweight knit upper that provides a sock-like fit & feel, UA HOVR technology and Micro G Cushioning for explosive energy return. Step onto the golf course with Under Armourâ€™s SPIETH golf shoes with an anti-microbial sockliner for unmatched underfoot comfort and breathability, UA Rotational Resistance outsole for lightweight lockdown tracking and UA HOVR placement to support the biomechanics of the golf swing with soft yet responsive underfoot cushioning.

name: Universal Traveller
description:
From humble beginnings in the 1970s on a street in Singapore, Universal Traveller (UT) has grown from a winter wear retailer to a leading winter wear brand in Southeast Asia.

Universal Traveller Sunway Pyramid constantly reinvents itself, exploring innovative designs to cater to the changing habits of the modern traveller. We believe travel can be light, functional and stylish. We are relentlessly sourcing and trying new material in our winter wear to guarantee the optimal functionality. UTâ€™s design team is always looking to design the next perfect winter piece suited for different occasions, whether for leisure or work.
Planning for a trip abroad can be stressful, and hereâ€™s where Universal Travellerâ€™s complete range of travel wear comes in handy for even the harshest weather. For trips to places where the temperature falls below 0 degrees, don a thick, insulated down jacket made with feathers, water and wind resistant fabric and a hood to protect your head. Browse for jackets and travel wear for temperatures above 0 degrees such as coats, trench coats, jackets, wind jackets, pullovers, sweaters, hoodies and many more, all available for Men, Women and Children/Kids.
Thermal wear is available in various fibres such as bamboo fibre which has natural anti-bacterial, anti-odour and anti-fungal properties for long wear and comfort. Universal Traveller also offers HEATPLUS+ performance thermal wear and long johns, made with inner brushed fleece for warmth and spandex for stretch and functionality, retains heat extremely well and has moisture wicking, quick-dry and breathable properties.
Store all your essentials in one of Universal Travellerâ€™s variety of luggage bags and backpacks, available in all shapes and sizes to fit your needs. From outdoor backpacks for trekking and backpacking, to secure aluminium hard cases and roller bags, there is something for everyone. Urbanlite, Jean Francois, Guess, Ricardo Beverly Hills, Heys, Titan, Travelpro and Travel Gear Backpack are among the brands on sale at Universal Traveller.
ratings: (5â­) We dropped by this shop looking for some warm clothing. They also sell luggage and travel accesories. Prices were reasonable for offer items. The shop assistant was helpful and we are happy with our purchase. - a year ago | (4â­) Universal Traveller merchandise - toiletry bag RM48, 3 digit lock RM48 and international travel adapter RM108. Great place to buy gifts for friends to travel. - a year ago | (3â­) Rather small Universal Traveller store inside Sunway Pyramid shopping mall, selling items for travelling such as warm clothes, jackets, luggage, accessories, etc. Items were well displayed and arranged. Not much space inside the store so might be a little cramp for window shopping. Only 1 fitting room, where quite some queue during peak seasons. Price rather competitive. Staffs were friendly and helpful. - 2 years ago | (1â­) Really shitty customer service. name: VANZO
description:
New Generation Healthy Premium Air Fresheners, VANZO is functional air freshener brand that produces exclusive sterilizing healthy air fresheners in Malaysia, dedicated to protecting consumers from the harmful car and interior fragrances. VANZO works closely with 2 Japanese fragrance experts, OGAWA & TAIYO, to produce high-quality products. With the implementation of exclusive Odour Emulsion Filtration (OEF) technology, it can infiltrate unpleasant odours first & then emanate fragrance effectively.
Products of VANZO are certified by SGS & SIRIM Malaysia for non-toxic inhalation, have no alcohol, formaldehyde & heavy metals, do not contain harmful chemical ingredients, and have a practical sterilizing function. VANZO is Malaysia's first International SGS & SIRIM Malaysia certified New Generation Healthy Premium air freshener brand that is safe to enjoy.

name: VCR
ratings:
(5â­) Had an awesome meal here three days ago, and I have to say, everything was top notched! The pasta was amazingly scrumptious; perfectly cooked, full of flavour, and just the right balance of ingredients. And that coffee? So smooth and creamy, with beautiful latte art. You have to give a shot on their desserts; especially the cakes and croissants. They are absolutely delicious; flaky, fresh, and just the right amount of sweetness. The perfect way to end a great meal.

Huge shoutout to Fernandez for making the experience even better. He was super friendly and mindful, and made sure we had everything we needed. Honestly, the kind of service that makes you want to come back again and again.

The vibe of the place was also really nice; cozy yet stylish, perfect for bringing each other up to speed or just enjoying a great meal. If youâ€™re looking for amazing food, great coffee, and top-notch service, this is the place to be. Frankly and definitely coming back soon!

P/S: Forgot to snap the atmosphere and the deco of the place  since I got so caught up with the meals served. - a month ago | (4â­) VCR was recommended to me by a few of my friends who frequent the KL branch. The food was quite good even if the menu was somewhat limited. I had the Wagyu Burger, and it was not bad at all. The only issue was that it was quite small. The other dishes were fine, though, and the pricing is quite reasonable overall. The ambience of the restaurant is quite nice with a very relaxed and cool vibe to it, especially in the evenings. This makes it a great place for dinner with friends and/or family. Most of the offerings in the menu are western dishes, though, so if you like pizzas, burgers, and pastas, you will like VCR. Recommended! - 2 months ago | (3â­) Feel quite disappointed with the food, maybe itâ€™s just the things we ordered ğŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸ The pepperoni pizza has a plastic taste but they were quite generous with the cheese. As for the burgers, suggest to add some greens on the side because overall felt very jelak and not balanced.

Espresso tonic was good ğŸ‘ Customer service needs improvement. The waiters and waitresses were quite blur and not very smart at planning tables causing people to wait in line or sit awkwardly. - a week ago | (5â­) Visited VCR this afternoon and had a great experience. The staff were warm and welcoming which the waitress attended politely and in a professional way. This makes me feel so open-sided without any restrictions. The food tasted great and the portion sizes were reasonable. The only consideration is the price's higher side. However, the quality and ambiance make it a worthwhile visit. A nice place to relax and enjoy a good meal !!! - 3 weeks ago | (5â­) First time here to dine, it was lovely, I was at the entrance looking at the menu, the waitress was very observant and attentive, she came and greet us and ask how many people to be dine in here. Love the fried chicken with waffles. The carbonara to me just average, love the art on the coffee look like a seahorse, it was all good. Plain water are free of charge. So you can actually not to order any beverages. I really like this place, would definitely come back here to dine again. - 4 weeks ago

name: VILLAGE ROAST DUCK
ratings:
(4â­) One of my familyâ€™s favourite place for roast duck with pancakes. The roast pork and char siew is good too. The recent outlet refurbishment made the place more spacious with more seats at the expense of higher prices. A whole duck which used to cost less than RM100 is now RM108.
Overall still recommended with free soup and dessert being offered. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Expect a queue during lunch and dinner times. This place is well worth the hype. I'm personally not a fan of roast duck or BBQ Pork, but the ones in Village Roast Duck are really that good. The fried rice was also fragrant and had wok hey.
Prices are on the higher side but the quality does match up to it. - a month ago | (4â­) We really love the duck from this brand. Overall good experience so far. Will have a meal when visiting this mall.
My favourite from this restaurant is there are complimentary soup and gualinko desert.
Tips: Nearby Sunway Pyramid Hotel and recommended when staying at the hotel. - a month ago | (5â­) Food is served fast and the meals are delicious and flavorful. Newly renovated more dinning capacity but at peak times there's a queue. - 3 weeks ago | (4â­) It is a smaller branch compare to Mid Valley. But the dishes are as good as Mid Valley. The queueing time for seating is about 20 minutes during peak hour. If you like to chit chat with family members or friends after the dinner, it is not a suitable restaurant due to the compact dinning area and good business.
I would recommend the Beijing Roast Duck and pork belly with taro which are delicious. - 11 months ago

name: Wacoal
description:
Wacoal was founded in Japan in 1949 by Koichi Tsukamoto. His goal was to bring beautiful intimate apparel that would offer a higher level of quality and innovation than was currently available in the market to women across the globe. By building teams of like-minded designers, researchers, merchants, and others he created a brand with global reach and countless loyal customers. In 1985, Wacoal launched its brand in America with the goal of using high-quality materials to create intimate apparel that was beautiful and comfortable too.
Helping women look and feel beautiful has always been Wacoalâ€™s mission. We understand that wearing a bra that fits comfortably and provides the right support can be a life-changing experience. Thatâ€™s why we offer bras in a wide range of styles and sizes from A to I cup as well as on-trend lingerie thatâ€™s sexy without compromising on quality or comfort from our brand b.temptâ€™d. All of our lingerie features beautiful materials, comfortable fit, and relevant designs. The impeccable quality of our bras, panties, and coordinating lingerie has earned us many loyal customers, which has made Wacoal a leading brand in department and specialty stores around the country.
Discover a seamless perfection and renewed confidence with Wacoalâ€™s Fineliner T-Shirt Bras, or move with a synchronized ability with the Synchro collection with sewn-in synchro sheets in their wireless bras. Opt for full-coverage with the Gococi collection and maintain your active, healthy lifestyle with their double-layer Sports Bras. To enhance your curves, Wacoalâ€™s Magic X Shapewear hugs and tucks you in all the right places, while their girdles and i-Shaper helps you achieve your ideal body shape. Pick from their cotton, seamless, sanitary or super fine panties for all-day comfort.

name: Wagyu More
description:
At Wagyu More, we serve a wide offering of high-quality meats alongside vegetables, hot dishes, meatballs, sushi, drinks and desserts. We also have Premium Buffet options with top-quality meat slices, including Japanese A5 Wagyu Beef, Australian Wagyu Beef, Spanish Iberico Pork, and Black Angus Beef. All meats are freshly sliced upon order to ensure the best quality and taste upon order.
We also serve a variety of 13 soups: Pork Bone, Chicken Collagen, Sukiyaki, Spicy Pork Bone, Tomato, Miso, Kombu and Kimchi with Mala, Herbal, Black Garlic Oil Hokkaido Tonkatsu, Collagen Miso and Collagen Tomato as premium add-ons!
ratings:
(5â­) This is the eat all you can buffet, we ordered the Angus beef package, which is good but maybe too many fat? Also birthday rewards for members are really good, birthday can eat for free and you need to get 3 people to enjoy the benefits for birthday month. I personally love the tomato soup. Lot of food to choose from. The wagyu fried rice I think can avoid, because rice tends to make you feel full. In my opinion - 2 months ago | (5â­) Cool atmosphere.. nice seating area and great place..

Service is okay.. sometime there can be confused how the staff explain the price...but can get better...

Food wise is great.. a lot of variety to choose.. from lamb, beef, wagyu, prawn and chicken.. and the gravy also have many choice to choose from.. the side dish and dessert also come in variety choice.. price is standard and affordable.. - a month ago | (5â­) Had a whole year we were content with celebrating all our birthdays here, safe to say we know our limits now. This place came out of nowhere and now i dont want it to leave. The meat selection of beef is too good for the price! Not forgetting their soup bases are really unique with the best definitely being the Sukiyaki and Spicy Pork Bone. The meat is really tender and has a small fat cap on it making it melt in your mouth. ğŸ¤¤ This place is like an endangered species, please take good care of it and make sure to let them make some cash once a while. ğŸ˜˜ 100/10 â­ï¸ - 10 months ago | (5â­) The lunch buffet offers a large variety of meats and fresh ingredients such as vegetables, hot dishes (fried stuffs), hot and cold drinks, desserts, and fruits.

The fresh sliced meats are cut upon order and they are in generous portion. Personally, I really enjoy having the meat as they are delicious with the sukiyaki soup.

Would recommend this place for gathering with friends or family meet-ups.

They also have buy 3 free 1 for birthday deals! - 11 months ago | (4â­) Have always passed by Wagyu and seen many people, got to try it out this time. I could say I regret I did not come soon.

They provide various options on top of beef selections; including a variety of pork meat, meatballs, vegetables, noodles and rice, desserts and drinks. All meat selections are delicious and you can tell that they are good quality. I love beef brisket, it just melted in my mouth. So many choices to choose from~ You can even choose two soup flavours! I spent a good two hours there and I was content when I walked out.
They have a free sign-up lifetime membership for points, a discount on birthday month, etc. It is a great deal. Do inquire about that further with the staff there. The staff are also helpful and fast-paced. Great place to go with friends and family! - 11 months ago

name: Wah Chan
description:
Started in 1955 in Pekan, Wah Chan has grown along with its customers, evolving into a diamonds, gems and white gold specialist along the way. Among the largest jewellers in Malaysia, Wah Chan has more than 50 boutiques in the key urban centres of Pahang, Selangor, Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Perak, Melaka, Negeri Sembilan and Johor.
Wah Chan Sunway Pyramid is staffed by experienced jewellery professionals of engravers, polishers, stone setters, bench jewellers, gemologists, designers, and model makers, many whom have been with Wah Chan for years, dedicated to their craft. Wah Chan is also known for their ability to source top quality diamonds and gemstones, aided by its sheer and volume of the business. By making customer feedback and service a priority, we have excelled in one-in-one jewellery design services and consultation, helping customers with their jewellery needs.
Stop by Wah Chan to discover a huge range of jewellery collections, from gold, rose gold, diamonds, pearls, jade, gemstones, fine jewellery, gold bars, charms and GIA. Wah Chan offers personalized consultations according to your gifting needs or specific occasions, such as diamond engagement rings, 18K wedding bands, bridal jewellery, Valentineâ€™s Day, gold charms for kids and babies, parents, mum and dad, corporate gifts such as good luck charms and pendants or rose gold jewellery as anniversary gifts.
Explore their selection of necklaces, bracelets, rings, pendants, charms, bangles, earrings to surprise your loved ones on a special day! For a unique twist, gift them with precious stones such as ruby, sapphires, south sea pearls, jade and more.

name: Wanderlust + Co
description:
Wanderlust + Co has officially opened its doors at Sunway Pyramid. An independent jewellery label celebrating 12 years of meaningful designs and jewellery kind to your skin and the planet, the brandâ€™s goal has always been to create trendy, affordable jewelry inspired by intuition and individuality, which serve as positive daily reminders to their community, fondly known as the #WCOgirlgang.
Launched in 2010, Wanderlust + Coâ€™s jewels have reached over 150 countries globally with styles seen on some of the worldâ€™s most influential women such as Bella Hadid and Jessica Alba, and many others across different age groups and communities.
Each Wanderlust + Co jewel is made from recycled brass, stainless steel, or sterling silver, coated in 14K gold or rhodium and finished with e-coating for extra luster and durability. In short, hypoallergenic and lasting in wear â€“ jewels you can live in.
As a brand, Wanderlust + Co only works with factories that are SA 8000 and ISO 14001 certified â€“ complying with global ethical standards, ensuring a safe working environment, fair wages and working hours. Their promise to their customers, makers and the planet is to continuously improve their manufacturing process in a sustainable manner.
The brandâ€™s new store in Sunway Pyramid gives the perfect opportunity for their #WCOgirlgang to style their pieces in person, as well as get a glimpse of their latest and bestselling designs up-close. The brand is also offering offline exclusive services such as piercing appointments and product personalization.
Inspired by zen minimalism and their iconic celestial and organic silhouettes, youâ€™re invited to visit their latest store and enjoy a truly experiential experience.
Storytelling has always been at the heart of every new Wanderlust + Co launch, design and campaign, and the brandâ€™s vision is to continue to create with care in years to come.
We hope to see you there!

name: Water Feature
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago
