name: Wheel Chair
description:
Wheelchairs are available for rent at our concierges for your convenience.
Reservation is also available via phone call at 03-7494 3100 or 03-7494 3102 OR via online booking on our Sunway Malls Super App. The reservation will be hold within 20 - 30 minutes of the reservation.
*T&C Apply.
â€¢ Weight of the patron using the wheelchair must be below 90 kg.
â€¢ RM 50 refundable deposit will be collected.
â€¢ 4 hours of usage.
â€¢ Usage for mobility-impaired persons, elderly and pregnant lady.
â€¢ Use a lift to access different floors.
â€¢ Do not carry passengers.
â€¢ Lock the brakes before getting out or onto the wheelchair.
â€¢ Do not leave handbags/valuables unattended.

name: Winter Time
description:
At Winter Time, discover a wide range of quality winter apparel from the leading apparel specialist, with apparel from the likes of fashion premiers like Europe, United Kingdom, USA, Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong & China.
Shopping for winter clothing for the first time? Relax and let Winter Time Sunway Pyramid take care of your needs based on your unique demographics, preferences and desires. Experience moments of warmth as you layer on Winter Timeâ€™s vast selection of jackets, coats, sweaters, parkas, down parkas, thermal wear and boots.
Men can opt for darker, distinguished tones of brown, grey, maroon or black. Start with a layer of thermal clothing with Winter Timeâ€™s Heatpro technology, available in long pants, crew neck shirts, long-sleeved shirts, V-neck shirts, Long Johns and more. Don a cosy long-sleeved sweater or hoodie over your thermal clothing, followed by a parka or down parka lined with a stylish faux fur hood to keep cold air out from your head and upper body. For slightly warmer or wet temperatures such as the Autumn/Fall seasons, slip on a waterproof and snowproof trench coat. Winter Timeâ€™s trench coats are super versatile, with detachable snow skirts and hoods for your convenience, made with breathable yet insulated material for comfort. Donâ€™t forget to slip on thermal socks and protect your feet with classic leather winter boots.
For women, live out your Winter Sonata dream with Winter Timeâ€™s choice of cream, white or pink coats, among other shades. Opt for trench coats and hoodies in various designs, patterns or colours to keep you warm in cool temperatures, and layer on down parkas and parks to brave the freezing temperatures and wind. Complete your look with practical yet stylish winter accessories such as pile lined gloves, ski gloves, knitted or fur scarves and hats, all available at Winter Time.
All these winter clothing items are also available for babies and kids from 6months till 12 years old, including footwear and accessories.
Letâ€™s go for a winter vacation!

no one come & approach us when we enter the shop, we go inside & find our own seat.

the baked cheese pork rice taste so horrible. As u can see from the picture, the rice is not well mixed with the sauce, the texture of the rice is bad as well, weird smell (think they didnt wash the rice properly), the texture of the pork is hard, which i believe itâ€™s a overnight food.

sorry for giving such a bad review, but quality control & taste of the food have to be improved if you want more customer coming in. (this is my honest opinion from my pov, if anyone wanted to try, you are welcome to.) - a year ago | (5â­) We had lunch here and found the decor pleasant. Food was served soon after ordering. I was genuinely shocked by the portion sizeâ€”the egg was the smallest Iâ€™ve ever seen, and the chicken chop was so thin it felt like eating paper. Just two small bites and it was gone.

While RM15.90 isnâ€™t expensive, Iâ€™ve dined at other Hong Kong-style restaurants in Pyramid, and they consistently serve generous portions. Unfortunately, this place didnâ€™t meet those standards. Even the hot tea was disappointing.

This was my first visit, and it will definitely be my last. Not recommended. - 2 months ago

name: XOX 5G
description:
XOX Mobile, a Malaysia Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO) has introduced its first flagship store called XOX Space at Sunway Pyramid! Located on the first floor of Sunway Pyramid just at the edge of the Asian Avenue, this concept store provides a fun, chill environment for people to hangout and explore the range of XOX offerings available. In fact, the store is also a conducive place to perform minor work tasks, a little escape from the monotony of office spaces, especially with the complimentary WiFi connection available at XOX Space.
Wholly owned and operated by the XOX Mobile crew, XOX Space also serves as a service center for people choosing XOX mobile plans, paying their bills, buying reloads and SIM card replacements, and even purchasing new mobile accessories. With vending machines dispensing both drinks and snacks, visitors are encouraged to stay awhile to pass the time.
According to XOX Berhad Group Chief Executive Officer, Ng Kok Heng, XOX Space is strategically located in one of the Klang Valleyâ€™s most popular shopping malls to allow XOX MOBILE to connect readily and easily with its subscribers and potential users, while providing the highest levels of customer satisfaction.
â€œWe want our first ever flagship store to be easily accessible to our loyal customers and to our potential users. XOX Space is our way of extending our reach so that more people can experience our excellent services and customer support in a setting that reflects the XOX spirit or sharing and working together,â€ said Ng.
XOX Mobile claims to serve 1.65 million subscribers via more than 200 outlets nationwide, including care centers, dealers, and through distribution partners. XOX Space welcomes you to drop by, visit a place away from your usual routine, and take a moment to pace yourself again, ready to take the next step to a new day.
ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: YAMAGUCHI FISH MARKET
description:
Business Hours: 11:00am - 10:00pm (open daily)
The culinary landscape in Kuala Lumpur breaks new grounds as the Caffeinees Group of restaurants launches the highly anticipated Yamaguchi Fish Market today, a concept that reimagines the seafood marketplace to serve the freshest catches in town.

Yamaguchi Fish Market is inspired by Karato and Tsukiji Fish Market in Japan where the team sought to bring not only the highest quality and freshest ingredients to seafood lovers but the energetic spirit of the vibrant market as well. The tanks of Yamaguchi Fish Market is filled with fresh catches from seasonal fishes to uni and king crabs that guests can either opt to dine-in and enjoy in a variety of delicious styles or purchase back home at wholesale prices.

Diners will delight in a great variety of fresh-from-the-ocean sashimi and shellfish that the team directly picks up twice a week from the harbour and serve on the extensive and carefully curated menu. Yamaguchi Fish Marketâ€™s signature sashimi and grilled seasonal seafood platters is a rich mix of sashimi, shrimps, king crabs, oysters, clams and abalone. For palates of comfort food, the salt baked tai fish, Yamaguchi eel rice and seafood nabemono takes centrestage.
As a marketplace that offers variety in abundance, Yamaguchi Fish Market also takes a local spin onto the ingredients by opening up its menu to offer dishes cooked in local flavors such as salted egg, garlic steam and superior soup.
location: Suite G-01, The Pinnacle Annexe (Ground Floor)
ratings:
(3â­) The worse seafood I have ever eaten!
The lobster in salt is terribly salty. Presentation is nice for everything.
The steam fish is overcook.
The crabs platters only taste of curry powder.

We cannot finished the lobster  because of saltiness.

Definitely won't come back again - 3 months ago | (5â­) I'm happy with their WhatsApp reservation service. They also provide useful information on price changes on their menu and share promotion meals through WhatsApp.

Finding the shop was a little tricky as it's located beside the Sunway Pinnacle building. You can park your car inside the Sunway Pinnacle to access the next building where the shop is located.

The food quality was excellent. I particularly enjoyed their fish head noodle with crab and clams. The broth was simply delicious. Their signature wine prawns were very fresh, and the wine was super tasty. However, their lala soup was too spicy for me to drink with just a normal spicy level. The crabs were fresh too. I will definitely visit again for their sushi meals. ğŸ£ - 9 months ago | (4â­) The second outlet of this restaurant, located in The Pinnacle Annexe, Sunway was opened in April 1, 2022 â€“ the main branch, located in Kampung Pandan was launched in November 2015.
It occupies 2 floors and has lots of seating capacity.  The decoration is rather haphazard, not that it matters when it comes to food and drinks.  The latter I suspect is the main draw come dinner time.
While the menu is extensive (not using the word lightly here!) and mainly promotes Japanese cuisine, there is also a small section catered to Chinese food.  What was a surprise was that they have quite a good range of set lunches as well!  We order the Teppanyaki Beef set, Teppanyaki chicken set, the Sang Hah Mee and a Lala Noodles Soup.  While the lala noodles was just ordinary, both the beef and chicken were pretty good; generous chunks of meat carefully cooked, almost to perfection in teppanyaki sauce.  The dipping sauce completely complemented the meat, being slightly tangy and sweet.  A more familiar chili paste provided some burn, if required. It also came with a plate of rice, edamame, chawanmushi, tofu and miso soup.   The sang hah mee was generous, a large plate of egg noodles drenched with eggy sauce and topped with one very fresh fairly large prawn (into 2 halves).  One is also allowed add-ons, a soup, a drink and dessert at give away prices.  One normally do not expect the add-ons to taste really good, but the mushroom soup was lovely and the ice-lemon tea refreshingly good too!
Although the service is not top notch, who cares when the food, in my opinion is a steal, particularly the sang hah mee.
(Footnote: I recently ate at a â€œfamousâ€ old school sang hah mee stall in the centre of KL and had to pay triple the price for a prawn smaller than the one I had at Yamaguchi.  Even the serving of noodles was more generous!) - a year ago | (1â­) I visited Yamaguchi Fish Market Restaurant for the Seafood High Tea and was quite disappointed with the food quality. Considering the price(RM102/pax), there are better options available elsewhere. The selection was very limited, with only 14 items to choose from. The salmon sashimi was not fresh, and despite my request for only two of each item, they served the full set. Additionally, drinks were not included in the buffet. The only positive aspect was the food presentation. - 9 months ago | (4â­) Food super good. Drinks a bit overpriced. - 2 weeks ago

name: YEAST
description:
Yeast at Sunway Pyramid Hotel, located at the lobby of the Sunway Pyramid Hotel is a part of Yeast Group, a combination of bistros and boulangerie, namely Yeast Bistronomy, Yeast TTDI, Yeast at Sunway Pyramid and Yeast Atelier. The bistros serve authentic Parisian style bistro cuisine and the boulangerie produces artisanal French bread and patisserie for wholesale and retail sales at all outlets.
We are known for our lively brunches featuring simple yet classic French bistro meals such as Duck Confit, Steak Frites and arrays of sandwiches and other delicacies to choose from. Our Parisian Hi-Tea and of course, casual and romantic dinners are becoming a tradition to many since 2012. Dine with us, enjoy a complete Parisian dining experience. Simply French, Simply Magnifique!
Business Hour : 8am to 10pm daily
location: Lobby Level, Sunway Pyramid Hotel (Ground Floor)
ratings:
(4â­) [too rich ah]
1) overall - decent cafe offering plenty of selection such as coffee, butter croissant, pastries, onion soup, mushroom truffle risotto, egg Mayo croissant, pulled beef brisket and many more, great place to hangout with friends, Yeast is located @ Sunway Pyramid Hotel
2) latte - great taste and great coffee
3) baked eggs - tasted good, loved the baguette underneath the sauce, soaked well and flavourful, perfect runny eggs
4) cheesy bacon omelette - tasted alright, pretty decent and normal
5) egg benedict (Oeufs Benedictine) - simple bread on the bottom, top it off with 2 poached eggs and Bearnaise sauce, it was not as good - 3 months ago | (4â­) Note:
1) located in Sunway hotel, lobby area
2) very peaceful environment for chillax
3) variety of breads and pastry available for breakfast, lunch items (hot food) available from 11am

This is an amazing venue for weekend breakfast, very relaxing! ğŸ¤© The coffee art is  really fabulous, the level of detail is beautiful especially the peacock ğŸ¦š

The breads and pastries are lovely and fresh. We ordered the basket but could not finish, the waiter kindly helped us pack for take-away ğŸ˜

There were not many ppl there, maybe it was too early. Felt like we were on holiday for the morning ğŸ˜Š - 2 years ago | (5â­) Absolutely love the food here ! French fare in a spacious hotel lobby setting . Although the menu here is smaller than their main branch in Bangsar, the quality and taste maintains . My partner loved the basket of breads and ordered a 2nd basket . They were generous with the butter and olive oil with balsamic vinegar too . For starters we ordered the soup of the day which was potato and smoked duck, and onion soup . Both were flavourful and not too salty . From the Mains , we ordered duck confit, seafood vol au vent , mushroom risotto with truffle and my favourite steak and frites . My steak was done medium well, just the way I like it. The seafood vol au vent was delicious too although there could have been just a little more sauce in the pastry . The mushroom risotto with truffle is a must try ! Service here is top notch too . All in all, a very good dinner celebration . - 2 years ago | (5â­) Ordered Egg Mayo Croissant Salmon and Greens (RM29). The croissant is so buttery and fluffy and complement with the egg mayo and salmon. Almond croissant have a denser texture. I think I'll just order normal croissant next time. The hot coffee (RM8) has a very strong coffee aroma. The service is very good. I'll visit again - 3 years ago | (3â­) The food quality has dropped. The signature chocolate drink was horrible. I think premix chocolate powder drink taste better than that. So diluted. Same goes to the latte. Mini lamb burgers and pasta were average. Nothing mind blowing - 2 years ago

description: Zero Sugar Added Frozen Yogurt and Ice Cream

name: YSL
description:
Yves Saint Laurent BeautÃ© is the makeup, fragrance and skincare signature of the most subversive Parisian couture brand. Ever since the first fragrance, Y, of 1964, more than 50 years ago, YSL BeautÃ© has produced true fragrant statements of all time. In 1971, a diverse image appeared of Yves Saint Laurent himself, posing nude for the campaign of the first men's fragrance, L'Homme, by YSL. The brand is now well-known for the most sought-after fragrances such as L'Homme, La Nuit de l'Homme, for men, and Opium, Black Opium, Manifesto and Paris, for women. The makeup products offer the highest technology, under the inspiration of Lloyd Simmonds, Creative Director of Makeup. He has created iconic products such as the Shocking Mascara and the infamous Touche Ã‰clat. The skincare range is all about glamorous, radiant and youthful skin. YSL uses the most cutting-edge technology to create high-end, luxurious skincare products that claim to give a glow to your skin. The products were created purposefully to work well with the beauty products to give you a multitasking hybrid for pre and post-makeup solutions for all complexions.

name: Yakiniku Kuro
description:
A modern twist to your Yakiniku experience!
A brand new smokeless and modern Japanese grilling experience for you with varieties of freshly sliced Angus & Wagyu beef.
ratings:
(5â­) Food is good. Went there for 3rd visit, taste is consistent. But the kimchi marination for beef getting lesser each time. Take 150g beef will be enough for 1 person. Long waiting time during weekend if they did not have spot for 2 person. They will asked if you willing to join table with another customer. Service is fast as not much preparation on their side. The grilling smell is not too overwhelming, doesnâ€™t really stick to your cloth. Overall, all good. Wish they had more seating so people donâ€™t need to wait to the table - a month ago | (5â­) Latest Yakiniku joint in Sunway Pyramid. Great spread of premium beef (Angus and Wagyu), seafood, lamb, chicken and sides. Individual BBQ pit with good ventilation exhaust does not leave any odour in the air or on clothes ğŸ‘

Service staff were attentive and polite.

Marinated BBQ meats were moist, tender and tasty. Seafood and vegetables could have better been served with some oil/marinade on the side to prevent it from being too dry during BBQ.

Overall nice dining venue and would surely come back again. - 3 months ago | (5â­) Latest Yakiniku in Sunway Pyramid, I like that I have the option to sit at my own mini table, it remind me of Ichiran ramen solo table. The meat quality especially the beef tongue was better then expected and the miso soup quality was also decent. I recommended people to don't skip order the beef tongue despite there's no set for it. It's quite surprise to know that they provide himalayan pink salt instead of normal salt.

The waiter was very professional and trying to make me feel comfortable. He was patiently explain to me about the menu. I also overheard him explain to an old couple behind me for quite a long time without getting annoyed. Big respect for the waiter patience.

Overall, the pricing may be a bit steep but for the quality they provided and the service they provided i think it's worth it. Would visit again if I got pass by. - 3 months ago | (5â­) Had a pleasant dining experience at Yakiniku Kuro~ Especially love their Premium Australia Infused Steak Cut! Beef is so juicy and delicious! Love it ğŸ˜» Would definitely revisit again! - a month ago | (5â­) The staffs was attentive, service was good.

The food quality is superb. We ordered Australian beef and the Wagyu beef, both melted in our mouth.

Love the vibe too and the place is well ventilated. - 3 months ago

name: Yong Kang TCM
description:
Yong Kang TCM is a trusted destination for traditional Chinese medicine, offering a holistic approach to wellness and a harmonious balance between ancient wisdom and modern lifestyles. With a profound understanding of the body's natural healing abilities, we strive to empower individuals on their journey to optimal health.
Founded on the principles of traditional Chinese medicine, Yong Kang TCM combines centuries of knowledge with contemporary practices to provide comprehensive and personalized care. Our team of experienced practitioners, trained in the art of acupuncture, herbal remedies, and other therapeutic techniques, is dedicated to restoring and maintaining the well-being of our valued clients.
At Yong Kang TCM, we prioritize the highest quality standards in all aspects of our practice. We carefully select premium herbs and ingredients, ensuring their authenticity and purity. Our state-of-the-art facilities create a serene and welcoming environment, where clients can relax and immerse themselves in the healing journey.
Yong Kang TCM invites you to embark on a transformative wellness experience. Whether you seek relief from chronic ailments, stress management, or a proactive approach to preventive care, our dedicated team is here to support you on your path to optimal health and well-being. Discover the time-honored traditions of Chinese medicine and unlock the healing potential within you at Yong Kang TCM

name: Young Curves
description:
Young Curves lives by its business concept, â€˜best quality at the best price', combining good basics with the fun designs that allows customers to find and experiment with their own style. By offering chic, comfortable and affordable undergarments to females aged 9 â€“ 45, Young Curves at Sunway Pyramid understands how important it is to feel relaxed and at ease all day with the right fit.
Shop for bras of all designs and sizes, available in bold colours such as navy, dark green, purple to express your vibrant style, or dusty lace tones such as rose pink, classic grey or dreamy blue for dressier days. Don a bralettes made with microfiber fabric, removable padding and scoop neck, perfect to wear under a loose dress or crop top. Sizes are available from 75A to 80C at Young Curves Sunway Pyramid.
Junior bra wearers would love Young Curvesâ€™ selection of junior panties and training bras in whimsical shades of sky blue, yellow, pink and purple with cute animal motifs. For chill days at home, slip into a pair of Young Curvesâ€™ relaxed fit shorts and laze around in utmost comfort without compromising on style. Snooze in style with their sleepwear collection, featuring pajama dresses in all colours and patterns, made with comfy cotton for cool, uninterrupted sleep all night.
Hop into your yoga mat or sports training sessions with Young Curvesâ€™ practical sports bra selection, designed to help you stay active and healthy while keeping you supported. Choose from thinner or thicker straps for varied levels of support, and a variety of designs and colours!

name: Young Hearts
description:
The Young Hearts brand is fun-loving, high-spirited, feminine and young.
Young Hearts was created with a passion about living a quality life and hence, we support and encourage this life objective by creating and producing our products with great attention to research, design, detail, variety and quality. Not only do we listen to what our customersâ€™ needs are, we also make sure that we are on trend with the latest in fashion, design and lifestyle.
At Young Hearts Sunway Pyramid, we have a wide selection of daily essential lingerie products to whimsical sleepwear and fun lifestyle products. We hope to inspire everyone who comes into contact with us to love life with passion, confidence and enjoyment!
For those looking for your first stylish yet comfortable training bra, Young Hearts is the place to go as they offer a junior collection made with seamless material for added comfort. Choose from a lightly-lined cropped vest, cami vest or a wireless junior bra for more coverage. Pair your top with fun, printed boxshorts in cute designs and motifs!
Regular bras for young adults in all sorts of designs are also available such as the barely there bralette, multi-way bras which you can wear with straps or without, lightly lined bras, wirefree bras for comfort and push-up bras for a boost of confidence. For training or sport sessions, slip into their sports bra or sports vest for fit, support and breathability. Sizes run from 75A to 80D, and from top medium till top extra large.
A large variety of undergarments are available at Young Hearts, including waterproof, lined sanitary panties for peace of mind during that time of the month. Mini, midi, hipster and boxshort panties are among the other designs, along with adorable animal print panties with ears on the back, made in breathable and comfy material such as a blend of cotton and lace.
A good nightâ€™s sleep will make your day (or night), and Young Heartâ€™s sleepwear collection comes in a set or individual pieces. Take your pick from pajama dresses, pajama tops and shorts or regular pajama sets. The airy, comfy material and dreamy designs will get you feeling all snuggly for bedtime!

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago

name: Zen House Japanese Vegetarian Restaurant
description:
Zen House specialized in Japanese Vegetarian cuisine with a menu created from the mixture of both vegan and the rich culture of Japan. The brand had redefined vegetarian cuisine by experimenting with original flavour and modern techniques, which is a blend of nature and flavoursome. Japanese cuisine is no stranger in Malaysia due to its distinctive tastes, attractive food presentations, and abundance of health benefits. In particular, the Japanese white rice was one of the key factor in contributing to overall health and longevity among the Japanese. The fact that Japanese rice contains a number of well-balanced of nutritional elements such as vegetable protein, dietary fibre, and low in calories. Thus, Japanese white rice being a staple food and pairing with other vegan dishes could promote overall health.
In Zen House, you must try out the Zen signature dishes curated just for you -Volcano Maki, Sashimi Moriawase, Omakase Moriawase, Cheese Shitake, and Zen House special salad. Besides, Zen House has the most creative Japanese vegan menu you can choose from: Appetizers, Salad, Temaki, Makimono, Hosomaki, Nigiri Sushi, Sushi Moriawase, Sashimi, Yakimono, Tempura, Nabemono, Noodles, Donmono, Teppanyaki, and Bento Sets.
As the brand had influenced by the culture of Japan, various vegan ingredients had been used to create a well-balanced Japanese diet. For example, Soba noodles are made up from buckwheat flour and offers beneficial manganese and gluten-free. On the other hand, Udon noodles are made up from thick wheat flour which promote healthy functioning of body cells and enzymes. Both Soba and Udon noodles are ideal for those opting for calorie-conscious diet. Furthermore, those who prefer crunchy texture should try out the wide choices of Vegetable tempura. It is a traditional Japanese style of cooking by deep-frying vegetables coated with light and eggless batter. Another dish that you shouldnâ€™t miss out trying is the Vegan sashimi. The creative fusion of vegetables and other organic ingredients bring out the actual taste of fresh sashimi. Look no further for a healthy and flavourful meal here at Zen House Japanese Vegetarian in Sunway Pyramid.
ratings:
(5â­) We had lunch here and found the decor pleasant and restaurant clean. Service was polite and food served soon after ordering. The bento sets we ordered were delicious with large quantity of food. It was also nice that the green tea was refillable. We had a  nice meal here and will be back to try other items on their very extensive menu. - 8 months ago | (5â­) The best Japanese vegetarian food that I have tried. Even bought takeaway after eating in the restaurant. Recommend to eat the food while it is hot! Service was great, slightly pricely but worth it. - 6 months ago | (4â­) I was delighted to discover this Japanese vegetarian restaurant after browsing a few options at the Sunway Pyramid mall. Finding vegetarian dining options beyond the typical Chinese restaurants can be challenging, so I was pleased to come across this establishment.

For my meal, I ordered an egg roll dish, okra skewer, and kimchi soup ramen. While the okra skewer may not have had the most visually appealing presentation when it arrived at the table, I was pleased to find that the okra was not overcooked. Instead, it maintained a satisfying crunchiness, which is how I prefer my okra to be prepared.

The kimchi ramen was decent overall, though I didn't particularly enjoy some of the ingredients, such as the bean sprouts and cabbage. Personal preferences aside, I appreciated the opportunity to find a suitable vegetarian restaurant option within the Sunway Pyramid mall.

Overall, I'm glad I was able to discover this Japanese vegetarian restaurant, as it provided a refreshing change of pace from the more common Chinese vegetarian offerings in the area. It's always encouraging to see a diverse array of meatless dining options becoming available. - 7 months ago | (5â­) Wonderful Japanese food for vegetarians! Loved the katsu don and inari sushi especially. - a month ago | (4â­) If you are in vegeterian and looking for Japanese food, this is a great place to be. Their sushi and shasimi really tasted 'real'. Good food. Only complain is their wasabi does not have the kick as you usually in a normal Japanese restaurants. - 8 months ago
displayNam: Zen House Japanese Vegetarian Restaurant - Sunway Pyramid

ratings: (5â­) Love this place! I do all my piercings here now. I don't experience any pain after piercing (of course I can't sleep on my ear for a while). name: adidas Brand Center
description:
The adidas Malaysia Brand Center serves as a central hub for consumers to experience the entire breadth and depth of the brand, showcasing the latest innovation and technology as the worldâ€™s leading sports brand.
Taking up 19,974 sqft (four shop lots) in LG1 of Sunway Pyramid, the new adidas Brand Center is the largest adidas store in the country, which makes this massive outlet the ultimate destination to shop and browse for the full adidas range, from sports performance wear to sports lifestyle wear and special releases such as the Yeezy collection.
The design of the outlet is inspired by a stadium design and is the first-of-its-kind retail concept in Malaysia which incorporates local elements, such as iconic local landmarks and cultural hues, all effortlessly integrated into one spacious sports arena.
For those less inclined to sports and fitness, adidas Brand Center offers a wide range of lifestyle collections such as the Classics and adidas Originals collection and the global creatorsâ€™ collaborations. Other unique aspects of the Brand Center include in-store category specialists to recommend products based on your unique needs and fit.
A â€˜Test & Createâ€™ section allows customers to try out footwear such as adidas signature Ultraboost, Pureboost, Pulseboost and more in real-time by running on the treadmills provided, complete with an outdoor running simulation for the full experience.
The store also offers personalized services such as a Print Shop to custom print your name on a purchased jersey on the spot, and an exclusive women-only changing rooms for safety and convenience, equipped with a call-button in each cubicle to request for a change of apparel or bra sizing.
Shop for all your favourite adidas clothing such as jerseys, sports bras, sports tops, long sleeved tops, leggings, joggers, sweatpants, hats, caps, footwear, sneakers, accessories and gym bags for men, women and children, spanning across all different sporting needs such as running, football, basketball, gym training and many many more.
ratings:
(4â­) Massive store, thatâ€™s why itâ€™s the brand centre I suppose? I went to pick up an online order and unfortunately, there were some hiccups. After showering my order number, the staff went to look for my parcel and said itâ€™s not there. Impossible, because I have a picture of it being delivered. After the second time, they managed to find my parcel. That was the only issue. While waiting for the staff to look for my item, I browsed around and they had a crazy sale. I ended up buying shoes because it was up to 70% off for it! - 3 months ago | (5â­) Fantastic set up. This is the biggest and the most comprehensive outlet of Adidas. Best Adidas outlet in Malaysia without a doubt. The staffs are all pro-active and very knowledgeable about its products. It has 2 floors. Adidas Performance at the lower floor and Adidas Originals on the upper floor. Widest selection is available here and you get the latest products and customization here too ğŸ‘ highly recommended. Well done! - 7 months ago | (1â­) I was at your adidas branch on the 26th of January on Sunday. Went there to purchase & customize a Jersey. STAFF no. 1 served me and went to confirm with the customization team which letters and numbers were available in stock. After confirming, STAFF no. 1 said that ONLY THE LETTER A was not in stock so he recommended me to purchase the letter at the Liverpool store opposite of adidas ( apparently he said that adidas customers do that when adidas runs out of letters or numbers ) So I went and purchase the letter A at the Liverpool store and went back to adidas to finally purchase the jersey. When I came back to the store I was served by STAFF NO. 2. STAFF NO. 2 brought me to the customization area to confirm the customization after I had told them the story of me purchasing the letter A. When I was at the customization counter suddenly the customization staff now said NUMBER 1 is also out of stock? To add another plot twist to the story after going back and forth with the staffs there, the same customization staff that initially SAID THE LETTER A and NUMBER 1 was unavailable suddenly said THE LETTER S is also out of stock when I showed him the playerâ€™s name and number for the second time? And what would have happened and how would it have been resolved if I went to the Liverpool store again and purchased the number 1 only for the hopeless customization staff to say that now the letter S is also out of stock? :D
( Do note that In the midst of encountering all these 3 incompetent staff and me going back and forth purchasing the unavailable letter at a different store I already showed them the Name and Number I wanted to put on the Jersey ) I donâ€™t usually get triggered or mad at things like this as I am also working as a retail staff and I know how fussy certain customers can get sometimes but honestly it was your staffs fault for handing out wrong information over and over again. Wouldnâ€™t it just be settled if any of the 3 staff actually would have just told me which letter and number was unavailable in the first place? Hence, today was probably the dumbest customer service Iâ€™ve encountered in my years of being a customer.

On a happy note, another Female customization staff was working on that day but she was at the upper floor as she was in charge of the redemption counter on that day ( based on the information given to me ) she was the one who apologized and insisted on reimbursing me for the initial letter A that I purchased. Kudos to her for helping out in settling the matter as the other Male customization staff kept laughing and saying that â€œI donâ€™t knowâ€ a million times throughout the whole issue. Felt bad that she was the one who had to take out money from her own pocket when it was the initial 3 useless staff that caused the whole problem with their wrong information to begin with.

According to the female staff, she said that the customization team and the retail team arenâ€™t linked together. So my opinion / suggestion is for both side to get correct information beforehand so something stupid like this does not happen again because itâ€™s quite troublesome for your customers when each staff is giving out a different story every time. - a month ago | (1â­) Had a sales guy ( Ashraf? ğŸ˜…Dude...don't scold customer lah if you can't hit your sales target...wuuuttt. - a month ago | (5â­) Myself and my husband were browsing Adidas online store and there were few unique edition which has limited unit and size. name: dipndip
description: Retailing of chocolate desserts and beverages
ratings:
(5â­) Good place to relax and spike ur glucose levelğŸ˜. Fast service and good dessert. Will come to enjoy dessert again. - 4 months ago | (5â­) Our choice was the exquisite Crunchy Triple Chocolate Crepe. This delectable crepe boasted a moist texture with delightful crunchy crumbles. It featured a generous serving of vanilla ice cream, generously topped with a frozen chocolate sauce and drizzled with premium flavored chocolate sauce. What surprised me most was that, despite the abundance of chocolate, the dessert had a well-balanced, not overly sweet taste. I had expected it to be much sweeter, but the overall flavor was just right. - 7 months ago | (4â­) During my visit to Malaysia, I had the pleasure of staying at the Sunway Pyramid Hotel. One evening, we decided to indulge in a delightful snack at Dipndip, conveniently located just a few floors away from our hotel lobby. They are located at Sunway Pyramid Mall.

Our choice was the exquisite Crunchy Triple Chocolate Crepe. This delectable crepe boasted a moist texture with delightful crunchy crumbles. It featured a generous serving of vanilla ice cream, generously topped with a frozen chocolate sauce and drizzled with premium flavored chocolate sauce. What surprised me most was that, despite the abundance of chocolate, the dessert had a well-balanced, not overly sweet taste. I had expected it to be much sweeter, but the overall flavor was just right.

Without a doubt, this crepe ranks among the finest desserts I've ever had the pleasure of tasting. I highly recommend giving it a try! - a year ago | (5â­) Dipndip at Sunway Pyramid exceeded all expectations and provided an unforgettable experience for my family this evening. From the moment we stepped in, we were greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere that set the perfect tone for a delightful evening. The staff was incredibly friendly, attentive, and eager to ensure that our visit was exceptional.

Now, let's talk about the star of the showâ€”their chocolate creations. Dipndip boasts an impressive array of mouthwatering desserts that are truly a chocolate lover's dream come true. Each bite was a heavenly explosion of rich, velvety chocolate combined with a variety of delectable toppings and fillings. From their signature chocolate fondue to the indulgent crepes and waffles, every dish was crafted with precision and love.

What made the experience even more enjoyable was witnessing the skilled chocolatiers in action. The live chocolate preparations added an interactive element and allowed us to appreciate the craftsmanship behind each creation. It was a pleasure watching them pour, drizzle, and sculpt the chocolate into beautiful works of art.

Furthermore, the attention to detail in both presentation and taste was remarkable. The desserts were beautifully presented, showcasing the artistry and passion that goes into every dish. As we savored each bite, we could taste the quality of the ingredients and the dedication put into creating a truly exceptional dessert experience.

Moreover, Dipndip's commitment to creating a family-friendly environment was evident. The cozy and inviting seating arrangements, along with the charming decor, made us feel right at home. The staff went above and beyond to ensure that our children were comfortable and catered to their needs.

Overall, our evening at Dipndip in Sunway Pyramid was nothing short of extraordinary. We left with satisfied taste buds, happy hearts, and wonderful memories. If you're a chocolate enthusiast or simply looking for a memorable dining experience with your loved ones, Dipndip is the place to be. Prepare to be enchanted by their chocolate wonders and indulge in a sweet journey like no other. - a year ago | (1â­) Love the desserts here but service staff couldâ€™ve been better. Theyâ€™re so rude. We saw the strawberry dip desserts asked if we could dine in and one staff said no, then another staff said yes but we have to pay for the service tax and proceeded with saying â€œwhat do you wantâ€. Lol thatâ€™s just upright rude and we really didnâ€™t mind paying for the service tax but dude was just really rude. - a month ago

name: iORA
description:
The heart of the business is well-made apparels at economic pricing for everyone. We are driven to reinvent styles that will inspire and serve as an expression. Expect versatile and timeless designs that see beyond seasons from workwear to smart casual styles, iORA is a one-stop destination for all clothing needs.
With significant demand in the retail scene, iORA sees an opportunity for sister labels to cater to every aspect of a womanâ€™s stage in life. That is when Lalu and Sora came to light. Lalu is a provision for contemporary street style and all about feeling comfortable in oneâ€™s skin. Sora is an extension label of accessories to complete your daily look from small goods to footwear.
Comfort and quality are deeply rooted in our DNA, our designs are carefully designed in-house to meet the real considerations of a woman as we want women to feel unreservedly comfortable in their skin and carry themselves with confidence in iORA.

ratings:
(5â­) Very large. If I lived here, I would take a few months to even fully explore the place, much less try out all of the stores. Pretty fun, lots to eat and shop, so honestly it's worth living nearby. Food isn't very pricey so that's also a plus. - in the last week | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a shopperâ€™s paradise and a fantastic destination for entertainment, dining, and more. The mall is enormous, with a wide variety of stores ranging from luxury brands to affordable options. The unique Egyptian-themed architecture makes it stand out, creating a visually stunning experience as you explore. The food court offers an excellent selection of delicious cuisines, and thereâ€™s always something happening, from events to exciting attractions. The staff is friendly, and the facilities are well-maintained. A perfect place for a family outing or a day of shoppingâ€”highly recommend! - 3 months ago | (4â­) As a frequent visitor, hereâ€™s my take on Sunway Pyramid:
â€¢	Diverse Shopping: With a wide array of shops, it caters to all family members, from fashion to gadgets.
â€¢	Family-Friendly Activities: The mall features an indoor ice-skating rink and a massive arcade that are perfect for kids and adults alike. My daughter loves to play at Parenthood. They have upgraded it too recently and we enjoyed it.
â€¢	Food Haven: Offers an extensive selection of dining options from fast food to upscale restaurants. For Indian food you can try Mantra Restaurant (Not great but decent)
â€¢	Convenient Layout: Despite its size, the mall is well-organized, making navigation easy.
â€¢	Themed Decor: The Egyptian-inspired architecture adds a unique charm, making every visit memorable.

It is connected to Sunway Lagoon. - 2 months ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid, located in Bandar Sunway, Malaysia, is a prominent and well-loved shopping mall known for its unique architecture, diverse offerings, and exceptional customer service. One of the standout features of the mall is its impressive Egyptian-inspired design, with a large glass pyramid at the entrance that captures the attention of visitors. Itâ€™s a visually appealing and iconic landmark that creates a memorable first impression for anyone approaching the mall.

The mall boasts a wide variety of retail stores, from high-end fashion brands to affordable, trendy boutiques, catering to shoppers of all tastes and budgets. Whether youâ€™re looking for international brands or local gems, Sunway Pyramid has it all. Itâ€™s also home to numerous dining options, with restaurants offering diverse cuisines ranging from Malaysian delicacies to Western comfort food, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

In terms of entertainment, Sunway Pyramid goes above and beyond with a range of activities, including an ice skating rink, a bowling alley, and a cinema, making it a perfect spot for family outings or social gatherings. The cleanliness and well-maintained facilities enhance the overall shopping experience, with clear signage, ample seating areas, and a comfortable environment for visitors.

Customers have consistently praised the mall for its friendly and helpful staff, who are always available to assist with any queries. The convenience of ample parking spaces and well-connected public transport options makes Sunway Pyramid accessible to all, further enhancing its appeal. With its wide range of offerings, excellent customer service, and pleasant environment, Sunway Pyramid continues to be a favorite destination for both locals and tourists alike. - a month ago | (5â­) Sunway Pyramid is truly a gem in the heart of the city! From the moment you step inside, youâ€™re greeted with a vibrant atmosphere and an impressive array of shops, making it a perfect destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The mall is vast, with a wide variety of stores, from high-end fashion boutiques to trendy local brands, ensuring thereâ€™s something for everyone.

The design of the mall itself is stunning, with its iconic Egyptian-themed architecture adding a unique flair. The spacious layout makes it easy to navigate, and the many open areas and atriums offer a refreshing break from shopping.

What stands out the most is the variety of dining options. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for casual bites or fine dining, Sunway Pyramid has it all. From international cuisines to local favorites, the food court and restaurants offer a delightful selection to suit any taste.

For entertainment, the options are just as diverse. Whether youâ€™re catching the latest blockbuster at the cinema, having fun at the ice skating rink, or exploring the interactive attractions, thereâ€™s never a dull moment at this mall.

The staff are always friendly, and the overall experience is top-notch. Sunway Pyramid truly caters to every need, making it a perfect spot for family outings, friendsâ€™ gatherings, or solo trips. A place where shopping meets fun and excitementâ€”highly recommend it! - 3 months ago
